67b6: shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gzungs gang la gnas shing gzungs de thos na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
67b7: 'gyur ba dang dam bca' ba bzang ba dang / chos la mi gnas pa dang / bdag the tsom ma mchis pa dang / slob dpon ma mchis pa dang / rang gi lam la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad drag s+ho//
67b8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu legs so legs so// shA ri'i bu gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas nyid du brjod do// shA ri'i bu gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa la sti stang
68a1: du byed dam bla mar byed dam/ rim gror byed dam mchod na des sangs rgyas thams cad la sti stang byas par 'gyur ro// gang dkri gzungs 'di thos pa dang / gang dag mos pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas rnams ji lta ba bzhin du
68a2: mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu gzungs ni 'di yin te/ san d+ha ra NI/ ud d+hA ra N+Te/ sam pra tiSh+Thi t+te/ mu ta ma/ su pra tiSh+Tha tA/ bi dza ya ba lA swa b+ha pra ti dz+nyA/ a ro t+na/ dz+nyA na ba te/ ung bAd r+thi/ hrIn
68a3: ma nI/ a b+hi Sheny+tsa ni/ a b+hi Sh+Tha d+hA rA/ shu b+ha ba te/ a ni shI ta/ ba hu kum b+ha/ a b+ha pa tsa/ shA ro'i bu 'di dag ni dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi ming rnams te/ 'das pa rnams dang ma 'ongs pa rnams dang / da ltar byung ba rnams dang lasa?
68a4: par gnas pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' gang gis legs par gzung ste 'chang ba de myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dag smon lam gyis zad par byed par mi 'gyur/ de la mtshon gyi
68a5: mi tshugs par 'gyur/ me dang srog chags mi srun pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum mo// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la lnga stong
68a6: gsum gyi stong chen po'i grangs med pa bcu mthar chags su gang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams la na bza' dang / zhal zas bzang pos bskal pa grangs med par gzung ba byas pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis gzungs 'di la
68a7: than tshig gcig tsam bzung ba de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu dbang bskur ba'i gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag/
68a8: dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho//
68b1: na 'am padang / na Sh+Tad / mas/ dgas cha sa sa / na // /
68b2: bad+ham/ nga ska rtsa/ 'phags pa mi gnam par stong bags bya ba'i dag sngags sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la byan 'tshal lo// 'di ga bdag gis pas bcus gcagan/ chom ldan 'das pa
68b3: da babang po zhig na shA rgya rnams kyi nang na bzhugs te/ de'i chas ng+yas zhes bya ba na shAkya ba de bzhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa/ chos dang dag 'dun la mngon par dad pa/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / tsha sa la byabs su so /
68b4: dge 'dun la skyabs su song / sangs rgyas la gcig tu phyogs/ chos la gcig tu phyogs/ dge 'dun la gcig tu phyogs/ sangs rgyas la nem nur med cing bcom med/ chos dang dge 'dun dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba
68b5: dang 'gog pa dang / lam la nem nur med cing the tsom med la gan mthong ba 'bras bu thob pa/ mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba/ mtshon cha dang / dbyig pa por ba zhig gnas pa de'i mig la snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i gzugs rnams snang
68b6: bar ma gyur nas/ de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te yid la byed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba mdzad pa/ sgron ma 'dzin pa/ gsal ba 'dzin pa la phyag
68b7: 'tshal lo/ / bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ gsal bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mig rnam par sbyang du gsol zhes byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das lha'i gnas pa la bzhugs pa lha'i snyan
68b8: rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas shAkya bde bas tshig de skad brjod pa gsan to/ / gsan nas kyang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la mig rnam par sbyong ba'i
69a1: rig sngags 'dis shAHbde ba la bsrungs bgyis shig yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde lags su 'gyur ba dang / chang pa spang ba dang / mtshan chas/
69a2: pa dang / dug gzhil pa dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bgyis shig/ de dang de bzhin du 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang //
69a3: sems can gzhan gyi mig kyang rnam par sbyongs shig/ mig gi sbubs rnam par sbyongs shig/ mig skyon med par gyis shig/ tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ ki li mi li/ hi li te mi li/ hu yA hu yA hu yA ma ni/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ hu ru hu du tu du/
69a4: tsak+Shar me/ bi she d+ha ya swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par spyong pa 'di ni mig gi skyon dang / rlung gi skyon dang / mkhris pa'i skyon dang / bad kan gyi skyon dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skyo na sel te/ tshul khrims kyi bden
69a5: pa dang brtul zhugs kyi bden pa dang / drang srong rnams kyi bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung gi bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa dang //
69a6: dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bden pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bden pas shAkya bde ba'i mig na bar ma gyur cig/ mchi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig/ kun du mchi ma
69a7: 'jug par ma gyur cig/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur cig swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par spyod pa 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug gis gsungs
69a8: pa'o/ / nga yang da ltar 'chang de/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi bdag po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang rjes su yid rang ngo // kun dga' bo gang gis rig sngags 'di dus gsum du brjod na de la
69b1: thibs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rab rib 'am/ ling tog gam/ mig nad sngon por mthong ba 'am/ mig gi yul gyi skyon lha las gyur pa rnams sam/ klu las gyur pa rnams sam/ dri za las gyur pa rnams sam/ gnod sbyin
69b2: las gyur pa rnams sam/ srin po las gyur pa rnams sam/ sha za las gyur pa rnams sam/ byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ ro langs las gyur pa rnams sam/ ro langs dang byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ kun du rgyu las gyur
69b3: pa rnams sam/ kun du rgyu dang ro la ngas las gyur pa rnams kyis tshugs par 'gyur ba ni lha dang bcas pa dang bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang mi dang lham
69b4: yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas med do// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di
69b5: nams bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas shAkya bde ba gal ba der song ste/ bde ba mig rnam par sbyong ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la bskur gyis nyin re zhing dus gsum du dran par gyis
69b6: shig ces de la rgyas par smras so/ / shAkya bde bas thos ma thag kho nar mig rnam par dag ste/ mig rnam par dag pas dri ma med pa'i mig gis thams cad mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
69b7: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / shAHbde ba dang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mig rnam par stong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags
69b8: rdzogs s+ho/ / @/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba a na ta rA yi bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas la phyag
70a1: n a na su rdzu ga stsag
70a2: byang byugs nasum 'dagapa la dbang pa'i brag gan pa gas so/ / de nas pa'i da ba ba can pa'ab 'i chos pathar // de'i 'a byed kyirtag pa sa sa ba nga ldan pa zhun pa sa
70a3: mo'i 'khor dang / gsog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ ya na drug ba
70a4: dang bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de'i phyir khyed kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang dag gis bdud tha sracad dang phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin du tshar bcad par
70a5: 'gyur ba bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di rnams nyon ci/ / tad+ya thA/ a b+ha ya/ b+hA ya bi ga ta/ b+ha ya pa ri sho d+ha ne/ a b+ha ye/ a b+ha ya na da ya/ ni drA ba k+ShiSh+Te a nakral/
70a6: N+Din/ sa bi kAs ba / sa/ @#/ bkagan su gas/ sa ba shag/ me ni/ oM d+hang+ga/ bi / ma ma /
70a7: nga/ ga ga/ rnas sa / @
70a8: nishri d+hI/ ba mar bA k+ShanA ma/ bar dza ya dr-iSh+Ti ga tra nA~M/ dz+wa la nan d+ha rmol kA le yu kra Ta nAM/ d+harma ni d+han s+ya saMrba ta nAM/ d+hi mgo shaH/ ko shi ka khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gan dag ni khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags ga/
70b1: gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang / byir rgol ba thams cad dang / pas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin du tshar gcad par 'gyur ba dag go/ 'di bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par bar
70b2: du gcod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur/ don thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ de'i tshe 'di skad du// kho bo lha
70b3: las ma gyur la/ / 'di nyid na ni 'dug bzhin du// kho bos tshe yang thob zin gyis// grogs dag de ltar shes par gyis// shes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// 'di'i mthu thams cad kyis bdag gi bar du gcod pa dang bgeg
70b4: dang log 'dren thams cad ni med par gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni grub par gyur cig/ na mo a ke tu le na ge tsaN Da na ye swA hA/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni ya swA hA/ d+harmA sA d+ha ni ye swA hA/ sarbA da ra ya bi sho d+ha ni/
70b5: ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang bcas pa dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das
70b6: kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba
70b7: ban d+he bzhes/ rgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba an tar saM grA sa d+hA ra NI man tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs
70b8: sngags/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje gzung sngags 'di su 'dzin pa
71a1: dang 'chang ba dang bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni dug dang mtshon gyis 'chi ba dang / ltogs pa dang mtshon brgyab pa dang gcan zan ma rungs pas za ba dang / mes tshig pa dang chung 'chi ba dang / 'go ba'i rims gzhan la
71a2: nga ba dang mdze'i nad dang / gser mi rung ba'i nad yang ba dang g.yang la lhung ba dang / gzhan gyi byad dang zas kyis mnangs pa dang padag rang gis gsod pa dang de ltar gshis ngan du 'chi ba bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par mi 'gyur ro// byag
71a3: rdo rjeg rgyang ma grags 'di su 'dzin pa dang 'jang ba dang / pazlas brjod byed pa da la nis dang namamakha' la gnas pa'i gags tshigs pa can madrangs pa rnams kyis kyang thag rnyed par mi 'gyur ba/ kan rdo rjegazungs
71a4: 'di su 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang bzlas brjod byed pa de la las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad kyang shing dag ste/ bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// o badz+ran naDa ma hA de Sha na hUM phaTas pra
71a5: tapa la hUM phaT/ sarba bi g+h+nAn an ta rA ya bi nA sha ka ra mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na 'grub pa'o// nges par 'grub pa'o zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags rdzogs s+ho/
71a6: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dra mi dra bi d+yA rA dzA/ do dang / lag la khro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das mnyan
71a7: yid na sreg ma'i myu gu'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis glog thams cad zlog pa so sor 'brang ba sngon gyi yang dag par rdzog pa
71a8: sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs par yang da ltar 'chad kyis zung shig/ kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'od ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod// kun dga' bo lho phyogs na skad brgya zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa
71b1: zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ / kun dga' bo byung phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod do// kun dga' bo gang la la thog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la glog gis 'jigs pa thams cad du
71b2: mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ / klog gi med 'di dag yi gar bris te gnas gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu grog thams cad mi 'bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags shin 'di dag pa
71b3: stsal to/ / tad+ya thA/ ni mi nai ne mi mi ni mi ni ni min d+ha re/ 'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir grog thams cad las bdag la bsrungs shig bsrungs shig swA hA/ yang de'i cha byang chub sems dpa
71b4: sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'gro
71b5: lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ ha de khi ha te/ ni ha te/ pra t+yar+thi ke/ pra t+ya mi tre/ shud d+he/ mug ge/ bi ma le/ pra b+ha swa re/ aN Da re/ ba Na Da re/ shwe te/ ban d+ha ra bA si ni/ he ri kang de/ bing ga la k+Shi da
71b6: mu khi/ rus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis bdag dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ de nas
71b7: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das gal ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi
71b8: tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ mu ne mu ne/ mu ni mu ni/ ro ra/ pa ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA pa ti/ hA hA hA hA/ khyod la sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes spras kyis d+hir+d+ha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi
72a1: bzung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying la 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris na de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'gral pa thams cad las thar bar/
72a2: bgyi'o// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba bskyed pa'i sladu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
72a3: gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ / d+ya thA/ ti'i mi li/ tsi li swA hA/ ThaH skA re swA ra swA hA/ p+lag r+b+he puH saM sta re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi srung batshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyib ste dus sa
72a4: lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te bcom ldan 'das
72a5: la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ni ba ra nI b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ mA dAn d+he/ ma ti ma ti/ te Ti/ go rigan d+ha ri/ tsaN
72a6: DA li/ mA taM gi/ ba ra la ni/ hI na ma d+ha ma hA ra nA ma la ni/ da la mad te/ tsakra ba kri/ sha ba ri shi pa ri swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad
72a7: las rnam par thar bar bgyis pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su slob pa legs so// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor zung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnamathos
72a8: pamaldan 'dasags pa da lags subal po snang ba da te bcom ldan 'das la 'di gad ces gas la ka bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgya ba la ldan pa dang skye ba mang pol bde ba dang / 'jig rten nyid
72b1: brtse ba'i slang du chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi lo/ / d+ya thA/ pra r+the pra 9/ d+han pa ri ha / Ar+yA pra sha ste/ ni drug te/ maMg le/ skye / sa bste swAhA/ btsun pa com ldan 'das
72b2: 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po bad gcag gi srung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bya ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad lalas 'gas pang rtsod pa// tshe stong ba drus ma lags par 'gram pa thams cad las yongs su slob pa lags
72b3: so/ / de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po klog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po klog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan
72b4: 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi bsrung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba glog thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/ dug thams cad mi gdug par
72b5: bgyid pa/ gshed byed pa/ byad dang ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa 'jig par bgyid pa mchis na bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang / ser sna spang ba'i slad du thag brtse bar dgongs te de bzhes
72b6: su gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni sems ser sna can ste/ sems ser snas kun nas dkris pa lags pa'i slad du'o// tad+ya thA/ a ra dze/ a ma re/ a mri te/ ak+Sha ya/ bun+d+ha par+ya
72b7: ba te/ sarba ba barba sha ma nI ye swA hA/ Ar+ya prar+tha mo pa k+Shi ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la'i lcel 'don tam yi ger bris pa de la klog gi 'jigs pa
72b8: thams cad ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ / rtsa ba'i dug gam mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyig drug gam/ gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bdag
73a1: 'jigs pa thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i bdag po de dag la legs so zhe
73a2: bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzangs dag khyer skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su gzung ba'i phyir 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pa legs so/
73a3: legs so phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang rab tu myos pa rnams bsrung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong
73a4: ba de dag dang / klu'i dbang po de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags
73a5: kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho/ / // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
73a6: @/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+h+wa dza a gra ke yU ra nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag/
73a7: 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na za ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams las bas
73a8: rab tu pham nas/ de brtad cing rings pa'i gzugs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
73b1: bcom ldan 'dra bdag ji ltar lha ma yin dang g.yul bkye ba las lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris las pha ma rab tu pham na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang pham rab tu pham na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
73b2: cag gi de ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po khyod kyis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs zung shig/ ngas kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar
73b3: gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan las 'di mnos so/ / mnos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do// mngon par dran te de tshun chad 'jigs pa 'am bag tsha ba'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa'am/
73b4: tha na skad cig yud tsam yang lus la gnod pa byung ma myong ngo // bcom ldan 'das rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan rma bgyi ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ya dza ya/ bi
73b5: dza ya bi dza ya/ dza ya mA hi ni/ shang ka ri shang ka ri/ pra b+had ka ri/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sarba sha d+d+hA/ dzaM b+ha ya dza b+ha ya/ stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dza ya bA hi ni/ ma thA ma thA/ pra ma thA pra ma thA/ gra sa gra sa/ has
73b6: ha sa/ hUM hUM/ la hUM la hUM/ la ma bo d+ha ri/ tre ne tre/ tsa tur thA ga dre/ tsa tur daiSh+Te/ tsa tur b+hu dze/ a si mu sa la/ tsakra tri shU la/ badz+ra ka ba dza d+ha ri/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ oM b+ha ga ba ti/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa
73b7: pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hun bi d+ha na/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ba ra se n+yaM/ bi d+hA na sa ya/ sarba shad+d+haM nA sha ya/ d+hA dza a gra ke yu re/ tri Ta tri Ta ti Ta/ b+hi Ta b+hi Ta/ u la kA mu khi u la ka d+ha ra NI/ trai lo kya ma thA ni/ bi
73b8: d+hAn sa ya par se n+yan/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig sungs shig/ tsa la tsa la/ tsa li tsi la/ tsu lu tsu lu/ ka pa~M ka pa/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ mum+ba muny+dza/ ad Ta hA sam bi d+h+wa na sa ya/ ba ra sa n+yan/
74a1: bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya b+hU ma ya/ bud d+ha sa t+ye na/ ma sen ga sem ye we'o// sa t+ye na/ bud d+ha sat+ye ma tri kram/ d+ha ma sa t+ya ma ti kra ma/ sa kyus
74a2: ma ti kra ma/ sat+ya bA ti nA/ sa t+ya ma ti kra ma/ lam bo d+ha ri/ lam bo d+ha ri/ ku Ta ku Ta/ kud Ta kud Ta kyad Te/ kud Ti pa ya kud Ta pa ya/ rud dra ma nA ya biSh+Ta ma nA ya/ tsan dra sUr+d+ha b+ha/ mAn trai lokya a d+hi ba ti ma nA ya sarba d+hi pa ti mAnA ya/ sarba
74a3: yaSha rak+Sha sa/ gan d+har+tha/ ku bA Na Da/ ma ho ra gA d+hi ba d+hi ma nA ya/ bi d+ha na sa ya pa ra se nA/ rang ga rang ga/ rang gA pa ya rang gA pa ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ shraSh+pa mA li ni/ run d+ha runaH/ ti ri ti ri/ tsi ti tsi ti/ d+hi ti d+hi ti/ bI ku Ti/ mu la pa ra sen ku long
74a4: sA d+ha ni ka ri/ ha la ha la/ hi li hi li/ hU lu hu lu/ he he/ ri Ni ri Ni/ ri ni ma ti/ dzaM b+ha d+hA dze/ sarba bud d+ha a ba lo ki te/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ti swA hA/ gu Na rA dza pra b+hA sod ta ma
74a5: swA hA/ sUr+ya arka bi ma le swA hA/ tsan dra arka bi ma le swA hA/ sarba gra ha nak+Shad+ya d+he mI ka ra Ne swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs sheg swA hA// lha'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan gyi
74a6: rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'dis khyod g.yul spyod pa 'am/ 'thub pa'am cod pa'am 'gyed pa'am/ gang du 'gro yang rung ste mi 'jigs shing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la
74a7: mthul du btags na ma'i rgyal ba dang / skyes bu dpa' bo thams cad la srung bar byed do// bud med kyigazugs lta bur bsgyur nas mdun du 'dug ste mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing srung bar byed/ dbal skyed par byed/ pha rol gyi sde pa 'god bar
74a8: byed/ bkra shes pa dang gtsang ba dang / grags pa dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa kun du gnas par byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas tI
74b1: 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mitra dang / dA na shI la dang /
74b2: zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bskur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma dI marden dra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sa'i dbang
74b3: po zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du 'od bram ze sa'i dbang
74b4: bo shing sa la chen po lta bu'i gnas lha dang ldan pa na bzhugs te/ de nas bram ze sa'i dbang po shing sa la chen po lta bu bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan
74b5: 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du 'od kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze sa'i dbang po shing sa la chen po lta bus bcom ldan 'das yang dag
74b6: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du 'od la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bla na med pa pang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab lags na/ gang gis bdag skye ba dran par 'gyur/ bdag bla na
74b7: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs
74b8: pa'i sangs rgyas kun du go ci bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sa la chen po lta bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / de'i phyir bu khyod gal te de ltar smon na de'i phyir kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di zung shig chongs shig
75a1: lhogs shig kun chub par gyis shig/ kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ a mo da ni/ pra mo da ni/ bi mo da ni/ saM mo da ni/ pri yang ka ra Ni/ shA ka ra Ni/ shA ka ra Ni/ bo d+hi ka ra Ni/ a nud
75a2: ta ra/ s+yan samyaka saM bud d+ha ka ra Ni/ a nud ta ra Ar+ya ka ra Ni/ a nud ta ra pradz+nyA ka ra Ni/ a nud ta ra ba shI ka ra Ni/ a nud ta ra sarba kle sho/ bkle sha bi d+ha ra nI/ a ba d+hA na d+ha ka ra bi d+ha ma ni/ a nud ta ra bi d+ha a lo ked pA da ni
75a3: a nud tar she k+Sha shi la bi d+yA tsa ra Na/ ba mug ti gu Na ga Na/ saM b+ha d+ha ni/ a nud ta ra sarba ku sha la mA lod b+ho da ni/ a nud tar b+ho na mU la ni/ a nud ta rA ra ga to sha mo ho na mU la ni/ a nud ta ra shai k+Sha ma na a bi d+ha/ an ta ka rA
75a4: bi d+ha ma ni/ a nud ta rA sI/ ibitri a pra ti ta tha la tsakra/ a nud ta rA sarba lA ra ba bi drA ma ni/ tAd hi b+ha dre/ a nu da ta rA ba la b+ha dra/ su b+ha dra/ shI b+ha dra/ a na ta b+ha dra/ sa man ta b+ha tra/ a sa ma sa ma b+ha dra/ a nud ta ra ma hA bu ru Sha b+ha se
75a5: bi tA a nud ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha a nu brta nI/ a nud ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha d+harmA de shi kA/ a nud ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha d+harmA ko sha saM b+ha d+hi kA/ a nud ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha Ni rbA Na/ a nud pra ta ra shi kA tA da hi b+ha dre/ gang ga si ta bak+Shu/ sam/
75a6: myaka sa bud d+ha d+he a sa~M bi ta/ b+hA bi tA/ ba hu lI kro ta/ sU ta/ sto mi birna tA/ pra sha ta/ bu 'di ni kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po yin te/ de bas na bu khyod kyis kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di gro ba dang 'greng ba
75a7: dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang yang yid la gyis shig/ bu gang la la zhig kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di ming dang / rigs dang rigs kyi bye brag gang yid la byed dam/ skyes pa'am bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo
75a8: 'am lha'am/ lha mo 'am/ klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ dri za'am dri za mo 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ lha ma yin mo 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ mi 'am ci mo'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po ma'om// yi dgas sam yi dgas po'am/ sha za
75b1: 'am/ sha za mo'am/ grul bum 'am/ grul bum mo 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam lung 'bog gam/ ston tam 'chang na de tshe rabs bdun gyi bar
75b2: du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ / de ji srid 'khor gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro// lhar gyur kyang rung / mir gyur kyang rung ste/ de mtshon cha 'am dug gam chu'am
75b3: mes bar ma dor 'di 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs
75b4: pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chi med 'od can ba rgyal ba 'od srung gi/ rigs dang bcas pa la phyag
75b5: 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od chen po rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od chen
75b6: rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mnyam pa med pa rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
75b7: 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mi mnyam pa da mnyam brgyal ba'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drang srong chen po 'od srung gi rigs
75b8: dang bcas pa bdun po de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ / zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bram ze sa'i
76a1: dbang po chen po shing sa la chen po lta bu yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa sa'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho//
76a2: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gas chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mdzad
76a3: Da nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pra be con chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa rus gcig na/ bcom ldan
76a4: 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sgrag can zin rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i
76a5: gnas na bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na 'dug go/ / der 'di lta ste/ lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi 'am
76a6: ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon
76a7: rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / gzig rnams dang / bya rog rnams dang / 'ugu pa rnams dang / grog bur dang / sdig sbrul rnams dang / gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe dang ldan pa
76a8: sgra gcan zin la shin du gtses so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgrag can zin bya rgod phung po'i ro ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ge la bi der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
76b1: ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngus te mchi ma blags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa skrag can zin la bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan zin khyod ci'i phyir nga'i
76b2: mdun na 'dug nas mchi ma blag/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil
76b3: pa'i gnas na bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na mchis mchis na/ der lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi
76b4: 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / sha za'i
76b5: gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / gzig rnams dang / bya rog rnams dang / 'ug pa rnams dang / grog sbur rnams dang / sdig sbrul rnams dang / gzhan yang mi dang mi lags pa'i sems can rnams/
76b6: kyis bdag la shin du gtses lags mod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/ sgra can zin khyod kyis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang /
76b7: dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba 'di zung shig/ tad+ya thA/ ad gA/ ba da gA/ tang gA/ tar dgra
76b8: sa rA sa rA/ ta rang gA sra/ sa dang sa/ dza d+ha rA/ ag ka re/ a rA bI rA/ ta ra bI rA/ ka ra bI rA/ kargar bI rA/ tsu ru bI rA/ tsu ru tsu ru/ bI in dra/ in dra ki/ sa ra ha na sa/ ha na sa ki sa ra/ ma tsi re lA/ ma hA mid tsa/ ma hA mid tsa
77a1: ba hiShI kA ka ling tsa ka ang ga dza ye/ dze yi li kA/ e la/ tsin ta/ li li/ ti le ti le/ su ma ti/ bu su ma ti/ tsu lu nad Te/ tsu lu tsu lu na da Te/ tsu la na Ta/ ku na Ti/ ha rI Ta ki/ na rI Ta ki ta go ra/ gan d+ha'i/
77a2: d+hAd+ha ra Ni/ d+hA ra Ne/ uSh+Ta/ bi bI li ka/ uSh+Ta/ bi pi la ke/ ka ra kaR+Shi ke/ kA ke li/ tsa la nad Ti/ ka gi ma le/ la ma ti rak+Sha ma ti/ bA la ku le/ bad sa le/ un mi le/ ta ra bI re/ ta ra ta ra bI re/ ku ru bI re/ ku ru ku ru bI re/ tsu
77a3: drenud+ha/ tsur+ya tsu dra bI re/ ma hA bI re/ i ra ma ti/ ba ra ma ti/ rak+Sha ma ti/ sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ni/ pa ra ma su ra sA d+ha ni/ a pra ti ha te/ rgyal po dbang po dang / rgyal po zla ba dang / rgyal po gshin rje dang / rgyal po rlung lha dang /
77a4: rgyal po gzi can dang / rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / rgyal po be con dang / rgyal po ba con med dang / rgyal po tshangs pa stong ldan dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje/ chos kyi rgyal po/ 'jig rten thams cad
77a5: la thugs brtse ba bla na med pas bdag la bsrung du gsol/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyab padang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gsad pa
77a6: dang / dug gzhil pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba mdzad du gsal// tad+ya thA/ i la me le ta sa lA/ i ra ma ti/ bi ra ma ti/ tsa la ma ti/ phu ru ma ti/ phu ru phu ru/ phu ru phu ru/ pa ra khu ru ru/ khwa dram
77a7: tib+hU mi maN De/ ka li ke/ tsaN Da li/ a ki sa rA le/ i yA sa/ sa la ma to hu s+thu le/ sha la dza ya s+phA le/ tsa la nA Ti/ tsa la nA Ti/ nA ga nan d+hA ra tI/ go ra hi ni/ go le/ ti hi/ aN Da re/ paN Da re/ ke yu re/ ke tu ma ti/
77a8: b+hU taM ga ma/ b+hU ta ba te/ d+har+ye ma hA pa le/ a tsun de/ a tsur+ran de/ d+ha ran d+ha ra/ dza ya li kA/ dza le ge ro hA nA tsa ra hu ru hu ru/ run d+hu run d+ha/ hu ru d+hu ma ti/ d+ha ran d+ha re d+ha re/ bi shra ma ti/ na shwan/ ma ta d+ha ni/ mo tsa ni/ bi mo tsa ni/ sa d+ha ni/
77b1: sho d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni/ saM gi ra ni/ na bI ra ni/ ad tsid da ni/ sa d+hu ta ra mA ne/ ha ra ha ra/ ban d+hu ma ti/ hi ri hi ri/ gi ri le/ hu ru hu ru/ bing ga le swA hA// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// skra gcan zin po con chen
77b2: po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags brgya rtsa bcu pa 'di/ skud pa la mdud de/ lag pa la btags sam/ mgul du btags na/ kun nas dpag tshad bcu khor yug tub con rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / phyag rgya rnams kyis de bsrung
77b3: ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// mtshon dang / dug dang / nad dang / rims nad dang / rims drag po dang / rig sngags dang / ro langs dang / khro gdug dang / me dang chus 'chi ba'i dus byed
77b4: par mi 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags dang gsang sngags sbyor ba rnams legs par sbyor ba thams cad kyis ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par byed pa'o// grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa'o// pha rol gyi sbyor ba 'ching ba'o// pha rol gyis bcings
77b5: pa las grol bar byed pa'o/ / nad dang / mya ngan dang / bgegs rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o// 'thab pa'i rnyog pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa'o// gdon gang gis mi gtong ba de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa
77b6: bzhin mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so/ / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar ba/ kun du 'bar ba/ kun du rab tu 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du
77b7: 'gems so/ / rgyal po chen po bzhi yang lcags kyi 'khor lo spu gri so lta bu'i mtshon gyis phung bar byed do// gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten de nas shi 'phos nas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gnas pa mi 'thob bo// sgra gcan zin rgyal
77b8: po dang mi rgod dang / me dang / chu dang / mtshon dang 'brog dang / dgon pa dang / ri dang mya ngan du song ba gang gis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'di lan gcig brjod na/ sdig pa thams cad las rab tu thar bar 'gyur ro//
78a1: sgra gcan zin be con chen po'i gzungs sngags 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa/ gsung gi gsung bar 'gyur ba mchog tu grub pa/ gzhan gyis
78a2: la thub pa/ lha dang / klu dang / dri za la sogs pas bstod pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba ste/ bdag dang sems can thams cad gnod pa thams cad las bde bar gyur cig nad med pa dang 'jigs pa med par byur
78a3: cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa betson chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
78a4: rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na ma tra dang / dAn shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su mu la
78a5: nan ma d+hA ra nI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi
78a6: drung na byang chub kyi snying po'i mchod rten chen po na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge 'dran chen po 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa nyan thos chen po thams
78a7: cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang /
78a8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang yang tharas
78b1: gcig go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis na/
78b2: bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/ gang gis sems can rnams la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad kyis gnod pa mi bgyi bar bsrung ba dang bskyab par 'gyur ba
78b3: dang 'di lta ste/ lha dbang po rnams dang bu'i dbang po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang srin po'i dbang po rnams dang / 'byung po'i dbang po rnams kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa dang mtshon dang / dug dang byad kyis gnod par mi
78b4: 'gyur ba dang / phar mchi'am slar mchi'am/ nyal lam/ gnyid kyis log gam// smyos sam/ rab tu smos kyang rung thams cad du yang skyob par 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de lta bu'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/ ji
78b5: ltar bdag rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim gro 'tshal ba dang / rtag tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su skyob par 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
78b6: rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'thab pa dang / mchang 'bru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / nad dang / dus ma lags pa'i 'gum pa las bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ba'i srad du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa 'tshal lo// de nas bcom
78b7: ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / lag na rdo rje khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs
78b8: pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legs so/ / de'i phyir lag na rdo rje khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o// u gu mu gu pa li ni/ ban d+ha ni bal
79a1: tsam na btu ba hu ba hu li brta ya swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags gzhi rnams bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gzung bar 'gyur ro// byin gyis rlob par
79a2: 'gyur ro/ / tad+ya thA/ badz+ri badz+ri badz+ri badz+ra d+ha ri/ badz+ra pA ni/ badz+re d+ha ti/ tsakra badz+ri/ tsakra d+ha ri/ pa Tu d+hi d+hi ri/ b+hi ri/ mu ri tsi ri/ a hu ri/ b+ha ga b+hai b+hi ri/ shi re tra shi ri/ ru ru tse ru ruH/ tse ri tse ri/ da ri tse le/ tsu rari mu ri paN Da re/ sdig pa thams cad
79a3: 'jig par byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba 'gog pa nas rmi lam ngan pa'i bar du 'gog par byed pa/ tad+ya thA/ ban d+hi da/ ga ga re ni/ mu rda ni/ bra mu rda ne/ nA sha ni pra nA sha ni/ nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa nA
79a4: rmi lam ngan pa'i bar du 'gog par byed pa/ 'di lta ste/ nA sha ni/ khan d+ha ni ban d+ha ni/ ts+tshin da ni ts+tshin da ni/ tsi ri mi re/ ma he ha na ni/ be na pa re/ ba re be re/ bi ri bi ri kho d+hi bo d+hi/ suSha ni/ sha ra ni/ ba ru ba ri ni/ ba ra hUM ye/ brad+d+hA nA ri ni/ in dra u0f7f/
79a5: te/ d+hi d+ha piM ni/ na mo ma he shwa ra ya Ni/ ri shi/ b+h+r-i dza ni pA pa dza ha ni/ kA la pa ti ni/ b+hu ta ba da ni/ sa t+ya ga the/ so ma bA di/ so ma pra b+he swA hA/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ tad+ya thA/ ha ra ha ra ha ra hA Ni swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ i Di ta ga Di ta bi di da/ a ye na/
79a6: a ri ban dza ni/ ka karda ni/ putra da da ha ni/ marga a b+ha ro ha ni/ hus pa ti/ mu ba da di/ hi le hi li/ ya thA ba dz+wa ya/ ya thA a ga ni ya ShA pa ra na tsa ya tA na ga ShA dza ma/ ya thA hri da ya swA hA/ lag ni rdo rje 'di ni sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs te/
79a7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rje sa sems can rnams kyi don du bshad do// ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa
79a8: dang / bden pa'i thugs dam gyis rnam par gzhag bzhin du nga yang 'chad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu chen po'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'od zer gyi snad
79b1: bzung ngo / 'od zer gyi sdang ba des bskul bas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas chas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa khyed kyis
79b2: sems can thams cad kyi don du sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzungs sngags gzhi rnams snang bar byed pa mchog tu dga' bar byed pa/ dran par byed pa bshad pa legs so legs so// bdag cag gis kyang
79b3: byin gyis brlab bo/ / legs so zhes bya ba byin no// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin cing nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i yon tan gyi zan yon nyi
79b4: shur shes par bya ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ba dang / ngan song du 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
79b5: med par 'gyur ba dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / ring du 'tsho zhing grags pa dang ldan pa dang longs spyod dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nang med pa dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus
79b6: dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dgyes shing thugs su chud par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad kyis bsams par 'gyur ba dang / dge bar spyod par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i don la rab tu brtson
79b7: pa dang / sdang bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par
79b8: 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas kyi gzungs sngags gzhi rnams gsungs shing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin
80a1: ces brlabs pa yin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lagan rdo rjes bcom ldan 'dal 'di sad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdagagis kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
80a2: ma de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bsnang ba'i skad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams pashad par bza'o/ / su zheg sa bzang po zhes pa chos kyi rnamagrangs stong ba dag sngags 'di 'dzi cing nang ba yang sa nas rmegapa
80a3: rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ shi khi shi la shi khi shi ka/ tsa tsa tsi tsi/ b+ha b+ha b+ha b+hA/ ru du ru ru/ dzodzadzi dzi/ pra gra gra grA/ hri hrI hI hre/ ta tatata/ ma ma ma ma/ tan tan me/ sarba praN+Dad+hi k+ShAr had ta mas
80a4: sha tra la/ patsa pa tsa me/ sarba a ti te shi na swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dngos
80a5: grub dam pa'i gzungs sngags gzhi rnams spras pa legs so legs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe sbyor ba'i rig sngags 'di
80a6: 'dzin cing na bar langs nas klog pa de'i spu'i khung bu rnams su mdangs thams cad stsal bar bgyi bar bshad par bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ ti li mi la tse li swA tA/ grAm sA+e sAs bu ng+gA ma ba sug ne aka 'a be// pu sha sa ra sta re swA hA/ btsun pa/
80a7: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gang nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsrung ba dang yongs su bsgyur ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya
80a8: byin gyis 'disad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa dag gis kyang gang tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di dag 'dzin cing nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos bsrung ba dang yongs su
80b1: bshA pa'i thang dus sa rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gzung sa sngags pa'i rnams pakad pang ba'o/ / N+yak+sha d+ha Ni N+ye bar ni/ ra T+Ta/ mod tu daH/ ga tugs dam / ba k+shas// rna la dz+wa la
80b2: nitsi thAka ka pa re/ ga ba re/ ga mar/ sha ma re swAhA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung da rtul po chen po'i phags skyes po dang rgyal po chen po sagami bzang gis sem nA
80b3: gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gang go / bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe stong ba'i rig
80b4: sngags 'di 'dzin cing na bar langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bsgyur pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ / d+ya thA/ puwe su praSh+pe/ sho d+ha ni/ sau sho d+ha ni/
80b5: ma pa ri ta re/ Ar+ya pra sha ste/ shAn te/ nair mug te/ ma ga l+ye/ te ra na Na ga r+b+he sa re sta pa ti swA hA/ de nas 'byung po'im mo 'phrogasas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang
80b6: sgo bzang po'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing nar par langs nas klog pa dang / yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrur ba dang yongs su bsgyur ba'i skad du gzungs kyi
80b7: gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par brtse'o/ / d+yathA/ ba laM saMb be le sa la/ ma hA ba bi la/ sa ma las/ sa mo la se/ bu ru Ne/ Ta ru gu ru Ne/ ma bA ku ru Ne mu swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen
80b8: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bkye ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
81a1: 'dzin cing nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ ad Te pu khang Te pra/ nad Te pu/ ku nad Te phu/ ma nad Te pu/ mu Na da ta ha ke pu/ shri thA
81a2: b+ha ge pu/ me ge pu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi
81a3: ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing nang bar langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / yongs su bskyang ba dang yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bsgrub pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su
81a4: 'gyur ba dang chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil bar bgyi'o// mtshams btsang bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ he badz+re te badz+re / tI pA/ bi si gi si/ ma hA bi si pra swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos 'di skad ces gsol
81a5: te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs/
81a6: sngags gan rnams brjod par babya'o// d+ya thA/ hu lu du lu du lu du lu lu/ sarba b+hU ta pra ti shed+ha ne kA ro mi swA hA/ de nas sde dpon gnon nus bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyang ba btud te bcom ldan 'das la 'di
81a7: skad ces gsal to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gtsad ma 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su
81a8: bsrung bar 'akra pa'i spad du gzungs sngags gzhi 'di rnams brjod par babya'o/ / d+ya thA/ ti'i te la/ Nam ti la/ ti li te 'i/ ma la ma 'i/ khu ru du nga/ du h+ya ru/ sarba b+hU tA rba ti de na kar mi sA / de nas lha'i buzla 'od kyis bcom
81b1: ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gtsang ma 'di 'dzin cing nang
81b2: par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ aM ge/ ba ge/ tsaM ga hi ni Di De/ da di/ tsi tsa pu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
81b3: chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan das bdag gis kyang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing nang par langs nas klog pI
81b4: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu modang de la yongs su bskyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / tad+yar+tha/ ha te bi ha te/ sarba pra t+ya/ rI kA prat+yA mi tra shud d+he/ mug ge bi mug ge/ bi ma le/ ni ma le/ nirma le/ pra b+ha sA re/ pra b+ha ka re pu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
81b5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi
81b6: bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / d+ya thA/ dzA le dz+wa le/ ma hA dzA le dz+wa le/ dz+wa la ni/ ug gi mug ge sha me/ pra sha me/ ma hA pra sha me/ sha me sa ma d+he ma rdzaman skyes ma sa tra dz+ra li/ dz+wa le ba me bu sA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sded pon kha ba/
81b7: ban gyis bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyi gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngag
81b8: 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// d+ya thA/ u du ma pa re/ u dum pa re/ dum be re pra dum pe/ b+hA ba rde/ A na g+he/ sa ma d+he/ ma hA sa ma d+he/
82a1: nI le nI le/ nI la ke she/ ke shi ni ku la ku le/ ma hA ku le/ nI la ku le/ sid d+hi sid d+hi/ ma no ha re/ ad Te/ bad kre nad Te/ kun da Te/ sa mthe/ ba ba la ku tse/ dAn te/ nI la ka she/ ku le nI la/ d+hA na te dzAM gu le/ du she mU she ba lang
82a2: ku she/ ha la ku she/ pha la mu tse swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bde ba'i ri gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
82a3: gis kyang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ a ma le bi ma le/
82a4: nir ma le/ maM ga le/ hi ran gar+b+he/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ ka ma sh+tsi ni yu bi ra dze/ ku Ta ku Ta/ ka ma pa le prah+ma prah+ma swa re/ prah+ma sid d+he/ sid d+ha ma nor the bu swA hA/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log+sa/
82a5: su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par ladra n+ya klog pa'i
82a6: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ badz+re badz+re/ ma hA badz+re/ badz+re da ni/ bud d+ha
82a7: badz+re/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te badz+re/ su bud d+he/ ni bud d+he/ ba hu bud d+he/ bi shiSh+Ta bud d+he/ shud d+he bud d+he/ bud d+he/ ni shaM grA ma ni/ tsaM ge le/ a la se/ ti le me/ ti le ti le le/ mne/ shAn ta shAn ta/ gA mi nI pu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
82a8: la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing nang par
82b1: langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ hi le badz+re/ hi hi badz+re/ he he badz+ra/ ya ba ki ri ki ri badz+ra swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ aN Da re baN Da re sh+ya te/ bad Da ra ba si ni/ kin na re/ ka rA de/ ke yU re/ i
82b2: hA bud d+he/ tatra bud d+he/ b+hU dze b+hu dze b+hu dzi ga me/ b+hU dza pA pa te/ b+ha ye b+ha ye/ b+ha ya a gra pa te/ bi nI bi nI/ sha ri pa the/ shi ba ba the/ a di da t+ya pra the/ te dze te dza ba to/ A kA sha ba the pu swA hA/ de nas rdo rje po nya mos bcom ldan 'das gal ba de losra
82b3: su thal mo sbyar ba btud to/ / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog
82b4: pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ku Te ku Te/ ku Ti ni/ ku ta ku Ta re swA hA/ nI le nI le/ nI la ke she swA hA/ bI te bI te/ bi ta ki she swA hA/ lo hi te lo hi te/ lo hi ta ke she swA hA/ a ba
82b5: rA de/ a ba dA de/ a ba da ta ke she swA hA/ many+dzi Sh+Tha many+dziSh+Te/ man+di Sh+Te ke shi swA hA/ tsakre tsakre/ badz+ra tsakre swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
82b6: thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzangs dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis lha dang / 'jig rten skyong ba khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs sngag
82b7: gzhi 'di legs par brjod pa legs so legs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sgo bzang po
82b8: zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnams grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur// lha'i dbang po dang klu'i dbang po dang gnod sbyin gyi dbang
83a1: bo dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsams par gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
83a2: bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs/
83a3: te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / d+ha na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes
83a4: sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas btan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+harma swa gar nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang /
83a5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bA rA NA sIn drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /
83a6: thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba dang / dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag
83a7: ngas ni chos zab mo mthang ba dang/ 'a gtogs par dka' ba/ zag btags pa/ mkhas shing shes par rig par bya ba rtogs so// ngas ni skye bo mang po la ba/ pa dang / skye ba mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la
83a8: snying rtse ba dang / skye bo bal po che'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// ngas thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir nges pa kho nar bsgrub par bya'o/ ge slong
83b1: dag chos kyi rgya mtsho'i gzungs shes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ blo gros kyi blo dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan
83b2: pa brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pa/ gsung gi mchog dang ldan pa/ spobs pa mchog dang ldan pa/ mkhyen cing gzigs pa dag gis bstan cing bshad pa yod de/ gang dag de shes pa dang / gang dag de 'dzin
83b3: pa de dag gis ni myur ba kho nar chos lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ / lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ thos pa 'dzin pa'i dran dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rjed ngas pa med pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhing chos bzung ba rnams chung za bar
83b4: mi 'gyur ba'i blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang rnon po thob pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yi ge dang don dang tshig la 'jug pa'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can
83b5: rnams kyi chu'i lam mngon par shes nas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/ chos lnga po 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
83b6: bzhag go/ / da ltar nga yang 'jog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyi sdom gyi gzhi bsdu ba khyod la bstan par bya ste/ des na khyod kyis ma
83b7: thos pa'i chos rnams thos par 'gyur ro/ / thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gzung ba'i chos rnams ni nyams su len par 'gyur ro// nyams su blangs pa'i chos rnams ni gzhan dag la khong du chud par
83b8: byed do/ / tshig gi rab tu dbye ba lnga ni 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / de bzhin du ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / bla na med pa'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / sa nas sa brtags pa'i yi
84a1: ge'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / nges pa'i tshig dang brda sna tshogs kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba'o// de la 'di dag ni gzi byin bstan par byed pa'i tshig rig sngags dang ldan pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
84a2: kyi gnod sbyin dang srin po dang grul bum dang yi dgas dang sha za 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags pa thams cad kyis gang zag de la zas kyi sna grangs rnams dang / sman rnams sbyin par 'gyur ro// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig chos las byung ba gzhan dag la mi
84a3: gnod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis mnos pa/ bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni 'di dag yin te/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nyon cig khyod phyis 'gyod ta re/ sAd ya the
84a4: dan/ karba ke ta ma nud tse/ ra ti ru ta bran dra ma/ thu man/ de la ta/ a saM ku la s+thA/ bu mi an sma ri/ i sha ga ma i sha s+thA/ klen a nu ga te/ yA mu la gum b+he/ pa b+he ma gur ba ya ba/ a s+ya ba kya s+ya bi le ga/ be lam tha/ shrI ba pa rI ban tsa ka/ pras tam ba
84a5: pe la/ a gra ba la/ ni shi khu u tse dzu me/ u dze dzu me/ kun dga' bo 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyi dbab pa grub dang / gnod sbyin gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ba la bsnyen bkur
84a6: yang byed byed/ rim gro byed byed pa rnams 'ching ba ste/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gnod sbyin dbab pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams zung shig/ kun dga' bo gang la la gsang sngags kyi tshig skyon med pa'i tshig 'di dag 'dzin
84a7: pa dang 'chang pa dang kun chub par byed pa de la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi sems bzhin du gnas so/ / kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bas ni dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// kun
84a8: dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin srin po snang byed ces bya ba gnas so/ / kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin cher spyod ces bya ba gnas so// kun dga' bo byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na ni gnod sbyin nam/
84b1: grangs zhes bya ba gnas so// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling na ni gnod sbyin grags thob ces bya ba gnas te// kun dga' bo gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gnod spyan gzhan gzi brjid zab gang /
84b2: yin pa de dag kyang dad pa thob par 'gyur ro// dad pa thob par gyur nas kyang dad pa mi phyed par thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed de// kun dga' bo de la 'di dag ni shes bzhin gyi tshig drang srong gis bstan pa dag yin te/ kun dga'
84b3: bo khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gi mchog gi tshig mchog srog chags 'byung po thams cad la rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i tshig rnams zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ / kun dga' bo de la de'i phyin 'brang ba'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa deng/
84b4: gis kyang bar chad mi nus so// sAd ya the dan/ dan d+ha ra ma hA ha ra ha ra ma ba ra na/ rud dra tra/ ku ma ti dri tri/ in dra man tu ke/ a ba te/ sa ha rA/ sa d+hu ma ti/ i la la ba ma ti/ a bi tA/ ta ra pa ra/ yi biSh+Na sang biSh+Tha a ba tiSh+Tha/ ba ra birta/ i sha
84b5: brta/ sa da brta/ kra ma kra ma ti ran/ a si pa tsa ma la bi na ha thi/ Sha sha su re/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ug kra mug kra/ ug ga ba ti bi sa ra gra ma ti/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang grul
84b6: bum dang / yi dgas dang / srul po dang / klu dang / dri za dang sha za gnas pa gang yang rung ba de dag gis khyim gyi nang na gnas pa dang / lam du zhugs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i tshig 'di dag thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ro// /
84b7: kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig/ phyis 'gyod ta re/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin grub pa 'di dag ni// gling ba'i dag na gtso zhes bya// gsang
84b8: sngags 'di dag su 'chang ba/ / de yi dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi// gnod sbyin de dag lhags nas ni// chos rgyal rnams kyis bstan pa dag/ nyams par gyur pa de la ston// dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po yang
85a1: mthar gyis su ni song nas kyang / / zab cing don dang ldan pa yi// tshig 'di dag ni mnyan par bya// 'di dag chos kun tsa ba ste// de dag mkhas rnams nyan par gyis// drag po dag gis thos na yang // byi nas mchog tu dga' ba ste//
85a2: gang la bde dang sdug bsngal med// de la de ni dga' bar 'gyur// sa 'di chags pa med pa ste// sangs rgyas sa ni bsam mi khyab// chags pa med par bstan pa yi// bsam yas sa de thob gyur nas// nyi ma sprin las byung ba ltar// de ni sa steng
85a3: de bzhin snang / / 'di la skye mched phung po rnams// bden dang byang chub yan lag dbang // dge ba'i chos ni zab mo rnams// sangs rgyas gsungs pa ci yang yod// de yi thos pa'i tshogs rnams gang // nams kyang chung zar mi 'gyur te// mthos
85a4: chos rnams de dag thos/ / nyes dang nyes min rnams la mkhas// rtogs par khong du chud pa'i mchog/ mig bzangs rnams kyang dag par 'gyur// 'chang ba dang ni ston byed pa// de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bsngags// sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la//
85a5: the tsom mi mnga' bden pa gang // bden des bdag la lung mnos pa// ci yod thams cad gnas gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung rnams la// byams pas gnas pa'i bden pa des// rang gi sems dang gzhan sems la// ston pa rab tu//
85a6: gnas gyur cig/ gling bzhi'i gnas kyi gnod sbyin dag/ ma dang pa dang dad par bstan// gang la rtogs pa mi snang ba// de la de kun don ston 'gyur// gnod sbyin skar gdong gang yin dang // glang chen sna dang khyad par stobs// drag po dga' byed gsod
85a7: byed dang / / zla ba mgo med lug bsod pa// dpa' sde dang ni lag dpa' dang // srin po dang ni sa 'dzin pa// ljang khu kha dang na bzangs dang // ral gri'i spu can bong bu rnams// thams cad grub par byed par shog/ gsang sngags 'di dag su 'dzin la//
85a8: gnod sbyin srin po de dag ni// spro bar gyur nas 'dzud par byed// rtag tu de ni spobs pa dang // tshig rnams dang ni lung bstan dang // nges pa'i tshig dang chos kun dang // yi ge rnams la mkhas par 'gyur// lung gnos pa yang chud mi za//
85b1: tortogs pa mtha' yas 'phel bar 'gyur// rtag tu don dang yi ge la// de yi shes pa 'phel bar 'gyur// sum bcu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang // mi mdzod bdag po tshangs pa yang // de yi legs bshad nyan pa rnams// de'i mang la dran par
85b2: byed/ / sAd ya thed na/ hu kun/ khu kun/ ta ran/ bi ha ra na/ i sha sa kra ma na/ o su mu la/ ta kan/ a ga Na ma bri la/ u s+tha me/ ka ba ha re/ u ru ba/ pra ba Na tan/ sagra me ba ha dza ga re/ pra shig re/ gu rta ba ne/ ud tan/ bi gu Na/ i sha kun/
85b3: at+ya la b+ha la/ a Ti ba Ti/ ba ri tsa mo sha/ ha ra dza ga ta/ e ba saM pra mu khe/ a ga ba re/ Sha hu sa hu/ i ti yaShA hU/ tsa tur dI bi ka ya na/ Sha hu ma hu/ ug gra hu/ d+hA ra sa hUM/ saM pra ta ma bi na pra ta sa zin t+ya pradz+nyA br-id d+hi ye/ Na tu sa hu/ ka ra ku rAH
85b4: sa su/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gsang sngags kyi ni tshig 'di dag/ gang gi lag dang lus la yod// de ni thos la rmongs pa med// de ni shes rab med mi 'gyur// sker mdo 'ji bzhin nyi ma bzhin// zla ba ji ltar snang ba bzhin// de ltar thos
85b5: dang don gyis kyang / / mya ngan 'das pa'i bar la reg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gsang sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to// sAd ya the dan/ tsa ra r+Ne bi tsa ra d+he/ a ma~M ku te/ a ti mi ti/ pa ra ha re/ g+ha Na b+he/ hi ba ra me/ ma hA briti bA hA ne/
85b6: dza ya dza ya/ a nu ke/ ba la pa le/ ug gra ba ti/ swa ra sA ra/ a bi sa re/ gu gun de/ pra bi ba bar+d+he/ sa me/ a dzi ta dza ye/ nu pa le su kho ma su san d+hi ni ku ma no/ sak+She tsA pe tsA pa/ tsu ba/ tsu lu tsu lu/ bu lu bu lu/ bya ba pra sa re/ ka ra kab+hin/
85b7: d+hebidz+nyA bi d+ho/ a pra ti sa nad+hi/ mA nA nA ma ti/ bran nu ma ti/ a ring gi/ rdo lA nu ba ni de/ a saM pra a ba ti/ rig sngags bsdus pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lus la thogs te 'chang na/ gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
85b8: khams na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang grul bum dang / yi dgas dang sha za gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / dbang du ma gyur pa rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro// don thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gnangs
86a1: bzhin du 'tsho ba'i mthar thug gi 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ med par mi 'gyur ro// de la chog ni 'di yin te dgon par 'dug la gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad zhag bdun gyi bar du brjod de/ nyin lan gsum mtshan/
86a2: lan gsum du dran par bya'o// de nas zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
86a3: snyad dag / ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsha zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gang gyi mkhan bsuM rin
86a4: dra bo d+hi dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ kA thA dri ya d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs/
86a5: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa dang / le lo dang ni cung zad chog par 'dzin// 'dod chags dang ning rgyal spyod pa dang // 'gyod pa dang ni ma nges spyod pa rnams// sema?/
86a6: can rnams kyi sgrib par gyur pa ste// de yi gnyen por theg pa mchog bstan pa// de yis bar du gcod pa de dag gi/ nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur// ta dA thA/ oM badz+ra pra kA ra badz+ra pra kA ra/ badz+ra tsakra/ daMSh+Ta b+ha yAn
86a7: ke/ a ma le// bi ma le/ ning ma le/ tsu lu ke/ tsu lu tsu lu sarba bud d+he swA hA/ tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs la ni// tshig gam don gyi sgo nas gang sbyor ba// sems can dam pa blo dang ldan pa des// phan yon rnam pa bcu
86a8: dag thob par 'gyur/ / khams rnams mtha' dag rtas par 'gyur ba dang // 'chi ba'i tshe na mchog dga' dam pa 'thog/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang // thams cad du ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams dang /
86b1: phrad par 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin de dag las ni theg mchog zos// mos par 'gyur ba blo dang bcas pa dang // sgo gnyis dang ni byang chub myur du 'thob// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/
86b2: Ar+ya Sha Ta mu kha nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi byams
86b3: gnas gtsang ma'i steng nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu rnam par phye bar spras pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te de'i tshe bcom
86b4: ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ / rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs zung shig/ de ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba nas 'khor
86b5: ba'i skye gnas gzhan dag tu bdag gis sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba de sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur cig/ bdag gis 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang ci myong/
86b6: bad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su spyod par gyur cig/ bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las gang ci byas pa de so sor bshags pa bla na med pas so sor ma bshags par ma gyur cig/ bdag gis bdud
86b7: kyi las gang ci byas pa de yongs su shes pas bla na med pas yongs su mi shes par ma gyur cig/ bdag gi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yang rung gang ci yod pa
86b8: de thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bur gyur cig/ bdag gi rnam par grol ba gang ci yod pa des sems can thams cad rnam par thar bar gyur cig/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la bdag gnas par
87a1: ma gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ o k+Sha me k+Sha me/ k+ShAn te k+Shan te/ da med me/ dAn te dAn te/ b+ha dre b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre su b+ha dre/ tsan dre tsan dre/ su tsan dre su tsan dre/ tsan dra ki ra Ni tsan dra ba ti/ te dze ba ti/ ya sho ba ti/ d+harmA ga
87a2: ti pram+b+ha ba ti/ sarba kle sha bi sho d+ha ni/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba ang+gi pra sha ma ni/ ba ra mAng+ga sA d+ha ni kA ya bi sho d+ha ni/ bA ga bi sho d+ha ni/ mnaHsaM sho d+ha ni srAhA/ rigs kyi bu dag de ltar na rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
87a3: zhig gis sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum klags na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang nas skye ba bdun gyi bar du de skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
87a4: chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das dkyi zhing de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/
87a5: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags bsgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya/ ShaT kA ri bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags sangs rgyas
87a6: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba la / yul ba/ kun dga' bo yi ge
87a7: drug pa'i rig sngags gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang gan byin ci ni zhes nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa/ yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung shig/
87a8: tshengs shig lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ tad+ya thA/ dan ti le kan ti la di mite/ ma d+hu ma ti/ ma rA na Te/ ko ran te/ drA bi ba ti/ ko shwa ri/ tsha Ta dze/ du ru ma ti/ ke tu ma ti/ tsa dun d+he/ ke'u Ta ran te/ da hu ru re/ en ni ge/ hu ta pa hu ni/
87b1: kun dga' bo 'di ni yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags te/ klang pa na ba dang / mig na ba dang / na ba na pa dang / son pa dang / ldan pa dang / len pa dang / snying na pa dang / ston pa dang / rgyab na pa dang / rtsi ba logs na pa dang / chu son pa dang / byin pa na pa dang /
87b2: rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag dang nyin lag na ba dang / zas ma zhu ba dang / ltos pa dang / mngal du thogs pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / rims drag po dang / nyin
87b3: gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rims yud tsam pa dang / nyin mo'i rims dang / mtshan mo'i rims kyis btab pa la yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags 'di bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bcung
87b4: ba dang yongs su bskyad pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang chus gtor ba dang / srad bus bcing ba byas pa las gang zhig 'gal bar byed na de'i mgo a dza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba
87b5: bdun du mi 'gas pa ni kun dga' bo ngas lha dang bcas pa dang bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nam mthong ngo // tad+ya thA/ aN
87b6: TA re baN nA re/ ka reH/ ka yu re/ b+hU taM ga me/ b+hu ta gra he/ Tuta prak+Shi te/ b+hu ta ya s+phA ya ni/ pri yA ba ti/ She dza ba ti/ ya sha ba ti/ gi ri na ni/ sha ri ni ni/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su b+ha cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'dra/
87b7: kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba'i rig
87b8: sngags rdzogs so/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ShA na ka ba ti nA mahA ra NI/ bod skad du 'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
88a1: thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lhas ma lta bu na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'dra
88a2: kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag g.yul ngor mchis te g.yul 'gyed pa na/ lha
88a3: ma yin gyi sku dang / rig sngags rnams dang gsang sngags dang / sman dag gis pham par gyur pa mkhyen lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rjes su gzung ba dang / bdag cag lazhugs partse ba dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sgra dang / rig sngags dang gsang
88a4: sngags dang / sman rab du gzhom pa dang / rab tu gzhig pa'i slad du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i gsang sngags chen po legs par bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi
88a5: ka de de bzhin no/ / lha ma yin dang g.yul sprad pa na rig sngags rnams dang gsang sngags rnams dang / sman rnams kyis phan pa de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka snying brtse ba'i phyir nga 'dir rig sngags brjod par bya ste sgra thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rig
88a6: sngags thams cad zlog pa/ gsang sngags thams cad rengs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang / 'tshang 'bru ba dang / thab mo dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ gsang sngags dang / sman thams cad gcod pa'i rig sngags bshad
88a7: par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can bka' stsal pa gang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu chub dang / gcer bu pa rnams kyis ngan du bsams shing bar
88a8: chad du byas pa las ngas de tshun chad sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi rig sngags thams cad bzlog nas pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu gru ba dang / gcer bu pa dang 'tshe ba rnams kyi sku dang
88b1: rig sngags dang gsang sngags dang / sman dang bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'jom pa'i reg pa chen mo de ngas bshad par byas ko shi ka khyod kyis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir gsang sngags chen po rnam par rgyal ba chen mo
88b2: zung shis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsher gasngags chen mo gser can 'di dag bka' stsal to// taHthA/ oM hI ni hi ni/ te le
88b3: ha le hi li/ mi li mi laM/ hi li mi le/ ni he ni he/ ni he ra pi naM/ kAnA nA pa ne/ lo kA mA te b+hU te nUkra ta man tra/ ma d+hi kre te/ ba de be de be ta man tra/ a d+hi kre te/ ha na han/ ha sa ha sa/ rkyen du ts+tshin d+ha/ b+hin d+ha bin d+ha/ b+ha ga ba te/ dza yi bi dza la/ dza ma b+ha ni/ ts+tsha
88b4: b+ha ni/ ban d+ha ne/ po ha ni/ a mo g+ha sha ga ti d+hA ra NI/ gri Na gri Na/ kA Da ma mA na si/ dza ma b+ha ya dza ma b+ha ya/ b+hany+tsa ya b+hany+tsa ya/ sta ma b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ lha'i sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / srin po'i sgra dang / na
88b5: mkha' lding gi sku dang / dri za'i sku dang / lha ma yin gyi sgra dang / mi 'am ci'i sgra dang / lto 'phye chen po'i sgra dang / rig sngags 'chang gi sgra dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i rgyal po'i sku dang / drang srong gi sku dang / sems can rig sngags 'chang thams cad
88b6: kyi sku dang / 'thung po'i sU dang / sU thams cad/ ra la ra la/ rad dza rad dza/ d+hu ma d+hum/ d+hu d+hu ma/ rA ba rA ga rA ba na na tsakrAn tan/ gA na tha ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba bi d+ha/ sha trUM nAM/ stam b+ha ya/ b+ha yun sta ma b+ha ya/ sU r+yAn stam b+ha ya/ so nam sta ma b+ha ya/ ba ruNA
88b7: na stam b+ha ya/ a ga ni na stam b+ha ya/ ud da kan d+hi ti d+hi di/ d+hA ra nI bA sha ha ste/ beSh+Ta ya bA sha ne/ gang dag bdag la phyir rgol ba rnams dang / dgra rnams dang / sdang ba dang rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'thab pa dang rab tu 'thab pa
88b8: dad mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa ba tsa/ b+hany+tsa ya b+hany+tsa ya/ dzaM b+ha ya dza b+ha ya/ stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ b+han d+ha ya b+han d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ ma hA mo ha ni/ b+ha ga ba ti swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang / nad 'go
89a1: pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig paT swA hA/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po gang la la zhig gser can gyi rig sngags 'di rjes su dran par byed na de la pha rol
