110a7: gtan bzhi pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go/ / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go// rnam shes mtha'/
110a8: las su mched la langs nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched la langs nas yod min med min skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go/ de las langs nas de bzhin nyid kyi
110b1: ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras
110b2: gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / byams pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par dga'o// lha dang me dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan
110b3: 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u dgu pa'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzung sa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shI mi tra dang / bod kyi lo nub
110b4: dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA ka la pa la g+hu tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud ces bya
110b5: ba/ 'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa rus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi nam mkha'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo rje snying por byin gyis brlabs pa'i steng du
110b6: rin po che sna bdun las grub pa lha'i gzhal med khang bye ba phrag brgyad bcus bskor ba'i dbus su dpag tshad 'bum phrag khyab pa'i khang pa brtseg ma shin du mtho ba/ kun kyang rin po che du ma'i khri pad ma dang / seng ges
110b7: mtho ba/ dbu rtse rin po che'i zur mangs kyi mchod rten pad ma dang / 'khor lo dang / gdugs mtho bar drangs pa la dar gyi dbyangs ldang ba/ de'i grib ma sa gzhi la bkod pa na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams lha'i
110b8: bzhon pa las babs nas nang du gshegs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i dril bu dang / ba dan dang / rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / rnga yab dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / rdo rje phyed pa dang / chun 'phyang shar bu
111a1: sa bcu pha rol phyin bcu bdag/ dbang bcu don bcu rnam pa bcu/ mi 'jigs bzhi dang ma 'dres chos/ byams dang thugs rje chen po dag/ dbyangs gcig gis ni sngags kyis su// sdug bsngal sna tshogs rab zhi dang /
111a2: yid 'phrog dpal 'byor dbang phyug dang // mthu stobs dus bskyed pa dang // rtag gnas thob dang don des thob// rdo rje bla na med sems bskyed// mdor na gang gis gang 'dod pa// bsam pas sems rnams rdzogs pa'i
111a3: phyir/ rdo rje bla na med pa gsor// chos su bla na med pa sgrogs// 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor// ral gri blan med bzung // pad ma bla na med pa chongs// rin chen bla med gsal bar gyis// dkyil 'khor tshul du
111a4: spros nas kyang / / mchod rten tshul du bsdu bar gyis// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang // lha mi mkha' lding mi 'am ci// srin po sha za rjed dbyed tshogs// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs 'gyur ba'i// rnam 'phrul du ma 'di
111a5: sbyar cig/ gsung mchog de skad thos ma thag/ lag na rdo rje mthu bo ches// dga' mgu thal mo rab sbyar te// snyan pa'i tshig gis 'di gsol to// gser dang rin chen lnga po las// rab mchog ri bong gyur pa las/
111a6: 'gro rnams kun kyis rten gnas dang // rtags su yang dag 'dzin pa ltar// rnam par shes dang phung po bzhi// 'byung ba rnam par dag bsgrubs pas// lha dang phyag rgya phrin las su// sngags shes rnams
111a7: kyis gzung bas nas/ brtul ba'i ye shes byang chub rim// / khyad par de la ldan par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa che// kun mkhyen ye shes gtso bo ches// sku las sna tshogs mdangs 'od can
111a8: 'od zer du ma byung nas kyang / / gzhi dang snying po me tog gis// brgyan pa'i zhing rnams khyab byas tshe// sa yang rnam pa drug du g.yos// 'jig rten skyod dang bdud kyi tshogs// ma lus pa rnams brgyal bar
111b1: la sogs pa dmas mdzes pa/ sgo khung khyams dang / sgo glegs dang / rin po che'i me long dang / gdugs la sogs pa du mas khyab pa/ rin po che'i pha gu brtsigs te/ mdzes par byas pa du ma de thams cad kyi
111b2: dbus su 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang lhan cig du bzhugs so/ / de yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang /
111b3: byams pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / sna tshogs bkram pa dang / mkha' 'od me tog 'chang dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / gzugs mdzes dag pa dang / sa'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje
111b4: la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag bdun dang / shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal dang / rta thul dang / 'od srung la sogs pa bye ba phrag bzhi dang / grags chen snyan pa chen po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang
111b5: khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / lus ngan dang / gshin rje dang / dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs pa lha'i rigs sum rgya dang lhan cig tu chos kyi rnam grangs gsang sngags zhes bya ba la 'jug pa gang zhig byang chub sems
111b6: dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / 'jig rten skyod pa la sogs pa rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la dgongs pa tha dad kyi bsam pa dang / 'thun pa'i bkod pa chen po bskyed pa dang / tshe 'phrul du ma bskur ba dang /
111b7: 'od zer du ma 'gyed cing thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum bzhin du 'khor la gzigs nas ljags kyis dbang po bkram te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag
111b8: na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ yi ge ming tshig dag gi sgos/ sngags dbyibs chos su byin brlabs kyis/ yi ge sgra tsam phyed dam gcig/ mngon sum rjes 'jug ring thung dang / dbyangs dang gsal byed mtshan mas mtshon//
112a1: gyur// nyan thos rang rgyal 'dar bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi// tshogs rnams shin du sdug par 'gyur// de tshe phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod spun//
112a2: bre bo chen po'i tshigs byung ba// 'od zer rtse mos drangs nas su// zhing dbus dkyil 'khor 'di ru lhags// 'od zer tshegs kyang rab 'dus nas// dpal be'u nyid du thim par gyur// de tshe 'od de'i byin rlabs/
112a3: las// mkha' la sgra 'di grag par gyur// shAkya'i mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang du gzi brjid che bzhugs smad// chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad gshegs//
112a4: dri ma med pa'i dam chos mchog/ gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul dag pa// thos nas byang chub 'dus ma byas// 'jig rten mgon po brnyes par gyur// de nas lag na rdo rje tshogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
112a5: kyang / / snyim ma me tog bkang byas te// gtor nas phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas// dad zhing gus pa'i tshul gyis su// pus btsugs thal sbyar gsol ba 'debs// mi ga nas ye shes che ba'i mchog/ yon tan rgya mtsho
112a6: 'byung ba'i gtso/ / mtshan nyid thams cad rab brgyan pa// mtshan min spangs pa'i thub pa che// / dri med dge ba ji ltar lags// gsang sngags tshul du spyod pa ci// 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub gang // 'jig rten mgon
112a7: po ci ltar 'gyur/ / bdag cag rnams la sman rab dang // 'gro la thugs rje che mdzad phyir// mgon po bcom ldan thub pa ches// yang dang yar du bshad du gsol// de nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis
112a8: gtso bos bka' stsal pa/ / gsang ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin// shes rab chen po'i spyan ldan pas// bdag gzhan pa na don la brtson phyir// legs par nyon la yid la zung // yang dag yang dag mtha' min tshul//
112b1: de ni nga yis bshad par bya// srog gcod ma byin len brdzun 'khrig/ tshig rtsub dbyen dang ngag kyal swA// brnab sems gnod sems log lta chad// dri ro ngan pa'i zas skom dang // srog can sha khrag log 'tshor
112b2: bcas/ / slob dpon dge 'dun mchod rten sogs// khyad par yul can yo byad dang // dman zhing nyams thag phrog dgu pa// glegs pa ma 'tshong dang chos kyi zong // g.yangs ral gri so du gsogs// ma 'obs ltar
112b3: mthong sngangs nas kyang / / rnam par dkar la sogs par bya// yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin stsol dang // nyan dang 'dzin dang klog pa dang // mchod pa dang ni kha don dang // de dag sems dang bsgom pa ste// dkar bcu la ma la yun rings
112b4: dang / / nus bcas rgyun mi 'chad du 'bad// gtan pa med pa'i byang chub sems// shel ltar dri ma med pa'o// mchog 'di spyad pas sdug bsngal tshogs// myur du gcod pas dge ba'o// chos bdag med dang mnyam
112b5: nyid dang / / rang sems gdod gnas dag pa gang // rgyu 'dra 'du byed med pa dang // zag bcas pa de dang bral ba las// byang chub phyogs chos ma lus pa// chos nyid bdag med spyod pa ni// chos dbyings ye shes mngon
112b6: byas nas/ / ma 'dres chos rnams rdzogs gsal ba// 'dus ma byas kyi byang chub ste// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi lus so// 'dod pa'i khams sogs yon tan la// shin du ba de rol spyad pa spyod/ sangs rgyas mu steg
112b7: can rnams kyi/ / lkog du gyur pa gsang pa ste// bskal pa bsam yas dpag med du// bslab bka' yang sa zab rgya chen rnams// sngags dang phyag rgya tid 'dzin du// lus ngag yid la gang gnas pa// dbyer med tshul
112b8: du skyob pas na/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis sngags su brjod// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'i sku// yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs pa ni// bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgon// la la 'khor
113a1: los sgyur ba'i gzugs/ / la lar dge sbyong chen po'i gzugs// la lar srin po srin mo'i gzugs// la lar 'gro ba bzang po'i gzugs// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // seng ge ltar gzigs mdzad/
113a2: la sogs// sna tshogs du ma mdzad pa ni// rkang gnyis lha me rnam gnyis sogs// 'gro ba'i mgon por gyur pa'o// rtag dang 'dra dang nges med pa'i// gtso bo bsam pas gyur pa rnams// 'jig rten pal pi'i
113a3: mgon po ste/ / gzugs byed kha dog tha dad pa// yul dus rnam pa'i bye brag gis// grangs ma byung ba mchod 'os so// thub pas gsungs pa'i de ma thag/ rdo rje can gyis bzhengs nas kyang // phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas
113a4: nas ni/ / spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad gsol// 'dren pa gtso bo bcom ldan 'das// sngags zhes pa ni gang gang yin// phyag rgya zhes ni ci lta bu// ting 'dzin zhes ni ji ltar bshad// lus ngag yid la ji ltar
113a5: gnas/ / dbyer mad tshul du ji ltar skyob// bdag la phan pa'i don phyir dang // gzhan la brtse phyir bshad du gsol// de nas rgyal ba gtso mchog ni// ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas te// tshangs pa chen po'i
113a6: gsung snyan gyis/ / rnam rtog zad phyir 'di gsungs so// snying po nye snying rtsa ba'i sngags// las kyi sngags su gyur pa ste// snying po brjod dang sa bon no// nye snying ye shes mchog dang ni// gsang ba'i snying po zhes
113a7: grags so/ / las kyi sngags ni gnyis yin te// bdag nyid brtan byed las sngags dang // sbyor tshogs grub par byed pa'o// phyag rgya lag pa'i 'du byed dang // rkang pa stabs kyi 'gyur ba'o// rtags su mtshon dang 'deb
113a8: pa dang / / 'gyur ba med par byed pas na// phyag rgya zhes su bshad pa'o// rang gi rtse gcig sems bsdus na// sems la lhag pa'i chos 'bebs pa// de ni ting nge 'dzin zhes bya// de ltar de dag la brten nas// snga ma'i
113b1: gnas de yongs gyur nas/ / sgo/ da bral ba'i 'dab bzangs ltar// lus 'di mkha' la cher song nas// rgyal ba'i zhing khams thams cad du// rgyal la dam chos mnyan nas kyang // rgyal sras kun la bshad pa dang //
113b2: skad cig mkhyen pa'i shes pas kyang // shes bya ma lus phyogs khyab pa// lus ngag yid la gnas pa'o// sems dang yid ni 'dres pa'i tshe// ye shes bde bar shar ba ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//
113b3: dbyer med tshul du skyob ces gsungs// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las lhag par gnas pa'i don yong su bkod pI le'u ste dang po'o// zhi bas gdul dka' bgegs chen dang / log
113b4: 'dren de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir/ / sems kyi bye brag thugs chud nas// de dang gzugs 'dras gzhos pa'i phyir// rtog med nam mkha'i lam gnas te// rdzogs sangs gdul dka' 'dul mdzad sku// rab 'phags khro
113b5: bo stobs chen dpal/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi sras kyi sras// mi g.yo'i mtshan grags de la 'dir// rgyal dang rgyal sras rtag phyag 'tshal// tshangs sogs lha dang lus can kun// de la rtag tu mchod par byed//
113b6: rgyal bas byas gzo rgyal sras kyi// smon rdzogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// ye shes rdzogs nas mi g.yo'i sa// thob pas mi g.yo ba zhes bya// pas kyis rgol 'joms dpa' bo ste// tshar gcod pa ni khro bo yin/
113b7: sngags kyi bden tshig mi srubs// nyan thos bdud tshogs kyis mi g.yo// rtog med bdud la khro bas rgyal// rdzu 'phrul bskyod med mi g.yo ba// de bzhin nyid kyi snying po mchog/ stong nyid las byung rgyal ba'i sku//
113b8: chos dbyings bdag nyid la bzhugs nas// sprul 'dis srid pa'i khams sbyor mdzad// mkha' ltar dri med spros bral bas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung // spros med nam mkha'i rang bzhin la//
114a1: skad tsam du gsang sngags zhes// brjod kyang ngag gi spyod yul 'das// skyob pas tha snyad rtogs phyir gsungs// sems med rang bzhin med stong nyid// sgra 'drar yid kyis bsgom pa yin/ dngos
114a2: med mnyam mdzad 'dod don rnams/ / gsang sngags mgon 'dis brjod pas stsol// mu stegs bdag dang srog gang zag/ gtso bo skyes bu khyab gnas pas// 'khor brtag 'dod nga rgyal rmongs// log pa'i
114a3: zhags bcings sdug bsngal skyed/ / bdag med srog med sems can med// byed pa med cing gtso bo med// khyab gnas med cing dngos po med// rdzas la rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin med// log tog srid 'ching zhags
114a4: gcad phyir/ / dngos med sna tshogos gzugs bsgoms pas// dngos grol stong nyid go 'phang 'thob// phyi nang khyad par der goms pa'o// dbu ba chu bur sgyu 'drang bsgom// stong nyid las ldang ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog
114a5: sdig bcings las grol nas/ / 'chi med ye shes go 'phang 'thob// phung po khams dang skye mched med// kun gzhi med de gang zag med// gzung 'dzin med de bcings med par// rgyal ba rnams kyis rtag tu bshang
114a6: kun med kun bral kun spangs pa'i/ / skyong nyid byang sems sgyu 'dra bar// bag yod pas ni rtag bsgoms na// byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'char// yid bzhin nor 'dra rdul phrul che// mkha' ltar gos pa med pa'i sku
114a7: sngags spyod byang chub sems dpa' yis/ / byang chub sems kyi sgom pas 'thob// ngo mtshar gsungs te thos ma thag/ khro bo rnams kyis gtse la bstod// rtag tu dag cing dri med pa// rnam rtog rkun 'gags
114a8: kane rtog mod/ / rtag rtog med la zhugs pa yi// dpa' bo chen po phyag 'tshal bstod// chos kun g.yo ba med pa khyod// spyod yul kun tu legs sbyar bas// kun mkhyen g.yo ba med pa rtag/ rang bzhin spros
114b1: bral khyod phyag 'tshal/ / sems can sna tshogs pa na don du// mdzad spyong sna tshogs gsung ba'o// dag pa'i lam rnams yang dag 'byung // rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal bstod// mun pa phra rab rdul spangs
114b2: pa'i/ / sprin bal nam mkha' dag pa ltar// mgon po khyod su shel sgong ltar// kun rtog spangs la phyag 'tshal bstod// spros med nam mkha' lta bu la// dngos po thams cad dang bral bas// phung khams skye mched shin du
114b3: dag/ ye shes rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod// mkha' la 'jar shar sna tshogs ltar// gtso khyod dag pa'i sems can gzigs// ngan 'gro kun sgrol dpa' chen 'khrungs// go cha chen po phyag 'tshal bstod// chos nyid las byung
114b4: snying po ni/ / yi ge gcig pa gzi brjid che// sems can sdug bsngal sa gzhi la// mun 'khrigs sel la phyag 'tshal bstod// sngags mchog gtso bo'i gsang pa 'dis// rgyal sras chos 'phel shes rab bskang // bla med
114b5: go 'phang myur 'gro gsungs/ / gtso bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dngos kun gyur dngang bcas pa yi// las dang skye las rnam par grol// rgyal ba rgyu med bdag nyid 'khrungs// gtso mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dngos med
114b6: ye shes me lce yis/ / 'dus byas ri bo kun bsregs nas// chos dbyings rang bzhin gcig tu rgyal// bla med su la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstod pa'i don de thugs chung nas// 'gro la pan phyir cho ga gsungs// gsang sngags
114b7: log par spyod pa dang / / ser sna log par goms pa las// 'dod pas non pa'i sems rtog gis// sngags pa yi dgas gnas su skye// dang pos mar me me tog dang // zhal zas gtor ma phreng ba sogs// mchod pa'i
114b8: rdzas dang ye byad dang / / mi yi lus dang kha zas la// 'tshe zhing sgrub pa'i bar du gcong// mi sdug nad skyed lo tog 'tshe// gnyis pa gnod sbyin dag gyur nas// sha khrag chang la snom zhing rgyug/ thos sam bsgrub pa'i bar gcod cing /
115a1: nang ba skyed re len lkog la bskyed// rig sngags 'chang gi gdon gzhom phyir// sgrub pos 'bad de sngags brjod bya// sngags mthab skyed pa gtor ma dang // sbyin pasreg phyag rgya sngags bcas dang // mnan pa'i
115a2: las kyis nags ma ltar/ / thogs pa med par 'joms par 'gyur// de dag brtan byed lha yin te// de gsal byed pa ras ris yin// / de kun rnam dag gsal byed pa// byang chub sems mchog zhi ba ni// log rtog 'khor
115a3: ba'i zo rkun la/ / ral gri gnon po'i se re ltar// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas sngags dang phyag rgya dag/ 'byung bar rab tu bshad par bya// na maH
115a4: sarba sa pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba tha hAM/ snying po dam pa'o// na maHsarba sra ba ri bu ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bA tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho ta ya hUM/ Ta ta ti mi snying po'o// na maHsarba swa pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaH
115a5: sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo sarba thAd tra ta a mo ka/ tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho ta ya hUM/ Ta ma ya hUM/ Ta Ta haM mi nye ba'i snying po'o// na maHsarba sra pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thAHa tsa lA rka na/ nad Ta nad Ta/ mong Ta mong Ta/ sad
115a6: Ta sa Ta/ ta DaM Ta ta Da Ta/ teSh+pe tiSh+Tha/ A be sha aHmad Ta/ ma la ka/ d+haN d+haH/ te ni ti ne/ khAd khAd/ big+han+nan/ mA ra mA ra duSh+Ta na/ rak+Sha rak+Sha sa traM/ ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA be dze ya badz+ra phaT/ hAM r-I t+sA/ tri bi la tar
115a7: nar tA ka/ ha tata/ a tsa la/ te tsa/ phaT phaT/ a hAM a sa/ maN ta ka/ Ta Ta/ ma hA ba las ta a man ya/ tre ma te/ shrar+ya du lo ka duSh+Ta na du badz+rin maHswa pra ti ta ta ba laM b+h+yaHdza la ma tra ta/ a sa ta na ma swAt+ma/
115a8: gsang ba'i snying po'o// de nas phyag r+b+ha stangs thabs kyis sngags brjod pa ni 'di gsungs so// na maHsarba swa pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ye/ sarba thAHoM tan ta na mA ra mA ra yo dz+nyA na/ kha Da ga hUM phaT/ ral gri bya/
115b1: n+ya'i sngags so// na maHsarbaswa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thaHa gr-ing+ga gr-in+tha/ khAng+ka Sh+Ta / bA sha na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ma hA ad+yata/ d+hAn te sAhA/ zhags pa'i'o// na maHsa rba sa? pa ri prA ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba tA
115b2: thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thAHoM rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ha na ha na/ kud Ta kud Ta/ mA ra ya duSh+Ta bi nA ya kaM hU dza go/ chi'i'o// na maHsarba swa pa ri prA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thaHo d+ha ra d+ha ra badz+nyA na li na kha Da ga pA sha d+ha ra swA hA/ gtsug
115b3: tor gyi'o/ / na maHsarba sra pa ri pra ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH// oM b+hany+dza ban d+ha da ha pa tsa b+hasmai ku ru ku ru ha na ha na badz+ra/ grih+Na gr-ih+na/ phaT/ tho ba'i 'o// na maHsarba sra pa ri pU ra ke b+h+ya// sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thaHoSh+Tanata
115b4: mur ti/ da ha da ta/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bidza ya bai dza ya// bi dza ya ki ra ti swA hA// mgon po'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba swa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba tha/ oM pU d+ha ra d+ha ra/ oM tsan d+ya pa la Ti kra ma NaM/ bur bus la
115b5: ye/ rak+Sha da k+Sha sa rba.AR+Sha/ rdo ba'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba sra pa ri prA ra ke b+h+ya// sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thaHoM badz+ra hri da ya/ badz+ra ma ti ga swAhA/ snying ka'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba swa pa ri prA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thAH
115b6: oM hUM da tad ha/ ka ni tsi rA ya si/ A na ya shI g+hI da/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ banad+ha ban d+ha/ duSh+Ta na/ da mad ma swA hA// phyogs bcing ba'o// na maHsarba swa pa ri prA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thAHo du na dA na ma hA bA sha Sha Da ga d+ha ra
115b7: sapa re pra ra ke b+ha swA hA/ / bka' nas kyi'o// na maHsarba sra pa ri bA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thAHoM ga ga nag na dong b+ha ba// ma hA sa ma ya/ pa raM bu ra ke swAhA/ gr-i'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsa rbas pi pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ta
115b8: b+haHsarba thAHo dun du na thA/ o bi shud d+hi dz+nyA na rA dzi saM b+ha be ga ga nA nan hAHsAtA ma mo'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba sra pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thAHoM shud+d+ha d+harma te/ shud d+h+ya shud d+ha/ grah+na grih+Na/ sarba pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaH/
116a1: sA hA/ gter ma'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba swa ba ri pU ra ka b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsarba thA oM shud d+ha ma hA dz+nyA na swa thA ga tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA na ye swA hA/ bdug pa'i'o// na maHsarbaswa pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya
116a2: sarba thAHoM ga ga na bi kAn ta gA ma ni ma hA shud d+ha na ya swA hA/ me tog gi'o// na maHsarba swa pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thAHoM ha na ha na/ pa ra ma bi shud d+he/ d+harma na ya pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHswA hA/ zhal zas kyi'o// na ma
116a3: sarba swa pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thAHo a pa tra ti ho na d+yo ta/ da ma da ma/ sarba thA/ swa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHswA hA// dpa' bo spyan drangs pa'i 'o// na maHsarba swa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ o bi shud+d+ha
116a4: bi shud d+ha/ sa kra swa b+hA ba A na ya/ ma hA na ye swA hA// byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang ba'o// na maHsarba swa pa ri pu ra kaM b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba thAHoM bi shud d+ha swA hA/ ha na ha na/ da ma da ma/ ma hA na yai swA hA// nyan thos spyan
116a5: drang pa'i 'o/ / na maHsarba swa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thAHoM badz+rA kar ShA ya/ shI g+h+raM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma hA pa ri wa rai swA hA// pho nya po mo spyan drang ba'o// na maHsarba swa pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yoH
116a6: sarba thAHe ma thA ma thA/ An ya A na ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta sarba paM/ ta ma ta ma/ ma hA na ya pa ri wA ri hUM swA hA// 'jig rten pa rnams spyan drang ba'o// na maHsarba swa pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga
116a7: b+h+yaHsarba thAHoM sa d+ya sa d+ya/ ma hA sA d+hA ya/ da ma da ma/ ma hA da ma/ A ka ra ShA ya A kar ShA ya/ a d+ya ba ma hA na ya shud d+he swA hA// drang srong spyan drang ba'o// na maHsa rbaswa pa pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te Sh+ya oM sarbatra/ oMd yang la/
116a8: dza ya bi dza ya/ ma hA sad+ya ya ba ti ni/ sarba hi te swA hA/ sring mo rnams spyan drang ba'o// na maHsarba swa pa ri pu ra ke b+ha// sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo// sarba thA/ u0f7foM hri hA dA/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma/ ha na ha na/ ma ha na ye/ ma ra ma ra ha swA hA/
116b1: pa po rnams spyan drang ba'o// na maHsarbaswa pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga/ teb+h+yo// sarba ta thAHoM ha na badz+ra hU~M phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta gra hi/ ma tha ma u0f7f/ b+han+d+ha b+haH/ sarba'i kA/ dam da ma/ sarbaduSh+TA na oM hU~M phaT swA hA/ rkang stabs tsham
116b2: dam gyi sngags so/ / na maHsarba swa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ sarba thA/ oM A hUM at+pa/ ka ga na s+pha ra na kaM swA hA// 'o thug khur ba 'bru sna tshogs/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa/ ci 'byor 'byor pa'i gtor ma ni// sngags
116b3: des spro zhing spel bar bya/ / na ma sarba swa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo// sarba thA/ oM swa b+hA ba sarba tha b+h+yAM bAM swA hA// na maHsarba swa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarbarba thA te skyes dran/ mo la brnyes rbashanan sa d+ha ut+ma/ na maHsarba swa pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba
116b4: ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ / sarba thA/ oM sarba sid sti ma dra d+ha mi he swA hA// byin brlabs bzhin du bsgyur ba dang / kun gyis thim par bya ba dang // 'dod pa'i las rnams gang dang gang grub par bya ba'i sngags yin no// gza' chen brgyad dang /
116b5: rgyu skar yang nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnams kyi sngags// na maHsarba swa ba ri pA ra ke b+h+ya/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo// sarba thA/ a dit+ya/ so ma aM gA raHbu d+haHbri ha spa tiH/ shu kra sha ni sh+tsa raHrA huH/ ke tu/ kri d+hi ka/ ro hi ne/ mri ga shi ra/ a tra pu
116b6: nar ba su ShaH/ a sh+le Sha/ ma g+ha pur ba pal gu Ni u ta ta ra pha la gu Ne hasta/ tsi tra sa? staM/ baM shA khA a nu rAd+ha/ dzaSh+Ta mu la/ bu ra ba Sha r+d+ha u ta ta ra Sha D+ha tha ba Ta a b+hi dzi/ sha ta giSha/ d+ha niSh+Ta/ bu ra ba b+ha dra ba dA/ mud tra
116b7: ba dA/ pa tra pa TA/ be ba ti a shwa ni/ b+ha ra ni oM dang swA hA ra bcas pa ni/ rang rang snying po'i sngags yin te/ gang 'dod las kyang sbyar bar bya/ mchod pa'i rigs kyang tha dad bya/ na maHsa man ta kA ya bA ga tsat+ta na badz+ra NAM/ oM a tsa la
116b8: ka na tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha na s+pho tA ya tra ka kha haM maM/ na maHsa man ta kA ya bA ga tsita ta badz+rA nAM/ oM badz+ra ka pa tsa duM baM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo// sarba b+ha ya bi ga te b+h+yo/ bi sha mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tha khi rak+Sha/ ma hA ba li/ sarba ta thA ga/
117a1: pu n+ya ni dza te hUM hUM tra thA a pra ti ha te swA hA// khro bo spyan gcig drag shul can// bsrung dang bcas par mchod pa dang // sngags bzlas dngos grub blangs pas 'grub// ci 'dod las la cho gas sbyad// lag
117a2: g.yas gung 'dzub ra/ shibs te brkyang // srin lag mthe chung mthe bos mnan// shugs drangs tshul phyung mkha' la sbyar// ral gri phyag rgyas bdud tshogs 'joms// g.yon pa khu tshur sdig 'dzub bsgreng // slar bskur byed pa
117a3: zhags pa'i rgya/ / gung mo mthe'u chung so sor sprad// 'dzub mo ming med nang du dgug/ mthe bo gzhibs pa gud 'gram sbyar// snying kha bkod de go cha'i brgyan// sor 'khyud khu tshur nad du bsdam// mtheb gnyis cung bsgyur mgo
117a4: thod rgya/ / g.yon pa'i khu tshur mthe bo ni// g.yas pa'i khu tshur nang bcug nas// mthe bong g.yas bsgreng tho ba'i rgya// phyogs bcur brdungs pa ltar bya'o// g.yas pa khu tshur gud mo bsgrengs// spyi gtsug phyag rgya gtsug tu
117a5: bzhag/ g.yon pa khu tshur gud 'dzub bsgrang // bka' rtags phyag rgya rtag tu phyar// khu tshur gnyis gzhibs lto sbyang ba// rdo ba lta bu'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa khu tshur snying khar gzhag/ snying la brgyan pa'i phyag rgya'o//
117a6: lag gnyis sor mo so sor brkyad// phyogs bcu bcing pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag sbyar gung gnyis nang bcug pa// nga'i phyag rgyar bshad pa'o// khu tshur rgyab spang gung mthe bong // mthe bong gung 'dzab smang dang 'khyud// gtor
117a7: ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / thal mo khong stong shugs ltar gdon// bdug spos dgrub pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis so sor gung srin dgug// mtheb mnan gzhag brkyang me tog rgya// thal sbyar gung srin 'dzub mo bkug
117a8: mthe'u chung mtheb brgyad zhal zas rgya/ / dkyil krung 'dug ste snyim pa zed// mthe bo gnyis ni nang du bkug/ sor gzhibs nas g.yab byed pa ni// dpa' bo gtso bo spyan drang rgya// thal sbyar 'dzug bkug mthe bos mnan/
117b1: byang chub sems tshogs 'gugs pa'i rgya// snyim bskyed mthe'u chung gshibs te brkyang // lhag ma brgyad pa so sor dgug/ nyan thos rang rgyal rdzu 'phrul can// ma lus thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgya// khu tshur g.yas
117b2: pa g.yon stengs bzhag/ 'dzub gnyis brkyang ste so sor dgug/ cung zad skyod par byed pa ni// pho nya pho mo 'gugs pa'i rgya// khu tshur rgyab sprad gung 'dzub ni// so sor drang por gshibs te brkyang // mtheb gnyis cung
117b3: zang spang de dgug/ 'jig rten pa rnams 'gugs pa'i rgya// g.yon min g.yas pas de ltar bya// brtul zhugs drang srong dgug pa'i rgya// g.yon pa khu tshur gung mo bsgred// dngos grub sring mo 'gugs pa'i rgya//
117b4: lag g.yas bkan te brkyang nas kyang // mthe bos mdzub mnan gsum po g.yab// ma bdun la sogs ma mo rnams// las kyi dus su 'gugs par 'gyur// res kyis bteg cing drang po yi// pus mo dag la rkang /
117b5: mthil sbyar// spyi bor me tog thal sbyar yang // phyogs der g.yob cing 'bri tshugs ltar// zlum pa'i stabs kyis 'di kun gyis// bgegs tshogs 'joms shing rnal 'byor bsrang // lag pa g.yas ni gyen du
117b6: brkyang / / g.yon pa snying la thigs 'dzub ste// rkang gnyis sprad nas rting pa rdebs// hUM brjod drag skad mdun du lha// sa gsum g.yo byed zla ga ma stabs// rkang g.yon brkyang ba'i skabs dang ni// ha ha brjod cing zhabs
117b7: rgyab cing / phan tshun bsnol nas bgegs la bsnun// 'khor lo phyag rgya phye mar bya// rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i stabs dang ni// rdo rje thal mo mkha' la bsnun// khro gnyer mig can ma mchu man na// yan lag gnyis
117b8: gnyis me ltar spang / / rkang pa mnyam stabs hUM sgra can// lag gnyis sdigs 'dzub phyag rgya'o// rkang gnyis mnyam du bzhag pa las// g.yas kyis g.yon bskor lte ba yin// mdun du g.yas te rgyab du g.yon// gya tshom
118a1: gsum gsum mnan pa ni/ / rtse gsum yin te rtse gsum rgya// lag pa steng brkyang dbyig sgreng ltar// bgegs la bsnun zhing 'bru tshugs blta// g.yas su tho ba hU~M brjod brdeg/ g.yon pa snying kha'i sdigs
118a2: 'dzub ste/ / gnyis ka bskrar pa 'khor lo bya// nub bltas rkang pa mnyam bzhag nas// mdun g.yas rgyab dang g.yon phyogs su// g.yon pas bgegs gsum mnan bya zhing // rim pas me dang ral gri dang // sdigs 'dzub
118a3: zhags pa phyogs bzhir bcing / / ha hUM drag brjod brjid gnon rgya// rkang gnyis pus 'bur lag pa gnyis// gru mo bsgyur na thig gis mnan// bgegs bskrad phyir na 'bri tshugs blta// rtse gcig rdo rje stabs su bcad// rkang pa
118a4: g.yas g.yon res kyis bskor/ / lho byad g.yon te shar nub g.yas// brkyang zhing drag du brlab par bya// rgyab nas drang dang tho ba dang // rdo rje dang ni zhags pa'i rgya// phyogs bzhir bya ste 'khor lo'i stabs// phyag rgya dang ni
118a5: stang stabs kyis/ / phyogs skyong rnams kyang skrag byed na// 'byung po'i tshogs 'joms smos ci dgos// thams cad dbang du sdud par byed// de nas phyogs bcu bcing ba yi// rkang stabs khyad par bshad par bya// shar du rkang
118a6: ba mnyam pa yis/ / rdo rje thal mo gyen du brdeg lhor ni rkang rting sprang dag dang // hU~M sgrogs thal mo mdun rgyab sbyar// nub du rkang sprang lag pa gnyis// sa sar sdigs 'dub gyen du brkyang // byang du ral gri'i phyag rgya dang // rkang pa ya
118a7: gtsigs la bsgreng / / khu tshur 'dzub sbyar dbral bar bzlog/ rkang gnyis mnyam byas res kyis phyar// mchag shes hUM sgrogs khro gnyer lta// byang shar thig ler grags pa'i rgya// khu tshur mthe'u chung mche ba'i rgya// rkang paras
118a8: bteg shar lhor phye/ / lho nub rkang gnyis nges kyi brdab// zhags pas 'debs dang ral gris gcod// nub byang rkang gnyis brdab pa dang // lag gnyis mtheb sprad 'khor lo skor // yang na tshe gcig phyag rgyas gtag// steng
118b1: skabs thams cad ha hUM sgrogs/ / de nas rigs sngags bzlog pa yi// phyag rgya cho ga bshad par bya// khu tshur gung mo brkyang rtse sprang // mdzub gnyis de'i 'gram du bcang // sngags dang phyag rgya thams cad kyis// lha klu
118b2: srin po gnod sbyin dang / / mkha' 'gro 'byung po mi ma yin// bsod dang skrod de me ltar mdzad// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / bla na med pa'i ras
118b3: ris sku/ / cho ga de nas bshad par bya// bris sku 'dod par thams cad du// dge ba'i ras bzangs btsal nas kyang // bkrus te sngags kyis bsrung byas la// ngur smrig du ni bsgyur bar bya// rgyud bzang dal zhing dul bag yod/
118b4: chos thos ri mo mkhas la bsgrin// sred chung yid gzhungs khro med pas// sen rtsi shun kan tshal sbyar// spangs dang mu zi kran ltar ldang // ba bla kra ti sma na ser// li khri sgong nga 'tshal spags dmar// rams dang 'thing shun bu/
118b5: dir sngo// smyig dang an dza na ma po ste// sha tra dag kyang dkar por 'gyur// sa snod so gtang skags snyig byug/ pir 'jam rab 'bring tha ma 'bri// rgyal dang sa ri nam gru dang // dz+nyAn rnams smin drag lnga mtshams shis// de nas
118b6: yang dag rab bshad pa/ / thub pa'i dge ba ra sa ris la// dbus su byang chub shing mchog drung // gser mdog 'khor lo sgyur ba'i chas// chos 'chang phyag rgya ngur smrig bsnams// logs su 'dab bzangs rgyal po gnyis// snyim pa me tog
118b7: bkang ba'i gzugs/ / g.yas su 'jig rten dbang po dkar// ngur smig gon pas thal mo sbyar// nga yi zhabs su mi g.yo ba// spyan gsum khros pa klu yis brgyan// na ra'i stong g.yogs stag smad dkris// rin chen rgyan can do ker
118b8: can/ / rdo ba dmar po'i khri stengs na// ral gri dang ni zhags pa dang // g.yon pa cung zad brkyang ste bzhengs// gtso bo'i g.yon gyi phyogs cha la// rdo rje 'dzin sngo ngur smrig can// rdo rje dang ni zhags pa 'chang // de yi 'og tu sgrub pa
119a1: ni/ / pus gtsugs spos kyi khang bu 'dzin// gtso bo zhabs su khro bo che// nag po khams gsum brtan pa yi// lag gnyis rin chen khri la btag/ gtso bo'i sna tshogs pad ma ste// 'jig rten dbang dang khro bo
119a2: yi/ / rdo rje 'dzin dang bslab pa'i sngo// yan lag lnga pa sdong po gcig/ klu yi bu mo mdzes ma gnyis// pangad gis 'khyud de 'dzin par mdzad// zhi ba rgyas pas dbang gi phyir// de nas bris sku yang dag bshad// dbus su shA
119a3: thub pa dang / / g.yas su 'phags pa 'jam dpal te// g.yon du phyag na rdo rje'o// bsnyen pa'i don du ras ris ni// shin du blta dka' gsus po che// zhal gcig phyag bzhi klu yis brgyan// kha nas khrag 'dzag le
119a4: 'dril ba/ / mche gtsigs hrIHsgra cher sgrogs pa// spyan gsum nyi ma shar ka'i 'od// ngur smrig bsnams pa char sprin mdog/ sku la thod rlon phreng ba can// dbu la thod pa tshar bzhis brgyan// g.yon du rin chen zur phud
119a5: 'phyang/ / bskal pa'i me 'od 'bar ba yis// phyogs kyi bgegs tshogs sreg par mdzad// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste// gnyis pas ral gri 'od 'bar 'chang // g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje zhags// gnyis pa sdigs 'dzub
119a6: brkyang ste mdzad/ / rin chen rdo yi khri stengs su// bgegs kyi rgyal po mnan nas kyang // g.yon brkyang pa yi gar gyis gnas// de yis mdun du zhi ba'i byed// spos khang bzung ba'i sgrub pa bri// ci sbyor rgyun tu mchod par bya//
119a7: mngon spyod bsgrub pa'i ras ris ni// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// dur khrod ras la mi g.yo ba// mdog nag spyan gsum zur mig lta// ngur smrig gos gyon khro gnyer ldan// ral gri dang ni zhags pa 'chang // bris nas
119a8: bdag gis khrag gis ni/ / spyan phye gsol ba btab par bya// ri mo 'dis ni rigs 'dzin kyang // sgrub po mngon spyod smos ci dgos// yang na sna tshogs las kyi phyir// mthing ka na ra'i rgyan can ni// brkyang bskum rdo rje
119b1: dril bu 'dzin/ / pad ma zla ba la bzhugs bri// dmag dpung rengs pa'i ras ris ni// gser mdog khro bo mi g.yo ba// mi sdug mche ba gtsigs pa'i sku// 'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa// zhal bzhi phyag kyang bzhi
119b2: pa ste/ / ral gri zhags pa dang po 'dzin// ri bo che dang sdigs 'dzub 'og/ zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi snying khar ro// de nas rig 'dzin dngos grub kyi// ras ris bri ba yang dag bshad// mi g.yo khro bo zhal gcig pa// mdangs bzangs
119b3: zar ma'i me tog mdog/ ral gri zhags pa sdigs 'dzug can// pus mo g.yas bteg g.yon pa ni// sa la cung zad btsugs par mdzad// mkha' la lha yi bu gnyis kyis// dbugs 'byin mdzad pa nyams dga'i gzugs// g.yas
119b4: su rnam snang mdzad bri ste/ / g.yon du 'od dpag med pa'o// de mdun srub po nyid kyang bri// gang yang ris ma thams cad la// mchod de me tog gtor nas kyang // spyan phye na bza' gsol byas te// rten 'brel sngags kyis
119b5: dab gnas bya/ / de rjes smon lam gdab pa ni// oM ldan bdag gis bsags pa yi// bsod nams grangs med gzhal mi lang // des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa// bla meng go 'phang thob par shog/ sems can dmyal bdud 'gro
119b6: dang / / yi dgas gang dag grangs med rnams// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// thams cad bde dang ldan gyur cig/ gang yang lha mi dbul phongs dang // mi nad mu ge dgra tshom sogs// bdag gi bsod nams mtha yis/
119b7: mede dag thams cad bral gyur shog/ ji snyed sems can thams cad rnams// de snyed sdug bsngal rgya mtsho kun// sna tshogs de dag kun zhi nas// 'ga' yang sdug bsngal med par shog/ sems can gang dag lus dag
119b8: yid/ / mi dge spyod pa bral gyur nas// dge ba pun tshogs spyod gyur te// kun kyang bde ldan thob gyur shog/ de nas rgyal sras kun btud te// lag na dri dang me tog sogs// mchod pa'i yo byad kun thogs nas// bla 'og tha dad
120a1: gsal bya'i phyir/ / bde gshegs bsdu don 'di skad brjod// oM bde bar gshegs pa'i bcom ldan 'das// skyob pa dngos su bzhugs pa rnams// bdag la slar yang brtse ba'i phyir// rgyal ba
120a2: sras bcas la mi mnga'/ / bdag don grub par 'gro ba la// brtse phyir slar yang byon par mdzod// de nas gtor ma me tog dri// dkyil 'khor rgyan dang rdul tshon rnams// dngos grub dam tshig gnod spang phyir//
120a3: lag pas reg par mi bya ste// gos kyi phur ma la stsogs pa// ci bde bas ni phyags nas kyang // skye dgag med pa'i sngags brjod nas// chu bo la ni dor bar bya// 'bras dang 'o ma sha kar// mar dang bcas pa bskor byas te//
120a4: 'bras zan dang ni lhan cig tu// dga' bskyed phyir du dge 'dun dang // bram ze la ni ston mo bya// de nas bris su brtan par ni// gsang ba'i gnas su mchod par bya// khyang par tshes brgyad dus su mchod// bla ma la ni yon dbu
120a5: zhing / / rtag tu sngags 'dzin thams cad kyang // mnyes par bya'i khros pa min// sems can ma mos spang bar bya// dkon mchog gsum la nges bskyed de// the tsom le lo spong ba bya'o// rang gi phung po bsnyen bkur phyir//
120a6: khrus dang gtsang sbra ldan byas nas// gos spa dri ma med pa bgo// zas kyang 'bras sogs dri med la// nyung ngu bzang zhing btung bar bya// mangs pas gnyid dang le lo dang // dring pa ni sked par 'gyur// tho rangs dang por langs
120a7: nas ni/ / srong thal bar du brtson par bya// nas gi gung la gnyid pa'i tshe// 'grol phan bya'i sems kyis nyal// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las bris sku le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas yang dag
120a8: bshad bya ste/ / lha bsgom pa'i rim pa ni// rang gzugs stong par byas nas su/ yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo las// sgra grags pa ni rig pa che// za ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur snang // der son pa ni rdo rje sogs// rang gi
120b1: phyag rgya nyid yin no/ / de las gyur pa'i sku mchog ni// 'ja' tshon shar ba ji lta bar// mtshan dpe mdangs 'od yang dag ldan// brjid cing dgyes pa'i mdangs dang ldan// sgeg cing rol pa'i cha byad ni// byis pa gzhon nur
120b2: lang tsho 'dra/ / rin chen rgyan dang na bza' ni// gzugs mdzes lha yi tsa lta ba// khros pa'i srin po lta bu ste// sgra dang kha su la sogs pa// spu sogs ser zhing drub la 'khyil// sna tshogs ngur khrod rgyan rnams me// rdu
120b3: cing blo ldan rab tu khros/ / na bza' chen pa khrag can ni// steng gi khyams su yod par mdzad// ha han+d+ra hUM phaT phaT kyi// ngar skad 'brug sgra sngags glu ni// ri rab 'bum bsnyil chal chom ltar// lus rab ltas 'gro
120b4: brgyan pa ni/ / gzi ldan 'khyud cing phu sgra 'don// 'phro 'du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni// nyi 'bum dus me'i bskal pa 'dra// rab gdug mtshon cha du ma ni// lha min dus kyi 'khrug pa'i cha// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs 'byung
120b5: thams cad yi ge hUM sgra can/ / ma mo dang ni mkha' 'gro rnams// b+h+yo yig drag po'i bdag nyid can// thub pa yi ge muM las bskyed// rgyal sras rig mnyan thos dang // 'jig rten skyong rnams sngags 'dis bskyed/
120b6: namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsa pa ri bA ke b+h+yaHsarba thAHoM sarbas sbyar pa re shud d+ha d+ha rma teg gnas mu dag te/ mthA ba pa ri shud d+ho/ ma hA na ya ba ri we ra swAhA// rang gi lam la sems bcug nas// sdig pa rnams
120b7: da bat+sa/ / nga tshul bzang ba yang dag byung // reg par gyur ba'i sems ldan nas// drang srong rje 'phrul can du 'gyur// gzhan yang sdug bsngal ni nus na// nga gi ba tho ba sum cadags// rang rigs kyiH/
120b8: rnams kyi// gzugs brnya daphyag mtshan la dog ni// dkyil 'khor ram ni ris ma las// gsung ba ji ltar bsgom par bya// de nas mi g.yo khro ba ches// rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag 'tshal nas// dag cing gsal la snyan pa yis//
121a1: tshig gi yang ni 'di gsol to// rdo rje 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das// gtum po mtshan nyid rab ldan pa'i// nga yi mtshan nyid khyed bshad nas// de tshe rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// gtum mo'i cha byad ldan byas nas//
121a2: rang gzugs sngags dang bcas pa yis// gsang chen brda 'di bka' stsal to// dag pa'i sems nyid hUM rdo rje// mthing ka'i mdog las rdo rje 'dzin// mthing ka brkyang bskum khro sems can// na ri'i rgyan bcas 'jigs byed
121a3: su/ / gyen skra kha spu gyod ser dmar// pad ma zla ba'i steng du ni// ma yi nang bzhugs rdor dril 'ching // rnam snang 'dzin dang gnyis dang po// bzhi pa'i lnga pa de'i gsum pa// lnga pa'i lnga pa bdun pa'i bzhi// me yi sa bon
121a4: dgugs pas mnan/ / bdun pa'i dang po gsum pa yin// gsum pas bteg go hUM phaT bcas// gsang sngags rgyal po bla med 'dis// dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa dang // khyad par du ni 'byung po sel// klu 'dul ba ni
121a5: dkar po che/ / nam mkha' lding gi cha byad che// grub pa'i gter gyi don du ni// ser po 'od dang ldan pa yis// dmar po dag ni ldang nag dag/ drag po'i gdon rnams sel ba dang // tshe ring ba la shis pa'o// lhag pa bskyed pa'i sku
121a6: mdog ni/ / 'byung bar gyur pa'i de ma thag/ sa stengs thams cad mun nag 'khrigs// bdud rnams thams cad rab tu tshig/ ye shes me 'od chen po 'di// bzod par sla la gcig ma mchis// bgegs chen log par
121a7: 'dren pa rnams/ / dog pa'i sems kyis tha garings 'bros// gsang sngags yi ge hUM sgra can// glog 'khrug pa'i 'od zer 'dra// klad par yi ge haM gi gzugs// gru gsum ma yi gzugs brnyan can// 'od dmar chal ba
121a8: rab 'thor bas/ / bgegs tshegs sreg cing 'bros par byed// bung bu rnga mo khyi spre'u gzugs// ro langs ma lus thams cad kun// ha ta brjod cing 'bros par byed// rlung gis g.yengs pa'i rul dang mtshungs// gyen thur haM
121b1: gi 'phro 'dra dang / / khro bcu sa bon yi ge hUM// me dang rlung gi tshul du 'bar// mngon sum rtsal me bzhin du// snying gi hUM gis 'das nas kyang // klad pa'i hUM gis sreg par byed// 'od dang phyag rgya lha yi sku// bskrad dang
121b2: bcing dang myos byed bsam/ / seng ge dang ni grang chen 'brug/ drag po'i sgra skad ci 'dra bar// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags zlas pa ni/ ba gegs dang lag 'dren ma lus pa// sreg cing bye ma rdul du rog/ snying nad spyong po
121b3: brtan pa ni/ / 'od 'bar 'od kyis sdig pa'i tsho gas// du ma rnams kyang zad par mdzad// lus ngag yid brtan 'khor lo sngags// oM dang AHdang hUM sbyor gyis// dpal 'phel dbang phyug bskyed pa dang // go cha chen po bskon
121b4: par byed/ / na ma ste yang d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM hA go cha chen po'i gsang sngags 'dis// rgyal sras rnams kyang 'dar gyur na// bgegs rnams sreg pa smos ci dgos// sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM gis/ ye shes lha dang 'brel bar bya/
121b5: rgyal bas dbang bskur sbyor bas ni// ye shes dbu rgyan brtag par bya// gtso la mi bskyod dbu rgyan can// 'khor kun mi g.yos rgyas gdab bya// bdag nyid yi ger byas nas su// mi gzugs shin tu phra bas ni//
121b6: mtshan mo dus su nyams par bya// sdang ba hUM gi sgra las so// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las lha 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sngags spyod tshul gyi cho ga
121b7: nyon/ / dad pa dang yang mi ldan zhing // byang chub sems las ma bskyed de// dbang bskur rjes gan dam tho ba la// sdom tshul dam tshig bral ba'i mi// gsang sngags rang nyid len pa ni// byis pa lcags bsregs ming
121b8: pa 'dra/ thog ma me sgrib bkru ba'i phyir// rdo rje slob dpon 'di skad brjod// oM sngags mchog ting 'dzin rnam dag chu// bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi// sdig pa'i tshogs rnams dag gyur nas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems
122a1: sa byed/ / oM sarba thA ga ta badz+ra ad+hiSh+Ti na kA ya bA ga tsi ta ta bi sho d+han a b+hi ShiH hUM/ oM sangs rgyas kun gyis dang sngags pa'i// rin chen sngags las byung ba yi// dbu rgyan lha rdzas cod pan 'dis// dbang bskur rin
122a2: chen ma chog tu 'gyur/ / oM badz+ra d+har shrI badz+ra swa sa ma yas a haM/ rad na swakraT a b+hiShiny+tsa hU~M// rdo rje chen po bla na med// bzung bas phyogs las rgyal gyur te// rdo rje lta bur brtan phyed pas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung /
122a3: oM sarba badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM// dril bu dbyangs snyan bla na med// sku yi rdo rje rab bskyed pas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung // khams gsum srid pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// oM sa ma ya b+ha Na D+ha badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM// oM snying rje shes
122a4: rab dbyer med rgya/ / gang gis thos pa nang gi su// de yi ming mtshan bdag por 'gyur// rtag pa'i dad gnas blang bar mdzod// oM badz+ra nA ma a b+hi Shi ka ta// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu
122a5: bzang po kun bdag nyid/ / rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dril bu rgya// shes rab dbyengs kyis rjes 'gror bshad// rtag tu khyod kyis gzung byas na// byang chub mchog thob rgyal bas gsungs//
122a6: oM shes rab ral gri bla na med// gang gis 'chang brgyal 'gyur te// bdud kyi dpung ni gshegs nas kyang // mkha' la ye shes 'ong 'bar 'gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga tA badz+rA dz+nyA na kha Da ga a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM// a rdo rje zhags pa
122a7: thugs rje can/ / nyon mongs srid pa'i sdong po rnams// thabs kyi zhags pas bcings nas kyang // srid pa'i baching ba las grol mdzod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra pA sha na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM// dbang dang rjes gnang ma thob cing //
122a8: dam tshig sdom pa mi ldan la// bla ma mnyes par mi byed na// sgrub pa 'bras me da na song 'gro// log lta can gang bla ma'i tshe// dmyal ba'i gnas su 'gro bar nges// 'dir nyams pas ni nang yams dang // dgra bo mu ges rtag/
122b1: tu'ache/ dkyil 'khor sa gzhi nyams dga' ba// chu klung tsho 'gram ri ljongs dang // 'bras bu me tog bskyed mo tshal// kun dga' ra ba khang bzangs mchog/ bzhi mdor sel shing gcig drung // phyugs lhas khang bcug
122b2: glang chen bres/ / gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa dang // chu gling mtshe'u 'gram ne'u bsing du// bsnyen dang dbang bskur byed pa dang // dur khrod sogs su las rnams bsgrub// las kyi dkyil 'khor khru gang ste// dbang gyi dkyil 'khor
122b3: chen po la/ / thub pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// yang na drug gam brgyad kyang bya// gzhan ni khru gsum tshad du bya// yang na lnga'am bdun du bya// gza' yi dkyil 'khor khru gnyis ste// yang na phyed dang gsum par bya// kun tu
122b4: bzhi che pho brang ste/ / khang pas tshad kyi phyed yin te// khang pa gnyis pa cha gsum pa// rta babs rdo rje pad ma'o// lha snam bzhi cha dag tu 'gyur// thub pa'i sgo ni bzhi yin te// gzhan du sgo gcig pa nyid shis// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni
122b5: byang gi sgo/ / tshes ni nubasgo rdo rje lho// gza' dang 'jig rten skyong sogs shar// dbang sgyur lha yi gnas rnams su// bum pa phyag brgyar bcas pa'am// sku'am rang rang phyag rgya gzhag/ thub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// pad
122b6: kar steng du lhung bzed do/ / gtso bo'i sa ni sor drug ste// lhag ma rnams ni sor bzhi'o// rigs kyi mtshan mas yang yang bskor// byang du 'jig rten dbang sdud ni// pad kar rdo rje gdengs por bcas// dbang ldan spyi blugs byams
122b7: pa'i 'o/ / shar du 'jam dpal ud pa la sngo// mar ni kun bzangs yid bzhin nor// lhor ni rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// bden bral mkha' snying pad dkar te// nub du pad ser rdo rje chos// nub byangs snying pad ma dmar// gtsug tor
122b8: gnod mdzes steng 'og char/ / gtsug tor dang ni btun shing ngo // shar du rnam rgyal thod pa ste// mar ni 'dod rgyal rtse gsum mo// rdo rje rtse gcig gshin gshed lhor// bden bral ral gri stobs po che// nub du rta mgrin pad ma ste/
123a1: byang du bgegs dgra rdo rje rgya// nub dur thug pa sngon po ste// dbang ldan du ni mi g.yo ba// de yi rgyab tu nyan thos ni// sha ri'i bu dang rab 'byor dang // maud gal bu dang 'od srungs dang // rgyal mchog dang ni sa steng skyong //
123a2: rta thul dang ni ba glang bdag/ drag shul dbang chen tshangs bu can// ba ra d+h+wa dza lteng rgyas dang // dga' bo nye dga' sgrag can no// de ltar bcu drug phyag rgya'o// pad ma'i steng du lhung gzed do// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jam dpal
123a3: dkyil 'khor bzang po yi/ / dbus su ral gri me 'ong can// rin chen rdo breg steng du bri// byang du rdo rjes mtshan pa yi// bum pa brib byams pa'o// shar du kun tu bzang po yi// rdo rje dkar po bri bar bya// lhod ni mi 'od ldan pa yi//
123a4: lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje bri// nub du 'jig rten dbang po ste// pad dkar 'od dang ldan pa bri// yid bzhin nor 'dzin mdzes gzugs car// rin chen rdo steng dbang ldan bri// mer ni rab 'bar rdo rje yi// bgrang phreng pad ma la gnas bri//
123a5: bden bral du ni rab brjid pa'i// go cha 'bar ba bri bar bya// rlung du mdzes pa gzhon nu'i lha// rin chen sgrom ni bri bar bya// steng du tshul phod ces khro bo'o// pad ma'i steng du khro bo yi// 'og tu khro rgyal mnga' gzhug gi/ rdo rje brag steng
123a6: zhags pa bri/ / khro bo lhag ma sngon gyi ni// tshul gyis rgyal bar dgod par bya// brtan pa zhes pa'i pho nyi ma'i// chu gri byangad du bri bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yi// mkha' sor ma ni shar du'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba ye/
123a7: rnam 'arigs pa ni lho ru'o// nub gyi phyogs su bri bar bya// mdzad bum zhes rin phreng 'dzin// rin chen rdo steng shar lhor bris// shar lhor bgegs 'dzin ma zhes pa// 'khor le me 'bar rdo rje bri// 'bar ba'i gdun shing bden bral du//
123a8: 'joms pa'i thob rlung du bri// thal sbyar gung mo nang du bcug/ pad ma mdzod kyi phyag rgya dang // sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH// sarba mu khe b+h+yaHhU~M hUM ba ba ma maM swA hA// spyan drangs gshegs su
123b1: gsol ba dang / / bsrung ba mchog gi sngags yin no// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo// sarba bi shra mu khe b+h+yaHhe he te/ A dz+nyA pa ra ma ra ga ga na a gats+tsha a gtsA b+ha ga bA na shIg+h+na swA hA// bsnyen pa 'bum la byin brlabs dang /
123b2: lha bsgrub pa dang mchod pa'o// de nas yang dag bshang bya ba// rdo rje chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dbus su 'jig rten dbang sdud nyid// pad ma dmar po 'chang ba'o// shar du don yod zhags pa ni// bgrang phreng sngon po 'chang pa'o//
123b3: lhor ni nam mkha' dri med de// rdo rje sngon po 'chang ba'o// nub tu gar gyi dbang pad ma// byang du thugs rje shugs po che// rdo rje nag po 'dzin pa bri// sgrol ma khro gnyer ral gcig dang // yid bzangs ma ni mtshams su bri// khro bo dang ni po
123b4: nya mo/ / 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rim pas dgod// de nas phyag na rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad par bya// dbus su phyag na rdo rje nyid// rdo rje dkar po 'chang ba'o// shar du sangs rgyas spyan ma yin// lhor ni pad 'dzin
123b5: mA ma kI/ / nub du gos 'chang na bza' dkar// byang du sgrol ma ud pa la 'chang // phyogs bzhir nam mkha' dri med dang // shugs po chen po rdo rje tog/ bsnyems tshul chen po zhes pa rnams// rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa'o//
123b6: der yang sngon ltar khro bo rnams// rim pa bzhin du bri bar bya// de yi cha rgyab dkyil 'khor la// drag po lha rnams bkod pa ni// dpung bzangs la sogs rdo rje can// brgyad po byang gi phyogs su bri// tshegs 'chang bshes gnyen 'gro skyong
123b7: dang / / mthong dkar rig byed bden bral med// ngan spong brgyad de drang srong shar// lhor ni rdo rje dgra stam// rdo rje tho badrag shul ma// rta rnam dang khro gnyer ma// ro langs ma dang lugs sgrog ma// mthong dkar ma ste brgyad po bri// dug sel
123b8: mad 'od zer can/ / nor rgyun ral gcig dpung rgyan ma// dbyangs ldan dril sgrol brgyad nub phyogs// kun kyang rang rigs phyag rgya can// sgo yi phyogs su dgod bya ba// thub pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi// brgya byin khyab 'jug
124a1: dbang phyug che/ / tshangs pa 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor lo'o// rgyal dang rnam rgyal mi thub ma// gzhan mi thub ma spyan ras gzigs// nag mo che dang u tsASh+ma// gzhon nu 'phrog mo gter 'dzin gyi// khro bo
124a2: migayo sgo bzhi la/ / nag po che dang dga' byed dang // nad spong dang ni tshegs bdag go/ mi g.yo dbang bskur dgyes pa yi// dbus su khro bo mi g.yo ba'i// ral gri me 'od 'bar ba'o// phyogs bzhir khro bo mdog bzhi'o//
124a3: 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad can// rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang // rgya gram g.yas pa'i phyag tu 'chang // g.yon pa sdig 'dzub zhags pa 'chang // rin chen brag la sru bzhugs nas// zhabs gnyis pad ma'i steng du'o//
124a4: mtshams su khro mo bzhi po yang // gtso bo dang mtshungs sgeg pa'i nyams// des rgyab sngon ltar khro bo bcu// sku 'am phyag rgya'i phreng ba bri// dkyil 'khor cha yi rgyab tu ni// 'jig rten skyong bcu drag shul can// khros pas//
124a5: rang rigs 'khor bcas bri// bum pa tshad ldan ras kyis dkri// dri bzangs chus bkar lha grangs sam// bcu gnyis sam ni drug kyang rung // kha rgyan dang bcas bzhag par bya// bla re ba dan gdugs rgyal mtshan/
124a6: yon chab bdug spos me tog dang // sgron ma byug chab zhal zas dang // gling bu sil snyan na bza' tshogs// gtor ma dri bzangs sman dang bcas// yid bor dri zhim zas skom tshogs// dkyil 'khor spras nas mchod par bya/
124a7: sa la pum mo tshad brkos nas// 'bra srin shing rdo dum bu sogs// skyon mangs bral nas sa yis dag // ba yi rnam lngas blugs pa'i sar// me tog btsal bkram mchod sogs bkor// lha ni spyan drangs mchod nas/
124a8: kya // dag mi dge ba'i rmi lam brtag/ rmi lam bzang na spro gyur nas// sa bdag mo la gsol ba gdab// khyad par du yang gtor mas mchod// bu tshur shog ces theg chen gyi// tshul chen khyod ni snod yin pas//
124b1: gsang sngags spyod tshub cho ga rnams// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams// mi g.yo mgon por rab bsgoms pas// ye shes mtshungs pa med pa brnyes// skyob pa#
124b2: ser ges kyang / / gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med 'dis// bdud ste shin du mi bzad pa// dpung chen rnams kyang dpa' bos bcom// 'jig rten 'dul phyir chos rnams kyi// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de 'dra
124b3: kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ / bu khyod blo gros 'di gyis shig/ u dum 'bar ba'i me tog ltar// brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'brur 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ste// skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po che// rnyed dka' rnyed par
124b4: gyur na yang / / gsang sngags skyob pa'i tshul 'byung ba// shin du dka' ste rmad byung phyir// sdug bsngal shin du mi bzad pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho cher 'jigs las// myur du sgrol ba gsang sngags las// sa stengs
124b5: gsang sngags nor bu 'dra/ / rga nad 'chi 'jigs spong ba dang // nyes mdzad grogs btsugs 'thun 'dod dang // mu ge dgra tshoms bral ba de dang // zas skom gos rgyan longs spyod rtag/ bde bskyed dpal 'byor thob pa dang
124b6: myur du sangs rgyas 'dod pa yis/ / gsang sngags thabs la myur brtson bsgrubs// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bya//
124b7: sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos na sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// deng nas mchog tu brtan por gzung // 'gro la lhag pa'i sems bskyer nas// bla ma la ni yon phul zhu// yid bzhin nor
124b8: 'dra bla med sku/ / zhi ba sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob// srog gcod rku brdzun mi tshangs spyod// myos byed 'thung dang glu gar rol// rgyan byug mal chen mtho ba dang // phyi dro ba zas spangs pa ste// brgyad dang bcu gcig ba
125a1: lnga dang / / khyad par du ni gnam stong la// dal 'byor thob pa shin tu dkon// sangs rgyas bstan pa shin tu dkon// sdom pa blangs nas srog bzhin du// g.yeng med bsdams te bsrung bar bya// gsung brtag
125a2: du skyabs 'gro bya/ / lha mi bde ldan lus thob nas// dmyal bdud 'gro yi dgas gnas// thob nas spong dka' de dag ni// nam yang thob par mi bya'o// bdag ni dpa' bo ral gri'achang // gsang ba'i 'khor lo sbyor byed pas/
125a3: las 'das pa'i gdug can rnams// dum bu phye mar 'gas par 'gyur// slob ma gzung phyir thog mar ni// bsnyen pas sngags kyi mthu bskyed bya// longs spyod 'phel phyir gtor ma gtang // bsod nams 'dod phyir mchod pa brtson
125a4: bla ma thos bsam sgom la gnas/ / gtod phod dul zhing chos spyod mkhas// nad med bzod des snying rje che// sngags sgrub brtson dpa' shes rab can// brtags nas slob ma lnga 'am bdun// dad brtson zhi dul bla ma bkur// sdig
125a5: 'jigs nad med dbang po tshang / / dbyibs sdug snying rjer ldan pa gzung // 'phags pa rdo rje khro ba'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las skye bo gzung ba'i thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rig
125a6: 'dzin pa yi dngos grub che/ / gzhan du med pa rdul byung ba// rgyud 'dir bshad pa mnyan par byos// mi ni rin chen dang po ste// gang gar bsgrub pa de dang de// 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// ral gri lugs sam shing nyid la
125a7: so bzhipa 'am sor brgyad bya/ / yu bar rigs kyi rgya la br-i// pa yi rnam lnga dri zhim chus// bkrus twa dri dang me tog mchod// zla drug sngags bzlas khra ba bskam// ral gri drang 'thal 'od du 'bar// blangs pas mkha' spyod
125a8: yul 'gro 'gyur/ / tshe ni bar gyi bskal pa ste// lha yi gzhon pa sna tshogs bcibs// sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'gro bar 'gyur// gser dngul zangs kyi zhags pa 'am/ shing gi zhags pa'ang de ltar 'grub// rgyal
125b1: mtshan nor bu 'gewang gdugs/ / lcags kyu rnams kyang de bzhin paslab// lha rnams bsgrub nA thang shing la// gang 'dod lha yi gzugs byas te// sngags bzlas tsam gyis mdun du 'ong// ci 'dod gsol 'debs 'dod
125b2: basmra/ / klu la nag ge sar shing // gnod sbyin la ni gser las gzugs// dri zal ni 'od mi'i shing // mkha' lding 'jam pa'i gzugs kyis so// srin po la ni dur khrod shing // gang yang gzugs byas rkang pa ni gagayon
125b3: bas de yi ske mnan te/ / sum 'bum bzlas na mdun du 'ong // ci 'dod smra tshe dgos pa blang // shar du ras ris kha smad drung // dus gsum bzlas bya gos rlon gyon// sum 'bum bzlas na mar do yi// brgyad la 'byung po gtor
125b4: ma sbyin/ / maN Da la steng du ro bzhag nas// rang nyid rin chen khri steng du// snying po khri brjod ro 'gul 'gyur// mi slad kha yi nang du lu// pad ma kha phye lte can mthong // bcang na ral gri rig 'dzin 'gyur/ lha yi gzugs kyis
125b5: tshangs pa yis/ / 'jig rten khams kyi gnas rnams rgyu// 'ag wang bdun bzlas thig les ni// skye bo kun gyis mi mthong ngo // mi g.yo bus mo btsugs pa 'am// 'jam dpal ris ma'i drung du ni// 'jam dpal sngags 'di
125b6: sa ya bzlas/ / nyal khyad par mchod pa bya// mtshan rangs bzlas pa'i tho rangs nas// dang po rtags sa g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa nyi ma 'gyur ldog byed// phyogs bzhir mkha' la sgra chen po// ha ta 'brug ska dgrag par 'gyur/
125b7: gsum par mkha' la rig 'dzin rnams// me tog char 'bebs chun 'phyar sbrer// de rjes rig 'dzin ma lus dang // 'jig rten skyod pas rab bskor nas// bro rgyal byon nas gsung snyan gyis// ci 'dod bu khyod gsung bar 'gyur
125b8: rig 'dzin rgyal po mi snang sogs/ / ci 'dod par ni smra bar bya// 'grub nas brgyad gnyis cha byad can// rgyan bzangs lag na ral gri thogs// lha yi gzhon pa la bcibs nas// rig 'dzin tshogs mang lhan cig tu// sangs rgyas
126a1: zhing ma byin pa'i rtsa/ / rgyal sras rnams kyis phyag byas nas// mchod pa chen po thab 'gyur te// bskal pa du mar tshe gnas 'gyur// ud pal sngon po lig bu mig/ ru dazangs snod ri lug zhag/ zlab
126a2: gzas zin par bzlas nas/ / mig bsdus 'dod pa'i khams gsal 'gyur// bdag ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo // gnam lcags rdo rje sor bcu drug/ de gnyis rtsa gsum dbyibs can te// tsan dan dmar dang dri bzangs
126a3: zug/ cho 'phrul chos gnyis nya yi bar// mchod cing bzlas na tha mar ni// mar ma brkyang sogs kyis mchod de// ku sha khris kyi steng 'dug nas// rdo rje lag gnyis bzung ma thag/ dud 'bul 'od du 'bar nas kyang // 'khod/
126a4: bcas rig pa 'dzin pa yi// 'khor lo sgyur ba thob par 'gyur// 'khor lo bdun sogs mtshon cha dang // gse dang mal lha ma tshangs skud sogs// dgos pa thams cad de ltar sgrub// sngon gyi tshul du dngos grub 'byung //
126a5: chos gcig nyin par su gzugs kyi// mthe bor dza ti sngags brjod brdeg/ stong phrag brgyad kyi mthe bo las// 'od zer phyung nas reg mtheg/ dbus skra lung lo 'khyil gyur nas// 'khor bcas rig 'dzin rgyal po
126a6: thob/ sus kyang mi thub lus grub 'gyur// tshe ni bskal pa'i bar du gnas// sa la pad 'dab brgyad pa bri// bum pa skud pa nag pos dkri/ tsan dan gyis byug dris kyang dgang// pad+ma ma'i steng bzhag pad sted 'dug/ skyong
126a7: phrag brgyad bzlas sa gzhigs/ / pad mar snang zhing sa gzhir snang // chu des gtor la khru gang brko// blangs pas bskal pa'i tshe tshad thab// srog mkhar sa la seng ge bya// 'gi wang gis zug dkyil 'khor gzhag/ g.yo
126a8: 'gul bar du mchod cing bzla/ / seng ger gyur nas rgyabazhon nas// 'dod gzugs lha gnas kun du 'gro// sangs rgyas zhing yang mthong bar 'gyur// tshe lo khri phrag gcig bskor nas// rig 'dzin chen po'i gnas su
126b1: 'gro/ / 'dir gsungs pa 'am ma gsungs pa// sngags dang lha 'dis bsgrub pa yis// rig 'dzin grub par grags pa rnams// ma lus thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen
126b2: po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// phran tshegs las kyi sbyor ba gtso// gza' yi chog 'di yin te// gnod pa sel dang par skyed mdzad// ba yi
126b3: rnam lngas byugs pa yi/ / dkyil 'khor dbus su pad ma ni// kha dog sna tshogs gnyis rdeg gi/ dbus su sangs rgyas de bzhin lhor// chos ni rdo rje choms/ so// shar du dge 'dun ldang ngu'o// nub du 'jig rten
126b4: dbang phyug dmar/ / byang du phyag na rdo rje ste// byad shar du ni 'jam dpal ser// mer ni gshin rje'i gshed do gnag/ dbyug 'chang ma he zhon pa'o// mi g.yo mgon po srin po phyogs// rta mgrin rlung gi phyogs su'o//
126b5: dkon mchog gsum po chos 'chang rgya// sems dpa' khro bo rang rtags so// kun kyang rin chen khri la bzhugs// de rgyab cha la gza' rnams te// shar du nyi ma dkar ser ni// rta la zhon te pad ma 'chang // nub tu
126b6: zla ba dkar po ni/ / ku mu da 'chang dang ba zhon// lhor ni mig dmar kha dog dmar// ril pa'i steng bzhugs me sgron bsnams// lag pa mdog ser ud dpal 'chang // byang du pad+ma stengs bzhugs pa yis//
126b7: phung bu mdog sngon grags pa mthogs// shAr lho phyogs su kAl bcibs// bawa sangs dkar shing thog 'chang // lha ba gsang kyi zil bzhugs// byang shang glen pa mdog dag ni// tshangs po'i skang na danag pa
126b8: thogs/ / nub byang sgra gcan du dka ni// sbrul gyi steng na 'khor lo 'dzin// rnon po ljang ku ral gri 'chang // gtso bo drung du pad spangs bzhugs// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM b+ha gi na sa
127a1: 6/ nyi ma'i snying po'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba pa'i pra re ke b+h+yaHsan b+hAHa sarba tra ya a swAt+ma// zla ba'i'o// na maHsarba ta thAg te b+h+yaHsarba pa'i bu ke b+h+yaHsarbarmA a a d+hi rA ya swAH// non pa'ang/
127a2: na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thAHoM su b+hi shud d+ha swA hA/ mig dmar gyi'o// namaHsarbata thA ga teb+h+ya/ saHpa ri pU ke b+h+yaHsa rbathAHoM bi su tra ba kA ya swAhA/ gza' lag gi'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba pa ri pU ra/
127a3: keb+h+yaHsarba thAHoM b+hikamA d+ha ya swA hA// pur bu'i'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba pa ri b+hu ra ke b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thAH sud+ham nar to s+yA ha// ba bsangs kyi'o// na maHsarba ta thAg te b+h+yaHsarba pa ri b+hu re ke b+h+yaHsarba thAHoM shre/ ba na pa/
127a4: sA hA/ spen pa'i 'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thAHoM bi kri ta ba ku ru tsi swA hA// sgra gcan gyi'o// sngags re brgyad stong brgyad brgya bzlas// ci 'byor mchod de gsol ba gdab// langs spyod spel
127a5: cing 'jigs pa sel/ / nad med bgegs rigs 'joms par 'gyur// rims sogs gzas zin nang la yang // sku yi drung du gsol btab sel// zhi rgyas dbang drag gang sbyar ba// de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// mi dang
127a6: rgod sbrul rus pa/ / skabs su btums nas dgra khyi ma swa// dgra bo nad paskyed nor rnams rlag/ rtag tu thab mo 'byung bar des// stag su thod dus phrag pa'i sku// dgra bo'i sgor sbas bskrad par byed// ne'u le nag po wa sbal//
127a7: rus// rang khrag rtsangs pa'i mgo bo rnams// gong bu ming bcas dgra sgor swa// dgra bo 'khor bcas shi bar 'gyur// mi tshol dur thal rgya skyugs ni// thod pa so can nang blugs nas// gang gi sgor bzhag khang pa 'jig/ ku shi
127a8: gzugs brnyan rkang pas mnan/ / dbang sbyar 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas na// rgyal po che yang dbang 'gyur na// 'byung po gzhan lta smos ci dgos// bud med skyes phyugs la sogs la// rang mi ldan pa'i gzugs byas te/
127b1: rkang pa g.yon mnan ming bcas zla// gang dang gang yang nges par 'grub// sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris te// sngags kyis brdungs na brlag par 'gyur// 'jim pas bgegs kyi gzugs byas te// gdab cing brdung
127b2: na sel bar des/ / phur bus gang ba dang mtshon chas brab// rdo rje ri rab cog brgyad ldan// sa la byas pa'i thams par du// gzugs brnyan bcugaste rkang pas mnan// gzas zin nub mo ba'i saN+Dal// dri bzangs
127b3: me tog sil sa bkram/ / pha rol phyin pa'i glegs pa ma bzhugs// byangs ma'i snod du mang bzhag ste// seng ldeng mas ni bskor bar bya// dngos grub rnam gsum 'grub pa dang // gter mthong bar yang 'dis 'gyur ro// zos
127b4: pas spyan gyi phyag rgya bya/ / hU~M mtha' gsang sngags drag du brjod// dur khrod thal ba gang byin pa// gdon gyis 'dzin nam bran du 'gyur// de nas mi g.yo spyan gcig pa'i// sngags kyi cho ga bshad par bya// ris mi'i drung du 'bum
127b5: phrag gsum/ / brjod pas 'di yi bsnyen pa rdzogs// dben par zan gyi chang bu sbyin// des ni rtag tu 'brel bar 'gyur// 'dzub mo'i rtse la hUM bkod nas// brjod pas sprin rnams 'dral bar byed// dgra bo ltar bcas
127b6: gzugs brnyan la/ / rkang g.yon mnan bzlas lugs phrar gdab// bka' nyan 'gyur rog tubs na shi/ skud pa ser po bcings na dag/ spang leb mnan na mnan par 'gyur// ra lpags brabs na bka' nyan 'gyur// srang bu
127b7: yungs kar la bzlas te/ / 'chang na gang 'dod bsrung bar byed// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bishwa mu khe b+h+yo/ sarba thAHoM tsan Da ma hA ro Sha na hAM tr-i thA ma hA tsanaT a tsa la ka na hUM hUM hUM a pra ti ha ta/ ta thA ga tAM dz+nya/ s+pha ra hUM hU~M phaT sA
127b8: hA/ / rgya mtsher 'bab pa'i chu klung du// tsan dan spras pa'i pad ma ni// sngags bcas ci tsam bsgyur ba'i grangs// gser gyi dong rtse rnyed par 'gyur// bram ze'am ni dge 'dun ras// rgyal po ngas sa ma grog la// pad ma mu lud/
128a1: gnyis ldan bri// lte bar oM hU~M ming dang bcas// tsan Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ phaT dang bcas pa 'dab mar bkod// mu khrud dang por rtsa sngags te// gnyis pa 'jam dpal sngags nyid bri// dri dang me tog sogs mchod/
128a2: nas// skogs kyis dril nas lus la bcangs// gdon dang nang dang mu ge sel// g.yul du phyin nas rgyal bar 'gyur// yang na ral gri sor bzhir bri// 'od kyi ri mo nar chud pa// ye d+harma la sogs kyis bskor// dbus su ming dang
128a3: bcas pa yi/ / snying po sngags ni khrigs su bri// 'dis kyang sngon gyi yon tan 'gyur// mtho lngas 'khor ba'i bar du ni// mtho gang 'phang du yod par bya// nang du mtshal gyis 'jam dpal sngags// mgo ni gyen du bltas pa bri// kha la nye/
128a4: bar rten 'brel sngags// spra tshil las byas dgra yi gzugs// dug dang gri khrag gis bris nas// ming yig bsad par bcas pa ni// ling kha'i snying khar bcug byas te// dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag po yi// dbus su mtho gang brus
128a5: byas te/ / nang bzhag steng du spar bu sbub// ci srid mar gyi tshes gcig nas// zla ba mi snad zhag bar du// nyin mo rten 'brel sngags bzlas te// mtshan dus khro bo spyan gcig pa'i// sngags ni drag tu brjod par bya// mtshams dang ji srid
128a6: mtshams bar du/ / g.yon du bskor zhing rtsa ba'i sngags// drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i grangs su brjod// 'jam dpal sngags kyis chos gos su// bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas ni// mchod rten la ni bsreg bshad bsil// sangs rgyas
128a7: bstan pa 'jig pa dang / / sngags la 'phya zhing sems can 'tshe// log lha log par spyod byed cing // sems can la 'tshe byed pa ni// rgyal po khro bo che bcu dang // 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal chen bzhi// mtshogs gza' dang rgyu skar
128a8: tshogs/ / bstan dga' rnams kyis myur du sgrol// rgyud gzhan dag la grags pa yi// bden pa'i mthu yang du ma brjod// dur khrod sa la mchod rten ni// nag po gru gsum khru gang ba'i// srog shing nag po gru gsum la// bde
128b1: gshegs yi ge brgya pas dkri/ / gur gram li khris bris pa'o// mya ngan med shing gru gsum la// rgya gram dbang chen rim par bcas// lam dang staM b+ha ya na na brgyad// phyogs brgyad bri ba'i rwa dbus la// nye snying ming dang
128b2: bcas pa bri/ / de yi lte bar snying po ni// gsang ba ming bcas bri ba'o// tshogs kyi bdag po gtor mas mchod// ma mo rnams dang legs ldan sras// sha khrag me tog nag pos mchod// ji srid gsum dang bdun par du// le mo
128b3: med par byas gyur na/ / dge slong dge tshul bsnyen ldan gang // sdom brtson de ni ldan gyur te// sdig ldan myur du shi bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gtum po rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// sna tshogs las rnams thun mong
128b4: ste/ khyad par sbyor ba cung zad bshad// yungs dkar bsnun pas 'byung po 'bros// ser ba bsrung na 'khor lo 'am// rnga dang dud la bri bar bya// g.yul du 'jug na ral gri sogs// nad la 'khor la chu yungs dkar// thod lo
128b5: kor gyis sa phor la/ / bris te sgor sbyangs se'u bsrung // smre tshil gzugs brnyan sor bzhi pa// dur khrod thal bzlas sgo snyeng bzhag/ nad pa gdon las bsrung bar nges// snying khar ming sngags spel bcug nas// tsher mkhar
128b6: bcugs ngag rengs byed/ / snying la btsugs nas khros pa zhi// nan tan sems kyis gsod par nges// ling gas rtags kyi nus pa med// yang na rabs chad thod pa la// ming sngags bris te mi khrag bkang // rabs chad drar sbas
128b7: rigs rgyud 'chang / / byin gzod par ming sngags bcas// dug bkang klu gnas smras mdzes 'dzin/ dag yi sgong sras 'byed par byed// zhing du sbas na le nyes byed// phyugs gnas god 'byung zla dang 'byed// chu dong sbas na chu
128b8: skesems 'gyur/ / me dur sbas na rims kyis 'dzin// yang na dgra ming khrag gis bri// spra tshil gzugs kyi snying khar bcug/ mchod rten nag po mtho gang ba'i// nang bcu ga dong bzhag lhung bzed sbub// bram ze rigs bzhis
129a1: sngags brjod cing / / nag po tshes nas phyis bskor zhing // bden pa'i mthu brjod gzugs brnyan bsreg/ dgra bo shi 'gyur the tsom med// gri khrag bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag/ ka tra ta yi lteb ma la// ka ro ka yi dus su ni//
129a2: gzugs la ming dang sngags bcas bris// rkang pas mnyes na rdul du 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin no// mtshon gyis bsad pa'i thod pa la// sngags dang yul lha'i ming sbal bri// lha yi gnas bcug de steng du// sngags bzlas
129a3: pung ba snying khar gdab/ / gdug pa'i tsher ma'i hom sbar te// mi rta ba lang khyim he// sna tshogs khrag bsres 'di skad brjod// lha khyod yul 'dir thog ser po ba// med na bskal par khyod nyid sreg/ de rjes dkar dang mngar mchod do//
129a4: 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las// sbyor ba phran tshegs kyi le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// / de nas sbyin bsreg las rnams kun// myur 'grub thabs ni bshang par bya// mngar gsum dur ba bsregs
129a5: pa yis/ / gnod rigs thams cad sel bar byed// yam shing 'bras bu gsum bsregs shing // gnod nad thams cad zhi bar byed// 'o ma can gyi yam shing la// 'i mdur ba til dang 'bras// snying rje'i sems kyis brgya bsregs
129a6: na/ / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// gabung mdar gsum 'bru thams cad// dung ba dkar po'i yam shing rnams// 'o ma can gyi shing la bsreg/ nad dang gdon rnams thams cad zhi// 'o ma sbyin bsreg brgya rtsa brgyad// blugs
129a7: ngas chen po zhi bar 'gyur/ / dUng ba mngar gsum ming bcas pas// bsregs pas rta phrugs nad zhi byed// shar lho nub byang phyogs kyis ni// dkar nag dmar ser kha dog 'grub// khru gang khru gnyis tshod kyi thab// sor bzhi la khyor rim
129a8: pas gtang / / sems dpa' pad ma'i rdo rje dang // gcig pus ni rgyas dbang drag 'grub// de nas rgyas pa'i sbyin bsreg ni// ci 'dod thob pa bshad par bya// pad ma'i chu ba 'bum phrag cig/ rgyal po 'thob ste blon po ni// ku mu tal
129b1: 'bum phrag gsum/ / zho dang mngar gsum dang bcas pa'o// a ba mar rga'i 'bras bu dang // mngar gsum 'bum gyis yul bdag 'thob// ri bzangs 'bum phrag bdun gyis ni// yid la ci 'dod thob par 'gyur// dUr btil/
129b2: dang 'bras sogs sreg/ bud med bu bzangs thob par 'gyur// nor 'dod pas ni rkun po yi// lag pa g.yas pa mdzod bzhag nas// mchod cing gsol ba btab pas ni/ nor rnams myur du thob par 'gyur// yang na rgya yi lpags
129b3: pal/ / gung gum b+hi wang yung bas ni// byib che brjid ser po bri// shar na mdzod phugs bltas par bzhag/ zas kyi lhag mas mchod byas zhing // gsol ba btab pas nor rnyed 'gyur// pad ma'i ze ba ka li ka/ bri yang ku ni
129b4: nor rnyed do/ / 'bras bsregs pas kyang nor chen 'thob// ku mu ta yi 'bras sogs bsregs// logs spyod che dang sa gzhi 'thob// pad ma zho dang sbrang rtsi mar// sbyin sreg 'bum gyis mchog stsol pa// gsum pa dag kyang
129b5: mthong bar 'gyur/ / bil ba'i 'bras bu mngar gsum bcas// 'bum phrag gsum du bsregs pas ni// rang nyid rgyal ba chen por 'gyur// mar dang yungs kar dkar pos ni// nim pa'i shing la 'bum bsreg na// snying po rnying pa
129b6: rgyas par 'gyur/ / nas la sogs pa 'bru rigs rnams// gang bsreg gsol btab te rgyas 'gyur// gang 'dod gos kyi kha dog can// me tog bsregs na gos rnyed 'gyur// spos shing sregs na 'khor g.yog 'phel/
129b7: zho mar seng ldeng ma la stong // bsregs na nor rnams rnyed par 'gyur// de nas dbang gi bsreg lugs bshad// til dang 'bras sogs phur ma bsregs// bud med dbang du byed pa'o// pri yaM ku yi sbyin sreg gis// byis pa
129b8: rnams ni dbang du 'gyur/ / 'o ma sbrang rtsi a ru ri'i// shing la bsregs na lha dbang byed// gsum po de dang gu gul bsreg/ gnod sbyin rnams ni dbang du 'gyur// mya ngan med pa'i ya ma shing gis// gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang
130a1: ru 'gyur/ / rgyal po'i yungs kar yungs mar bcas// bsregs pas rgyal po dbang du 'gyur// de nas drag po'i las grub pa'i// sbyin bsreg yang dag bshad par bya// ming bcas tshad dang nim pa bsreg/ bstan
130a2: sngang dgra bo myur du 'chi/ / dgra ming dug gis ni ma pa la// bris te dug dang lhan cig tra// sbrul shun thum po lnga byas nas// thod pa lnga yi nang bzhag ste// lnga po yungs mar gyis bkang nas// gsum ni skyed po gnyis brtsegs la/
130a3: khros pas gcig tu sgra grol bas// sngags brjod thal bar gyur par du// nyid byed bsreg na dgra 'chings// 'chi ltas 'dab ma rtsa ba shun// ra khrag sungs mar rtswa kya skyegs// tsha ba'i bung shing yam shing la// bdun phrag ming dang /
130a4: bcas pa bsreg/ stong phrag gnyis kyis rta phyugs 'chi// bzhis ni bu dang chung ma 'chi// drug gis nye du gnyen 'dun brlag/ brgyad kyis dgra yi rang srog 'chang // gal te skyabs su 'od gyur na// 'o ma stong bsregs rnal du
130a5: sos/ / khrag dang dug phye nim pa'i 'bras// yungs mang la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad// myos byed la bsregs dgra bo 'chi// yang na rus bya nim pa'i lnga// rang gi khrag gam yungs mar skrag/ yang dge tshe dug dang ni// nim pa'i 'bras bus
130a6: bsad par bya/ / yang na gri khrag gis bsregs las/ bya dam myur du gsod par 'gyur// nim pa'i lnga dang ra khrag dug/ dri ma lnga bcas gzugs snying khar// ming yig bcu ga nas phur bus gdab// rig sngags byed ma nyid
130a7: ldog 'gyur/ / rgya skyegs mi rus phye ma yis// mi lpags rmod la dgra gzugs bri// dug dang ske tshe cung zad byug/ nim pa'i me la khros pas bsro// bsregs pas tsha ba'i rims kyis 'chi// drung ba 'o mas sos par 'gyur//
130a8: dug dang nim pa sgog skya dang // mi rus phye bsregs phyugs rnams brlag/ tsha gsum lan tshwa ngungar rang sgyur// yungs mar ro sba sbrul shun dang // nim pa'i lnga dang mi rus phye// skye tshe dug bye sgogatser dang // sgog skya tsher ma'i me
130b1: la bsreg/ dgra bo khrag tu skyugs te 'chi// rgya skyegs lan tshwab glang mkhris// bsregs na mchin pas nad kyis 'chi// ske'u gsher lan tshwa tshab gsum// gzugs brnyan dur khrod mgal dum la// mgo nas rkang pa'i
130b2: du bsreg/ thig nag gis ni gsod par 'gyur// 'o ma can gyi yam shing la// dkar gsum bsre gsanamos par 'gyur// dri chus spangs pa'i sa las ni// thab khung byas te dug gis byug/ nim pa'i 'dab mar dgra po'i ming //
130b3: ra khrag gis bris rgyus pas dkris// tsha gsum shing gi mer bsregs pas// rgyal po myur du 'chi bar nges// dug khrag lan tshwa tsha ba gsum// ming bcas gzugs brnyan nim pa'i mer// bsregs na dgra bo dmu rdzing ngam// mdzend
130b4: kyis ni gsod par 'gyur/ / tsha gsum nim bdug dang dur// khrag dang lan tsha'i gzugs brnyan ni// lan tshwa nim pa tsha ba'i mar// byugs nas a ga'i shing la bsreg/ mdzen da chen pos gzung nas 'chi// ra khrag tshag sum nyungs mar sos//
130b5: nim pa'i lo ma na le sham// nyungs mar dug bsregs tshabs 'chi// ne'u le sha 'am dug dang tshwa// d+ha dur lnga tsha ba gsum// sol ba la ni dgra gzugs bya// nyungs mar byugs te bsregs na 'chi// tsha gsum pa yi 'bras
130b6: bu yis/ / nim pa'i 'dab ma dgra ming bri// thod par dug nyungs lhan cig gzhag/ d+ha dur lnga bcos nas 'ching // ris ma byang du bltas nas kyang // rang nyid lho phyogs blta bar bya// tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs dang
130b7: 'jig rten sbyor ba rdzu 'phrul can/ / ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za sogs// sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems// rig 'dzin khro bo'i rgyal po dang // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha rnams gson// sdig can nga rgyal gdug cing khro/
130b8: chad lta sngags 'phya dkon mchog bcom// bstan la sdang zhing sems can 'chi// mtshams med can 'di bsgral du gsol// rlung gis 'dar zhing char gyis gsher// mes gdung rdul tshub skam 'dir skye// seng ge mkha'/
131a1: lding stag khro bos// bcom zhing 'bru sbrang bung rgod kyis// khrag 'jib bya tshogs mkha' la khyer// mngon spyod las kyi bsam gtan no// de nas sna tshogs las bshad pa// mi rus phye mtshe skye tshe// gnod sbyin
131a2: 'khrig pa dug shing la/ / tha dad mang bcas bsregs pas ni// bskrad dang dbye dang spro bar byed// dA ra ba 'o mar bcas pas so sa// d+ha dur yan lag lnga 'bras bu// tsher ma'i mes bsregs smyo bar byed// tshe gsum lan tshwas
131a3: tsha rims bskyed/ / yang na shing skam lta bur skams// dzam pa'i ri dang rang skyur btsas// dgra bo grang ba'i rims kyis 'debs// khwa'i sgro e ra Na Da mar khus// blugs pa d+ha dur me la bsreg/ lag stobs khwa ta lta bur ni// dgra bo
131a4: mtha' ma kun du 'khyam/ / ske tshe mi rus lan tshwa dug/ nyungs mar nim pa'i me la bsreg/ dgra bo rtag tu 'thab pa dang // nad rnams kun gyis 'debs par 'gyur// dur khrod thal ba sol bar bcas// dgra bo'i gzugs byas dum
131a5: bur gnan/ / cha mngam phur bur 'debs pa ni// phol mig na ngan skyed par byed// bya rgod 'ug pa byi la sha// ne'u le'i bu rnams khyer ba'i mer// drug bcu rtsa brgyad bsregs pa yis// 'thun gnyis myur du 'byed par nges//
131a6: khrag can ras la gzugs bris na// rkang g.yon sker mnan tsham dam bcas// 'dod bcas sngags ni drag po yis// rgyal dang rims nad mtshe nad bskyed// dgra yi skra dang rkang rjes sa// dgra gzugs dug dang ske tshes byug/
131a7: tshe mes bsregs na rengs par 'gyur// dgra yi pha rus dug rang sbyar// gzugs byed nim pa'i mer bsregs na// dgra bo gnod chen nad kyis 'debs// phag rdug sU ha arka'i shing // tsher mes bsregs na mgo 'khor
131a8: 'gyur/ / ne'u le byi la byi tsher spu// bsreg na bud med bu rlag 'gyur// mi dang ne'u le khwa rus pa// yungs mar nim pa'i me la ba sreg/ grong dang grong khyer bskrab par byed// stag spu thod rus 'ug pa'i spu// sa ha me tog na
131b1: le sham/ / nim pa'i lo ma drug bsregs byed// nim pa'i 'bras bu dug lan tshwa// d+ha dung 'bru ba sregs nad skyed byed// dug khrag d+ha ngur 'bras bu yis// nim pa'i shing la dgra ming bri// tsha gsum lan tshwa khrag gis byug/ lcags
131b2: snod yungs mar nang bzhag nas/ / nam pa'i shing gis me yis btso// dgra bo lnga dang 'byed par 'gyur// mi khyi bya rgod rus phye drug/ ske tshe yungs mar sbrul shun dang // nim pa'i lnga dang skags lan tshwa// tsher mes bsregs na nad kyis
131b3: 'debs/ / ske tshe dug skegs sbrul shun tsha ba'i mar// gzugs byas tsha ba'i me la gdung // tshar ches pa dang thog 'bab 'gyur// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las// sbyin bsreg gi le'u ste dgu pa'o//
131b4: de nas tshangs pa khyab 'dug sogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// bzhengs te thal mo sbyar nas kyang // snyan pas ched du 'di rjod do// e ma sangs rgyas thams cad la// thabs dang shes rab bsam du med// thugs
131b5: rjes gyur pa'i thugs kyis ni/ / mtshungs med rgya che dam chos gsungs// dug gi 'jigs pas sa skyengs 'khrigs// nyon mongs mun 'jigs med pa yi// bdud rtsi 'od bzangs 'dir gus na// ngan 'gro 'jigs pa stongs
131b6: par 'gyur/ / de nas tshangs sogs 'jig rten skyong // rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kun 'dus nas// dam ning ched du brjod pa 'di// snyan pa'i tshig gis rab tu gsol// e ma sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/ sems can kun la sman par
131b7: dgyes/ / rgyob chen 'jig rten mgon po yis// mtshungs med pasam gyis mi khya ba thabs// gsungs pa 'di la gang gnas pa// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho spyod// 'grol sman mthong bsgrubs pas ni// lhag pa'i bde ba 'byung
131b8: bar 'gyur/ / de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyis// ngo mtshar spyan ni gdangs nas su// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// oM ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// gdong nas thugs su 'grangan
132a1: 5/ / chung // rtog med rang bzhin las grol nas// bas pa mi khyab pa'i go 'phang gsungs// 'chang byed dang po ngan 'gro gcod// gnyis pa mthong chos dngos grub byed// de rjes 'jigs med de yi med// dogs pa spangs
132a2: na zad par gyi/ / sa la bzhugs nas sems can do// ma bsams thogs pa med par byed// sang sngags rgyal po ste bkun la/ spang sa das 'dod don kun grub ste// rnamamapa 'jug ser dag bsgyur// bskam pa ma
132a3: rgyas byed / / de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs// ma lus pa rnams 'dus nas kyang // gcol ma tog gtor byas te// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod de// e ma sangs rgyas bas pa mi khyab// dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab/
132a4: 'grol phan dang don byed pa'i// cho ga'i ming dang shes rab dang // snying rje'i dbyebs rgyas gyur nas// mnar med la sogs ngan 'gro yi// 'jigs rnams las rgal pad ma ltar// rnal 'byor can de mdzes par spyod// de nas mtha
