132a5: stobs cher ldan pa'i/ / phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun 'dus nas// shin du dam pas snyan tshig gis// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ma sangs rgyas chos chen dang // dge 'dun dkon mchog bsam mi khyab// 'khor ba'i mun pa chen por
132a6: ni/ / bying bas blta dka' rtogs pa yis// sngags dang phyag rgya bsam mi khyab// mthong dang thos pa tsam gyis kyang // blta dka' 'apung po dag po rnams// lhag pa'i sems ni skyes par 'gyur// de nas rig pa'i lha ma che// spyan la sou0f89u0fa4 p
132a7: a rgya chen rnams/ / de mtshar gyur nas spya gdangs te// snyan pas ched du 'di brjod do// sa ma sangs rgyas rbang du byung // ma ma sangs rgyas dpa' bo che// a ma sangs rgyas rab tu zab// chos rnams kyi med 'gags pa med// sgra 'phru
132a8: sna tshogs rol pa ltar/ / sgyu ma gdul bya tshim mdzad pa// spros pa dang bral spros pa ltar// sgyu ma rab tu 'phel bar mdzad// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams// stong gsum mi mdzer 'jig rten khams// gdul ba dag par
132b1: gzigs nas/ / 'dul mdzad rdo rje 'chang ba la// ngo mtshar rmad kyi gsung gis ni// ched du brjod pa 'dis bstod do// oM zhes dang po phyag 'tshal bkra shis ster byed pa// ser sna rnam par dag nas yo byad dbang thob dang // gnas
132b2: dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni/ / rab dga' ye shes khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dud// tsa Na yig dri bzangs tsan dan byugs dang ngang tshul mtshungs tshul khrims rnam par dag pas tshe la dbang ba dang // las
132b3: dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni/ / dri med ye shes khro rgyal mi g.yo phyag 'tshal lo// Da yi gnyon mongs sgrib pa gtor ba'i zhi ga nas dang // gcod pa dag pa skye ba la dbang thob pa dang // mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa zhes
132b4: pa'i stobs dang ni/ / 'od 'phro ye shes khro bo dbyug sngon phyag 'tshal lo// ma yig sgyu 'phrul chen po lhags mthong che ba'i bdag/ brtson 'grus dag pas sems la yang dag dbang thob dang // khams kyi rnam pa sna tshogs
132b5: mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni/ / 'od byed ye shes gshin rje gshed po phyag 'tshal lo// hA yig ma chags shes bya'i sgrib 'phrog sbyangs sa che// bsam gtan dag pas rdzu 'phrul la ni dbang thob dang // thams cad dag du 'gro
132b6: ba'i lam dag stobs dang ni/ / sbyang dka' ye shes rta mgrin khro bo phyag 'tshal lo// ro yig 'khor 'das nad bral shes dag las dbang thob// bsam gtan rnamathar ting 'dzin dang ni snyoms zhugs pa'i// kun nas nyon mongs
132b7: rab kyang lta ba ldanas khyen stobs/ / mngon drung ma shes 'ad pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo// migs nyam nyid sdol chen dang phyug chen brgyal// stabs chen dag las mas pa la ni dbang po dang // rjod kyi gnas rnams
132b8: rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/ / ring dusong pa'i ye shes bdud ci 'khyil ba 'dungad // Na yig skyes bu chen po sgra chen khrumachog gso// smon lam dag pas smon lam chal dbang thob dang // dbang po mchog dang mchog pa yin pa
133a1: mkhyen pa'i stobs/ / mi g.yo ye shes khro ba stobs chen phyag 'tshal lo// hUM yig hu lu sprin gdengs 'brug sgra gad rgyangs can// thabs dag pas ni ye shes che la dbang thob dang // 'chi 'pho dang ni gang zhig skye/
133a2: ba mkhyen pa'i stobs// legs pa'i blo gros ye shes khro bo hU~M mdzad 'dud// phaT sgras bag chags kun gtor dag pas shel dang mtshungs// ye shes dag pas chos la dbang ni thob pa dang // zag pa thams cad yang dag
133a3: zad pas mkhyen pa'i stobs/ / chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes khro bo gnod mdzes 'dud// de nas chos rje thub pas ni// ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas nas// 'dzum pa mdzad pas rab gzigs te// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen
133a4: po'i dbus/ / lag na rdo rje mthu chen la// snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa// mchog tu brtan par rab bsngags pa// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// mi gang bsod nams dman pa 'am// mtshams med la sogs byed pa yang // rgyud
133a5: 'dir zhugs pa'i de ma thag/ gser 'gyur gyi ni rtsi bzhin du// log rtog ma lus dag nas kyang // rtog med bde ba'i skur byung ste// rmi lam bzang po'i sems bzhin du// rnam 'phrul sna tshogs ci yang snang // mu mtha' med pa'i 'khor
133a6: ba'i mtsho/ / bskal pa'i gzings chen bla med 'di// chag gsad med pa'i tshul du ni// khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya// lag na rdo rje stobs po ches// ston pa la ni 'di gsol to// rgyud 'di byung ma thag tu ni// gdul dka' ba ni rab
133a7: tu zhi/ / sa stengs nad dang gdon mu ge/ bar chad gnod pa kun dang bral// slar yang bstan pa 'phel ba'i phyir// brtan por bdag gis gzung bar bgyi// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro drag po rnams// yid kyis brtul zhugs phyung nas
133a8: kyang / / rgyud 'di 'dzin pa'i rjes su 'brang // lha dang 'jig rten pa dang ni// ma mo srin ma mkha' 'gro ma// sha za gnod sbyin srin po rnams// rgyud 'di 'dzin pa skyong bar byed// rgyud 'dzin longs spyod spel bar byed// ston pas
133b1: gsungs pa rdo rje 'dzin/ / legs so shin tu cher legs so// rgyud 'dzin rnal 'byor can chen de// rgyud du srung zhing blo 'phel mdzod// de skad kyi ni gsung thos nas// byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // mkha' 'gro ma mo
133b2: 'jig rten skyong / / lha klu gnod sbyin dri zar bcas// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de rnams// dgyes te thal sbyar mngon par dga'i// mi g.yo thugs rje'i lcags kyu bzung bas 'khor bar brtson ra nas// lha klu 'bum phrag 'tshe
133b3: bral dkar po dge ba'i kun slong sems/ / skye gnas byang chub rin chen nor thob mdzad pas rmad byung mtshar// rgyas pa'i tshul bsdus bstan pa'i chos 'di dman la shin tu gsang // 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i
133b4: rtog pa bsdus pa las/ / mngon par dga' ba'i le'u ste bcu'o// // 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa rdzogs s+ho//
133b5: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// na maHsarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwa tA/
133b6: sa man ta a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta shA sa na nAM/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya// ma hA bo d+hi sa twA ya/ badz+ra satwA ya/ badz+ra bi pu lA ya/ pad ma sa ma b+ha bA ya/ pad ma yo na ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM hI ka ra/ bI kar/ praSh+Na kar Shadz+ra satwa/ badz+ra sam b+hA ba/
133b7: pad ma mas b+hA ba/ pad ma sA ga ra/ pad ma go tsa ra/ bar d+ha ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ka ru Ni sam b+ha ba/ hAM hAM/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ da ra dar / ba ra ba ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma hA shud d+ha satwa swA hA// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
133b8: kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mgo bo la blugs nas bka' stsal pa// yon tan rin po che'i phung po khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pas sems can rnams la
134a1: sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i chos bstan pa legs so legs so/ / 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can rnams shin tu rnam par dag par byed do// gang la la nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed
134a2: pa des ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / / dge ba'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po dbang phyug chen po dpag tshad 'bum phrag du mar khyab cing 'jig rten gsum po kun tu rgyas ko lte ste/
134a3: 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mgo bo btud nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sa'i dbang phyug dpa' bo rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan brgya
134a4: rtsa brgyad pas mngon par bstod pa/ / sa yi dbang phyug rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ba// srid gsum ma lus yon tan chen po'i bdag/ dri med skyon bral gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can// snying rjes khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya che ba//
134a5: rab dga' rab dgyes rab tu bston pa po// bskal pa bzang po rnam thar zhi ba'i mchog/ shin tu rnam dag yon tan chen po'i bdag/ rnam dag du mar grags pa'i me tog thong // rab mchog srid gsum dag gi mig gcig pa//
134a6: mchog sbyin 'gro ba kun gyi 'byor pa mdzes// dpag med pas kyang dpag med bskal par 'byung // skyabs dang yid 'phrog dag cing gsal bar mdzad nor bu'i thod can rdo rje las byung ba// srid gsum gcig pa dpa' bo
134a7: pad ma'i spyan/ / thos pa'i rgya mtsho sems can kun pas dpa'// 'gro ba thams cad rnam par grol mdzad mchog/ snyan cha 'gul zhing pad ma dag pa bsnams// dbang phyug bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i thor tshugs can
134a8: tshul bzang yon tan rgyan du 'tshal pa'i gzugs/ / 'jig pa'i rlung chen 'tshub pa'i mtshon cha can// dge ba'i rgyu ste dam pa stsol ba'i rgyu// tshul gyi longs spyod bde chen mchog gi rgyu// dkyil 'khor mchog gi spyod yul tu
134b1: gcig pa/ sring gsum sgrol ba'i zam pa gcig pu lags// dkyil 'khor mchog gi rgyun te sdig med pa// gser mdog 'od rgyan rten dgyur ba ste// mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam mtshungs par 'gyur// sa brnyes 'od ze
134b2: rgyas pa rgyan phreng mnga'/ / chen po'i che ba thog ma med pa ste/ snga ma mun pa bsal zhing nyon mongs med// dge bas dag pa spyod yul rnam par dag/ tshul gyis dkyil 'khor yangs shing rnam par dag/ srid gsum dbang phyug
134b3: pad ma las byung ba/ / srad gsum bde can yangs pa'i dbang phyug ste// dbang phyug mi g.yo rnal 'byor mkhas pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa chen po rab mchog yangs// nor bu'i rgyan gyi rdo rje rgyan du thogs// pad mas brgyan
134b4: ba lhun po las byung ba/ / dge snod yon tan chen po'i snod gcig pa// bde la longs spyod rnam 'dren chen po'i bdag/ smon lam rgya chen rgya mtsho ldan pa ste// 'gro ba srid par lhung ba grol mdzad pa// sa dang mnyam pa thams cad
134b5: gzigs par mdzad/ / skal bzang bskal pa stong gi snad pa po// rdo rje mchog gis bsgrags pa'i dkyil 'khor can// yon tan rnam grags khyab par dkyil 'khor ba// dge ba'i mtshan nyid dpa' bo'i rtsil mnga' ba// de bzhin nyid chos ro/
134b6: mkhyen spyod yul can// cod pan thig le dmar po'i dkyil 'khor ldan// lha chen brgya mda' sum bcu gsum bdag dbang // lha dang lha min dbang byas rnams kyis btung // brtson 'grus brgya dang ldan zhing rtsal stong mnga'// bsod nams
134b7: brgyamanga' mtshon cha brgya 'chang ba/ / pad ma brgya pa pad ma nyid las byung // dkyil 'khor brgya'i dbus na mdzes pa ste// chos brgya ldan pa mchog stong ston pa po// sangs rgyas stong phrag mang pos yongs bstod pa// bskal pa rab 'byam mang por
134b8: mkhas pa ste/ dkyil 'khor mang po dag na dpa' ba'i sku// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mthu mnga' ston pa po// rgya chen dri med dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs// rab dga' bsgyings pa 'thor mdzad me tog thong // na bza' dar dkar las nabs
135a1: 'od mdzad pa/ / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rjes brgyan pa las// cha brang gser mdzad mtha' yas zad mi shes// dpa' bo nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya mnga' ba// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor zla 'dra 'od gsal zhing // nyi mas
135a2: kha pye pad ma mchog bsnams pa/ / me tog mtshon ma thogs pa'i lha zhes grags// gtsug pud gsum pa tshangs sras skye dgu'i bdag/ btsun rigs mchog ste rigs chen nang du skyes// rang gi rigs gsal dbang chen dkyil
135a3: 'khor pa/ / pad ma bzang ba'i rigs mchog thig les mtshan// spyan bzang dge ba'i lha rnams rten gyur pa// gsang sngags mang po 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug go// tshogs chen bdun na 'dus pa'i mnga' bdag lags// spyan gsum dag gis/
135a4: dkyil 'khor mdzes gyur pa// ka la bid ka'i skad kyis sdang ba 'dul// mda' dang ru gzhu stobs chen mtshon cha bsnams// stobs kyi lha ste stobs dang brtson pas 'dul// rgya rnams sna tshogs legs par spras pa ste// rgyal ba rig
135a5: sngags 'chang ba mang pos bstod/ / tshogs mchod dag byed rnams kyis rab bstod pa// chu sen 'dzin khri'i 'jigs las rab grol mdzad// gzugs ma mnga' zhing bde skying rab sbyin pa// lha yul 'gro ba'i khyad par dkyil 'khor can
135a6: mtshungs med pas kyang mchu med mthu rtsal mnga'/ / stabs gshegs yon tan che mchog 'od ldan/ 'jig rten nang na mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs// sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus kya dkyil 'khor can// 'od zer mang po
135a7: stong phrag zang mo shes/ / nyon mongs rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa// mtha' dang bral ba kun du gzigs pa sa// rab zhi kun las 'phags pa'i spyod yul can// don dang tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ba// theg pa bzang /
135a8: 'dzin pa'i nyi ma lags// dul dang sbyin dang tshul la dad pa brnyem// skye dgu rnams kyi drim ma lus bcom// blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po// bde ldan gos brgyan yang ba sna tshogs can// bcom ldan 'byung ba'i 'jigs
135b1: pa med par mdzad/ / rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa po// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo// bde ba longs spyod cher 'byung drim med// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri med pa// mi dang sred med brgya byin lag pa'i
135b2: mchog/ 'jig rten mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug po// stobs dang rigs dang mthu stobs che ba lags// sangs rgyas mtshungs shing chos mchog rin chen mtshungs// dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub par dka'//
135b3: khyad par gsum 'phags rin chen mchog chen mtshungs// khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul pasal ba// rdo rje sems mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pad ma dri mad phyag gi dbus bsdams pa// thor tshugs can
135b4: la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs/ / spyi bo 'od dpag med rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan rang byung mun sel ba// rnga chen sgra ltar brtan pas bka' stsal pa// mchog chen rdo rje glul bstod pa yi// ming brgyartsa
135b5: brgyad skyon sel legs pa med/ / ji ste la la rtag tu dge mchog 'dod// spyan ras gzigs dbang la ni bstod byed pa// des ni ring por mi thogs yon tan gyi// longs spyod mchog chen ches ni thob par 'gyur// mi ni gang
135b6: zhig rtog tu 'dis bstod la/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang das pa sbyin par byed// sdig pa rnams kyang de la 'byung mi 'gyur// 'dod pa gang yin bde blag de yis 'thob// de ni sdig pa'i dri mas mi gos te// lam srang bzang por//
135b7: dmigs te 'gro bar 'gyur// srid gsum skyabs 'os gcig pu pad ma smras// de 'drar chos kyi mchog la spyod par 'gyur// de ltar ming gi khyad par grub 'dod cing // gang zhig rtag tu bde ba 'dod pa yis// 'gro kun skye dgu'i bdag
135b8: po spyan ras gzigs/ / pad ma las byung rtag tu bstod par gyis// bcom ldan 'das bla ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// //
136a1: ba6/ khrug sad du/ Ar+ya be pa mab+h+yon+ta sha taka r+d+ha dA tI a dus tid khod skang du bags pabyams pa'i ma ngan brgyad tu byud pagasus rdzags dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas phyag 'tsha // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
136a2: pas rang gi stong po smas pa/ na me s+t+rai yad d+hi ka nAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta nAM/ ta da ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra/ su ru su ru/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ma hA tsa ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA b+ha ra/ kam pa ka ma ga/ ma hA ka ma pa/ hUM ma dA s+pha ra Na
136a3: d+harma a gra sA ga ra swA hA/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di ni yon tan che ba ste mtha' yas par khyab pa/ bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por yang shin tu thos par
136a4: dga' ba/ / sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnyed kyis bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa/ sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / rmil ma ngan pa
136a5: dang / / lhas ngan pa thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa yongs su thar bar byed pa ste shin tu dkon pa'o// de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa/ nor
136a6: bu'i cod pan gyis bsgyings pa/ / brgyan phreng rab tu g.yo ba rnams kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ dpa' bo chen po
136a7: thabs rnyes pa/ rgyal tshab mi yi bdag po ste/ 'jig rten bdag po rnam pa ragasal// rar ba chen po mngon par rgyus// tshan chen stobs ldan che ba ste// de bzhin yangs shing rdul dang bral// dbang chen rtse ltar 'od ldan pa/
136a8: sa yi dbang phyug rnam par gnon// rgyal chen mtshon cha brgyapa ste/ mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i mtshon// yon tan 'od brgyas bsgyings pa ste// nor bu'i rna cha'i brgyan thogs pa/ srid gsum dag na dpa' ba'i sku// rgya mtsho lta bu'i
136b1: spyod yul can/ / lhun po zla 'byin te sa yi// rtse nas dkyil 'khor 'char ba po// dkyil 'khor chen po longs spyod pa// rab tu dga' ba de bzhin des// yongs su dga' ldan chen po'i lha// che ba lha rnams kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas
136b2: gdung nang rgyas mdzad cing / / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor kun gyi brgyan// sangs rgyas longs spyod longs par spyod// sangs rgas bstan pa bston pa po// tis zla 'byin bzhin du yangs// sa yi dbang phyug bde mdzad pa// pad ma 'das
136b3: stong rtse ma can/ / rdo rje'i pad ma legs par skyes// chos kyi longs spyod longs par spyod// sa dang mnyam pa thub par dka'// snang bar byed pa 'byung ba bo// mri dgasum ye shes nyi ma lags// gtso bo chen po cher grags pa// seng ge
136b4: chen po stobs po che/ / cha lugs chen po zhal che ba// skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul// rdo rje byi ru bai dU r+ya// nor bu'i dbu thod rgyan du thogs// byi ragaser gyi gcal bkra ma la// sgra chen zhabs kyi stabs kyis gshegs// zhal ma dang
136b5: nyi ma du ma'i gzi/ / lcang lo ced pa nang bu thor can// rig sngags 'chang brgyas zhabs la btang// rjed per bya ba rnams kyis mchod// nor bu brgya 'gul 'od zer gyis// brang gi phyogs rnams dag par byas// cod pan can ta 'od
136b6: 'tshe / / nyi ma bye ba brgya bong ldan// rin chen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing // dri med dkyil 'khor rab tu 'phro// rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa yi// 'bar ba chen po'i lta ba can// 'od zer mang pos pog pa yi// phan pa'i thabs ni
136b7: rab ston pa/ / brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhad pa yi// 'od kyis zhal gsal rnga yab bskyod// dpung rgyan 'od zer spel mar bkod// tshe ni bris shin tu mdzes par 'char// lhun po phrad cing 'khrugs pa ltar// ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen
136b8: sgrogs/ / rdo rje chen po ched po can// shin tu dga' mdzad pade sbyin pa// byams pa'i dkyil 'khor go char bgos// brtson pa kun las rnam par rgyal// snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste// mtshon cha chen po shin tu 'bar// byams
137a1: pa byabs pa'i rtog pa can/ / kun nas sba pa'i dkyil 'khor ba// ma pham thub med dag pa ste// sangs rgyas cha lugs mnyam med che// byabs pa'i snying ba snying po che// byams pa'i bad ma las byung ba// rdo rje 'chang chen
137a2: rdo rje can/ / rdo rje'i bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor ba// rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis btud// de bzhin bsnyen cing bstod pa po// grub pa chen po rig sngags grub// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes pa mdzad// thams cad grub mdzad grub papo//
137a3: sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen lags// gsang sngags chen po'i rnam par nges// mdo sde'i bkod pa mdo sdud pa// nges gyur nges pa'i 'od sgron gyi// snang bas dri ma sel bar mdzad// 'bar ba rtsa dmar 'od snang ba// dkyil 'khor dkar
137a4: po che ba ste/ / gzhung dang 'thun pa'i chos dbyings dang // nye bar gyur cing shin tu nges// swA hA sA dA'i bdag po mchog/ 'od zer ba de legs bde legs mdzad// stobs chen 'chang ba bkra shis pa// nyi ma 'dra ste snyoms pa lags//
137a5: bstod byed rgyal ba'i longs spyod ldan// mkha' ltar dri med spyod yul can// dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms par mdzad// rdo rje chen po rab bsgrubs pa// bsgrub pa pa ste rtsod pa med// dkyil 'khor ldan pa rdo rjes ston// rlung chen thugs kyi
137a6: bskyod pa yi/ / g.yo dang 'brug sgrogs sgra ldan pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul pad ma ste// de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skyes// mngon shes chen po mngon shes brnyes/ khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nas sa yi dbang phyug po//
137a7: byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byabs pa la// bsod nas kun mkhyen gnod bral ba// thub pa nyims bka' stsal pa// kye ma ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ ming gi yon tan 'od ldan pa// bde dang phun sumatshogs bsgrubs pa// thabs chen pa
137a8: na med pa ste/ / ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// 'jig rten kun gyi bde skyed pa// 'di ni bton pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// sdig pa dag las rgyal ba yi// byams pa bstod pa'i gnas po la// ming brgya rtsa
137b1: brgyad dam pa 'dis/ mi ni la la gang bstod pa// de la lha la sogs kun dang // lag na rdo rje stobs chen rnams// rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal kun// gtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ myur du 'don pa'i
137b2: mi ni/ / sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur te// 'di la the tsom yod med do// nang par mal nas langs nas ni// gang zhig byams pa'i sems kyis bstod// de la byams pa rtogs pa yi// byams pa bde legs byed par 'gyur// de phyir dri ma thams
137b3: cad sel byed cing / / sdig 'joms yon tan thams cad skyed pa dang // de bzhin 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad ched du dag par lhogs// / 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho/
137b4: 'phags pa nam mkha'i rnying pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyi 'od 'phro bas nam mkha'i dkyil dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i'
137b5: spyod yul can sa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / oM swa sti ka mA la Ni bi bu la sam b+ha ba/ d+harmA d+hA tru go tsa ra swA hA// gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sa
137b6: yang g.yos par gyur/ / rnga bo che dag gi sgra yang zag par gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa// kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nag dpa'i
137b7: sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi sA rba'i mchog gi gzungs 'byung bar shin du dka' ba/ bsod nams chen po sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
137b8: thams cad kyis/ rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di nyon cig dang // 'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la shin du rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// pad ma lta bur 'gyur te// 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis
138a1: mi gos so/ / nyi ma lta bur 'gyur te// sems can thams cad sdang bar byed do// zla ba lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad rab tu sem par byed do// nam mkha' lta bur gyur te// ngan song gi sdug bsngal
138a2: thams cad kyis ma gos so/ / sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te/ mthong dman med do// lhun po lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so// thar pa lta bur 'gyur te/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos
138a3: so/ / de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs pa tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te/ nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa tsam dang / bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste/
138a4: de'i 'dod pa dang / smon pa dang / re ba de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrugs pa dang / mi nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dang /
138a5: 'jig pa'i dus dang / 'chi ba dang / chom rkun dang / dgon pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gcan zan dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed la/ bde ba dang / 'byor pa dang / ci 'dod pa dang / ci la dga'
138a6: pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhes ca co dang gzhab ton te/ sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang / brgyan sna tshogs bskyod de/ snyed nas phyag 'tshal nas byang chub
138a7: sems dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa/ nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog
138a8: 'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'/ / sems can dag pa bla med rin chen mchog/ thar pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel// kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen// thar mkhyen chos mkhyen
138b1: bde dang mi bde mkhyen/ / / bar mabyedag/ ces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen// dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs dang stobs min mkhyen// 'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mchog/ lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul/
138b2: min mchog/ rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang 'dzin min mchog/ dge mchog rtogs mchog mchog dang mchog min mchog/ zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab// 'od rab thar pa'i rab ste stan gyi rab// rgya rab sngags
138b3: kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab/ / mnyam rab sems can rab ste gsum rig rab// legs sgron mchog smon stobs dang stobs min smon// thar sgron regs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min smon// dge slon gzi sngon nor bu'i 'od kyi sgron//
138b4: rgyu skar zla ba'i brgyan las shar ba'i sgron// mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od/ legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od// 'od chen gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od// rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'char ba// rdo rje'i
138b5: dbang po 'dren dbang sems can dbang / / rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brgyan dbang po// rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad med dbang // dbang po rig sngags 'chang dbang srid gsum dbang // rdo rje bzang po rdor 'od rdo rje
138b6: 'ab/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'ab rabs brgyan// rdo rje 'od can rdor 'dzin rdo rje drug/ rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang // na bza' sde zhing sku'i cha lugs so// sgra mdag sngo zhing sngo pa'i 'od kyis brgyan// ral zin
138b7: 'joms sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams/ / mkha' sngo gzhal mad khang 'bar nang na bzhugs// wanal dri med shin tu mi bzang 'bar// rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'ang // sdigs la rdul lhur 'khrug byed phreng mchog cam/ na/
138b8: gi stobs kyis snang bas pa sgegs la brtan// ral gri mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon// rdo rje'i mtshon thogs mda' dang mdung thung 'jigs// 'khor lo'i mtshon thogs bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul// gsal shing
139a1: mtshon pogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa/ / bde 'thung 'jig rten gsum bdag rdo rje dbyug/ su rnams thams cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis brgyan// grags pa'i rigs su bung bar rgyal po dang // ma tigazung bas
139a2: bsregs shing mdzes par bgyis/ / sku mdzes brnyes shing phun sum tshogs pa brnyes// rab 'byam mchog brnyas sa la 'jug pa brnyas// mthu stobs lhag pabarnyes shing grub brnyes la// rig pa gsum gyi stobs parnyes
139a3: yubarnyas pa/ / de 'dren ning 'dren cing 'od 'dren pa// cha lags gas la mchog dang pa chen po 'dren// rnams 'dren nyim 'dren cing skye dgu 'dren// legs 'dren ning gi stobs 'dren snying rje can// dri med cha lugs gsal/
139a4: lugs 'bar// nam grags bsgrags pas grags pa'i bdan can// 'gro ba'i skabs 'byed 'jug dang ldeg pa mkhyen// longs spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug/ skud dmar sa mngon su mangs su babang ba//
139a5: su ser su dkar darab che ba'i sku// sku rol rdo rje'i su mnga' spyan legs su// rigs sku rig sngags 'chad ba rin chen bsnams// gtsug gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog/ cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog/
139a6: dpal 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'chang ba'i mchog/ sngags gzhi phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs// rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu r+b+ha// srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stong mnga'// ri tser 'char ba bdal legs
139a7: bab shis pa/ / yon tan mthu stobs khyab par rnam par grags// nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od// nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar// yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig bu// nam ma pa'i dkyil na nor bu gcig
139a8: snang ba/ / sems can nam dag yangs shing rnam par grags// srid gsum spangs ma gcig bu rgyal sras mchog/ zhib rab tu zhi bskabs 'os nyag/ skye dgu'i bdag po bad 'byung pad ma skyes// kun nas 'od bzang
139b1: lags bshad chos mnga' ba/ / dar ba lags bshad rab yul legs bshad phyag/ blo bzang 'ong bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang // mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan// ni mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i
139b2: gnas/ / 'od kyi 'byung gnas pade mdzad dbang du mdzad// lags 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs skyed pa// snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grangs mdzad// rnam grol ngas grol shin du grol ba'i 'o// blo langs nas/
139b3: par bkram zhing rnam par grags// kun du longs spyod sgo ste blo yi mchog/ blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs// sangs rgyas pad ma 'dab rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal// dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thang //
139b4: snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul// de ba nyid kyi rgyun brnyes rab gsal ba// spyan bung mnga' ni rab dul gtad legs pa// 'jigs med zhal ras ston gyi tha ba 'dra// mdurung thung brgya'i mtshon mchog mtshon mdzegs
139b5: drag pa 'jigs pa sngagasal gsum las skyes/ / rab dul mkhas pa 'thogs dga' 'dris par sla// rab tu drag pa gnyen rab gser mdog can// lha chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams// spyan gsum
139b6: rig pa gsum ldan ma gsum sel/ / 'dod bzangs me tog mtshon thogs me tog mnga'/ na bza' bzang ba nabs g.yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen// legs pas sna tshogs mtshon cha sna tshogs mnga'// na bza' snga
139b7: tshogs sna tshogs brgyan gyi dpal/ / zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra// zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byar mdzad// gzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mnga'// zhal mdangs rgya mtshogs la mdzad lams
139b8: ba/ dbang chen rdo rje'i thog lags 'jigs pa'i sgra// rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin// sgra snyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan// blo gros chen po blo gros no ba'i mchog/ brgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan
140a1: rgyu dang mai n+ya 'gro ba kun gyi gnas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mgon zas phreng ba bzang // stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo ba nyid// skye dgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags// me yi mnga' bdag
140a2: mtho ras skyes pa'i rgyu/ / sgra 'dra 'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can// mthu stobs mngal zhing spyan bzang sdug par ldan// ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stsogs// gces gsum 'phel ba'i rtul 'jug pa mdzad// brtan po rgyu
140a3: rab te nges gyur ba/ / dkyil 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags// gcig pu ste dgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen// rnam par snang mdzad ring gi gnas nas shes// dbang skur brnyes shing sa bcur legs par gnas//
140a4: gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags// skye dgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sel ba dang // sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas// bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa// 'jig rten zla
140a5: ba gcig sha ra bzhin du snang / / nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi// mdun 'dug nang bar bstod pa 'di brjod gang // de ni srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing // dri ma'i gnas kun las kyang thar bar
140a6: 'gyur/ / g.yul dang 'thab rtsod shin tu mi bzang dang // mu ge'i gnod pa mi nad byung ba na// mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dang bskyed nas// nam mkha'i snying po la ni bstod byed pa// de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas
140a7: thams cad dang / / sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol// des ni ni mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang // bde ba rgya cheni nges par thob par 'gyur// bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'am// rgyal srid 'thob
140a8: dang byad gzugs nor 'thob dang / / rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi bsgrub phyir// gton pa 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// de phyir ci ste rtag tu 'dod bde kun// 'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba// nam mkha'i snying po
140b1: srid gsum mgon po la/ / rtag tu brtan cing sngags kyang bsten par bgyi// 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho//
140b2: 'phags ba kun du bzang po'i mtshan bcwa rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa kun tu bzang pon pa mkha'i dkyil kun tu rab 'byam ma lus pa dang mnyam
140b3: pa'i bonyid kyi chos kyi sang bags la pa brnyes pa/ / pa'i dkyil 'bor kun tu 'bros pa'i slatha da med cing dus gsum kyi sa mnyam nyid brnyes pa// gzugs pa chogs can byang drubs sa pa dpa' sem pa dang
140b4: mchog dang / rab mchog dam pa sbyin pa// yon tan chen po'i skus kun tu mnga' mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog kun du bzang po gzugs snga tshogs can// byang chub
140b5: sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byam sa'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa de'i tshe stong chen po'i
140b6: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul byed kyai su byams su da yongs su rgyas par gyur te/ / nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sku rnams pa'i dkyil 'khor du ma dag tu kun nas 'khod par gyur to//
140b7: de nas sangs rgyas kyi 'di rab 'byam thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste// byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i mgo bo la thugs nas bka' stsal pa//
140b8: rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo shong cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchog lus 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas
141a1: kyi zhing thams cad g.yo bar byas nas gzungs 'di bshad do/ / tad+ya thA/ oM na mo na ma sti brub ne shwa re/ ma hA b+ho gA ya/ a sams ma/ a mri ta sa ma A nan ta sa ma/ gaganas ma/ tri brub nas ma/ mge/
141a2: Sha sa ma/ be Sha sa ma/ ba ra ma ar+Ya sa ma/ swa d+hA ba sa ma/ ta ShA tA sa ma/ a ra dze sa ma/ shud d+hi sa ma/ bud d+hi sa ma/ d+harma ta bA tA sa ma/ a b+hi sha ma sa ma/ sam sa ma/ e ga nA ya/ sA ga ra bi shud d+ha/ a lo ka hi hi la ba d+ha la ba
141a3: d+ha/ / bidz+ra ya bi dza ya/ oM pra sa ga ta/ na ya na ye/ daM nir a d+hiSh+Tha na saM b+ho ga/ aM a na la ya la ya/ d+harma a gra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dza ya dza ya hUM hUM/ d+ha ma d+ha ma swA hA// de nas rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo 'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon
141a4: po gcig pu sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ / sa'i dkyil 'khor g.yo bar byas nas de skad ces smras te// 'jig rten gsum po
141a5: kun tu gang bar byas so/ / de nas lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas gser gyi 'od zer 'bar zhing de snang la rab tu g.yo bas brgyan pa'i lus can sa
141a6: steng kun gyi rdo rje me tog thod stan chen po las bskyod de/ / dkyil 'khor nas langs nas ha ha zhes sgra byung ste smras pa/ kye ma snying rje chen po dang yon tan grangs med pa'i rgya mtshor rab tu 'byam pa'i gzungs chen
141a7: mo/ / kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba chen mo// mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sa gsum dang mnyam zhing sems can gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa med pa'i
141a8: gzungs chen mo/ / bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas 'phangs pa'i sdig pa'i bag chags sel cing nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems la lta ba'i ri bo 'thor bar byed pa'i gzungs chen po// bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshe
141b1: 'byung ba yang dag par ma bsags shing bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag du ma mngon sum du mthong bas byang chub kyi sa bonam bsgrubs la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par gyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa
141b2: rjes su thob pa ma yin pa gzhan ni sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo 'di mnyan par yang mi nus na/ gzung ba 'am/ klag pa 'am/ kun chub par bya ba lta ci smos// gzungs chen mo 'di'i ming
141b3: tsam yang bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gi bar du thos par dka'o/ / kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di ni sems can gang dag gi/ lag na 'dug pa de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o// 'tsho ba bzang pos 'tsho ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams
141b4: kyi gzhi bzang po'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o// yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// 'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal
141b5: thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ / lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis
141b6: gong nas gong du yon tan rnams thob par 'gyur te/ / de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// shing gcig 'greng gi drung du bzlas
141b7: brjod byas na grub pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / 'gro bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// nags tshal chen po'i nang du dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug la lan bdun brjod na bsam
141b8: gtan chen po 'thob par 'gyur la nyon mongs pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa kun du bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du dkyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la me tog la sogs pa ji snyed pas mchod nas lus ngal bar
142a1: gyur gyi bar du gzungs chen mo 'di brjod la/ / dal bar gyur nas de nyid du nyal na rmi lam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur te// phyag g.yas pas de la byugs nas yang dag par dbugs 'byin/
142a2: par mdzad de/ ches kyi snang ba chen po yang stsol bar mdzad do// 'di skad du rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/ khyod che rjes nas sa chen po thob par 'gyur
142a3: ro zhes kyang gsung ngo / / de nas lus bde ba dang / sems bde ba dang / dga' ba chen po dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyur ro// mthu che ba dang / dbang che bar grags par yang 'gyur ro// lha rnams
142a4: kyang de la blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo / / nang par langs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams klag par bya'o// sems can thams cad la yang phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de nas
142a5: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing sdig pa thams cad dang bral te/ nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams bcom la// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags par 'gyur ro// lha la stsogs pa yang de la bsrung
142a6: ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro// de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni ring po mi thogs par kun tu bzang po'i sa chen po la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje gtsug phung
142a7: la sogs pa stong gsum gyi bdag po rigs sngags 'chang chen po rnams dang / / spyan chen mo la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang // rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
142a8: dang / rdo rje zhags pa la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha chen po rnams dang // rin chen dra ba can la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen mo rnams dang // lha mo sgrol ma la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi
142b1: lha rnams dang / dar chen dang / gzugs bzang dang / shin tu blta na sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon nu rnams dang / gzhon nu ma rnams dang / bran rnams dang / bran mo rnams dang / mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa log 'dren chen po rnams
142b2: dang / lus mchog la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po rnams dang // ma mo la sogs pa srin mo rnams dang // dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i dbang phyugs rnams dang / rdo rje me tog thod la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen por
142b3: 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog 'phags pa kun du bzang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi snang ba zhes
142b4: bya bas bstod pa/ / kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog/ sna tshogs kun gyi 'byor pa che// dkyil 'khor chen po rdo rje mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi bdag/ rdo rje chen po dgyes pa che// gzi brjid chen po stobs po
142b5: che/ gnon dang rab gnon dpal gyi rab// khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros rgyal// rdo rje chen po rab tu bzhad// sgrub dka' chen po bsgrub mdzad pa// rol mo chen pos rnam par rol/ rab dga' chen po 'dul ba po// lha chen dbang phyug
142b6: chen po ste/ btsan po khyab 'jug skye dgu'i bdag/ sa steng sa 'og sa la dgyes// de bzhin sa 'dzin sa gsum pa// dul dang sbyin pa'i go rims thabs// rab mkhyen stong gi mnga' bdag lags// bzhes gzhan can te
142b7: bzod la dgyes/ / brtson 'grus 'byung ba 'byor pa che// brtson 'grus bcu dang thabs bcu pa// stobs bcu'i sras chen thu bo ste// mthu stobs stong gis spro ba dang // yongs su ldan zhing bcu sel ba// rdul sal rgyal po chen po/
142b8: ste// rgyal po dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ba// rdul rnams rab tu zhi ba'i thabs// cho ga mkhyen pa blo mnga' ba// mkhas pa mdzes pa bskal pa bzang // shin tu sdug pa dga' skyed pa// snying po chen po las byung ba// nyon mongs bral ba
143a1: thub par dka'/ / sa dang mnyam pa mkha' dang mnyam// rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul can// gzi brjid nyid de gzi brjid mtshungs// rgya mtsho bzhi'i chu dang 'dra// rmugs dang spro bzhi par mdzad// thub pa dka2
143a2: ba'i nyon mongs 'jig/ g.yul sel g.yul la dgyes pa ste// g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa// gsung bzang dang ba'i gdangs su bzhad// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen sras// dbang po las lhag thub dang mnyam//
143a3: chos 'dzin 'byor dang ldan par bstan// rab dga' bu lon zhi mdzad pa// nyon mongs 'dam rdzab skems pa mdzad// dpa' bo rgyags pa'i rims nad sel// khro bo'i dregs pa rnam par 'joms// gsung snyan 'jam pa nyid
143a4: dang ldan/ / mnyam pa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang // mnyam med g.yul las rnam par 'das// sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig/ byang chub snying por rgya cher rol// rim pa rab ston dge ba ste// spyan bzang phun sum chog
143a5: pa dge/ gtsang ma lam bzang sbyin mdzad pa// dag mdzad bsreg sbyin mchog sbyin po// 'joms byed bgegs rnams rnam par 'joms// 'thob mdzad dpe med gsung ba po// rdo rje'i 'jig rten gcig snang ba/ skyes
143a6: pa bud med tshags kyi bdag/ nges par yon tan 'byor mdzad pa// sems can 'khor bzhi mdzad pa/ brtan po sdig pa rnams dang bral// kun tu rnam rgyal snang ba bo// kun tu rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor can// kun tu rgya
143a7: mtsho'i snang ba mdzad/ / kun du nyes pa sel ba lags// mi bzang sa 'og rnam par dkrugs// de bzhin zad mdzad thug phra mdzad// nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs// nyon mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad// 'bar
143a8: ba'i dka' ba 'phro mdzad pa/ / rgyags shing bdo ba zhi bar mdzad// rdo rje chen po stobs skyed pa// sdang ba thams cad nges par 'joms// pha rol bzhugs pa sdig sel ba// dag pa nam mkha'i spyod yul can// dag pa
143b1: sbyin zhing yon tan sbyin/ / 'bras bu sbyin zhing kun sbyin pa// ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams sbyin// longs spyod sbyin zhing rgyal sbyin pa// dbang phyug sbyin zhing tshig sbyin la// nor sbyin tshogs ldan rdo rje can// gzugs sbyin
143b2: dpa' bo rnam par rgyal/ / dag cing dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa// bde 'byung gtsug na nor ba thogs// sa 'dzin gzung bar dka' ba po// dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa// 'bab cing de bzhin 'bebs par mdzad// rin chen drab
143b3: rin chen mnyam/ / blon ma mun sel rgyal ba can// yon tan ye shes theg chen ldan// brtan mchog che ba'i chos nyid can// gsung ba chen po shes rab che// sangs rgyas tshul ni rab ston pa// mchod pa chen po theg chen gyi// theg pa
143b4: bla na med par ldan/ / mchod pa chen po'i chos shes pa// 'bras bu chen po'i chos kyi mchog/ ston mdzad 'dul mdzad ston pa po// zhi ba de bzhin zhi mdzad pa// bzang po bzang dang mtshungs pa nyid// kun du rab 'byam sel mdzad pa//
143b5: snying rje ye shes snying po mkhyen// snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs// dus chen rnam par dag par mdzad// mtshon mchog dang ba rab mtho ba// btsod chen 'das pa'i spyod yul can// skye dgu srung
143b6: zhing spyan yangs pa/ / rnyed par dka' ba'i 'byor pa can// kun du spyod pa khong dge ba// dga' ba'i dam pa sbyin pa po// kun tu yul kun mnga' ba ste// zhes bzang po rtag tu mnga'// dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dkyil 'khor chen
143b7: po'i pad ma lags/ / zla ba lta bur sim mdzad thabs// mkhas pa rgyags spangs cho ga mkhyen// spyod yul gcig la gnas pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mnga'// dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen// slob dpon chen po grags pa
143b8: che/ / dam pa nyid de bla na med// gsang sngags rlabs ni rgyas par mdzad// de ltar khyab bdag chen po ni// yon tan brgya'i spos kyis rgyas// dag cing byad la mkhas la sogs// yon tan 'byung la rig sngags rgyal// gtsug na nor
144a1: thogs la sogs/ / mchog rnams kyis ni bstod nas kyang // sdug bsngal chu bo bcom pa yi// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs// kye ma bstod pa chen po brgya// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin// mi rnams la/
144a2: la gang zhig gis// sdig bsal kun tu bzang po la// snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na// des ni sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don// mi de yon tan yongs rdzogs shing // de bzhin gshegs tshul che ba
144a3: yi/ / ye shas ma lus smra bar nus// de ltar thub mchog sras po yon tan brgya'i spos las nges par byung gyur cing // yon tan sna tshogs 'byung dang 'jig rten yan chad dag gis yon tan rgyas rnams la// bstod pa chen pos snang
144a4: byas rgyal ba'i sras la bstod pas nyin re bstod byas na/ / stobs bcu mnga' ba'i skur 'gyur snang ba thob cing rnam dag yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas
144a5: pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes
144a6: rang gi snying po smras pa/ oM badz+ra tsaN Da sarba duSh+TA na ta ka/ ha na/ da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ de nas gzungs sngags 'di bshad ma thag tu sa chen po g.yos par gyur te// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas nyam thag pa'i
144a7: skad phyung ngo / / dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha ha zhes mdzer to// lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyan gyi char chen po phab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum bzhin du rdo
144a8: rje 'chang la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ sdang ba sel ba 'khor 'di dag ha cang skrag par ma byed cig/ rdo rje 'chang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba lags so// rig sngags
144b1: thams cad kyi mchog dang / bgegs thams cad zlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad sel ba dang / dam pa stsol ba dang / 'byor pa stsol ba dang / sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang / thos na don mchis pa dang / brjod na don mchis pa
144b2: dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis na don mchis pa dang / stobs skyed pa dang / gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spobs pa skyed pa dang / dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang / nor dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / dbang bgyid pa dang / sdang ba 'joms
144b3: pa dang / sdang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang / dug sel ba dang / rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bar bgyid pa dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa dang / dang bar bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang / sdig
144b4: pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / nongs pa bgyis pa sbyong ba dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / mtshams ma mchis pa zlog pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa
144b5: dang / dpal skyed pa dang / skal pa bzang por bgyid pa dang / sems can thams cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang / gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang / ci 'tshal ba stsol pa dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang /
144b6: char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags te/ g.yul chen po dang / mi nang chen po dang / rtsod pa chen po dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang / byang stem dang / ro langs
144b7: kyi sbyor ba chen po dang / spod ba dang / srog 'jigs pa'i tshe dang / 'jigs pa chen po byung ngan/ nang par langs nas lus khrus bgyis la/ gos dkar po 'tshal te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du
144b8: lte zhing lan bdun brjod na/ brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur la// thams cad du yang rgyal bar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang /
145a1: sbed pa ni gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so// de nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas rdo rje 'chang la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' // rdo rje
145a2: rgyal po bde ba che/ rdo rje 'jigs pa dgyes pa che/ rdo rje snying po stobs po che// rdo rje 'khrug pa zhags pa che/ rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje hUM gi hU~M lags te/ rdo rjes 'og 'jigs pa po// chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa che//
145a3: chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che// phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste// spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags// rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka che// mthon nyid dbu sgras brgyan pa lags// ral gri sngon po ral gri cha// dkyil 'khor sngon po'i
145a4: dkyil 'khor can/ / mthon ka'i spyan te dbu sngob// 'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan// rdo rje sngon po stobs mi mtshungs// rdo rje spro ba'i stobs po che// khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che// sel mdzad khro bo'i rgyags pa sel// khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu
145a5: bstod/ / khro bo bgegs rigs sel bar mdzad// gzhu bsnams zhags pa snams pa ste/ rdo rje'i mdangs ni nges par 'gugs// dbyigs thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsdams// rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms// rdo rje'i 'khor lo
145a6: 'khor lo che/ / 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rab tu khro// sna tshogs sku te thig les bris// gzi ba rjid bskyed pa grangs mdzad pa/ bzod par dka' ba reg mi bzod// sdig dang bgegs rnams gcod mdzad pa// drag po chen po rdo rje khro//
145a7: skyel byed drag po skyel bar mdzad// gting dpag dga' ba ring du gshegs// rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'// rgya mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan// pad ma ti se lhun po'i rtse// gang rgyangs chen pos gzhang pa po// spyod yul bskar pa
145a8: grangs med gsum/ / rig sngags 'chang mchog rdo rje can// rig sngags 'chang chen mnga' bdag lags// na bza' lcang lo rtsa dmar gsol// mthon ka na bza' 'thon la dgyes// srin po srung ba drag po ste/ me tog
145b1: brang ba'i brgyan la dgyes/ / nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od// 'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed// grol mdzad mgon po ston papo// rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod// mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngo ba
145b2: mgur bzang zhal bzang dam pa lags/ / cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od // phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa// ye shes tshe ldan srung ba che// rlung mar langs te spyod yul ring // gtso bo sgrol mdzad pha rol gsheg/
145b3: 'jigs las grol ba rab 'jigs pa// rgyal chen gtsug na nor bu thogs// mtshon cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon// 'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig/ gsum gzigs rtse gsum gtsug bung gsum// 'dod pa'i
145b4: lha ste snang chen mtshan/ / zab bo ste 'jigs par mdzad// mtho ba kun mchog zhal gsum pa// tsha mtshom med de srid las byung // rtag pa skar dgyes dus 'byor pa// rgyu skar rgyal rigs 'phel bar mdzad// rgyal po
145b5: sngags 'chang chen po sde/ / bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa legs/ bai dUr+ya ltar dri med sku// mdzes shing stobs skyed sna tshogs stobs// dga' ba skyed pa dga' ba mdzad// dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i
145b6: mchog/ lha chen dpa' bo chen po ste// brtan po dpa' bo lham me pa/ bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod// dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba// mtshon cha che tshogs cod pan can// rig sngags 'chang ba'i
145b7: tshogs dgapa/ / pad ma chen po'i phyag ring ba// pad ma las byung pad ma'i mchog/ nag po chen po 'byung po che// gtum chen thog thog chen po ste// rlung ren gzhang mo 'byung ba dang // rdo rje'i mtshan rab tu rdzogs pa/
145b8: tul phong thub dka' brtson pa ste// 'byung po chen po'i tshogs kyi rje// zhi bdabang po rdo rje'i mtshon// brag gi rtse mo rnam par 'gems/ rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs che ba// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ rdo rje'i lcags mangs
146a1: sreg mdzad pa/ / rdo rje'i mangs ni rnam par sbyong // rdo rje don yod rdo rje'i dbang // rdo rje dbang po rdo rje'i rtsal// ye shes dag pa theg pa che// thabs brnyes snying rje chen po lags// rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can// spyan
146a2: bzang rnam par gzigs pa po/ / rdo rje dril bu rnam dag spyan// mdza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen// rdo rje chen po mgon po pa// rdo rjes 'og 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje chen po ga rgyangs sgron// me tog chun po 'od gsal pa//
146a3: dag pazas gtsang sras kyi sras// nges pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags// sna tshogs can te lha kun mchog/ rdo rje dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje gtsug sdug shes rab can// rdo rje'i bkod pa rab tu mdzes// mdzes
146a4: pab shin du rnam par dag/ bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags// dpa' bo gas ba chen po 'chang// rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gis rjed// gas ba po stegs rab gsung // skyes pa bud med tshogs dga' ba// rdo rje thog
146a5: thog sgra chen sgrogs/ / rdo rje'i sgrogs ste rnam par 'joms// rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che// rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba// nor bus spras pa'i na bza' gsol// spos dang me tog phreng gis brgyan// dbu'i snyan chagadubakor
146a6: btags/ / sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po// rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dbang phyug chen po grags pa che// dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ston pa po// dbu rgyan cod pan kun nas
146a7: bcing / / tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags// de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon// mtshan brgyan brgyad dag gis bstod// de nas rdo rje dan yod pas gsungs pa// rdo rjegs dpas brtan pa yi// rnamatshan na brgyad pa'ing// yi ni dzaH
146a8: don yod 'thung / / sdang ba thams cad zlog byed pa// ming ni brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di// dad pa gang zhig 'chang byed pa// grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing / zhes pa kun las rnam par 'grol// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// rtag tu byi bzhin
146b1: 'brang bar 'gyur/ / lag na rdo rje'i yon tan che// gang zhig nang bar langs nas brjod// de ni sdig pa kun las 'grol// ngan song kun las thar bar 'gyur// gas sngags thog mar smos pa 'di// bu zhig nang bar langs nas
146b2: 'don/ rgyal po blon po grong khyer ba// gnyen rnams kyang ni dga' bar 'gyur// bstod pa'i mchog ni su 'don pa// 'jig rten thams cad de dbang 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang // tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// jis
146b3: 'dod pa dam pa yi/ / bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur// gang zhig nang par langs nas ni// lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod// de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang // ldan 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la// begags dang log
146b4: 'dren thams cad dang / / 'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang // zil gyis mnan par mi nus so// shes rab cen ni gang zhig gis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na// gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang // bde ba 'phel ba de yis
146b5: 'thob/ / gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di// nges par gnas shing gtsang mar 'don// mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi// bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs/
146b6: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing mchog tu rmad du byung ba
146b7: rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba/ yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sku// zhabs rten gyi pad ma la lha dang
146b8: mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang rig sngags 'chad rnams kyi thor tsugs dang cod pan gyi rtse mos gtugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms
147a1: pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ oM b+ho ma hA ma Nau rA tsi rag lnga ba'i tsi tra/ mug ta dA ma/ A laM kri ta sha ri ra/ ba ra satwa mo tsa ka/ ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harma ko Sha d+ha ra/ pra ba ra d+harma la ba te/ bi dza ya su ra te/ sam b+ho ga u ba da sha ka/ wa
147a2: sha ga ra pra sha ma ka/ shA n+ya tA swa b+hA ba/ a nu sA ri/ ma hA bo d+hi sa tra ba ra/ ba rata/ ba ra Na dang / oM ma hA pA sha pra sa ra/ a sa ma sa ma/ Anan ta sa ma sa man ta b+ha dra/ sa man ta san d+ha ra/ sa man ta a ka ra/ sa man tan bya sa ra/
147a3: sa ra sa ra/ he he/ many+dzu ra nga/ ma hA badz+ra kha Da kha/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ bi ra dza bi ra dza/ karma a ba ga ma ka/ ku ru ku ru/ d+hu ru d+hur+ya/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ d+hang+ga d+had+ha/ d+hu d+hud+hu d+hu/ ma hA ma hA ma hA ma hA/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/
147a4: b+ho/ b+hi ma b+hi ma/ na dan da/ sa ra sa ra/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa/ mo tsa ya/ ma ma nA tha/ ma nu pre te/ a pa ya duHkha na/ su ka da/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA/ a nA tho ha na duHkhi to han/ sar dzo ha na/ u pad dra to han/ a bi big to ha na/ ku si dz+ha
147a5: ha na/ mA ra na d+harmo ha na/ tA na b+ha ga bAn/ duHkhi ta nAM/ su ka na dang / a nA tha nAM/ sa nAH ka ra/ sa ra dza sa ma/ bi ra dza ska ra/ ud pad dru tA mAM/ swa ra u pa dra ba pra sha ma ka/ a baM big ta nAM/ ku sha la saM b+ha ra/ pa ri pU ra yaM tA/
147a6: kA da nA~M/ ma hA bir+yA d+haH/ mA ran d+harma NA/ ma mi ta pa d+ha r+tha/ mas bi t+ta/ u0f89u0fa4// dA kroHga shar d+h+waM/ ba ra ya n+tu/ hrat+ma/ sarbadu ShA nam pra sham ya/ sarba N+De shan dzAs mi/ a ba na ya/ sarbas nAs ra u ba 'dag du k
147a7: ha ni me nA sha ya/ sarba ku sha la d+harma pa ri pU ra me ku ru/ sarba karma a ba ra Na/ k+She sha pa rab ta ma bi ki ra/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa si bi d+hi/ bIr+ya pA ra mi tA/ yo gaM me sa na ni yo dza ya/ a ra Na d+harma/ bi ra ka bi ra dza/ san dza ha/ pra dza u0f7f/
147a8: d+har ni sa ma/ kha sa ma/ dza la ni d+ha sa ma/ me ru sa ma/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba dad sA hA// rig sngags don kun bsgrub pa 'di// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na// de ma thag du sems can rnams// skye dang rga ba zad par 'gyur// ngan 'gro
147b1: thams cad zhi gyur nas/ / bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'dar// lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'// log 'dren rnams ni skrag par gyur// sdig bzhi par byed pa yi// gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mod la yang // grangs med phrag
147b2: ni drang phyung snyed/ / 'khor ba'i btsonar dag nas thar// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrags shing // gang tshe rig sngags bshad pa ni// brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas// rtsub
147b3: dang ni mi rgyu ba'i/ / sa gzhi de yi tshe na g.yos// sangs rgyas 'od kyi snang ba yis// sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // srin po ma zad gzugs can rnams// stobs bcu ldan la phyag
147b4: 'tshal zhes/ / skad phyung tshig ni 'thun par smras// lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can// thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas// gang na rdo rje'i ral gri tshe// de yi drung lhags smras pa ni// phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog/
147b5: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs che la// shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can// bgegs kyi yul la khor rab 'joms pa// sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang // sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bdag/ shin tu stobs/
147b6: ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs// dag po dag po rab 'joms pa// gzi rjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal// dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe// rdo rje can te snying stong ba// mi shes pa'i rab rib sel// sgeg pa'i cha lugs
147b7: mchog mnga' ba/ / skye dgu'i bdag po skrag par dgyes// gzhu stobs can la phyag ring ba// nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad// mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol// me tog phreng rgyan sna tshogs can// spyan bzang dbu
147b8: ni mdzes pa ste/ / dgyes shing na bza' mdzes par gsol// 'jam pa'i dbyangs de rab tu bzhad// dkar nag 'byes pa'i spyan mnga' ba// ha ha'i sgras ni grag par bsgrags// rab tu dang bas bstan pa dga'// rgya chen gser gyi
148a1: mdog dang ldan/ / rgya mtsho snying po'i spyod yul can// tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste// sdang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad// cha lugs sngo la sa skyong ba// lha'i bdag po dga' bar mdzad// 'dod pa'i
148a2: lha ste 'dod sel brtan/ / rgyal po'i 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa// brtan po rnams la brtan par grags// yon tan dag gis phyogs su bzhad// btud pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa// rtag tu mchod cing rjed pa lags// stobs po
148a3: che la shugs che ba/ / phyag ring g.yul chen mnga' ba po// sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste// 'dzem shes rab srang ngo tsha shes// dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen po ston pa po// dkyil 'khor
148a4: chen por grags pa ste/ / dkyil 'khor chen por mdzad pa lags// dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can// zhabs la rjed pa'i tshogs dang ldan// ha ha swA hA'i bdag che ba// mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam// hA gis
148a5: 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste/ / 'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po// lha dang lha min rnams kyis btud// de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyid// zham ring gang rgyangs chen po can// rlung drag mun pa sel mdzad pa// 'jig
148a6: rten gsum du snyan par grags/ / gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba// drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba// mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can// 'dzum zhing sgeg par kun tu ston// spyod pas lngar brtan pa lags//
148a7: nor bu dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa// nyi ma gsal ba lam me ba// nyi ma'i 'od 'dra mdza' khrags bzhin// tha ler zhugs shing rgya cher bzhad// mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad// nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin/
148a8: dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sbyin// gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa// dpal ldan dpal mdzad bgegs gnon ri// kun du rmongs pa sel bar mdzad// 'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs pa// zhabs la mchod po'i//
148b1: tshogs bsags pa// dpung brgyan snyan cha gdub gor can// nor bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sgron// rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po// ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa// dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi
148b2: mchog/ 'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste// 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas sbyin pa// dkar bsngo ba 'od bzang ba// mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags// ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba// de bzhin cha lugs rab tu ston// shes rab
148b3: ral gris 'debs par mdzad/ / stong nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa// byams pa mchog dang tha ma mkhyen// rnam par grags pa gsan pa des// rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod// rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che// shin du rnam
148b4: rgyal 'khor los bskur/ / 'jigs med blo gros shes rab can// de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'dzin pa// mgur bzangs 'dul mdzad zhi ba ste// zhi ba'i lam ni skyon mdzad pa// lha dang lha min bcas pas bkur// sems can
148b5: thams cad 'jigs mid mdzad/ / sems can kun la rab ston pa// brtan po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can rnams kyi blo la mkhas// sred med brista drag shul stobs// me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste// byis pa sku mchog
148b6: mchog sbyin pa/ / rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad// phyag rgya mdzad pas gsang sngags mdzad// bdag gir mi 'dzin rdul med brtan// mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas pa// bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po// mi mchog brdzun
148b7: pa bsod du med/ / de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal// brtan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// mya ngan med cing gnas pa med// 'joms med tshig bzang che lugs bzang // dpa' bo sgra rnams rab 'joms pa/ tshan chen
148b8: nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa/ / 'dod pa gnod pa khyab par gshegs// mgon po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog/ gshin rje pham mdzad skye dgu srung // las dang nyon mongs rab bsreg pa/ ston mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags/ legs
149a1: ba khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan/ / brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing // dad pa skyed par byed pa 'di// lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad// bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren dang // gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang /
149a2: mdangs 'phrog gtum po rgod rnams kyis// de ring legs par bstod par gyur// 'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gi rab// bsgyings pas bltas pa'ang bde bar gyur// de dag kun la bltas nas kyang // 'di skad du ni tshig smras pa
149a3: khyed kun rtag tu bgegs med cing / / nges legs thar pa thob gyur la// 'jigs med bkra yang shis par shog/ nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig/ de nas rab tu cher bzhad cing // 'brug chen sgra ni sgrogs pa yis// de bzhin
149a4: gshegs pa zhal gsal bas/ / shar phyogs gzigs nas bka' stsal pa// kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul// sems can gti mug bsal ba'i phyir// sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs// shin tu rgyas pa
149a5: byung bar gyur/ / kye ma bsod nams cher byas pa'i// sems can rnams ni rab sbyad phyir// dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs// 'jam pa'i klog gis rab tu bshad// la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas// sdug bsngal thams
149a6: cad sel ba yi/ / grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa 'am// yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung // de'i don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing // sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa// de yis nges par thob
149a7: par 'gyur/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa chen yang // ring por mi thogs de yis 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis// rab dga' shin tu dri ma med// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can// sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur// ring du
149a8: song dang mi g.yo ba/ / legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// sa chen dam pa de dag kyang // gang zhig nges gnas 'dod pa yis// sems can chen pos mi thogs par// tshe zad nas ni thob par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang
149b1: sems can kun la sdug pa dang / / spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi// byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang kun skyed pa dang // sdig pa thams cad ni byed cing // bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad yid 'ong
149b2: 'di/ sor mo bcu'i thal sbyar nas// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la/ shin du dang ba'i sems kyis su// nad par langs nas su brjod pa// de la rig sngags 'chang kun dang // de bzhin lha'i bdag po rnams// gnod sbyin
149b3: srin po mang po dag/ rtag du yang ni srung bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang // de bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'chang rnams// de la nges par srung bar byed// de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhug
149b4: shing / / mnyam par bzhag par snang bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams// bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dag/ dga' zhing bsam pa dag pa yis// rgyud ma dag nas phyag kyang 'tshal// de phyir bgags rnams dga'
149b5: gyur pas/ / 'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so// lan gcig klags na tshangs chen dang // bsod nams mnyam pa thob par 'gyur// shes rab chen po gang zhig gis// nyin re mtshan mchog brjod byas na// dri ma med cing rab dag la// rab tu
149b6: 'od gsal sgra snyan dang / / sems can thams cad dga' ba yi// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang thob// mtshungs pa med cing stobs skyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang // 'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing // yid 'phrog
149b7: lha dang lha min tshogs de 'dun pa yi/ / gzungs 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho//
149b8: 'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mri ta bin du
150a1: dza ba ma hA su ka swA hA/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
150a2: bal tshim par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ / yon tan rin po che 'a tshogs can khyod kyi gzungs sngags 'di phyung bas sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras gang la la gzungs
150a3: sngags 'di thos pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / gang la la'i rna lam du grag par gyur pa de yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sku gdu
150a4: dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad dam/ / tshes bcwa lnga la sbyang bar 'dug cing gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te// spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa la sog
150a5: pas mchod la bskor ba byas nas bzlas brjod byas na dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa thams cad dang // sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
150a6: thams cad rnam par sel ba la spos la sogs pas mchod de bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du ston par 'gyur te/ / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing // nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad sel
150a7: bar byed do/ / de nas rdo rje me tog zod chen pos gsum gyi dbang phyug dang thabs cig tu 'khor kun gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam
150a8: par sel ba la btud nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa'o/ / sems can kun gyi gtso bo che// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul chag/ nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
150b1: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol// nyon mongs dri ma kun sel cing // nyes pa kun las rnam par grol// skyon bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lam srang gcig pu'i tshul ston cing // theg pa gcig pu'i tshul gcigs
150b2: theg pa chen po'i tshul bsnyes te/ / theg pa dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// snang ba chen po snang ba brnyes// yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag/ zla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba// 'jig rten 'das pa khyod phyag 'tshal// theg pa
150b3: chen po dag pa che/ / sangs rgyas theg pa rtogs gyur cing // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnam grags pa// rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal// darab chen po nyon mongs choms// bgegs thub
150b4: gshin rje'i thub pa ste/ / rin chen drab khyod phyag 'tshal// zla ba chen po nyi mche// lhun po chen po dbang phyug che// lha chen mgon po chen po ste// 'byor pa chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad cing // s+thing
150b5: pa thams cad sel mdzad pa/ / kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che// rnam sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa ste// chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa lags// ye shes dbang phyug ye shes che//
150b6: sred bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sku mdzes yon tan snying po mkhyen// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan// sangs rgyas lam ste don yod che// ye shes dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// bstan pa gnas pa dbang bdag po// bde
150b7: mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste/ / yangs pa dri med shes rab can// snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// zab cing brtan la rnam par gnon// zhi la 'jig rten dag par mdzad// ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na// dpa' ba tsar khyod la/
150b8: phyag 'tshal lo// skal ba chen po nyon mongs bcom// 'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste// zhi bzhi mdzad pade 'thung ba// chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// zang po'i rgyu ste chos lugs che// bde 'gror gnas pa
151a1: dri ma med/ / rnam dag zugs mnga' zhi ba mkhyen// nyes sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtse mo yangs par rnam par grags// sngags chen mang pos 'dul mdzad pa// snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor
151a2: mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ / sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog/ dkon mchog gsum dang spyod yul 'dra// nam gsum mkhyen pa rnyed pa'i bdag/ nam thar gsum khyod phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi//
151a3: 'byor ba brnyes shing mnyam nyid bsnyes// bskal pa dag ni grangs med par// tshogs chen bsags pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sa la gnas pas chen brnyes// sa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// yang dgas 'dzin las byung ba// ye shes sa
151a4: khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ / ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa// nyes gsum spong zhing sdig pa sel// ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che ba// mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal// mgon po chen po snang ba che// sdug bsngal chen po'i dri ma sel//
151a5: zhizlar ma lus zhi mdzad pa// yon tan pa mtha' khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa// chos kun zhi ba phun sum tshogs// dkon mchog gsum rigs dpe med pa// rin chen mtha' yas khyod phyag 'tshal/
151a6: rdo rje chen po dri med mchog/ rdo rje'i mtshon bsnams sdig mi mnga'// nam mkha' ma lus yul dang ldan// ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'// de bzhin gshegs dang yul gcig pa// sel ba po ste dri ma stod // shes rab chen po rgyal
151a7: ba'i sras/ / sred gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog/ rdo rjes 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje rtsal can rnams kyi rtsal// rdo rje snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen chen po rin chen po// rin chen rdo rje
151a8: 'od che ba/ / rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung // rin chen bstan pa srung mdzad pa// stong pa nyid kyi yul brnyes pa// ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston// stong nyid longs spyod yul dang ldan// stong nyid mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo//
151b1: shes rab mtshungs med shes rab can// dge ba rnam dag sa dang bral// chos gcig las byung snang ba po// 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul chen lags// 'jig rten snang mdzad smra mkhas pa// 'jig rten chos las rnam par 'das
151b2: 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan brnyes/ / brgyan par mdzad pa dkyil 'khor dag/ nyes pa ma lus bsal ba ste// phal chen skye bo kun la phan// sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po// kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' mkhyen
151b3: dga' la longs spyod pa/ / dga' ba'i rigs mchog rnams kyi mchog/ dga' bar mdzad pa'i rtog pa can// dga' la snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal// sgeg chen 'jam zhing dgongs par ldan// rnam par bsgeg la spyod pa brtan// rdo rje rig pa
151b4: skrag pa'i mchog/ sgeg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/ rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// bla med mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dga' bo byang chub sems
151b5: dpa'i mchog/ sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad la// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyis ni// ming brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas// rdo rje'i bstan pa rnam grags pa// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// kyem 'byor chen snang ba yi// dkyil
151b6: 'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ba/ / gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa// 'di dag so sor brjod byed na// da ni nyes pa kun zlog cing // rtag tu de yi phyi bzhin 'brang // nang par langs nas gtsang ma yi// sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la//
151b7: ldan gang zhig bstod byed pa// de yi sdig pa med par 'gyur// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ nang par langs nas rjod byed pa// sdang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur// bgags rnams kyis kyang yongs su gtang // sdig pa dag
151b8: pa 'thob pa dang / / de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang // ye shes rgya mtsho longs spyod cing // sa chog chen po thob par 'gyur// gang zhig nges par gnas byas la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'don pa// des ni 'byor chen sangs rgyas
152a1: sa/ / ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur// rgyud chen ldan zhing blo che ba// gang zhig ming mchog 'don pa ni// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa la// ring por mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa
152a2: thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po byang chub
152a3: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / oM sum b+ha ni sum b+haH/ ha ra tsa ra/ ma hA bA sha ma ru tA/ a mo g+ha badz+ra satwa swA hA// de nas yon tan sbyin pa yi// gzungs 'di bshad ma thag du yang // rdo rje'i dkyil
152a4: 'khor dam pa ni/ / ti se'i gangs bcas g.yos par gyur// sa yi snying po tshogs dbang la// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis spras// skal ldan chen po legs so legs// sa snyeng khyod kyis yangs par byas// khyod kyi gzungs ni rnam grags
152a5: shing / / yon tan dpag med mchog skyed pa// sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal dang // nyes pa zlog byed thos pa ni// 'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na// nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te// ji ltar 'dam gyi pad ma dag/ 'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos bzhin//
152a6: lus can dag las su yang rung // khyod kyis gsang sngags 'chang byed pa// de dag las ni gcig tsam yang // byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog/ thos nas mos par byed pa ni// nges par
152a7: yon tan thams cad kyang / / thob par 'gyur te the tsom med// de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor// langs te sa yi dbang phyug po// sa yi snying pos mchog la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad smras pa ni// sa yi snying po gtso bo che// glog 'grul
152a8: bu'i spyan mnga' ba/ / cod pan ca sa brnyes pa// phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor pa mchog/ rig ldan rig mdzad mchod pa'i gnas// gtso bo dge sbyong ston pa po// gzhi bcas ldan pa'i rlung gi tshul// sA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i ngag// thams
152b1: cad mkhyen pa'i nyi ma'i mchog/ snying po snying po mkhyen par grags// gsang sngags rol cing rgya cher rol// sa yi dbang phyug gar thabs can// sgeg po zhal bzang gar mkhan ldan// 'bras bu mngon sum ston pa'o// rab
152b2: 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen/ / snying po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med// mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba// shes rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs// 'dod chags la sogs skyon bsal cing // gar thabs chen po ston pa po// ston par dpag
152b3: bsam shing dang 'dra/ / nam mkha'i dbang phyug gsung snyan pa// nyi mtshan po nyid yin te// dbang phyug chen po 'bar bas bskor// yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa// sa yi dbang phyug spyod yul can// chos kyi longs spyod longs spyor
152b4: tshe/ yon tan rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtsho// yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog/ thabs tshul zab la mkhas pa ste// theg pa chen po 'jigs pa med// mchod pa chen po sgra che ba// zla ltar
152b5: grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ / rdo rje 'chang chen mtshan brgya pa// rdo rje dkyil 'khor me tog zod// blo gros chen po phyag ring ba// pad ma chen po stobs po che// gsang sngags chen po tshogs chen po// sa gzhi chen po lhun po lags//
152b6: lag na rdo rje yon tan des// nor bu'i me tog thod kyis brgyan// mnyam nyid 'byam la longs spyod pa// rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtshocan// rdo rje'i 'od mda' rdo rje ldan// sa yi bdag po lhun po bzhin// sa la longs spyod longs spyod bzang //
152b7: mtshon cha g.yo ba phun sum tshogs// rab 'byam snod ni rnam par grags// sbrum khas rdo rje dang 'dzis pa// spyan tu yid tsam dmar ba ste// me tog sngon po'i tha~Md kyis bcings// sprob chen po phyag ring ba// ban ni po brtan la bde sbyin
152b8: pa/ / ded dpon dpal bzang chen po ste// gangs can lhun po lta bu lags// dbang po gshin rje rgyal chen dang // btsan po khyab 'jug stobs dbang phyug/ 'jig rten mchog gis sangs rgyas tshangs// de bzhin nyid tshul spyod yul
153a1: can/ rin chen tog ste cher bzhad pa// dgyes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsel// gzigs pa ring ba spyan yangs pa// nam mkha' bzhin du thogs pa med// thogs pa mi dpogs rin chen gtsug/ srid gsum 'dod
153a2: pa med pa'i rgyu/ / dul ba nyon mongs dri ma bsal// dag pa gtsang ba gso sbyong can// rnam par gnon pa'i g.yul las 'das// ljang mdog skyabs mdzad snying rje che// stobs kyis grags pa rgya che ba// bsams na shes pa'i
153a3: spyod yul can/ / dpa' bo seng ge 'jigs par byed// sdang ba rnams kyi snyed 'joms pa// mnga' bdag grags pa yul dang ldan// dga' ba rgya chen rab 'byung ba// rigs mkhyen rigs kyi snying po mkhyen// rigs kun du
153a4: ni mchod pa lags/ / rgyal po rigs mchog skyes pa'i brten// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan// rdo rje sa 'og rab grags pa// rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che// mngon par 'phags pa khyab pa mchog/ 'grin bzangs
153a5: nad dang bral ba lags/ / skyosbyor mdzad ston pa dag pa ste// sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa// / grol la smin mdzad 'dud par mdzad// dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams kyis brgyan// rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams la
153a6: mkhas/ / rdo rje'i slob dpon yon tan rten// grub pa sbyin pa rnam dag mchog/ tshul dang tshul min rtogs pa po// dkyil 'khor rtsa ser mnga' ba ste// 'od zer ljang khu'i 'od dang ldan// ser la na bza' ser po panabs/
153a7: dkyil 'khor ma lus kun gyi rgyan// spyan rtsa dmar ba zla ba'i dpal// nor bu sna tshogs 'od 'byung ba// rdo rje brgya yi stobs kyis spro// mnyam nyid mnyam pa dri ma med// sku yang dag cing na bza' dag/ dag pa mkhyen cing
153a8: dag par ldan/ / dag pa'i chos mnga' snang ba ste// 'byung ldan srid pa sel mdzad pa// 'khor ba zang mdzad shes rab can// tshul shes tshul la spyod phul ba// rdo rje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags// rdo rje sems dpa' dge ba che//
153b1: 'thung ldan rab 'byam shes rab can// ma lus grags pa'i 'od bzang ba// sa yi snying po snying po che// rdo rje'i snying po rnam par 'dren// dpag tu med pa dpag med rdzogs// khyad b.rang 'phags pa'i yul la gnas// ma kyi
153b2: gsal ba'i gtso bo ste/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil// dga' dang dang pa skyed pa ste// ye shes rgya chen spyod yul ba// rlung gi drag shul lta bur drag/ drag bo lags te drag se lag ca// rgyal bar byed cing rgyal bzhi/ rgyal pa mad dag bang mar
153b3: lhun po ti se ma la yas/ / spyod yul zab mo non pa ste// rin chen rdo rje snying po che// mi bzhi'i spyod yul mda' ba lags// rin chen brag las byung ba'i 'od// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan// de bzhin gshegs la lhur dgyes
153b4: shugs drag dpal gyi bzhi rten lags/ / rab gsal dpal mdzad gtsang ma ste// phyogs bcu'i dbang phyug dbang phyug che// de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog rnams kyis// rdo rje sems dpa' bstod nas ni// rdo rje
153b5: sa gsum dbang mchog smras/ / yon tan snying po shes rnams kyis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog rjod cing // nyes pa zlog pa 'di las gzhan// sa yi steng na ngas ma mthong // ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// thams cad 'grub byed
153b6: dga' ba ste/ / sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang // dri ma kun bral yon tan nges// de phyir bsgrim pa thams cad kyis// phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i mis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di// rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis// ming brgya
153b7: rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ / bsam pa kun dang 'byor pa yi// gnas mchog bla na med pa ste// dpal yon rgya chen sbyin pa yin// yid ni shin tu dang ba yis// sa yi snying po'i mtshan gsal ba// 'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'i// yon tan
153b8: mchog ni gang rjod dang / / dpal yon rgya chen 'dzin pa yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// mi ni gang zhig rjod byed pa// sdug bsngal kun las myur du 'grol// 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang
154a1: bcas pa rdzogs so/ / sangs rgyas 'khor brgyad dang bcas pa'i mtshan brgyas brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// rdzogs s+ho// n+ya gar skad du/ ArA ba lo ka te shwa ra s+ya nA ma any+dza sha taka/ bod skad du/ 'angags
154a2: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
