154a3: dbang phyug gi gnas/ ri gu 'dzin gyi rtse mo me tog drigam po sna tshogs bkram pa// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar kha dog bzang po ltar snang ba// rin po che sna tshogs snang ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
154a4: lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la ste stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas te/ mchod cing rjed nas
154a5: yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ / tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab
154a6: tu ston to/ / de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das// dgongs pa mdzad pa/ mdzad rgyu mdzad pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su brnyes pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba
154a7: yongs su bas pa/ yang dag pa'i mkhyen pas thugs shin tu rnam par grol ba// cang mkhyen pa/ glang po che chen po dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol du byon pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ srid pa'i
154a8: dgon pa las rgal ba/ gzhan la sman pa/ thugs rje dang 'brel ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ skye dgra la mchog tu mnyes gshin pa// bde ba rab tu stsol bar mdzad pa// byams pas zhugs pa/ sems can mtha' yas pa sgrol ba la mkhas pa
154b1: bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po/ / srid pa gsum gyi rtsa lag gcig pa// 'dod chags mi mnga' ba/ zhe sdang mi mnga' ba/ gti mug mi mnga' ba/ dri ma gsum spangs pa/ rig pa gsum gyi pha rol du gshegs pa/ mngon par shes pa
154b2: rmug+ha rnaMs pa/ shid n+ya gro d+hawAr chung zhe dgab pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ de byung bzang po brgyad brgyas brgyan pa/ lpags pa srab cing mdog ser ba// su ring rgyu bzang zhing dkaragasu shing
154b3: gi me tog sar pa dang / dmar rangad lta bu'i dbu thor tshugs mnga' ba/ lung lo 'khyil ba mang pos dbu khebs pa/ 'od dpag med dkyis 'od zer gtang ba/ 'bar ba'i 'od 'dom gang gis gser gyi ri bo ltar snyan par grags pa/
154b4: gzibarjid rgya che ba// gzugs 'char ka'i ri lta bu gtsug tor mnga' ba/ nor bu rab tu 'bar ba/ mchod phyir thogs sku la se ral du thogs pa/ sa rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i zhabs dang ldan pa// tshul khrims ma
154b5: nyams pa/ tshul khrims ma zhig pa/ se dge ltar thod ka phel ka che ba/ sku 'jam zhing mdzes pa/ gzigs pa dang gshegs pa thabs khyu mchog gi dbang po 'dra ba/ mkhur ba g.yas su 'khyil ba// dpral ba cha zhing zla ba kham pa 'dra
154b6: la thig le mnga' ba/ phyag pus mor slebs pa/ smin ma bar ma chad pa/ shangs mtho ba/ mgur bam pa'i mgrin pa 'dra ba/ phyag sor mo dang tshigs ring ba/ sen mo 'jam zhing zangs kyi mdog dang 'dra ba/ phyag dra bas 'brel ba/
154b7: phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los brgyan pa// ston ka'i pad ma 'dra ba/ sku 'jam zhing rgyas pa/ tshangs pa ltar dbyangs zab pa/ yid du mchi ba/ sdug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ nyams dga' bar bgyid pa/ 'od pad ma 'dra ba/ pad ma las
154b8: 'khrungs pa/ pad ma las byA da ba/ pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag na pad ma mnga' ba/ phyag na ril ba spre'u lugs bsnams pa/ ri dgas nag po'i lpags pa banabs pa/ phyag 'khar bsnams pa/ bgrang ba'i nor bu bsnams pa/
155a1: gtsang ba srungs pa// gsor por gsung ba bdud rtsi 'bri dang bebs pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu/ blta na sdug pa'i shing 'dra ba sems can thams cad mos par mdzad pa/ dga' bar mdzad pa sems can thams
155a2: cad nye bar 'tsho ba/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa bde bar gshegs pa'i cha byad mnga' ba/ bde bar gshegs pa'i ring srel 'dzin pa spu re re skyes pa sems can gyi snying po bsod nams mdzad pa/ dge ba mdzad pa nges par mdzad pa/
155a3: brtson 'grus 'bar ba 'khor ba las shin tu gnas pa/ dam pa'i chos la rgyal tshab du dbang bskur ba/ sgrol ma zhabs drung na gnas pa/ khro gnyer can bka' bzhin bgyid pa/ rgyal ba dang ldan pa tshul dang ldan pa dran ba dang ldan pa/ mthu
155a4: rtsal che ba yon tan dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang ldan pa/ zhi ba dang ldan pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa skal pa dang ldan pa/ don dang ldan pa/ don rnams thugs su chud pa the tsom rnams gcod pa chos rnams gsung ba 'jig
155a5: rten rnams kyi ston pa zhal gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas pa sku rked pa'i phyogs rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu/ sku nyi ma stong pas lhag par mdzes pa tshangs pa'i dbang po la sogs pas phyag bgyis
155a6: pa lags so/ / gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa sgrub pa byed pa de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor thams cad du
155a7: zhugs par 'gyur ro/ / de la gsang sngags thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshams med par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// su zhig nang par langs nas 'don dam
155a8: klog gam/ / kha ton byed na de'i lus la mdze dang / rkang shu dang lud pa dang / mi bde ba mi 'byung zhing nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs so cog tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i
155b1: dus kyi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / tshe rabs so cog tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur/ dpa' bar
155b2: 'gyur/ skad snyan par 'gyur/ skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// stan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// bstod pa bsgrub pa 'dis stod pa byas na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i
155b3: klung drug bcu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi bye ma snyed dag la mchod pa byas par 'gyur te/ / rnam par smin pa mtshungs shing bye brag med par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel
155b4: gyi za ma tog ces bya ba rdzogs s+ho/ / // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kan/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgyargya brgyad pa zhes phyag 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu
155b5: dang ba'i sems kyis su/ thub pa mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi// mtshan rnams 'dir ni brjod par bgyi// gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste// gzugs rnams kun gyi bla na med// mtshan
155b6: rnams thams cad kun tu rdzogs/ / 'jam dpal dpal gyi dam pa lags// bsam gyis mi khyab bsam dang bral// mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad du byung / sku gsum phrin las bsam mi khyab/ de bzhin thugs kyang bsam mi khyab/
155b7: stong nyid bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can// stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan// stong pa nyid la lhag par mos// srid pa gsum po stong par ston// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// sa rnams kun gyi bdag dang ldan/ sems
155b8: can kun gyi mchog du gyur/ sems can kun gyis phyag bgyis pa/ ngan 'gro kun dang de bzhin du// mu stegs can rnams thams cad 'joms// phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa// smra ba'i seng ge'i mi yi mchog/ ngal zhing
156a1: con myong rnam nga bral/ / grIb pa mnyan mi mang // sems can thams cad yangs paskyog// grol zhi 'jig rten mam ma dad pa// ral ba sun rna drus zhugasan// ngas pa rgyangs pa zhan
156a2: 2/ / paza nga thugs shing phyag la bar ba sdums// gci lan sa // 'das pa'i bya sa can mang bdag pa dang // pad+ma ma las ngas pa byed// da ma'i za ba'i 'do pa / mra
156a3: ga ba ma sa/ na sa/ / ma / / la
156a4: na ga na / / dag te stong bcan mong mas/ khyod ni dang pag da// ma na pa'i rnams can mas// ngan gyim dag yon/ nagaso// yod rdzas gi sbyid sa
156a5: pa tsha da/ na/ smra
156a6: khyod rtsub 'dag stong/ / mi rgyal pom thar mam khyod// de bzhin rje dpon ma byed lags// mA smin dbang po grags pa rig+sa/ mig dam gapa'aphag pa bya mangs// san pa dnga' bo sa kun lags Sh+Than
156a7: pa pa / 6/ chas // se ma la / nan ci/
156b1: zhing mkhas pa lags// khyod ni bsod nams dpag bsam shing // byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan// rnam grol 'bras bu phran su mtshogs// lus can kun gyi mchog du gyur// yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog pa//
156b2: sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod// khyod ni mjug rings gza' mchog lags// khyod ni drang srong thub pa mchog/ khyod ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba// sa bcu'i mnga' bdag gtso bo lags// ded dpon 'gro ba rnams
156b3: kyi gtso/ / mya ngan 'das pa mchog skyon bzhin// khyod ni nam mkha' sa chu bzhin// khyod ni me dang rlung lta bu// khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar// sems can rab kun rdzogs mdzad// 'byung po kun gyis phyag bgyis
156b4: pa/ / rin chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam dpal gyis ni bka' stsal ba// oM bAkye daM na maHswahA// ji skad smos pa'i mtshan rnams dang // rig sngags bcas par 'dzin na ni// sdig 'gyur rnam dag rab tu thob/
156b5: brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan// skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa// de 'dod pasam dgra yid bzhin du// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// bzang po'i mtshan rnams dran na ni// mtshams med skal pa mnyam
156b6: yi/ / las rnams mi bzad gang byas pa// de dag thams cad myur du 'byang// 'jig rten pha rol 'pho ba dang // 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe// sems can dag pas dran byas nas// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyang thob par 'gyub/
156b7: tho dang ldan pas dran byas te// nges par gnas nas su klog pa// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod na yang // thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho//
156b8: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya me trin pra tidz+nyA nA mad+hA NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal babyams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo ngan
157a1: dra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga rA te/ shAkya mu na ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te saM myag saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a dzi te a dzi te/ a dzi tan dza ya/ ha ra ha ra/ mai tri a ba lo ka te/ ka ra ka ra/ ma hA sa ma ya sid d+ha/
157a2: b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA bo d+hi ma Na Da bI dze/ s+pha ra sma ra/ a s+sa kang sa ma ya bo d+hi bo d+hi/ ma hA bo d+hi swA hA// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so// oM mo hi mo hi/ ma hA mo hi swA hA// snying po'o// oM mu ni mu ni swA hA// nye ba'i snying po'o// gzungs
157a3: 'di nyan pa tsam dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la sems pa dang / bsgom pa tsam gyis gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur
157a4: pa na/ bdag gis sems can de nges par btsal bar bgyi ste// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan par bgyi'o// ban du bzo'i phye gnas su gyur pa'i ri dgas dang / bya rnams kyi rna / bung du sgrogs par byed na/
157a5: de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob po// 'di thos pa tsam gyis nam du yang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// ngan song gi dri mas mi gos so// ma'i mngal du yang mi skye'o// lha'i bskal
157a6: pa stong du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i longs spyod 'grub par nga byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can de
157a7: bsnung bar mi bgyi lags so/ / nges par bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis pas// de ji ltar gyur kyang rung // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o// 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas
157a8: pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / // rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis sbyar cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// !// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dzam b+ha la nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka/
157b1: bo ska du/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshar brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gnod sbyini 'brog gnas po// gser dag gis ni legs par brgyad// rin chen gyis ni rab mdzes shing /
157b2: me ni shin tu 'bar 'dra ba/ lung lo can du zhugs nas kyang // gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang ba yi// zhabs gnyis la ni rab 'jus nas// shin tu mnyam bzhag dris pa ni/ bcom ldan gdod 'dzin rgyal dbang po// gsang sngags tshogs
157b3: ni kun gyi bdag/ rig sngags 'chad rnams kun gyis mchod// lha dang lha min phyag byas pa// ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa po// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// mgon po sems can kun don mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi gas
157b4: ba 'dzin/ / sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// snying rjes dod pa'i yid kyis su// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir// bdag gis kyang ni sems bskyed de// mi rnams nor de nyung ba dang // bsod napas chung zhing dbang chud ba/
157b5: mthong nas sdug bsngal chen po yis// rab tu gzir to gsang ba'i bdag/ de nas gnod 'dzin gyis smras nas// bcom ldan gsang ba gsang ba'i bdag/ snying rjes non te smras pa ni// legs par nyon cig gsang ba po// mgor
157b6: po gnod 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ / sems can kun gyi don byed pa// dbul po'i nyon mongs sel ba po// nor ro cog gi dbang phyug gi/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bsod nams ldan// dbul ba'i nyes sdi gsel byed pa// gang ga'i bye
157b7: pa'i gras skad / / rgyal bachog rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa// 'od zer brgya bzhes pa yi// zhing nasangs rgyas kyi ma yin la// chos ston pan bdag gis kyang // de ni rang gis sngon thos te// dbul byas pa cing bsod nams
157b8: ldan/ dan bdag gi shes rab kyis// sems can kun don brtson pa po// khyod la legs par bstan par bya// khyod ni mnyam bzhag rab tu nyon// 'phags pa lha dang lha min tha// shes rab ldan zhing chos la nus// snying 'i
158a1: bdag nyid bzod ldan pa tan/ / dbang po zhib dbang po thul// dgebs sdig 'joms shes nyen can// des shing don kun slab pa po// mi gnong mi sru dpal dang ldan// mdzod bdag gzhan gyis mi thub pa// dkon mchog
158a2: gsum gyi sbubs gcig pa/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs pa'o// gtar rnams spyod pa gzi brjid can// rtag sbyin nor ni phel byed ba// rin chen 'byung gnas su bo 'dum// chu yi bdag po chu 'bebs pa// gnod sbyin nu spyod bdag
158a3: nyid can/ / gter don nye bar ston pa po// gser gyi ri bo ldan po ste// dbul ba'i gdon las par byed pa// dbang po nyid bang 'gro ba'i mgon// chu'i dbang po sbyin mdog can// 'jig rten mig dang 'jig rten pa// nyis zla ba thar thug pa/
158a4: nor chen rgyal po chen po ste// lag nane'u le rab gnas pa// gzhon nu sang ge tog can te// gnod sbyin chen po rdzu 'phrul che// tshig gi bdag po bzhin 'dzum pa// gsong por snyan par sgrub po// bram ze 'dod pa'i lcags kyu ste// cha ba
158a5: don grub grub pas mchod/ / rig sngags 'chang ba 'khor los sgyur// ku be ra dang mi la zhon// bum pa'i lto can mig yangs pa// lha'i dri ldan yid ltar mgyogs// khyab bdag bde 'byung nor bzangs sras// sems can rnams ni skyong la
158a6: dga'/ / 'dod dgur bskur gzugs yid kyi lha// cod pan can de rigs dga' ba// g.yon phyogs cod pan lagan dbyug/ lag pa brgya pa stobs po che// sa brgya dbang phyug lha yul pa// zla ba nya ba'i zhal mdog can// da dpon tshogs kyi
158a7: bdag po ste/ / gnas btan tshong ba sgral ba bzang // yid bzhin nor bu bus pa bzang // dpag bsam ljon shing mi yi bdag/ mchog don 'os pa gtso ba ste// mchog sbyin mi' thung khyab 'jug pa// skyabs 'os bkra shis sung ba po// rin chen/
158a8: phreng bas rnam par brgyan// lha yi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi bdeg/ rab du dar ba nor mi zad// seng ge'i rtsal gyi mthu cal can// ston pa 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// gtso bo tshang pa rigs kyi
158b1: mchog/ pad ma'i lte ba thub med rgyal// tshangs par spyod pa rgya mtsho che// gnod 'dzin bdag nyid che ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad nges bshad 'di// sdig pa thams cad 'joms byed cing // dbul ba'i nyon mongs sel byed pa// 'byor dang /
158b2: kal bzang skyed pa po// glang po ta nor 'phel byed pa// gza' dang rgyu skar mi la ma ngan// lhas ngan sal bar byed pa ste// nags sa mgal te grong dang ni// dur khrod yang na ri yang rung // mkhas pa gang na klog pa der gsul dang ngagran
158b3: nyam ngab/ / sbrul dang mchu chom rkun sogs// stag dang dom dang 'jigs pa che// rgya mtsho bgrod dkar mi bzang las// mi ni rab du zhi bar 'gyur// dbang po me dang chu lha dang // gshin rje srin bdag rlung lha dang // nor sbyin dpal
158b4: ldan ku be ra/ / nor bu bzang sras lnga rtsen dang // rtse ma can dang 'brog gnas dang // lha dang gnod sbyin gzhan dag kyang // g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du// rab tu dga' bzhin srung bar byed// gang na ming 'di klog pa dang // glang
158b5: chen rta dang ba lang dang / / lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bras bu me tog rnams kyang 'phel// mi nad dang ni 'go ba'i nad// gnod pa kun las byung ba rnams// thams cad du ni bde legs 'gyur// lhag par byis pa rnams la
158b6: shis/ de la yi dgas klu nams dang // ma mo dang ni gdon drag dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang mi 'am ci// srin po rnams kyang 'chi mi byed// nad do cog las rnam par grol// de bzhin bde zhing nor dang ldan// bu dag dang ni tsha bo dang // dpal
158b7: dang gtong ba rnams kyis rgyas/ / rigs mchog rgyal ba 'byung ba dang // longs spyod chen po'i nang du skye// tshe dang dpal dang ldan pa dang // nad med rims dang bral bar 'gyur// tshe rabs kun du skye ba dran// lobs spyan thos pa 'dzin
158b8: pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// skal ba bzang po nyid du 'gyur// phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal gnod sbyin rje// gsang bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal te/ ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa po// lag na rdo rje khyod la 'dud//
159a1: sems can dang la mnyes gshin pa// nor bzangs sras kyi grags pa 'di// dbul ba'i nad ni ni byed pa// rab tu bshad pa legs par gsungs// don kun grub pa gsang ba'i sngags// bdag gis kyang ni 'dir dbul te//
159a2: de ni legs par dran tsam gyis// mi ni dbul las grol 'gyur zhing // gzhan gyis mi tshugs srung bar 'gyur// dgra rnams kyis kyang mi tshoms shing // bskal pa bzang dang skal dang ldan// lo brgya yang ni 'tsho bar 'gyur// lha yi
159a3: glang po rin chen dang / / rgyal dang rgyal srid 'os rnams kyang // nges par myur du thob 'gyur te// rgyal srid kyang ni the tshom med// na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Na~M b+ha drA ya// ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM hrIM hrIM k+Sha dz+nyA hrIM hraM/ dpe bya rang nog pa ri
159a4: sha na a ta bA ka de ba yak+Sha sa ma ya ma nusma ra hI hUM phaT swA hA/ / // 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ ma hA sa mA dza su tra na nA ma ma hA sU tra me// bod skad du/ mdo chen po
159a5: 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na// dge slong lnga brgya thams cad
159a6: kyang dgra bcom pa/ / zag pa zad pa bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur por ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag
159a7: dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de// de'i tshen phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas/
159a8: dbang che bar grags pa/ dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed do// de nas tshangs ris kyi lha tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa bzhi zhig 'di
159b1: snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na// dge slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/
159b2: bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
159b3: lamya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de/ / de'i tshen phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dganas/ dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lpags nas bcom ldan 'das dang // dge slong
159b4: gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed kyis bdag cag kyang song la/ / bcom ldan 'das la re re nas tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod par bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag 'di lta ste// dper na skyes bu stobs
159b5: dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brgyad pa'am/ brkyang pa las bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cing // bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas// tshangs ris kyi lha gcig/
159b6: gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'dus pa che la gzhol ba yi// lha tshogs kun nas lcags gyur pas// gzhan gyis mi thub dge 'dun la// blta ba'i skad du bdag cag mchis/ tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/
159b7: drang por gyur pa'i sems kyis ni// 'di na dge slong rab brtson pa// kha lo bltar mig blangs shing // dbang po rnams ni legs sdom bgyid// tshangs ris kyi lha gsum pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// dbang phrar 'ong ba 'obs 'dra
159b8: ba'i/ / phur bu rab bcom bkris mi tshugs// de dag sred bral dag spyod cing // 'dren pas glang po gzhon ltar 'atul// tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchi ba// de dag ngan 'gror
160a1: mi mchi zhing / / mi lus spangs par gyur nas kyang // lha'i lus ni thob par 'gyur// tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag gis de skad ces gsol nas de nyid na zag bcu meste 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i
160a2: 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas/ / dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni shin tu che ba yin no// dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni shin tu che ba yin/
160a3: te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste// dper na da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po
160a4: 'di kho na lta bu dag 'dus par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na
160a5: da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag lha rnams kyi ming dag brjod par byas// lha rnams kyi ming dag zung shig/ gang dgas la gnas pa dang // gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams
160a6: seng ge bzhin du tha dad la/ / sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag byas shing // kun nas 'dus par gyur pa ni// spu dag zing zhes byed pa yin// gang dag sa la gnas pa dang // gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams// seng ge bzhin du tha dad
160a7: la/ / sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag byas shing // kun nas 'dus gyur spu zing zhes// byed padag gis brjod par bya// yid byang dag cing rab dang la// rnyog med 'chi bdag spangs pa rnams// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar thug ci/
160a8: lha dang mi yi bar na 'khod// slob ma lnga brgya phrag gnyis dang // gzhan yang brgya dang bcu dag dang // stong phrag du ma rnams dag gi/ lha rnams 'dus par gyur pa dag/ mtha' nas mtha' ma mi mthong zhing // phyogs rnams
160b1: thams cad khyab gyur pa/ / sangs rgyas kyis ni te mkhyen nas// de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te// de nas ston pas bstan dga' ba'i// nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag/ lha tshogs mngon par lcags gyur
160b2: kyis/ / nges par rtogs shes bka' stsal pa// tshigs su bcad pas mthar chags kyis// de dag rnams kyi ming brjod kyis// rtse gcig gyur pa'i yid kyis ni// nga yis bshad pa mnyan par gyis// ser skya'i gnas
160b3: kyi nags tshal gyi/ / gnod sbyin stong phrag bdun po dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang
160b4: ldan/ kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gser can stong phrag drug po kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal
160b5: ni/ / snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i
160b6: tshal du mngon par zhugs/ / shar phyogs rnam rgyal tshal gyi ni// ri mnyam stong phrag gsum po dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus
160b7: par lhags/ / rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de ltar stong phrag bcu drug kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan
160b8: padag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de'i 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams//
161a1: dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal po'i khab// yangs pa la ni rtag gnas shing // brgya stong phrag ni mang po yi// gnod sbyin bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
161a2: gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs//
161a3: kun gyi bshes gnyen lnga brgya dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po kun gyi lha// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de gnyis kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams//
161a4: dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// shar phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bya/ de ni
161a5: nye du lhan cig du/ / glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la
161a6: phyag 'tshal zhing / / 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par
161a7: kun du gzhan gyis mi thub par/ / gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i
161a8: tshal du mngon par zhugs/ / lho phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ klu dang gar gyi rtag tu rtse// gang dag
161b1: de yi 'khor rnams dang / / de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par
161b2: zhugs/ / de la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de mi
161b3: 'khor rnams dang / / de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// nub phyogs
161b4: mngon par skyong byed pa/ / rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus
161b5: pa'i nang du 'ongs/ / rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig
161b6: de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ / dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing
161b7: 'od dang ldan/ / kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// byang phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// gnod sbyin bdag po
161b8: rgyal po ste/ / ming ni lus ngan po zhes bya// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// gru dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags
162a1: ldan rnams/ / dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya
162a2: stobs po che/ / lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams//
162a3: dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzad// byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyal
162a4: po chen po de bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyod par byed// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul
162a5: ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ / kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de dag gi ni khol po rnams// mchod rten mang la gnas bcas pa// sru
162a6: byed g.yon can su ma can/ / sgyu ma shes dang rnam shes dang // ngan spong khro gnyer lhan cig tu// de tshe rdzu 'phrul ston cing lhags// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul
162a7: ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ / kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin chen po dang // gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dang /
162a8: dmag dpon 'di dag kyang der kun nas lhas te// 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / b+ha ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag/ dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang // mgrin ngan dang ni ma gul des dang // spobs ldan nor bu nor
162b1: spyod dang / sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang // ri mnyam gser can gang po dang // seng ldeng pa dang g.yon can dang // gnod sbyin pa skyod 'brog gnas dang // rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po// dri za sna tshogs ste dang ni/ lcags
162b2: ma rung ring dang ma ldan dang / / tshigs lnga ser po yid dga' dang // gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas// 'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa// 'grog nas ji snyed yod pa yin// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag
162b3: kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ / rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lhan cig 'byung ba'i klu dang ni// 'jog
162b4: po dang ni yangs pa'ang 'ongs/ / la ba dang ni mgyogs mchog dag/ srung byed 'gro dang lhan cig lhags// klu bdag bran bzang bu dang ni// yul 'khor srung dang glang po che// 'jigs byed che dang sa srung bu// rdzu 'phrul ldan
162b5: pa'i klu yang 'ongs/ / gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dus pa'i tshal du
162b6: mngon par zhugs/ / gang zhig klu rgyal zil mnan len// stobs ldan mig rnon 'dab chags bya// de min mdab bzang khra bo yang // mkha' las tshal du mngon par 'ongs// de tshe klu rgyal mi 'jigs byin// ston pas mad
162b7: bzong ba de mdzad cing / / gsung 'jam brjod pa de nyid la// sangs rgyas skyabs su nye bar song // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // dwe yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/
162b8: dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lag na rdo rjes pham byas shing // rgya mtshor rten pa'i lha min rnams// thams cad nor lhas skrag cu cing // mtshol skyabs su 'du shes pa// thags zangs
163a1: ris dang rab bkra dang / / rab sim byed dang pa tang zung dang // stobs ldan bu ni rgyal po kun// rnam snang byed pa'i bu rnams dang // stobs ldan sde dang sgra gcan bzang // dpa' chen khyod kyi dus lags shes// dge slong 'dus padi
163a2: gnas tshal du go cha bgos te lhags pa dang / / gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus
163a3: pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ / chu lha mo dang bu mo dang // zla ba mo yang phyi bzhin 'ongs// mdza' bshes ma dang chu lha can// lha mo grags ldan nyid kyang 'ongs// sa dang chu dang rlung gi dang // me yi lha mo'ang 'ongs gyur te// bcu tshan tshogs
163a4: bcu de dag kun/ / kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan
163a5: zhing grags ldan rnams/ / dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// khyab 'jug lha dang gshol can lha// 'tshe ma gnyis kyang lhags par gyur// zla la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis// zla ba nyid ni mdun
163a6: du bdag nyil gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis/ nyi ma nyid kyang mdun pa dang cig char pa 'bebs par byed pa dag rgyu skar rnams kyis mdun bdar lags// thams cad bzang po rdo rje can// brgya byin khyer 'jig 'ongs gyur te// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha
163a7: dog sde tshogs ldan pa dag/ sar skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'bad pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags pa/
163a8: rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lha mo tshogs can ma dang ni// me lce'i rtse 'dra 'chi ltas can// zhib mo dang dka' zlog ma// me tog gos can 'ongs gyur cing // rgyu ba mo dang
163b1: mtshan mchings bzang / / 'chi med nam pa du ma dang // gang zhig phyogs su char 'bebs pa// 'dod lha'i dbyangs can ma yang 'ongs// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni
163b2: snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / / gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdza 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// khadog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon
163b3: par zhugs/ / sngo bsangs sngo bsangs chen mo dang // mi 'dra mi 'dra dam pa dang // rtsed mos myos dang de bzhin du// yid 'khrug ma yang 'ongs gyur cing // phag mo thag mo chen mo dang // slong ma des ma lhan cig/ lhags// bcu tshan
163b4: tshotshegs bcu de dag kun/ / kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//
163b5: kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// dkar mo rgyags byed snying rje dang // gos sngon mo yang 'ongs gyur cing // skra dkar mo las sogs pa dang // gos ser mo yang
163b6: 'ongs par gyur/ / 'phrog ma rtag tu myos pa dang // spel ma rnam pa du ma dang // dag pa dang ni 'od can ma// lha mo grags ldan rnams kyang lhags// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi
163b7: nags tshal ni/ / snang bar byas te 'bod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus
163b8: pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ / bde byed dga' ldan 'thab bral dang // nag po btab pa du ma dang // lum bi ni dang lum bi mchog/ skar ma zhes bya legs smon dang // 'phrul dga' rnams dang de bzhin du// dbang sgyur rnams kyang lhags
164a1: par gyur/ / bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags//
164a2: rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lha tshogs drug bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i
164a3: gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ / snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la
164a4: phyag 'tshal zhing / / 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong dag gi/ tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba// kun 'ged gzhon nu skar rgyal de// so sor dbang sgyur dbang phyug bcu// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de dag
164a5: dang / / lhan cig 'grogs te der lhags pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing //
164a6: 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// dbang sgyur byed pa'i 'phrog ma mo// bdog gzugs mchog ldan pa yang // bu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing // de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'ongs// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du
164a7: 'ongs/ rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ bang por bcas dang dbang ldan bcas// skye dgu'i bdag dang bcas pa yi lha rnams
164a8: dag der lhags shing / / dge slong rnams kyang der lhags so// nag pas sbas pa'i tshig la ltos// 'dod chags kyis ni 'di zung la/ bcing bgyis dang khyod la legs// 'di dag kun nas yongs bsdus la// 'di dag gson bor ma
164b1: btang zhes/ de na nag po sde po che// sde rnams la ni skul byed cig/ khros shing rang dbang med gyur nas// rang yang mngon par zhugs gyur te// lag pa sa la brdabs nas ni// shin du 'jigs pa'i sgyu byung ste// de nas lha yis sprin
164b2: phreng dang / / glog dang bcas pa'i char yang phab// sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas// de bzhin gshegs pas rnams gzigs te// de nas ston pas bstan dga' ba'i// nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag/ bdud sde mngon par
164b3: lcags gyur kyis/ / mngon par rtogs shes bka' stsal pa// brtson par byed pa de dag gis// sangs rgyas gsungs pa thos nas ni// de dag spu yang mi g.yo bas// de dag chags bral yin par rtogs// rgyal sras nyan thos de dag ni//
164b4: slob ma rnams dang lhan cig dga'// de dag g.yul las rnam rgyal zhing // 'jigs bral grags dang ldan pa yin/ bar gyi sdom ni bdun stong gser can ri mnyam dang // de bzhin gnod sbyin chu srin dang // kun gyi bshes
164b5: dang rgyal po rnams/ / de bzhin khol po gnod sbyin dang // klu dang mdab bzang lha min dang // chu lha mo dang khyab 'jug dang // tshogs can ma dang sngo sangs dang // dkar mo bde byed dbang phyug dang // kun 'ged gzhon dang 'phrog
164b6: ma dang / / dbang bcas bdud dang dge slong ngo // de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha shin du dbang che bar grags pa rnams mdo sde bstan pas yid rangs par gyur nas de'i tshe tshig 'di dag gis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo bshad do// bcom
164b7: ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang tshig 'di dag gis mdo sde 'di yang dag par bsnyad par bgyi zhing yang dag par brjod par bgyi lags so/ / de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lags so// tad ya thA/ tedz+ra te dze ba ti/ cing
164b8: dri cing tra ba ti/ la te la ta ba ti/ kha me kham pa te/ ka me k+Sha ma ba ti/ b+ha dwe b+hadra ba ti/ yaM she ya sha ba te/ dru dru ba ki/ tsa ba le tsa ba la ba ti// kha tse la tsa ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gnas gtsangs pa rnams kyi
165a1: gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams lags te/ / bcom ldan 'das gang zhig sang sde 'di dag/ gsang sngags kyi chog 'di dag rmos pa ma mchis par 'dzin par bgyid na 'den rje sring 'cha' bar du 'byung po thams
165a2: cad las bsrungs pa bgyis par 'gyur lags so/ / 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// de la bro nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so// gang du klog pa der dge bar 'gyur zhing de dag la
165a3: dgung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lags so/ / ji tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de tsam gyis dgung tshar 'babs par yang 'gyur// 'chad par yang 'gyur// dgung ser 'bab par yang 'gyur/
165a4: 'chad par yang 'gyur lags so// bro nad thams cad la byab ba gyis sam// chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te stsal na// des de'i bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas
165a5: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma bdag ma gtogs pa gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris gong ma rnams kyi rig sngags kyang 'di dag lags la// gsang sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo yang 'di dag lags so//
165a6: 'di ni 'dir mdo sde yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so// tad ya thA/ b+ha le b+ha la ma le/ dur du le/ hi me/ phupa pi se kA tsA k+Shi ku tse si/ ma mi Di She re tho ra Ni/ pa ma pi bam pho Ti ste ke/ ta ra ke/ gu ru ga ro/
165a7: gug gu mi Ti/ tA ri rak+Sha/ su tra ma nu pA la ya tha// 'di ni bdag cag gi rig sngags kyi cho ga zhi mo lags te// gdal la zhig mdo sde 'di dang grasang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma gyur par 'dzin tam/ klog
165a8: bar bgyid na de la mi dang / mi ma lags pa dag mchi bar mi 'gyur zhing gdug pa yang mi mchi// sbrul yang mi mchi// drug kyang mi mchil// de'i lus la gnod pa dag gis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so// 'byung
165b1: thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ / ji srid mtsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lags so// gang klog par bgyid pa dang / gang nyan par bgyid pa de la gung lo bdun
165b2: du srung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/ / chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te/ gtor ta ma/ 'tshal du stsal na/ de'i bro nang thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa'i bdag po
165b3: thams cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag cag gi yul yang lags te/ mdo sde 'di yongs su bzung ba'i rig sngags ni 'di lags so// tad ya TA/ lin te/ li baM/ le baM kha be/ kha she kas/
165b4: tse kA tsA k+Shi/ kA tsa pi ga le/ du ma du me/ ta Te tad tra Te/ tra nA k+Shi/ go la/ ki li/ ki ka ko li ke sA hA/ sU tra ma nu pA la ya tha/ ud gri h+NA ya tse ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde
165b5: legs par gsungs pa 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang / mnyams par bzung ste bsrung bar bgyid pa de ni thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so// 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so//
165b6: ji tsam 'tshal bar de tsam gyi dgung char 'beb par yang 'gyur 'chad par yang 'gyur// dgung ser 'bab par yang 'gyur// 'chad par yang 'gyur lags so// 'byung po dang gdon rnams las yongs su thar bar yang
165b7: 'gyur lags so/ / dug 'byin par yang 'gyur lags so// cha ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor tam 'tshal du sul na des tho nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang
165b8: brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di yang de bzhin du mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid cing // 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha gong ma rnams kyis ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyis
166a1: la/ 'og ma rnams kyis kyang legs par rjes su yi rang ba ra bgyis pa lags so// tang ya thA/ bI re bI ra ba ti/ to Te to Ta ba ti/ b+ha dre b+ha dra ba ti/ ge re go na ba ti/ me g+he me g+ha ba ti/ dz+wa la ne dz+wa la na pa ti/ d+hU ta
166a2: Tuta ba ti/ khor te khor tab te/ i dan sU tra ma nu gran+ta tha/ a nu pA la ya tha tse ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig meng sde 'di dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma gyur bar 'dzin par bgyid na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
166a3: 'byung po thams cad las srung bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ / de la mi dang mi ma lags pa 'ga' yang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags so// gang du klog pa der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung ba bgyid par 'gyur lags so// sems
166a4: can thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ / de la zil gyis gnon pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// de'i lus la bro nad rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so// sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs
166a5: par yang 'gyur lags so/ / gang du klogs par 'gyur ba der dgud lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang gdon rnams las thar bar yang 'gyur lags so// dug 'joms par yang 'gyur lags so// bro nang
166a6: thams cad sel bar yang 'gyur lags so/ / skud pa'am chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te bcings sam gtor na brond thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis
166a7: gsol pa/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rig sngags 'di yang mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin cing grub par bgyid pa lags so// rnam thos kyi bus gsol ba// tad ya thA/ ku re ku ra NI/ mo re mo ra NAM/ k+Shatse
166a8: k+Sha tsa nI/ kri mi kri ma ni/ yul 'khor srung gis gsol pa/ pu re po re pu ra tI/ ho re ho ra NI/ pra ho re pra to ra nI// 'phags skyes pos gsol pa/ ke she ke she ba ti/ ka sha ni ma ke/ sha the ti She pa ni ma ri ti/ mig mi bzang gis
166b1: gsol pa/ tsakre tsakri Ti/ tsakra ba gi Ni/ b+hi ti rirmi ni/ shi mi shi mi/ sha ma ne ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig rgyal po chen po bzhis brjod pa'i rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mos 'di bzhi dang / mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang /
166b2: ma bkol bar legs par bzung ste srung bar bgyid na/ de ji srid 'tshe'i bar du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so// de la 'byung po thams cad dang bro nad thams cad kyang slar ldog par 'gyur lags so// gdug pas zin pa dang /
166b3: dug thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur lags so// skud pa 'am/ cha ba la bzlas brjod pagyis te/ bcings sam/ gtor cing 'tshal du stsal na/ cho ga des de la 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lta
166b4: ma yin dang / drung lhas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di yang yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so// tad ya u0f7f/ ga leg ga ga le/ ga lag ni/ khi ni khi ni/ g+ha She g+hu Sh+ya g+hu g+hu Tha/ khan kha kha ne/ kha na kha
166b5: ni/ lu be lu bi/ lu ba lu bi ti/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur cing / ma bkol par bzung na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung bar 'gyur lags so// de'i bro nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar
166b6: 'gyur lags so/ / lus la dug gis mi tshugs par yang 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa mdo sde 'di'i dgongs pa yongs su bzung
166b7: ba'i slad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas lhags pa rnams kyis rig sngags dag smras lags na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar mdzad cing / kun tu
166b8: gzung ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dag legs par bshad du gsol// de ltar ni rigs kyi bu de dag gi sbyin par bgyi ba'i chos kyi mdo sde 'di 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
167a1: bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis gsang sngags kun tu bzung ba de ni grub pa yin te/ nga nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang mdo sde 'di'i grub pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dag bshad par byas// de nyon cig dang
167a2: bshad par bya'o/ / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas med chen po 'di grub par bgyi ba'i slad du bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa
167a3: dag bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di grub par bya ba'i phyir bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dag bka' stsal pa/ de la rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no// ta la ta la/ tan ta la/ ta to ta la ma te/
167a4: lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no// sa le sa sa li ti/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no// la te la te lo la te/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no// d+hu bu d+hA bu/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ka
167a5: bi ka tsi/ ka tsa bi ka tsa ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grub pa ni 'di yin no// d+ha me d+ha me/ d+ha se d+ha se/ d+ha se d+ha se/ d+ha re d+ha d+ha re/ d+ha ro d+ha di d+hi d+hi ti/ de la srungs pa ni 'di yin no/ tin ti ri tsa ri Sh+Ta/ bi ga la k+She ra k+ShakA/ mtshams
167a6: bcing ba'i ni 'di yin/ bad d+ha bad d+ho di/ bad d+ha si ri mo ti/ bad d+ha gu Sha bad d+ha/ g+hu g+hu She bad d+ha/ g+hu Sha ka She ya ma bad d+ha b+hi/ bsgrub pa ni 'di yin no// pi khe sA d+ha ya tu tu le sA d+ha ya ti/ zhag gsum myung ba byas pas
167a7: tshes bcwa lnga'i nyin par gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'dis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la bsrung b.lan brgya brjod par bya zhing // bzlas brjod lan brgya byas la/
167a8: mdud pa re re pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas na srung ba byas pa yin zhing // lan gsum spu zing zhing byed par yang 'gyur te/ sngon las gyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// zla ba yar gyi de'i tshes bcu gnyis la bcom
167b1: ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la skud pa de lag tu blangs te bzlas shing mtshams bcad par byas te/ / lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing mdung pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ mtshams gcod par byed na lan bdun spu
167b2: zing zhes byed par yang 'gyur ro/ / lho phyogs nas ce spyang mos lan gsum sgra phyung ste 'dug par gyur na/ de nas mtshams bcad par shes par bya'o// des de bzhin du smyung ba byas te/ tshes bcwa lnga'i nyin par
167b3: khrus byas la/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ skud pa blangs la/ nyan thos kyi tshig rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi cho gzhib mos lan bdun bzlas te/ mas yod lan ma cang brjod cing mang dpabargyargya brgya byas pa/ srung ba
167b4: lag du blangs te/ rig sngags thams cad lan cig bzlas brjod byas shing sgrub pa byas na/ char pa chen po dang / rlung chen po yang 'byung ste/ mtshams kyi phyi rol du ldang zhing 'bab par 'gyur la/ skad cig
167b5: gis 'chad par yang 'gyur te/ lan bdun gyi bar du yang brjod par bya'o// de nas lha'i bu sprin chen zhes bya ba dang / sprin bzang shes bya ba gnyis 'ongs te/ de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing grub pa
167b6: sbyin pa dang / rjes su yi rang bar yang 'gyur ro// de la grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/ ku tsu ku tsa zhes bya'o// sprin bzad kyi ni 'di yin te/ ka ra ka ra kA ra ra zhes bya'o// tshig 'di dag dang skud pa lag tu blangs pas mdo
167b7: sngo dang / gsang sngags rnams bsams na gang bya bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dang / rig sngags 'di dag thams cad kyis chu 'am sdud pa la bzlas na gang byed par
167b8: mi 'gyur ba de med de/ / las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag dang / gzhan dag bsrung ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di gzung bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
168a1: dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur cing // sa dang par snang dag la 'khod pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag/
168a2: tra byams byed cing // nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba/ rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / pra dz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba~M ban de ye shes rje
168a3: la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / rgya gar skad du/ A TA nA nI ya ma sU tAn nA ma ma hA su tra ma/ bod skad du/ mdo chen po kun tu chub dang / kun tu chub ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba/
168a4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam
168a5: thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag dum dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang /
168a6: bcom ldan 'das gal ba der songs phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mabyas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad
168a7: snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs cas// tho rngan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ rgya rnams kyis
168a8: nidam la/ chen khyodas byan tsham lo// sa ma N+Das ga dag das pa dang / dgang byang dang mabyon pa// thams cad yin padag phyag 'tshal// khyod pa yang dag ni rgyabs sum chis// brgyan pa bcom ldan das kyi
168b1: thos kyi dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dang / nags mdab dag dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de la gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa
168b2: gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das
168b3: kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin tu nyung la gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun
168b4: pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma nams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa
168b5: gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang /
168b6: sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing / kun chub par bgyid na legs so// legs so zhes gsol/ ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bas
168b7: gnang bar mdzad do/ / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar can
168b8: du chu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ / rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to// skye bo gang dag gtod phod cing / phra ma ma mchi ser sna bral/ gang dag
169a1: sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pas/ / mi de rnams kyi rnyed pa lags/ gang gi 'char la brten nas ni/ des na nyin mor brjod pa yi// nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdugs gang 'char 'gyur ba yi// phyogs de mngon
169a2: par sbyor bgyid pa/ rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig du// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // dri za rnams kyi
169a3: mdun gyis bltas/ / de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag
169a4: rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ / sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// me yi phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la
169a5: dge bas gzigs su gsol/ / khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ gau ta ma rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan
169a6: pa/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi// de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyod bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na yi dgas zhes bgyi ba// rgyab kyi sha
169a7: 'tshal phra ma can/ / srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa// 'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i// phyogs te mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes
169a8: bgyi/ de ni nye du lhan cig du// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // grul bu ma rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mad mchis te/ brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun
169b1: grags pa ni/ / dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la
169b2: 'drad/ / skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang
169b3: thos/ de slong bdag ni 'di skad ces/ 'dren brgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ gau ta ma rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi// de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni// bzang ba
169b4: lags shes skye bo mchi/ / phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen gragra dang ldan pa lags/ gang zhig nub pa kho na las// des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi// nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdug gang du nub 'gyur
169b5: pa/ de na mtsho chen zab mo ni// shin du 'da' bar dka' ba ste// de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes// skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi// phyogs de mngon par skyod bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/
169b6: ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing // klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis ltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig/
169b7: de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thab lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i mnyan mthong nas// skyes bu
169b8: cang shes khyod la 'dud/ / skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ga de skad yang dang
170a1: yang du thos/ / de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ gau ta ma rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tsho la mchi// de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni/
170a2: bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid cing // rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan// dga' zhing lhun chen lha mdzes dang // gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni// brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing //
170a3: de dag mi mo mi 'debs la// gshol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing // tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang // nges par yongs su spyod bgyid cing // zas su sa lu kha dog dang / dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang // dri gda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing / lha yi
170a4: bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal/ / na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas// tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod ming // gang na me lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i// sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni//
170a5: gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang
170a6: mchis te/ / brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyi si rdzogs sangs rgyas//
170a7: sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la
170a8: mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ / de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ gau ta ma rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi//
170b1: de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyod bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs
170b2: na ni mig mi bzang / / byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs bzhi dag ni sbyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa// gnod
170b3: sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/ / de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing // phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par chu// de dag ni chibs rta dang // rnga mo dang khu mchog dang ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang /
170b4: gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so// glang po che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lag so// chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug
170b5: dang sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che'i// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams
170b6: bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni/ / phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag ni grong khyer dag/ sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis// 'di lta ste/ kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang // gar bcas
170b7: ma ster kun tu rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi ba dag lags so// byang phyogs na mtsho ka bi bad ka zhes bgyi ba yang mchis lags so// nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang // gos can dang / gos
170b8: mchog can dang / pad ma can dang / pad ma bzang po can dang // sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lags so// chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa/ 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te// chab rgyun tha dad de las byung / de las
171a1: dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/ / btsun pa grong khyer u sha ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na// lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang // de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can// rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang // bar snang mkha' bya lngar gdal/
171a2: btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol byang phyogs na mdun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te// der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so// rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs dang / 'jigs rung lto spu can dag mchis/ de ni ljon
171a3: shing 'bras bu rtag/ rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang / khu thug sgra skad chen po dang / shang shang de'u dag sgra 'byin cing // rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag kyang // go'u kum b+ha dang chun lag dang // bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing // me tog sbrang rtsi'i rol
171a4: dga'/ lus ngan po de glu gar gyis// pad ma can dang lhan cig rtse// btsun pa grong khyer lcang lon can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud da mchis lagraso// bdag gi na mchis pa'i mdun sa de ni khyu mchog can
171a5: zhes bgyi ba ste/ / bdag gi ming ni nam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad ya thA/ i li mi li i li mi li/ kir Ti mA le/ hi li kid Ti mU le/ hu du me/ hu dur du me/ gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/
171a6: godo ha ni/ oM ke mo ke swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri na chen po rnams dang // dri za'i snga dpon rnams dang // dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ 'dod myos dga'
171a7: bas myos pa dang / glu yis myos pa spun dang ni// phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos// me tog myos pa spun rnams dang // rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos// nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang // ud pal pad ma zla ba dang /
171a8: lnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sla// tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang // gser skyod bu mo gser can dang // pa bsangs dang phur bu dag/ 'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags// de dag bdag gi spyan lags te// de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 'tshel/
171b1: drizi 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i driHyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin// de yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas/
171b2: del gas sngags kyi cigani 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ kun tu le/ kun tu la/ kun tu le kun tu le/ e ti/ e tI/ sa dA mad ti ki/ sar+b+ba Sh+Ta Na Ti ni ke/ tiSh+Tha rub+ha bad d+ho sa sA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngas
171b3: dge slong ma'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du sgrub dang / kun tu rgyub ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don
171b4: par bgyis pa dril/ gal te dri za 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri za rgan po 'am/ dri za rgan mo 'am/ dri za'i bu po 'am/ dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor po 'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug
171b5: ma'atshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la// dri za rnams kyis dri zi 'dra ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /
171b6: rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
171b7: bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ / rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyi dpa de la/ gal te sha za ba'am/ shan
171b8: mo'am sha za rgan po'am/ sha rba rgan mo'am/ sha za'i bu pho 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor po 'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhi
172a1: grags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchis zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi gnas la/ sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i po
172a2: brang wang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ / de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad ya thA/ hu me hu me/ tu ma le/ hA mi la bA ti ya swAH/
172a3: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis grul bum rnams dang / grul bum chen po rnams dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byin kri mi sha/
172a4: rtsi bi lobs che dang gsus po che/ lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu/ g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang / sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang / rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrogs/ ral pa can dang stobs bcu da// srid srub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi/ 'jog
172a5: po dang ni bya ba snyed/ / la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang / tshon kun dang ni mig bkra bo// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag phul bum 'di ni bdag la 'che'o// grul bum 'di ni bdag mi
172a6: gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ / bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang / bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis/ legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin de mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas/ de la gas
172a7: sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ / tad ya thA/ si kro bi si re se kri se re kriSh+Tha tshag le/ ka rA Te/ bing ga laM swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu
172a8: rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / mug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid tu cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te grul bum 'am/ grul bum mo 'am/
172b1: grul bum rgan po 'am/ grul bum rgan mo'am// gul bum gyi bu bo 'am/ gul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor po 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ gul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe/
172b2: bar bgyid pa glags lha zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig/ nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ grul bum rnams kyi gul bum 'dra ba'i nang du mchir mi chung cing / rgyal po'i
172b3: pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dag pa bzhin tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mgang
172b4: la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'dron par bgyid pa de la/ gal te yi dwags sam/
172b5: yi dgas mo 'am/ yi dgas rgan po'am/ yi dgas rgan mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi bu pho dang / yi dgas kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor po 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi mdag gzhug pa 'am/ yi dgas kyi
172b6: mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ yi dgas rnams kyi yi dgas 'du ba'i nang du
172b7: mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ yu me yu me/
172b8: yu me le yu mi la/ bA ti ye sAhA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang / klu chen po rnams dang / klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ dga' dang nye dga'
173a1: kun dga' dang / nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang / ser po dang ni zhon dang / dbang po lag dang bkra shis dang / mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/ rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag/ ngos yangs po dang ros bkra dang / yangs pa
173a2: can dang bkra 'a dud rgyal/ ga de ngas ka tshe dang skar dga' dang / nag po che dang lag 'gro dang / ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang / g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang / sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni/ 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/
173a3: de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tsho ba'i klu dag dang / bdag mi gtor ba'i klu rnams kyis// legs par
173a4: smras pa 'di thos na/ / ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ de la gsar sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ tsi le bi tsa li/ tsi li bi tsi le/ go ri ga na d+ha ri/ ma tang gi/ tsa na Ta li sA tA// btsun pa
173a5: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal
173a6: bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te klu'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgan po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i bu bo 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor po 'am/ klu'i 'khor mo 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug pa'am/
173a7: klu'i mngag gzhug pa mtshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la zhig nye bar 'chi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi snyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyi klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i tshe
173a8: zang lcar lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gdal la/
173b1: kun du rgyu ba dang / kun du rgyub ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te lus srul po 'am/ lus
173b2: sul mo mo'am/ lus sul rgan po 'am/ lus srul rgan mo 'am/ lus srul po'i bu po 'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor po 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ lus
173b3: srul po'i mdag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'gred dam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i
173b4: nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i po brar lcar lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ a be ba ha na ti ye sA
173b5: swa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang // gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang // dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste// dbang po zla ba chu lga dang /
173b6: b+ha ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag/ dbang ldan can dan 'dod gtso dang / mgri ni ngan dang ni mgul des dang / stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang / sgra rab dang ni nyer lnga dang / ri mnyam gser can gang po dang / sed lden pa dang g.yon can dang / gnod sbyin
173b7: bskyor 'brog gnas dang / rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rtul po// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang // tshig lngas po yid dga' dang // gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas// 'bras bu gsum pa mgul gsum pa// 'gro
173b8: gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ de dag ni bdag gi spyan lags te de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la bdag go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang
174a1: bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis/ / legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin/ de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas/ de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ he le mi le/ hi li mi le/ kIr ti mU/
174a2: le/ ti li kI ti mU le/ oM dus be tu ma be/ oM tu ma be ku mabe/ oM g+he mo g+ha/ go te te/ bA di g+ha re/ ri ri sad ta ma swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam// dag bsnyen ma gang lal dran
174a3: du rgyu ba dang kun du chub ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug sa nad pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba/ 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la// gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo'am
174a4: gnod sbyin rgan po 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu po 'am/ gnod sbyin bu mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor po'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa'am// gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe
174a5: bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar bgred ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mcher mi chud cing rgyal po'i
174a6: bo brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mgar
174a7: la la kun du zla ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ / rig sngags dang / sung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te srin po'am/
174a8: srin mo'ar// srin po rgan po 'am srin po rgan mo 'am/ srin po'i bu po 'am/ srin po'i bu mo 'am/ srin po'i'akhor po 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug pa lam/ srin po'i ma ngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid
174b1: pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas ni ma yin/ srin po rnams kyi srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho
174b2: brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ tu lu hu lu/ yu ma yu me le/ yu mi
174b3: la bA ti ye swA hA/ / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar
174b4: 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtso la gdan
174b5: bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma dang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang /
174b6: g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa/ nam sros pa dang / ngag la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas ra'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig du 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal po
174b7: chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kho dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chol thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// /
174b8: rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa// lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal// dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang // da ltar byung dang ma byon pa// thams cad la ni bdag
175a1: phyag 'tshal/ / khyod la'ang bdag ni skyabs su mchi// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam// dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang / nags mdab
175a2: ngab dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de na gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang // mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang
175a3: mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdub pa gnyug mar gnas pa
175a4: gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di
175a5: ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dang
175a6: pa rnams kyang sbar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun
175a7: chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol pa dang / dge slong dag ngas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bul cang ma gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do// de nas rgyal chen po rnam thos kyi bus ngas cad mi gsung bas gnang bar rig
175a8: nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ nga'i spyan sngar kun du rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyub ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to// skye bo gang /
175b1: ngag gtong phod cing // phra ma mi mchi ser sna bral// gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa// mi de rnams kyis rnyed pa lags// gang gi 'char la brten nas ni// des na nyin mor brjod pa yi/ nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can//
175b2: nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/ de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis
175b3: rtag tu rtse/ / dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // dri za rnams kyis bdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang
175b4: lha min g.yul 'gyed la/ kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shas khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yi
175b5: phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag
175b6: 'tshol cig/ go ta ma rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tsho la mchi// de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par sbyor bgyid
175b7: pa/ / rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gangan yi dgas zhes bgyi ba// rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can// srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa// 'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ rgyal chen grags
