175b8: dang ldan pa ni/ / grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/ de ni nye du lhan cig tu// gru dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // grul bum rnams kyi mdun gyis bltas
176a1: de la bu ni meng mchis te/ / brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thu na grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams//
176a2: kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i mnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la
176a3: dge bas gzigs su gsol/ / khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de skad bdag ni 'di gad ces// dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/ gau ta ma rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan
176a4: mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mchi/ / de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni// bzang po lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang zhig nub pa kho na las// des na
176a5: mtshan mor brjod pa yi/ / nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdugs gang du chub 'gyur ba// de na mtsho chen zab mo 'di// shin tu 'da' bar dka ba ste// de ni chu mngon rgya mtsho zhes// skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi// phyogs
176a6: de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ / rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing // klu rnams kyis
176a7: ni mdun gyis bltas/ / de la bu ni ma mchis te// brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes gyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyi mi thub lags// de dag rnams
176a8: kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ / sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la
176b1: dag bas gzigs su gsol/ / khyod la mi mini phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren byal la phyag batshal cig/ gto rgyal la phyag 'tho cig/ sangs tus da dang bas ldan pa// myang na bdang
176b2: la phyag 'tshol mchi/ / de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchis// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan// dga' zhing lhun
176b3: chen blta mdzes dang / / gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni// brgya phrag bcu pa skyes 'gyur zhing // de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la// gshol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing // tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang // nges par yongs su spyod/
176b4: bgyid cing // zas su sa lu kha dog dang / dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang / dri gda'i me tog tshegs 'dra zhing // lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal// na li ker bskol bgyis na// tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min// gang na me lce rtse 'dra
176b5: ba'i/ / sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi// phyogs de mngon par skyod bgyis pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar
176b6: gyis rtag tu rtse/ / gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bkyi
176b7: stobs po che/ / lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog
176b8: khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ / mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos/ de slad
177a1: bdag ni 'di skad ces/ / 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tsho la mchi// de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni// bzang ba
177a2: lags shes skye bo mchi/ / phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// rub phyogs na ne mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus
177a3: ngan po/ / rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/ de dag
177a4: glang po che 'tshal zhing / / phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu// de dag ni chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing
177a5: phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ / glang po che gcig gis shing rta grangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so// chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud
177a6: med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon ma gcig gis shing rta grangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams// bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong
177a7: bar bgyid/ / rgyal po dag ni grong khyer dag/ sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/ 'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa steng kun du rgyu ba dang // sbubs can dang / grong
177a8: khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi ba dag lags so/ / byang phyogs na mcho ka bi bad ka zhes bgyi ba dag mchis lags so// nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gser ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog can dang / pad ma can dang / pad ma bzang
177b1: po can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag mchi lags so// chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa// 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te// cha ba rkun tha dad de las 'byung // de las dgung char 'bab par gyur// btsun pa grong khyer
177b2: sha ri'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/ lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang / de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can/ rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang // bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'// btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol byang
177b3: phyogs na mdun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba yang mchis te/ der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so// rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs dang / 'jigs rung lto spu can dag mchis// de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag/ rma bya khrung khud
177b4: sgra snyan dang / khru byug sgra skad chen po dang // shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing // rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang // kau ku ma b+ha dang chun lag dang // bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing // me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'// lus ngan po de gu
177b5: gar gyis/ / pad ma can dang lhan cig rtse// btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis lags so// bdag gang na mchis pa'i mdun sa de ni khyu mchog can zhes
177b6: bgyi ste/ bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ i li mi li i li mi li/ kid Ti mU le/ hi li king Ti mU le/ hu du me/ hu du du me/ go ri/ gan d+ha ri go do
177b7: ha ni/ oM ke mo ke swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gi dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams dang / dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste 'dod
177b8: myos dga' bas myos pa dang / / klu yis myos pa pun dang ni/ phreng bas myos dang sbrad rtsis myos// me tog myos pa spun rnams dang // rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos// nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang // ud pa la zla ba pad ma dang // lnga 'dzin
178a1: dang ni khu byug sgra/ / tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang // gser spyod bu mo gser can dang // ba ba sangs dang phur bu dag/ 'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te// de dag la bdag dri za 'di bdag la
178a2: 'tshe'o/ / dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bor bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang // bdag mi gtong pa'i dri za yis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na// ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du
178a3: 'gas/ de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ kun du le/ kun du le/ kun tu le/ kun tu le/ e hi e hi/ sa dA mad ti ni ka/ sa dA b+ha Na TI ni ke/ tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bad d+ho si swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag/
178a4: slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing
178a5: 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te dri za 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri za rgan po 'am/ dri za rgan mo'am/ dri za'i bu pho 'am/ dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor po 'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe
178a6: bar bgyid pa/ glags la zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing // nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams kyi dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lung
178a7: lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyub dang /
178a8: kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgan po 'am/ shaza
178b1: rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i bu pho 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor po 'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'che bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchis
178b2: zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing // gnas mi rnyed la/ sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo a pa'i dog pa bzhin tshal
178b3: pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ / de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ hu me hu me/ hA mi le/ tra mi la bA ti ye swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis grul bum rnams dang / gul bum chen po
178b4: rnams dang / grul bum gyi snga dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste byin dang nye byin kri mi sha/ rtsib logs che dang gsus po che// lag bcu dang ni sa la chu// g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang
178b5: sprin mdog dang ni dra meng dang / / rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrogs// ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang // srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi// 'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed// la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang // tshon kun dang ni mig bkra po// 'gro gnas
178b6: ji snyed mchis pa lags/ / de dag bdag gi dbun lags te/ de dag la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'tsho'o// grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang / bdag
178b7: mi gtong ba'i grul bum dang / legs par smras pa 'di thos nas/ ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// de gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ si re bi si re/ si re bi si re/ si re bi sa re/ kri
178b8: tshag le/ kaR+Sha TaM/ ping ga le swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam// dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang /
179a1: srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te grul bu ma 'am/ grul bum mo 'am/ grul bu ma rgan po 'am/ grul bum rgan mo 'am// grul bum gyi
179a2: bu po 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor po'am// grum bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol pa la la zhig nye bar mchi/
179a3: zhing / nye bar 'grer ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ zul bum rnams kyi grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog/
179a4: pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo// rig sngags
179a5: dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te yi dgas sam/ yi dgas mo 'am/ yi dgas rgan po 'am/ yi dgas rgan mo'am// yi dgas kyi
179a6: bu pho mal/ yi dgas kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor pho 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye tha
179a7: mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ yi dgas rnams kyi yi dgas 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste// de'i mgo ardza ki'i
179a8: dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ / de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ yu me yu me/ yu mi le/ yu mi la bA ti ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang / klu chen po/
179b1: rnams dang / klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ dga' dang nyer dga' kun dga' dang / nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang // ser po dang ni zhon dang / dbang po'i lag dang bkra shis dang / mya ngan
179b2: med dang mya ngan bral/ / rab grol dang ni rgyal po'i bdag/ ngos yangs po dang ngo bkra dang // yangs pa can dang ba kra gdung rgyal// gdengs ka che dang skar dga' dang // nag po che dang lag 'gro dang // ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang // g.yon phyogs de bzhin
179b3: nag po dang / / sngo sangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te// de dag la bdag klu dang ni bdag la 'tshe'o// klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo // zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyi
179b4: lags so/ / bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na// a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+yab/
179b5: tsi le bi tsi le/ tsi le bi tsi li/ gau re/ gan d+ha ri/ ma tang gi/ tsa Na Ta li swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge snyan ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags
179b6: pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par rabagyid pa de la gal te klu'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgan po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i bu pho
179b7: 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor pho 'am/ klu'i 'khor mo 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug ma'i'atshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags 'tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar
179b8: mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyi klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du
180a1: 'gas lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/
180a2: rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pade lag te lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ lus srul rgan po'am/ lus
180a3: srul rgan mo 'am/ lus srul po'i bu po 'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor po 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po'i mdag gzhug pa 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe
180a4: bar bgyid pa can glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la// lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir
180a5: mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ a be ba
180a6: han ti ye swA hA/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyid lags
180a7: so/ / 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / b+ha ra dra tsa skyes dgu'i bdag dbang ldan can ldan 'dod gcong nga / mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang / stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang / sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang / ri mnyam gser can
180a8: gang po dang / / seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang // gnod sbyin pa skyong 'brog gnas dang / rgyal ba khyu mchog ma'i rgyal po// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang / tshig sde ser po yid dga' dang /
180b1: gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas// 'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi sman lags te// de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'che'o// gnod sbyin 'di dag
180b2: ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ / bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na// a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin/ de'i mgo tsha la ba bdun
180b3: du 'gas/ / de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi le/ kIr ti mU le/ hi le kIr ti mA le/ oM tum be tum po/ oM tum be tum be/ oM g+ho mo g+he/ go de he/ b+h+ri g+ha re/ ri Shi sad ta me swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan
180b4: 'das kyi dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid
180b5: rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan po 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor lo
180b6: 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par
180b7: gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nad du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste// de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal ba bdun du 'gas
180b8: lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa
181a1: rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te srin po 'am/ srin mo 'am/ srin po rgan po 'am/ srin po rgan mo 'am/ srin po'i bu pho'am/ srin po'i bu mo 'am
181a2: srin po'i 'khor po 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par
181a3: gyur na/ / glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi snyed la/ srin po rnams kyi srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal ba bdun du dgas lag so// de la
181a4: gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ / tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ yu me yu mi li/ yu mi la bA ti ye swA hA// zhes rgya cher smras nas/ nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// dge slong dag khyed kyis
181a5: 'di ltar bdag nyid srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi ma yin pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas par mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bya ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang
181a6: phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ / rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid long shog/ zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ bcom
181a7: ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rang te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bar sdom ni/ i/ kra/ hu/ si/ yu/ tsi/ A/ hi/ hi// gsang sngags kyi tshig rnam pa dgu smos pa dang go rims bzhin du
181a8: sbyang / / seng chen po kun du rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgyag kyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / pra dz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
181b1: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha/ bod skang du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye
181b2: dga'i gnas na nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/ klu'i//
181b3: rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' dang / rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / gzi can dang / chu lha dang / 'jog po dang / yul 'khor bsrung dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / sa srung gi bu dang / mdongs bu dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid
181b4: dang / dpal bzangs dang / glog gi phreng ba dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / gtsug na nor bu thogs dang / snang ldan gtsug phud can dang / gtsug phud 'ja' can dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong dang / 'dzam
181b5: bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis ldan dang / dkyil 'khor chen po can dang / lag gis 'gro chen po dang / skar mdog dang / zla ba'i gzi brjid dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang / zla mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / shin du brtan pa dang /
181b6: mgul na nor bu dang sprin byung dang / char rgyun dang / rab 'joms dang / rnam par 'joms dang / mthu bsgyings dang / gdengs ka chen po dang / dbyangs za ba dang / klu'i rgyal po cher sgrogs dang / rnam par sgra 'byin dang / ud pa la dang / rtsal
181b7: chen dang / gshol mda' 'dzin dang / sna tshogs sde dang / zhags pa chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang / kun du snang dang / rna rtsub dang / dung dang / dar dar dang / klu'i rgyal po u ba dang dang dang / bde byed dang / lag 'gro dang / lag
181b8: 'gro chen po dang / dri ma chen po dang / 'phur lding dang / sog ma med dang / 'phyang ba dang / srin bu gnas dang / nag po dang / glu'i rgyal po dbang sde dang / 'dam bu dang / nye ba'i 'dam bu dang / dud thogs dang / 'gro ldang dang / rab mdzes dang /
182a1: glang chen sna dang / rnon po dang / ser skya dang / glog 'bar dang / glog 'od chen po dang / stobs lha dang / chu stobs dang / klu'i rgyal po dam pa 'gebs dang / bdud rtsi can dang / mu stegs can dang / bai dUr+ya'i 'od can dang / gser mdog sgra
182a2: dang / gser 'od dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang / nyi 'od dang / 'char ba dang / bal glang mgo dang / klu'i rgyal dkar po dang / nag po dang / gshin rje dang / dge tshul dang / sbal ba dang / dang pa'i gzi brjid dang / mu khyud 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang /
182a3: mgo stong can dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong dang / sprin chen dang / sde bzangs dang / sa skyong dang / mis byin dang / rnam par dul dang / dga' ba 'byung dang / chu srin kum b+hi ra'i gdong dang / dug 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po myur
182a4: gdug dang / pad ma ka dang / mjug ma dang / rab 'phyang dang / 'jigs byed dang / gzi brjid mdzes dang / mgo lnga po dang / ba la li ra dang / shing rtas rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang / klu'i rgyal po mjug rings dang / mgo bo che dang /
182a5: bi ma bi ka dang / bi ta ra dang / mgyogs 'gro dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang / klu sde dang / gzi chen dang / 'dam bu byin dang / klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang / 'od 'bar dang / mgo bdun pa dang / sdong chen dang / mthong dga' dang /
182a6: rab tu cher gtum dang / dri med gzi brjid dang / mig bzangs dang / drag po chen po dang / 'od 'phro phung po dang / klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang / khro bo drag shul can dang / rin chen chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin sprin chen po dang / dbang po'i
182a7: 'od dang / rkang pas 'thung dang / sprin zla dang / rgya mtsho'i sprin dang / me tog dri chen dang / ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang / klu'i rgyal por rini chen mig dang / tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang / sprin chen snying po dang // khab can dang / dpal
182a8: gyi snying po dang / sprin mthu can dang / mtshan mo 'dzin dang / chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid me 'dra dang / sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / khro med dang / sa'i bum pa dang / klu dpal dang / chu 'dzin dang /
182b1: sprin gdugs dang / ing gi ra'i gdong dang / gzi brjid can dang / sprin las mngon byung dang / klu'i rgyal po gom stabs mtha' yas dang / cha byad mdzes dang / lus chen dang / spyad lto dang / zhi ba dang / dpa' bo dang / gser dang tsan dan
182b2: mchog du brtson dang / gdug can dang / dbyangs snyan dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi snying po dang / rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang / rnam par g.yo dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga sgra dang / bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang / dga' bar byed pa dang /
182b3: 'brug sgrogs dang / dpa' sde dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgya mtsho'i klong dang / klu'i rgyal po yon po dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa kru bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag 'dus te 'khod pa dang /
182b4: zabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas pa te stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lta nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
182b5: su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bla ma la gus pa dang / phu dud chen po byed pas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi lnga
182b6: lnga dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / phag rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i lda ldi dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / klu'i me tog dang / mu tig gi dra ba mchog du mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu
182b7: med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig du 'dug nas smon lam btab pa/ lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra
182b8: rab kyi rdul snyed kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho thams cad dang / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi
183a1: rdzu rnams dang / gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ grangs med
183a2: dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang / lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun du mngon par phyogs pa dpag tu med/
183a3: grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi cha re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi bzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpar
183a4: thams cad la mchod pa bya'o snyam pa 'di lta ste/ kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du
183a5: khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / 'od zer stug po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
183a6: 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba dang me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / phye ma dang / shing ljon
183a7: ba thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu ston pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra thams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad
183a8: kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho dpag du med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/
183b1: gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// tha mar bya'o// mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// yul thams cad du bkod pa
183b2: rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang bya'o//
183b3: tha mar bya'o// rir mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// thams cad kun du snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i char 'bab pa bkod pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad 'od 'gro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa sangs rgyas
183b4: la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu smras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis
183b5: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sdang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres rnams su bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od 'gro ba sgonams
183b6: yul thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtshasbyin
183b7: rnams dang / rin po chesna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par snang bar byed pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sbyin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brnabs te
183b8: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsha thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// tha mar phyo'o// sa phyag sa kyog gi mo dang / spos dang / matog rna tshogs pas sa pe lang pa bcags pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho snyi rnams dang /
184a1: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya ma
184a2: sprin rnams dang / mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par sbas pa'i khang pa rtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po'i che'i phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan pa'i
184a3: khang pa brtsegs pargya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs bcu kun du 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa rtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin
184a4: rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyis rab tu brgyan pa bkod pa du ma kun du ston pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i / zhab brtsegs brgya
184a5: mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgo kun du me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba sbyangs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du shes par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang
184a6: bya'o/ / bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// gser dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshor tshong dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi ming ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog snang ba ltar sna tshogs
184a7: kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sbyin rnams dang / an da rnyig dang / 'dzam bu chu bo gser gyi bad ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i ston ma'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi sang ga
184a8: khrirgya mtsho sman rnams dang / nor bu rin po che skad gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri ny+tsa
184b1: mtsho sprin rnams dang / an da rnyil mdzes par 'bar ba'i 'od zer ldan gyi pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rtse mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od zer 'bar ba zad mi shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad pa'i snying po can gyis
184b2: ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba thams cad byung ba'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi se ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad byung ba'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng gos
184b3: waM rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs
184b4: rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// spos dang / nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo lo ma
184b5: las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun du ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin
184b6: rab tu 'phyang ba'i shing ljon pa lta bu rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sbyin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khod rnam par snang bar
184b7: byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsan dan thams cad kyi bye mar kun du ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab
184b8: pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbya kun tu tor ba'i shing ljon
185a1: ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun du mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi
185a2: seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i phreng ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i
185a3: khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / me tog dang / pad ma thams cad kyi phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgyamatsho
185a4: sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan bkod pa kun du ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi phreng ba rab tu sbyangs pa'i rta bapas stegs
185a5: bus rab tu brgyan pa rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i yal gdang phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin
185a6: rnams dang / spos sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kun nas rgyan nyi ma snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs
185a7: te/ sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtsho sprin
185a8: rnams dang / an rnyil gyi ze ba can gyi me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi tha bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi blar
185b1: rgya mtsha sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla re rgya mtsho spen rnams dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa thamams cad snang ba kun du ston pa'i bla rgya
185b2: mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / pad ma 'bar ba la
185b3: dog mtha' yas pa/ sna tshogs su snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi pad ma'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gser gyi dra ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa bsam gyis
185b4: mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho sprin rgya mtsho
185b5: thams cad la sti stang du bya'o/ / bla mar bya'o// ri mer bya'o// mchod par bya'o// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs la/ rin po
185b6: che bcu'i 'od snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje la
185b7: sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i phreng ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i rdul kun du snang bas rab tu rgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba sbyangs pa'i
185b8: gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu thams cad kyi sdong po yal ga'i brgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams
186a1: cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par bgedas pa'i gags rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po snang bar byed pa kun du bkod pa rgyas par
186a2: 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams can la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil
186a3: 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
186a4: rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas
186a5: sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bai dUr+ya dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil
186a6: 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sems can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad cig la kun du ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra
186a7: rab tu 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /
186a8: byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad pa sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg gyi'i
186b1: 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po tshe thams cad kyi 'od lo rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sgrogs pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi ning bkod pa thams cad sdang
186b2: bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sbrani rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa
186b3: thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa sgrogs pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che mi zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams
186b4: dang / khri stan bkod pa thams cad kun tu ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o//
186b5: rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i
186b6: 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / / spros thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba ma rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin
186b7: rnams dang / rin po chen tshogs kyi shing gi zi ba'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'tho brgya
186b8: mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig gi smon ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o//
187a1: mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho sbyin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi pad mo'i dra ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin chen la dog
187a2: mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che dang / spos dang / tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma rgya mtsho snga ni rnams dang /
187a3: rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing sdugs mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i
187a4: mdzod mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / thams cad kun tu bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o//
187a5: bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang
187a6: nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/ / de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog gi smon lam gyi stobs can g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po
187a7: zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ongs so// de nas klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i bzi brjid kyi
187a8: dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig du gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
187b1: btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
187b2: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs
187b3: lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / klu'i bdag po ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la klu'i bdag
187b4: po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi rjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur//
187b5: bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur// rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad 'khrung bar 'gyur// /
187b6: 'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur// bcud thams cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur// gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po
187b7: g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs
187b8: pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legaso legs so/ / klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// klu'i bdag po chos gcig dang ldan na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug sngal
188a1: rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa'o// klu'i bdag po byams pa de la gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams ni mes mi tshig mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chus mi
188a2: khyer/ dug gis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis zil gyis mi non/ bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur// bde bar sad par 'gyur/ rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur/ bsod nams chen pos gzi brjid
188a3: gyis gzi can du 'gyur/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ 'gro ba thams cad du thags thogs med par 'gyur/ sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun 'chad pa dang / rab tu dga' bar//
188a4: 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / mi'i chos bla ma rtogs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po lha dang mi byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phan yon 'di dag go// klu'i bdag po
188a5: de bas na byams pa'i lus kyi las dang / byams pa'i ngag gi las dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis gnas par bya'o// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ des klu thams cad kyi
188a6: klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgun gcod par byed/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed de/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed/ rtswa dang / shing gal ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / le tog thams cad skye
188a7: bar byed do/ / klu'i bdag po de la bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gang zhe na// tad+ya thA/ d+hA ra NI d+hA ra NI/ ud tA ra ni/ sa ma pra tiSh+Thi ti/ bi dza ya ba ra NA/ sat+ya pra tid nya sar ta/ dz+nyA na ba ti ud de bA da ni bi nA ma ni/ a b+hi she
188a8: tsa ne/ a b+hi bA tA ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ a dzi ma tu/ e hau ku ma tha la ni/ ba ha tA rakle shA na/ d+hu na pA ba ma/ sho d+ha ya ma rbA na/ nir ti ka/ d+harma ta shud d+ha/ lo ka bi ti mi ra ra tsa se/ duHkha sha ma na sarba bud d+ha a ba lo ki na a d+hiSh+NI ti/ pradz+nyA
188b1: dz+nyAn b+he swA hA/ / klu'i bdag po gzungs kyi tshig don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ chos kyi skul 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya/ brjod par bya'o// klu'i
188b2: bdag po gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying po sprul pa snang bar byed pa/ ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa/ gser gyi 'od zer rnam par
188b3: snang bar byedapa/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang / rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan gzung bar bya/ yid la bya'o// de dag gis klu thams cad dang / klu'i rigs thams cad dang / klu'i rus thams
188b4: cad dang / klu'i tshe rigs thams cad dang / klu'i 'byung ba thams cad dang / klu'i skye gnas thams cad dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / klu'i bu mo thams cad dang / klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun
188b5: gcod par byed pa/ / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed do// klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad snying po can gyi sprin
188b6: chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba'i sprin gyis rnam par mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
188b7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'brung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klung gi dkyil
188b8: 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog 'bar
189a1: pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo//
189a2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag
189a3: 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ched/ dgas pa phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bal
189a4: sdug sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung bI snang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs
189a5: bcu mtho 'gebs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab tu sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bsil 'byung mi dga' rab 'joms sgra zab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
189a6: de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdaga'i chu sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal gyi sprin ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo//
189a7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen kun du ston la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rgya chen la phyag 'tshal lo/
189a8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar 'phags
189b1: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin lta bu'i na bza' banabs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyis lo tog bskyed la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
189b2: gshegs pa sprin gyi gnas la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char gyi sprin ts+lismin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'du bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo//
189b3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs sgra ni chen yud pal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen spos kyi skul phyag
189b4: 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin
189b5: chen 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen byin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i sprin lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
189b6: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu bo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud la
189b7: phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang lce 'bab pa rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po ltar nam mkha' mtho nas
189b8: bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen chang bu skyes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
190a1: 'das bzhan gshegs pa snyoms pa gas brjid sgru sman la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'as bzhin gshegs par gro drug dang ldan pa'i chuchen pa'i sman la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan dang /
190a2: de bzhin gshegs pa chu thor srin chen la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin chen gyi mtsha gangs la myag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gagags pa rang mi'i bab pan byin sa
190a3: kun du 'gabs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gzugs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
190a4: rgyas sprin chen po thams cad rnam par sgrub pa mdzam bu'i sprin gyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od mdzad pa sprin gyi 'od zer can rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ / klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas klu thams
190a5: cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char ba'i rgyun 'bab pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / le tog thams
190a6: cad bskyed par byed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i spri ni bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/
190a7: bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char mi 'bab pa'i tshe gang dag brjod na chan gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang / mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /
190a8: chos ma lags pas skye bo 'thab pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshed/ na dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang // ma ma rungs bganas pa'i dus kyi tshe dang yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar
190b1: bgyid pa dang / del bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi nams bshad par gsol// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par gsol// gang dag klu thams cad la skul ma 'bas par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad
190b2: rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud thams cad rnam par 'doms par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / gnod
190b3: pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid pa dang / rgyu skar ma rungs par bgyis pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis char ba'i bar chad lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de
190b4: dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char ba'i rgyun legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bcom ldan 'das mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan pa/ sems can
190b5: thams cad la phan par thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha'
190b6: yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
190b7: la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so lags so/ / klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / snying rje chen po las byung ba 'brug chen po'i sgra can bgyings pa dpa' bo'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs
190b8: sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ rjes su yid rang ba bshad par bya ste/ de ni char med pa'i tshe char 'bab par byed/
191a1: cher mes pa gcod/ 'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu ni par byed/ klu thams cad skul bar byed/ lha thams cad sam par byed/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed/ sems can thams cad bang ba bsas/
191a2: cad dang ldan par byed do// tad+yaSh+Tha/ ma hA dz+nyA na/ a ba b+ha sin/ shre te dze lag sma dri Ta bi ka ma/ badz+ra sad hA ta ne/ ba ra ma bi rA dza/ ni mal gu r+Na ke tu sUr+yA pra b+he/ bi ma lAng ga yaSh+Ti/ b+ha ra d+ha ra/ sam b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ du du bu na
191a3: ha na/ ma hA pra b+he bi d+hu ta ma hA mo sA a d+ha ka re/ pradz+nya kra shud d+h+ye/ pa ri pU ra Na mi tre/ mai tre bi ra ma na skan d+ha/ mai tre ma bud d+ha re/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dz+wa lA ma bud d+ha re/ bo d+hA ga ru su me da she ba le/ tsa tu raM bai shwa ra d+ye/ aSh+Ta da sha e ba ni ka
191a4: bud d+ha ha me/ shu b+ha ma ti/ bu N+ya rA shi/ shu kla d+harma ma sa ma nI te/ ga ma b+hi re/ gam b+hi re/ bi rA dza ste/ bi ma lo/ bi sheSha/ prA ba te/ ni rA sra ba d+harme/ sarba lo ka dz+ye sA r+N+Nos+tha/ ba ra pra ba re/ a nud ta re/ a sang ge/ d+ha ra d+ha re/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru
191a5: d+hu ru/ shan ta ma te/ sha na ta ba be/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru ba ram bud d+ha nu mai te/ ma hA pa dz+nya pA mi te swAH/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang / byang
191a6: chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char dbab pa'i phyir klu thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas char pa'i
191a7: bar chad byed pa lnga btsal bar bya'o/ / s+yA da ya twe dan/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ nA gA nA nA/ dza ba dza ba/ dzi bi dzi bi/ dzu bu dzu bu/ klu chen po dag/ tshur sheg/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu po ba
191a8: shig/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ klu'i bdag po chen po tshur sheg/ kye klu chen po dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig/ ba ra ba ra/ bi ri bi ri/ bu ru bu ru/ sangs rgyas kyi bden
191b1: pas klu thams cad dgug par bya'o/ / byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / gtad snyoms kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / bden pa dang / bsam pa
191b2: chen pos klu'i bdag po dag tshur sheg/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams dran par gyis shig/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ chu chen po'i chu dang / sprin
191b3: gyi chu 'chang ba can lag gis 'gro ba chen po'i g.yog rnams byams pa'i sems kyis tshur sheg/ ston pa'i bstan pa dam pa dran par gyis shig/ g+ha Da g+ha Da/ g+hi Di b+hi Di/ g+hu r+ya g+hu r+ya/ drag shul can// khro bo shugs chen po dang
191b4: ldan pa/ dug chen po'i lce 'byin pa rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa tshur sheg/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob shig/ swA hA ta Ta ta Ta/ ti Ti ti Ti/ tu Ta tu sh+ya/ nor bu chen
191b5: bo'i cod pan thogs pa dang ldan pa/ sbrul gdug pa'i gzugs can rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs dran par gyi sa la/ rdo rje 'chang gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char pob shig/ swA hA ka la ka la/ ki li
191b6: kikili/ ku lu k+Sha wa/ chu chen po la gnas pa dang ldan pa smin pa chen po brtsegs pa'i bzhon pa la zhon nas mngon par 'gro ba rnams tshur sheg/ byams pa'i sems kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun thong shig/ de bzhin
191b7: gshegs pa'i bden pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis lag na rdo rjes bsgo ba/ ra la ra la/ ri li ri li/ ru lu ru lu/ lag gis 'gro thams cad khyed rnams gnyid med par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
191b8: pa'i bden pas/ g+ha ma g+ha ma/ b+hi mi g+hi mi/ glu mu gru muSh+ma/ klu thams cad dgug go// byams pa'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro bas/ na ra na ra/ ni ri ni ri/ nu ru nu ru swA hA/ yon po sna tshogs su gyur pa'i mgo
192a1: stong pa/ mgo dang mig dmar ba/ stobs che ba'i lto 'phye chen po rnams dgug par bya'o// kye kye lag gis 'gro chen po dag mchog tu thugs rje can bsod nams thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis brjod pa/ nyon
192a2: mongs pa dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs dran par gyis shig/ ga Da ga Da/ gi Di gi Di/ gu D+ha gu n+ya swA hA/ stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / gzi brjid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling
192a3: 'dir char gyi rgyun rnams pho bshig/ sha ra sha ra/ shi ri shi ri/ shu ru shu ru swA hA/ kye kye klu chen po rnams rang rang gi rigs dang / tshe rigs dran par gyis la/ ma shol bar lha thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i
192a4: gling 'dir char gyi rgyun po bshig swA hA tshangs pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ brgya byin gyis bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pho bshig swA hA/ rgyal po chen po
192a5: bzhi'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag brgyad pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char
192a6: rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i glang 'di ma rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po
192a7: dag dgra bcom pa'i bden pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag rang sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag sangs rgyas dang /
192a8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang / byin gyis brlabs
192b1: kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ / lha thams cad kyi bden pas gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig sAhA// klu thams cad kyi bden pas sa chen po 'dir char rab tu phob shig/ swA h+la gnod
192b2: sbyin thams cad kyi bden pas sems can thams cad srungs shig swA hA/ / dri za thams cad kyi bden pas mi rnams kyi 'khrug pa dang / gnod pa thams cad sol cig swA hA/ l+h+wa ma yin thams cad kyi bden pas
192b3: rgyu skar ma rungs pa thams cad rnam par zlog shig swA hA/ nam mkha' lding thams cad kyi bden pas klu thams cad byams par byos la 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char chen po rgyun phob shig swA hA// mi 'am ci thams cad
192b4: kyi bden pas sdig pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig swA hA/ sems can thams cad tshim par gyis shig swA hA// lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi bden pas yangs shing rgya che ba'i char gyi rgyun po pa shig swA hA// 'dir char la sgrig
192b5: pa lnga po dag yang dag par zung shig swA hA/ mi thams cad kyi bden pas mi thams cad la yongs su bsrung shig swA hA/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ da ra da ra/ di ri di ri/ du ru du ru/ na ta na ta/ ni ti ni ti/ nu Ta nu Tu/
192b6: shin du mgyogs par bzhud na/ sprin chen po'i chu 'dzin ma/ sprin ldan ma/ sprin chen ldan ma/ sprin chen chu 'dzin ma/ sprin gsal ma/ sprin 'byung ma/ rus sprin ma/ sprin gyi 'byung gnas ma/ sprin sgrogs ma/ sprin bzhugs ma
192b7: sprin gyi cod pan ldan ma/ sprin gyi phreng ba mnga' ma// sprin gyi rnam par rgyan ma/ sprin bcibs ma/ sprin la gnas bcas ma/ sprin gyi snying po'i sprin gyi ral pa can/ sprin 'od ma/ sprin gyi 'khor ldan ma/ rgya chen sprin bzhugs
192b8: ma/ mchod phyir sprin thogs ma/ le tog 'ongs sgrub ma/ ri sul na bzhugs ma/ klu'i yum bcom ldan 'das ma/ sprin chen dpal ldan skar mdog can/ bsil reg ma/ tshub ma chen po'i spyod yul ma/ klu chen
193a1: rnam par rol mdzad ma/ bcom ldan 'das ma/ bon tha bcud kyis len drug 'dzin ma/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu dbab du gsol swA hA/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ b+hi ri gI ri/ b+hur+ya
193a2: g+hu ru/ b+hi ni b+hai ri ni/ b+ha ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma g+hu maglu ma/ g+hu ma thu ma g+hu ma ri/ dbu dgu dang ldan ma/ sbyin phreng ldan ma/ klog tshogs phreng ldan ma/ lag gi 'gro thams cad 'dzin ma/ sprin lta bu'i na bza' ba nabs ma/ jug/
193a3: drag po thams cad spyod yul ma/ kA ni bkod pa la bcibs ma// 'brug sgrogs ma/ sgra sgrogs ma/ klu tshogs la ku la ma/ lha mo sprin chen phreng ldan ma/ klu thams cad lam shol bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/
193a4: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob shig ces bskul du gsol sA hA// ya ra ya ra/ yi ra yo re/ yu ru yu ru/ dza ra dza ra/ dzi ri dzi ri/ dzu ru dzu ru/ dz+ha ra dz+ha ra/ gu D+haM gu T+ya/ gu gu D+ha/ ga Da ga Da/ gai Di gau DaM/ ha ra ha ra/ hi li hi la/ mu lu
193a5: pu lu/ ta la ta la/ ti li ti li/ tu lu tu la/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gr-ih+na grih+Na/ ma rang ma ra da/ pra ma ra da/ pra ba ra sha bi g+ha na na/ me tre yod nya pa ta ya ti sA hA/ bud d+he bud d+he/ bu bud d+he/ bu bud d+he/ ha ra pA baM/ sarba
193a6: satwanan/ a d+hiSh+Ti ya ba/ N+yam/ sarba bud d+ha nan/ d+ha ri ni d+hir/ shu b+ham te/ gu n+de pra thA ba ne/ ma hA dz+nyA na lage/ shug kAd+harmas twa pa did N+De/ ma hA yA nA dASh+Te tre lokad+haSh+Te thA ga ba te/ bud d+ha ma tra ma pU ra ya sA rbak+She tre nA~M
193a7: shu kle she tra ma/ ba ra da re/ ban ta rab si ni/ d+hu d+hA re/ d+hAd+hA ru/ sha ma sha ma/ shan ta ma nA sa/ char gyi ba gegs thams cad rnam par bsal bar gsol swA hA// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas
193a8: byams pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyi thugs skyon med pas klu chen po rnams la yang dag par skul lo// klu'i rgyal po chen po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi rjid kyi dkyil
193b1: 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la yang dag par skul lo/ / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nyer dga' la yang dag par skul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pho ba shig swA hA/ klu'i
193b2: rgyal po rgya mtsho la yang dag par skul lo/ / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la yang dag par skul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ kA'i rgyal po gzi can la
193b3: yang dag par bskul lo/ / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig/ swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po chu lha la yang dag par skul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po la yang dag par skul lo//
193b4: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu thob shig sA hA/ klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung la yang dag par skul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig sA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la yang dag par sprul lo// 'dzam bu'i
193b5: gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gtad gzung la yang dag par skul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal pos bsrung gi bu la yang dag par skul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char
193b6: rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nu ta la yang dag par skul lo// 'dzam bu'i gla 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid la yang dag par skul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pho pa
193b7: shig sA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal bzangs la yang dag par skul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig sAH/ klu'i rgyal po glog gi phreng ba la yang dag par skul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/
193b8: klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu chen po la yang dag par skul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu thogs la yang dag par skul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob
194a1: shig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug pung can la yang dag par skul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig sA hA/ de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po chen po thams cad la yang dag par skul lo//
194a2: 'dzam bu'i gli 'dir cha ra ra ba tu po bshig swA hA/ nA ge nA ge/ ma hA nA ge/ g+ho ra ma na sa nA ga hri da ya/ du mA ku le/ u gor she bra tsaN Da te dze/ bi sho gr-i/ a She bi she/ a hi ga re/ kriSh+Ta bid ga le/ tsan tsa le/ lo la dzi he/ ma hA pa
194a3: na kar/ ka lA pa she/ ro dra bA sa ni/ D+haD+ha ma be g+ha na g+han/ shi ki ni/ ka na kan/ ga na gaN/ ma hA ga Na ga Na/ ba ra ba ra/ bi ri bi ri/ bu ru pu ru/ bi s+phurdza ne/ b+hu ru pU ru/ ma hA b+ho ga/ ma ne da re/ bi ri pi ri/ pu ru pu ru/
194a4: pa ra pa ra/ ba ra Sha ba ra Sha/ dza lA ma bud re/ sham bu sham bu/ ba ta tu tu ma me/ pUng drung / d+hud d+hu ma be/ me g+ha pra b+he/ me g+ha b+ha hi ni/ D+ha kaD+ha ka/ D+ha kan+durnA ma gai/ g+ha na g+ha na/ shi ki ni/ ka na ka na/ gaN gaN/ ma hA nA ga ga ne/ nir
194a5: tA n+ya/ badz+ra dar ka ri ma hA rA d+hi da ye/ g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma ba yA sti ka/ dzAng gi ri bu dza ga me/ bi ka Ta sad ka Te/ go ra bi s+phu rdza ni/ bi dz+ra ma b+ha ne/ klu thams cad dgug go// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs dang / dus gsum gyi
194a6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang / byams pa'i thugs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ na maHsarba bud d+he b+hA/ sid dun du/ man tra b+ha d+ha ni swA hA/ 'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo stong
194a7: phrag brgya pa las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ / cho ga ni char chen dbab par 'dod na bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar bla bre sngon po bre/ ba dan sngon po spyad de// chos smra ba lus bkrus la
194a8: yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar gnas shing / gos gtsang ma sngon po bgos la/ spos dri zhim po bskus nas/ zas dkar gsum zos la/ stan sngon po'i steng du 'dug nas/ kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
194b1: sa ca pa yol ta sa seMd ma kyil nam can tshun pa 'chad pa bag par bya/ / un sa gang ba dus pagang bzhi gapa kya/ / na da
194b2: byar ro/ / de la chos skabs phyogs bzhir lci ba'i khu bas bri bar byaste/ shar phyogs su khru gsum tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa/ klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa pa'i lcibs bri bar bya'o// lho phyogs su khwa lnga tsam
194b3: duklu'i rgyal po mgo lnga pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ / nub phyogs su khru bdun tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo bdun pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// byang phyogs su khru dgu tsam du ku'i rgyal
194b4: po mgo dgu bkru'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ / chos smra ba rang gi lus bsrungs la byams pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems nye bar gzhag nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
194b5: dpa' thams cad la gsol ba btab la klu rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bgo bar bya ste/ 'di ni cho ga'o// gang zhig char mi 'bab pa'i tshe sprin chena'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di klog na/ nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis nas nyin zhag bdun tshun chad
194b6: gdon mi za bar 'char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / rgya mtsho ni dus las yol yang srid kyi/ thub pa chen po'i gsung rab kyi char gyi cho ga 'di ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de lta mod kyi tshul khrims dang / yon tan la gnas te 'chal ba'i tshul
194b7: khrims dang / sha dang nya sha la sogs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o// 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / 'bras chen bu ram can la sogs pa dang / mngar gsum za zhing klag par bya'o// de ltar na grub par 'gyur te/ thub pa'i rgyal pos
194b8: gsungs pa bzhin du the tsom med par bya'o/ / 'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa cho ga dang bcas pa/ rdzogs s+ho//
195a1: rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / shI lan dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
195a2: rgyagar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA ma g+ha b+ha ta ma Na Da li sarba nA ga hrid ya nA ma ma hA yA na sA tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang /
195a3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po na nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na klu stong du tshang ba'i klu'i tshegs chen po
195a4: klu thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul che zhing dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po nye dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po yang dag skul dang / klu'i rgyal po glog phreng can dang / klu'i
195a5: rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po gtang bzung dang / klu'i rgyal po dung dang / klu'i rgyal po e la mdab dang / klu'i rgyal po mtshams bzangs dang klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu dang / klu'i rgyal po glog
195a6: 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug pud can dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin chen rnam par 'phrul dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin chen rgyas byed dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug sgrogs dang / klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po skar mda'
195a7: gtong dang / klu'i rgyal po dus min sgrogs dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug skad dang / klu'i rgyal po glog rab tu gtong ba dang / klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang
195a8: dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug chen spogs dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od chen la mkham dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po mdongs bu dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal 'dzin dang /
195b1: klu'i rgyal po rnga s+thasgra dang / klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra rnam par spogs pa'i skad dang / klu'i rgyal po la ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'dren byed dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal mgrin dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po sha sho sgra chen dang
195b2: klu'i rgyal po dang ding sgra dang / klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms dang / klu'i rgyal po char 'thung dang / klu rtsi chen rnam par 'phrul dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung rab tu gtong dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang /
195b3: klu'i rgyal po dpal dkrigs dang / klu'i rgyal po bkra shis dang / klu'i rgyal po spyani rgyas byed dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin gyis dga' byed dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin gyis 'gebs pa'i rigs dang / klu'i rgyal po legs par 'gebs pa dang /
195b4: klu'i rgyal po rnam par rtse dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po mthong dga' dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod dga' dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyis
195b5: legs par 'debs dang / klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin las chu 'byin dang / klu'i rgyal po bde mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung 'khrugs par byed pa dang / klu'i rgyal po
195b6: gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po chen po stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de dag thams cad kyang klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos nam mkha' le di ra rir
195b7: sgrogs shing / rdzi char chen po rab tu 'bebs te/ bcom ldan 'das la sri'u bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags so// kye klu chen po dang klu dag tshur sheg/ mu lu mu lu/ tsa Ta tsaT/ pha Ta phaT/ ma Ta ma Ta/ glog 'bar ba rab tu phyung zhing /
195b8: rdzi char chen po'i rgyan thong la char pho bshig/ kye kye klu chen po dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dran par gyis shig/ kye klu'i klu chen po dag tshur sheg tshur sheg/ 'dzam bu'i gling du char
196a1: rab tu babashig/ kurba rbaD+ha/ mu nA mAr+tha/ 66/ 6 u0f7f// ma hAnA ga hr-i da ya/ sarba nA kan/ a ga rnam/ san tsad ya/ shin+dan dar swAH/ spen chen pa rnam par 'bral ba'i tan bkod pa dag gsapa
196a2: snam gyi mtha' rin po che thams cad kyi tshon gyi lnga ldi mdzes pa/ mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin ga/ lha'i rin po ches mdzes par byas pa'i gzhal med khang me tog rab tu 'byang brgya ma
196a3: chen po'i sprin dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis rlobs la/ rin po che'i sprin rab tu 'phyang zhing / lha'i ras bcos bu mang pos mu tig gi rgyan phreng rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi
196a4: rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo sna tshogs kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis sgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi brgyan bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa rin po che
196a5: bkod pa chen po'i rgya mtsho'i sprin dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis rlobs te/ sprin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi lha'i bla ri'i dril bu'i sgra
196a6: snyan par sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / bya'i tshogs thams cad skad 'byin cing me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / rgya mtsho sprin chen po sgra cher sgrogs shing lha'i rin po
196a7: che rab tu 'byung la mag gi lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / gsar skud kyis brgyan pa'i snang ba chen po can gyi rtse mos nam mkha' kun du khebs par byed pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag
196a8: rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis nam mkha' kun tu khebs par byed pa la mkhas pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / snang ba dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sgras kun du khebs pa'i
196b1: rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag gis nam mkha' mngon par khebs par gyis shig/ klu dang klu'i rgyal po thams cad chung sheg/ sa'i steng 'dir 'brug sgra sgrogs shing char po bshig/ chang rab tu
196b2: pobashig/ char kun du rab tu po bshig/ der der sgrogs shig/ glog chen po snang ba rab tu byung shig/ 'du zhing kun tu 'dul tog yang dang der zhing 'dug ste/ klu'i skad chen po yid du 'ong ba'i sgra chen po 'byin cing
196b3: dbyangs chen po rab tu sgrogs pa dag 'jam 'i gling 'di char rab tu bob shig/ grA Da g+hA Da/ g+hi Di g+he Di/ huT+Ta hu Tu/ kru d+hu b+hu d+ha/ gaT gaT/ gi Ti ga Ta/ ma Ta maT/ tsaT tsaT/ baT baT/ kye kye klu dang / klu chen po dag chur chung tshu
196b4: sheg chur sheg/ dU dru dru d+hu/ hA hA hA/ hI hI/ hUM hUM/ 'brug sgra chen po sgrogs shing / rlung chen po rab tu gtong bdag sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu thob shig swA hA/ kye kye klu dang / klu'i rgyal po dag
196b5: klu thams cad la yang dag par skul gyis 'dzam bu'i gling du char phob shig/ g+hu Du g+hu Du/ pha Ta pha Ta/ ha ha/ he he/ klu chen po dag 'dus shing sa'i steng du char pob shig/ hu Tu hu Du/ ki ri ki ri/ tsi ri tsi ra/ mi ri mi ri/ di ri di ri
196b6: ki li ki li/ zhing thams cad yongs su gang bar gyis shig/ 'bru dang / shing ljon pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman thams cad rab tu skye bar gyis shig/ byams pa'i sems kyis tshur sheg/ sangs rgyas kyi bden
196b7: pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / lag na rdo rje'i bden pa dang / klu thams cad kyi bdan pas klu chen pa dag chung sheg chur shegs hA/ kA'i rgyal po mdongs bral yang dag par stsal lo// sangs rgyas
196b8: gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu po bshig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid la yang dag par skul lo// chos kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu po bshig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po mtha'
197a1: yas la yang dag par stsal lo/ / dge 'dun gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pobashig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la yang dag par skul lo// lag na rdorje'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i
