218b6: gyis gro ba la sngags bris spyi bor bcings la/ bgos kyis bkab la nyi ma re re zhing 'bru phyir dbyung bar bya'o// mdzod khang gi sgo ru nyin re nor rgyun ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi mdo klag par bya'o//
218b7: sngags pas bsgrub bya'i sngags bltas la dus gsum du brgyad brgya bzlas pa bya'o// ji ltar rnyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i gzungs kyi rtog pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // @// rgya gar skad du/
218b8: shrI ma hA kA la tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud/ dbang gi rta mchog sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ shar lho'i dur khrod chen po ha ha drag tu rgod pa'i
219a1: gnas shing tsan dan gyi nags tshal rab tu dga' ba'i ming zhes bya ba mi ma yin pho mo mang po 'dus pa'i pho brang du/ dpal nag po chen po zhes bya ba bi nA ya ka la sogs te/ de tshal bar gdugs pa can
219a2: rnams kyi dbus na skyes 'gro sems can rnams kyi srog dbugs la dbang byed pa'i nag po chen po zhes bya ba cig yod de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na mthar byed pa'i rta'i rgyal po
219a3: zhes bya ba rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i 'khor gyis bskor te/ dregs pa can 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ljags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya hU~M bahUM hral hu pra d+hU
219a4: zhes brjod pas/ dur khrod ha ha drag du rgod pa'i gnas nag po chen po rang dbang med par mthar byed rta'i rgyal po'i mngon du byung ste las ci bya zer zhing rang rtags srog gi snying po 'di mdongs gsol du phul ba/ oM badz+ra
219a5: ma hA kA la k+Shi k+She tra pig+ha nan bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT zhes phul lo/ / dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas rgyal po mig mi bzang gis mthar byed rta'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to//
219a6: stsal to// e ma pad ma khros pa'i bdag/ nag po chen po drag shul can// gsang pa'i sgrub pa bshad du gsol// mgon po bsgrub par bya ba gang // gsad cing lus srog dbye ba dang // ma grub shis bstan pa dang // mgon
219a7: po'i rtags dang ser ba rnams/ / rta mchog chen pos bdag la gsol// zhes zhus pas de nas pad ma khros pa yis// nag po'i sgrib thabs ched du brjod// dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// sangs rgyas bstan pa
219a8: srung skad du/ gza' gang ches grangs shis pa la// dur khrod la sogs shing gcig tu// bsod nams tshogs ni bsags byas pa// nag po chen po bsgrub par bya// phung pa'ams nag dag la ni// stegs bu rdza
219b1: bani byas nas ni/ / dri sras khrag gas chag rdzag bya// dbus su gru ga sum thal maldan// b+hi la pad ma'adab brgyad bri// de dbus thod den nang du ni// sha lA snyi rdzas brgyan pa'i// gtor ma ba shos bu zhug nga /
219b2: de la mda' gzugs dmar nag dang // gri snying rtsa ka li yang gzugs// de nyid mgon pa'i rten du bzhag/ Da ma ru'i lpags pa'i nang // mgon pa'i srog sngags bri bar bya// lnga'i nang du bla rdos dril// bos dang rkun gdong /
219b3: gtang bar bya// dkon mchog spyil mchod pa bsham// de nas pad mar bdag bsgoms la// thugs ka'i skyi las 'od 'bros pas// bla ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa// rang gi mdun du bsam byas la// mdzod pa rnam la
219b4: dbul bar bya/ / rnam dag bdun gyi 'og tu ni// tshad med bzhi po bsgom par bya// btang snyoms la sogs pa ri tri// pad stengs yi ge hUM las ni// nag po zhal gcig phyag drug pa// gri gug phreng ba Da ma ru// thod pa mdung
219b5: dang zhags pa bsnams/ / g.yas g.yon rim pas bsnams pa'o// sprul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// sku smad pa ti khra bo gsol// stegs lpags zhing gi sham thabs can// gtum po spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs//
219b6: dpral bar dri'i thig les brgyan// spyi gtsugs mi bskyod sbrul sku brten// de ltar bdag mdun gsal bsgoms nas/ spyan drangs mchod dang bzlas pa bya// gtor ma pU dza la sogs pas// nag po che la sbyin par bya//
219b7: man pa'i thugs ka'i sprulas na// mugs migs ga sa senas pazlang // kha gshes bzlas pa bya// ma brnam rnas bag+h+nAnan pan pa // dem+b+ha ces ni brjo pas// na@
219b8: pa'i rtags rnams 'byung / / dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las bsten cing bsgrub pa'i lel ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas bstan pa pashig pa dang // rnal 'byor par chad byed pa
220a1: rnams/ / nag po chen pos bsgral 'dod na// stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas kyang // drag po e yi nang du ni/ pho mo rabs chad thod pa'i nang // gzugs ni spra tshil dag la bya// ming rus dag ni bkod nas kyang //
220a2: gsang dang na bskabs dang sbyar// mgon po'i ma dang dam rdzas rnams// kha dang kha la dgod par bya// bag zod nang du bran rdzas blags// rtag gtor gyur gtor g.yas dang g.yon// gsang sngags 'di yis gsang
220a3: bya/ oM badz+ra ma hA kA lak+Shi k+Shi tra bi g+ha nan bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT// oM ma hA k+Sha la ya shA sa na a pa ka ri Ne Sha A pa Sh+Ti ma k+Sha lo yaM e da ra da na tra ya u pa ka ri Ne ya dI pra tidz+nyAsl-i ri sa tad+hA i da duSh+Ta na kha kha khA ti bA
220a4: hi/ mA ra mA ra ThiR+Sha grih+Na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha daha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ di na me ke na dgra bo mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM bi nA ya ka bi la sa tra bi tri hU dza si ma bu bi nA ya kaM a mu ka pre srog hur thums dza mA ra
220a5: yarbad/ / drag sngags bzlas shing thun gyis zab// zhag bdun par du sgra mi bya// de la rtags rnams rdzogs par 'gyur// dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las lus srog dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
220a6: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las mtha' sbyin sreg dag gis btul// gru gsum dbus su gdug pa'i shing // dbus su nag po 'khor bcas bskyed// ling ka gtor ma dam rdzas rnams dang / nag po'i zhal du
220a7: dpral bar bya/ / sngags 'di bzlas shing bsreg par bya// ag ne dz+wal ra las rdzogs// thal ba rlung dmar dag la bskur// a mo g+ha ni myur du klog/ dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las mtha' brtul ba'i le'u ste
220a8: bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// de ltar bslabs kyang ma grub na// gcig dang gnyis la nan tan bskyed// de ltar byas kyang ma grub na// sa gsum khrag gsum dug gsum la// khru gang ba'i
220b1: / / thug pa ma / / k+ShA/ skas da / 5 / sa spya sa shA rdzun
220b2: cid sngags 'di banas/ / oM badz+ra ga d+hata ma k+Shi ba d+ha las ma rnaMs ya hU~M) sa nA ba nan n+ta Sh+T+rI dz+dza la k+Sha ny+dzas 'o// deg brjod cing ldan gyis zag// de la rtags rnams rdzogs pa dang nas gas
220b3: ga bya/ / zi su bla rdo dam rdzas rnams// spos chus bkru zhing sngags 'di bzlas// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+Shi k+She tra big+ha nan bi nA ya ka hUM hU~M phaT sos sos swA hA// de skad byas la gnas su ni// mgon po'i gzugs kyang
220b4: spos chus bkru/ / gru gsum dbus su blangs byas la// dgra bo'i ming rus snying khar gzhug/ zhag bdun bsgrubs la dgra la bskyal/ a mo g+ha ni myur du bklag/ dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud las ma grub na
220b5: spogs pa'i cho ga dang gso ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ bya nag 'phur zhing lding ba dang // mon pa a tsa ra dang ni// dge ba shes pan de slob dpon dang // 'od dang sgra dang khang pa 'tshegs//
220b6: mgon po'i mu dag dngos su mthong // dgral dmag drangs sems can bsad// mi nag bdag la snying stobs dang // mdze bo dang ni spang po dang // bya nag thang la ltung ba 'byung // dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud las
220b7: rtags kyi rim pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ / // de nas yang dag bshar bya ba// ser pa dbab pa'i las byan// mon nam mdze can thod pa ru// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bris nas kyang // rigs lnga k+Sha yis bon dgod//
220b8: rtsibs mtshan ser sru ming rus dang // yul du pob ces bya ba bri// de mthar 'khor lo rtsibs dgu la// dregs pa'i sngags dag bri bar bya// rgyab tu gang yin yul ming dang // rlung gi snying po bri bar bya// bdag
221a1: nyid pad ma khros par bsgom/ / gsang sngags 'di yis gnad la bor// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+ShaM k+She tra big+h+na nan bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT/ nAg snying gzer/ pu dur thums dza pro shar hri la b+h+yo// de
221a2: skad ces ni rab brjod la/ / nyungs dkar nyungs nag ske tshe dang // khrag dang dug gis thod par brab// lo 'bras rlung khyer rtags byung na// dgra yi yul du dbab par bya// gal te 'jig rten zung pa'o// dpal
221a3: mgon po nag po'i rgyud las ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / // de nas yang dag des gsungs pa// e ma 'khor 'dus ngo mtshar can// ma 'ongs dam can sgrub byed na// dam tshig la gnas
221a4: sdom pa gzung / / gtor ma dag la brtson par bya// dam rdzas bla rdo lus la bsrel// zhes gsungs pas rgyal po mig mi bzang la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams yid rang nas nag po chen pos bstan pa
221a5: bsrung bar khas blangs nas mi snang bar gyur to/ / dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las le'u brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba phur bu 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o//
221a6: rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la nA mA d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
221a7: dras gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdan la bdud btul te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
221a8: sulha'i sde dpon chen po tshogs kyi bdag po ma hA kA la 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la dbang sgyur ba dang / mgon po nag po chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
221b1: gcig tu 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa 'phrul gyis bzhes su gsol// oM shrI ma tA kA la ga Na ku ta swA hA// na maHshrI ma hA kA la ga Ne gu ti shwa ya/ na mo yo kan
221b2: NAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM ti le hi le/ ki ti ki te ni/ tsid de cid de ni swA hA/ 'di bton pas nad thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / mings thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / nyes pa
221b3: bsgoms pa thams cad dang / nyes par bltas pa rnams steng du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad bcing ngo // 'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing ngo // thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri
221b4: la thug pa tshun chad bcing ngo / / gzhan yang gtsug lag khang dang dkyil 'khor gyi srungs ma/ dug gsum nad kyi sman pa/ rig 'dzin yongs kyi srog shing / rnal 'byor gyi dgra bla/ bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang
221b5: byug/ srin po lang ka bu ri'i grong khyer gtan nas rlog pa/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma srin rdul du rlog pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bstan pa srung bar khas blangs shing dam bcas pa'o// 'phags
221b6: pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ / // // rgya gar skad du/ de bi ma hA kA li nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
221b7: thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so// de nas
221b8: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma/ bdud kyi yum/ gshin rje'i lcam mo lha mo nag mo chen mos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
222a1: lha mo nag mo chen mos gsol pa/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i rig pa 'bul na/ bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
222a2: stsal pa/ bdud kyi yum gshin rje'i lcam mo lha mo nag mo chen mos steng du ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad bcings par bya'o// 'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing bar bya'o//
222a3: thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad bcing bar bya'o// de'i sngags 'di dag kyang bzlas par bya ste/ tad+ya thA/ oM ru ru b+he tiSh+Tha bad d+ho sa ru ru ro ru b+he tiSh+Tha bad d+ho si swA hA// 'di bton pas rims dang / nad
222a4: dang mings dang / nyes pa thams cad dang / mdze dang / pol mig dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro swA hA// lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa nag po chen
222a5: po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// nag po chen po skyes bu nag ser mche ba rnon po/ mche ba chen po rims nang
222a6: thams cad las thar bar byed pa brjod par bya ste/ / phyogs gang dang gad du bltas pa der bdag la rims nad med par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na rA dza d+hA te na/ da ha da ha rA dza d+hA te na/ pa tsa pa tsa rA dza d+ha te na/
222a7: parba shra be la du ba T+Te re ba hu pa ri sho d+hi/ e mdz+wa ra tsaH DA la ha na ha na/ oM sr-i b+ha ni sra b+ha she ra mu tsa/ tsak+Shu mra tsa/ shro tra ma tsa/ g+hA na mr-i tsa/ dze hA mr-i tsa/ ka Na Sha mu tsa/ grI ba mu tsa/ priSh+Ta mu tsa/ kA Ti kA ma? tsa/ kuk+Sha muH
222a8: U ru mr-i tsa/ dza na mu tsa/ tasta mu tsa/ bA do mu tsa/ e gu li mu tsa/ e ga pra t+yaM ga mr-i tsa/ a ba sa ra/ a d+h+ya si mI gats+tsha/ dz+wa ra mu to sa bdag la swA hA/ oM dz+wa la mA aM gu la hUM/ sarba dzA rA nan phaT// 'phags pa nag
222b1: po chen po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus
222b2: gtan la phab pa/ / / @// rgya gar skad du/ shrI de bi ka pra ma rA dza tan tra kA li/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i bstod paM rgyal po'i rgyud/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi mnga' bdag dpal
222b3: phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ri rab kyi rtse mo rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal chen po na bcom ldan 'das dpal drug po chen po phyag na rdo rje lus bskal pa'i me ltar
222b4: 'bar ba/ srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba/ nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid dang ldan nas bzhugs so// 'khor ni brgya byin dang / sha za dang / srin po dang / ma mo'i tshogs bye ba dung phyur gyis bskor te bzhugs so//
222b5: de'i tshe na dpal phyag na rdo rje pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs te bka' stsal pa/ nga'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i lha ma srin sde brgyad nyon cig/ 'dod pa'i khams 'di na bdud kyi ma gshin rje'i sring mo zhes bya
222b6: rgyal tshab chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa 'dzin pag sha yod kyis/ khyed kyis de la mchod pa gyis shig/ bstod pa gyis shig/ ngas kyang khyod la byin gyis brlab bo zhes bka' stsal pa
222b7: dang / 'khor gyi nang nas lha'i dbye bo brgya byin stan las langs te dpal lha mo nag mo la dge ba bcu'i sgo nas bstod pa/ sngon 'das bskal pa dang po'i pha rol na// dge bcu'i las la sems rab cher
222b8: sbyangs nas/ / lam gyi khyad par gong ma rab rdzogs kyang // mtho ris skyes pa rnams la dge ba bcu'o// tshul gyis don mdzad phyi rol sgyur ba yi// dpal ldan lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'das pa'i
223a1: dus na srog gcod rab spangs pas/ / sku tshe ring zhing gzugs byad bun sumatshogs// gzhan gyi lan chags gnod pa'i rkyen dang ldan// 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma byin
223a2: len spangs tshul la rab sbyangs pas/ / bsod nams tshogs kyi longs spyod phun sum tshogs// gter gyi longs spyod mi 'grib rab brtan brnyes// sbyin pa'i gter 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//
223a3: mi tshangs spyod pa'i dka' rnams srung ba dang // mngal gyi grong khyer dman las rnam par 'phags// srid pa'i 'dod chags ring du spangs pa ste/ dge sbyong chen mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nyon mongs brdzun
223a4: tshig sbyangs pa'i rnam smin gyis/ / gsung gi dngos grub 'jig rten 'dul ba'i gtso// gsung mchog rnam dag brnyes pa'i rang bzhin te// bden par gsung ba khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/
223a5: phra ma'i skyon spangs mi phyed 'khor dang ldan// nyid la rnam par dul ba'i 'khor gyis bskor// lha dang lha min bden pas 'dul mdzad ma// dkar mo'i 'khor tshogs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ngag
223a6: 'khyal spangs pa'i yon tan sbyin pa yis/ / ting 'dzin rtse gcig mi g.yo bar chad spangs// dgos 'brel tshul gyis bstan pa skyong mdzad ma// byis pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nga rgyal
223a7: khongs sems spangs pa'i yon tan gyis/ / zhi ba'i tshig 'jam lha mo dbyangs snyan ma// tshig rtsub gshe ba'i gnyen po byed pa ste// ngag rtsub 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal stod// rang sems brnab
223a8: sems spangs pa'i khyad par ni/ / 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnam par spangs pa'i rtags// bdag med rtags su seng ges rna ba brgyan// brnab sems spangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzung ba'i yul la
223b1: gnod sems rnam par spangs/ / phyi rol yul 'di gnyis med chos su gzigs// gang la gnod sems yang dag spangs pa'i rtags// sbrul gyi rna rgyan can la phyag 'tshal bstod// log par lta ba'i chos phyogs rnam
223b2: spangs te/ / sangs rgyas chos las 'khrungs pa'i gzugs brnyan khyod// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can// spros bral don dam nyon la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jig rten 'di na las gnyis dag ma dag
223b3: ma dag mi dge bcu las ngan song grub/ / dag pa'i dge ba bcu las mtho ris grub// las 'di dge ba dang por rab sbyangs pas// gong nas gong ma'i sa la rab gnas kyang // dge ba bcu yi rtags ni dman pa'i zhing
223b4: 'dir bstan/ / gdug pa'i ngang tshul can gyis 'gro ba 'dren mdzad ma// bstod par 'os pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la// gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis
223b5: lam rnam pa lnga'i tshul gyis bstod pa/ / dam pa rnams kyis bgrod pa'i khyad par ni// tshogs kyis sbyangs nas don dam mthong ba yis// gnyen po ye shes rim par sgom pa la// mthar phyin pa la gshegs
223b6: pa'i don mchog lags/ / de bas lha mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di ltar rab ldan khyod kyi khyad par te// dang po'i tshogs las yang dag rab bsags pas// dang pos las sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin brnyes// rab tu dga'
223b7: ba'i sa ladon dmani/ / rnam par me rtog skye med tshul gyis gzigs// dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par ni// rang sems sa gnyis dga' rab brtan nas// de bzhin sa gsum dag pa'i pha mas /
223b8: rang sems bzhi pa'i sal cher bsgoms pas// lnga pa'i sal bsam gtan pa rol son// rang sems drug pa'i sa la cher sbyangs pas// bdun pa la ni thabs kyi pha rol son// rang sems brgyad pa nyid la char
224a1: bsgoms pas/ / dpal ldan lha mo nan mo smon lam nyid// dgu pa la yang stobs kyi yon tan sgrub// de yi stobs kyis ye shes 'phen par 'grub// 'di dag rnam par rdzogs par byas nas ni// sangs rgyas
224a2: la smin pa'i smon lam can/ / sa brgyad non pas gzhon nu'i tshul 'chang ma// 'gro ba 'dul phyir drag mo'i tshul ston cing // gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag kyang khyod kyi lam ltar myur 'grub
224a3: shog/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo can gyis dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa// dpal ldan lha mo gnyis su med pa ste// don dam spros bral chos nyid 'di las brtsal/
224a4: don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med pa bden// 'khor ba myang 'das gnyis su med pas zab// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su med pas 'phags// las dang rnam smin gnyis su med pas bstod// rgyu dang 'bras bu
224a5: gnyis su med pas smin/ / yul dang yul can gnyis med gcig gi dang // spros dang spros med don dam dbyings kyis bsdus// bsod nams ye shes gnyis med tshogs chen te// mthong dang dam pa gnyis med
224a6: dag pas bstod/ / bdag dang gzhan gyi chos ni ngang tshul gcig/ gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis med zab mo'i mthu// mtho ris ngan song gnyis bral dag pa'i zhing // bzang ngan gnyis med rang bzhin gcig gis bstod//
224a7: bskyed meng rdzogs pa gnyis med ldan grub mchog/ sems dang phung po gnyis med sems nyid de// sgrub dang bsgrub pa gnyis med grub pa'i dang // bdag gzhan gnyis med tshul mchog gcig gis pa nga / @
224a8: dang yum mkha' gnyis med byang chub sems/ / thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i don// stong dang mi stong gnyis med zhi ba'i dang // gur dang 'gyur med rtsol bral phyag 'tshal bstod// sgra tshig gnyis med
224b1: brjod pa med pa'i ngang / / lus ngag gnyis med sems nyid gcig gi tshul// rtsol byed rtsol bya gnyis med don gcig pas// rnam par spros med don dam dbyings kyis bstod// mu stegs sangs rgyas gnyis med tshul gcig
224b2: pas/ / dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med don rtogs te// srid dang rnam grol yang dag don gcig pas// thams cad gnyis med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyi dang nang med gnyis med segashes dang // sems ldan sems med rnam
224b3: dag zhi ba'i tshul/ / snang dang mi snang gnyis med gnyis kyis mthong / gnyis med don mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di dag rnams ni don dam zab mo'i tshul// spros pa med pa'i don dam 'brel pa ste/ 'di
224b4: rnams lha mo khyod kyi thugs la gsal/ / 'di ltar bstod pas bdag kyang khyod ltar shog/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pas dpal lha mo la phrin las kyi sgo nas bstod pa// sems nyid phrin
224b5: las rnam bzhi'i khyad par ni/ / sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med// don dam spros bral kha dog gzugs kyang med// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems// 'thun par bstan pa'i zhi ba dpal lha
224b6: so/ / mdzad zhi 'gyur zhi ba'i ngang tshul can// zhi ba'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo na// rtags kyi su mdog dkar mo shin du dang // kun hU~M zhi mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi dgra dang nad rnams
224b7: zhi bar mdzod/ / 'thun par bstan pa'i rgyas pa'i dpal lha mo// rgyas mdzad ces 'gyur rgyas pa'i ngang tshul can// rgyas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtsem ni// rtags kyi sku mdog ser mo shin du brjid/
224b8: kun du rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi bsod nams ye shes rgyas par mdzod// 'thun par bstan pa'i dbang gi dpal lha mo// dbang mdzad dbang gyur dbang gi dang tshul can// dbang gi
225a1: 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni/ / rtags kyi sku mdog dmar mo shin du brjid// kun du dbang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams dbang du mdzod// 'thun par bstan
225a2: pa'i drag mo dpal lha mo/ / drag mdzad drag 'gyur drag mo'i ngang tshul can// drag mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog nag mo shin du brjid// kun du drag mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//
225a3: bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams drag mos sod// khyod kyi rang bzhin cir yang ma grub la// 'di ltar 'dzin nyid cir yang snang ba ni// phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro don mdzad pa lags// bdag kyang las bzhi rang bzhin
225a4: lhun grub nas/ / khyod ltar gzhan gyi don la brtson par shog// / de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la klu'i rgyal po dga' bos sku'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa// gsang sngags rnal 'byor grub pa'i bdag nyid ma// yon
225a5: tan rnams kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni/ / don du snang ba med kyang gdul bya'i phyir// rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar bstan pa'o// khams gsum gdul phyir gdan du bong bu zhon// mya ngan mi 'da'i rtags su lhags sgrog
225a6: mda'/ bdag don lhun grub glang chen ko bas brgyan// gzhan don phun sum tshogs phyir re ldes dkris// byang chub sems ldan spyi gtsug zla rgyas gsal// shes rab rtogs phyir lte ba nyi mas brgyan// dug
225a7: gsum stong po gcod pa'i ral gri dang / bsod nams gter gyi phyag mtshan ne'u la bsnams// dbang drag rdzogs phyir ral pa kham nug sag/ nyon mongs 'dren phyir rno dpal mche ba gtsigs// 'khor bldags la
225a8: bdar phyir rkan sgra gdeb/ / gdug pa zhes la gnon phyir sdang mig bgred// thams cad dbang du sdud phyir spyan rtsa dmar// snyoms pa'i tshogs mchog mi 'gyur sku mdog gnag/ ma mo 'dul phyir dur khrod rgyan gyis
225b1: brgyan/ / sku gsung thugs ldan rtags kyi phyag rgya kha T+wAM gsor// sku gsum rdzogs byed thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// drag po myur mgyogs bstan phyir tshub mas brgyan// nyon mongs sreg phyir me phung nang na bzhugs/
225b2: 'dod khams bskyad phyir yongs 'du shing la brten// lha ma ni 'dul phyir rdzong gi brga bzlog ma// dpa' brtan bstan phyir stag ge sham thabs bsdams// bstan pa bsrung phyir drag mo'i cha dugs rdzogs// nga rgyal
225b3: dbang sdud bdag med sgra sgrogs phyir/ / thabs kyi spyan cha g.yas pa seng ges brgya na// zhe sdang dbang 'dul drug chen 'dul ba'i phyir// shes rab snyan cha g.yon pa sbrul gyis brgyan// 'du byed mi rtag rtags su
225b4: dril bu sgrogs/ / chags phyir rngam mdzad rag ta'i rba klong 'thung // dam tshig srung phyir zhing lpags rgyan du mdzad// tha dad pas rnams 'dul phyir rma bya'i 'phru// nyon mongs sgrib pa'i tshogs rnams rab sbyangs nas/
225b5: ye shes rig pa'i tshogs rnams shar ba'i phyir// rang bzhin gnas mchog byang shar mtshams na brten// dbu ma'i sa la gnas phyir dre'u la zhon// nyon mongs gdug pa 'dul phyir ma yi tshul// mkha' 'gro ma
225b6: mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ / / de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pas dpal lha mo la sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas bstod pa// don dam gnyis med byang chub sems yin yang // srid gsum gdul phyir
225b7: rtags kyi phyag rgya ni/ / rang sems rnam dag drag po'i gzhal yas khang // rag ta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil pa las// keng rus zod phreng zhing gi lpags pas brgyan// sku mdog gnag la rab 'jigs khro mo rgyal//
225b8: sngon mo ral pa bcings ma'i sprul pa 'gyed// sku yi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma ti// gru gsum ser nag zhal gyi dbyings su bzhengs// yon tan rgyas mdzad ser mo mkha' la bzhad// phrin las rgyas pa thams
226a1: cad nye bar mdzod/ / gsung gi sprul pa dpal ldan ra ma ti// gru gsum dmar na gzhal gyi dbyings nas bzhengs// dmar mo chen mo dmar chen gtum ma ste// dbang gi phrin las thams cad grub par mdzod/
226a2: sku gsung thugs ldan sprul pa rgya mtsho ma// drag po 'joms mdzad bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// 'gro drug sgrol mdzad sems can kun gyi ma// bstan pargyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi lus
226a3: ngag yid gsum byin gyis rlobs/ / de nas dpal lha mo la lnga ma yin gyi rgyal po thag zangs ris kyis don dam pa'i sgo nas bstod pa// spros bral 'od gsal yang dag zhi ba'i ngang // thugs kyi thugs mchog
226a4: rnam dag bden pa'i yum/ / gdod nas gnyis med nam mkha'i snying po ni// dpal ldan khyod kyi rang bzhin khyad par gsal// 'di ltar rnam dag brjod med ngo bo la// byis pa rnams kyis bstong ba byed pa ltung /
226a5: thun po rnams kyis dngos por rab brtags nas// gzugs can tshul du gang zhig bstod pa'i tshig/ rgyal ba'i don spangs thugs chung khyod nyid la// tshig dang yi ge'i sgo nas bstod pa rnams// nams kyang grol
226a6: bar 'gyur ba'i chos nyid min/ / gdod nas gnyis med bde chen ma rtogs par// khyod kyi smon lam rtags kyi cho 'phrul la// den du bzung nas gang zhig bstod pa rnams// khyod la rten nas thams cad ltung bar 'gyur//
226a7: gang zhig skye ba med par shes pa dang // gdod nas gnyis med snying po bsgom nus na// gang zag des ni khyod nyid bstod pa yin// khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dzin pa yis// bskal pa grangs med 'das par rab bsdus
226a8: kyang / / khyed kyi gzugs dang kha dog mthong mi nus// gang zhig gzugs su mi 'dzin rnams kyis mthong // sgra dang tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyis// khyed na pos kyang bskal bar mi thos te// 'di dag spangs par
226b1: rnal 'byor de yis ni/ / khyod kyang thob la de yang khyod kyis thos// gang zhig lus ngag dge bas khyod bsgrub pa'i// blun po de yis nams kyang khyod nyid spangs// lus ngag spangs pa'i sems kyis khyod mchod nas// mchod na
226b2: dngos grub de yis ster thob 'gyur/ / khyod ni rgyal ba mang po'i yon tan sdud// chos kyi dbyings na rgyal ba rnams dang mngab// zab mo dbu ma'i rang bzhin ston pa'i phyir// mi mjed 'jig rten shin du rtsub pa 'dir// phyi rol
226b3: tshul gyis thams cad 'dren mdzad ma/ / khyod kyi sku ni 'di ltar rab rtags pa// sgrib pa mang po stong nyid dang du gshegs// stong nyid dam pa stong pa yang dag khyod// stong pa gnyis med shes pa rnams kyis bstod// 'di ltar
226b4: bstod na bstod par 'gyur grang bas/ / khyod ni bstod pa'i yul can ma yin yang // byis pa drang phyir don la 'di ltar bstod// de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje gser mig can gyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa// dpal ldan
226b5: lha mo dpag par dka' ba'i don/ / thabs kyi cho 'phrul nam mkha'i mkha' la spyod// byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa khyod nyid la// sgo gsum rdul snyed dbyangs kyis phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gis khyod ni mchod pas ma
226b6: bslabs kyang / / dpal ldan dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyir// 'dod pa'i yon tan mkha' la char bab pas// mchod pa'i tshogs 'das dbang po rgyas gyur cig/ dpal ldan khyod ni dge sdig dbang po ste// bdag gi lus ngag yid
226b7: kyi sdig pa'i tshogs/ / khyod kyi thad du 'gyod pas rab bshags na// thugs rje'i shugs kyis sgrib pa byang bar mdzod// khyod kyi khyad par yongs su 'phags pa ni// 'gro ba'i don mdzad bdag don phun sum tshogs// dga'
226b8: 'thun phrag dog med pa'i spros pa ni/ / rjes su yi rang khyod kyi rgyud la 'bul// 'di ltar yon tan ldan pa'i sku mchog ni// nag mo bzang mo 'jigs pa'i mthu stobs kyis// phyogs bcu dus gsum kun du 'gro don la/
227a1: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul gyis bskul bar spobs// yang dag khyed kyi yon tan sku mchog ni// gdug pa 'dul zhing bstan pa srung ba'i phyir// sems can zad par ma gyur bar du ni// mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par
227a2: gsol ba gdab/ / 'di ltar phyag 'tshal mchod nas bshags pa dang / rjes su yid rang bskal zhing gsol btab nas// dge ba 'di yis ngan song stongs gyur te// thams cad tshogs rdzogs byang chub chen por bsngo// de nas
227a3: dpal ldan lha mo nag mo la nam mkha'i lha brun rnams kyis bstod pa/ / bskal ba me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// rlung nag dgu pa'i klong 'khyil pho brang nas// ma cig 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma// bdud kyi yum la
227a4: gshin rje'i lcam cig ma/ / dpal ldan lha mo nag mo re ma ti// nag mo za byed rngam pa'i mche ba can// mthing nag gcer bu khrag gi ral pa can// khyod kyi sku mdog nag mor bzhugs pa ni// don dam dbyings la bskyod pa med pa'i
227a5: rtags/ / dbu skra g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil ba ni// yum gyi mkha' la sprul pa 'gyed pa'i rtags// dbu gtsug ral pa gcig tu lakhyil ba ni// don dam dgongs spyod gcig tu mdzad pa'i rtags// ral ba'i gsib nas me
227a6: rtag 'gro ba ni/ / thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed pa'i rtags// dbul thod rnon phreng babacings pa ni// thu brjes sAl sus 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags// g.yas na seng ge mchod pa ni// sman mo thams cad zil gyis
227a7: gnon pa'i rtags/ / g.yon ni sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka 'byar ba ni// zhe sdang ma spangs dbyings su dag pa'i rtags// snyan chag ser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba ni// sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen sgrub byed pa'i rtags// sman rtsa dmar la
227a8: sdang mig bgrang ba ni/ / srid gsum rnal 'byor dam tshig byar byed// zhal gyi drag po he ma khrang gdengs pa ni// bstan pa 'jig pa'i ru dra sgrol ba'i rtags// rdo gdug mche bzur gsum gtsigs pa ni/ bsgral ba'i
227b1: zhing bcus la sgrol ba'i rtags/ / skul zhing lpags g.yang gzhi gsol ba ni// yang dag chos dang don dang ldan pa'i rtags// glad chen ko rlon snam phyed dkris pa ni// theg pa mchog gi don dang ldan pa'i rtags// re lde nag pos
227b2: sngam byed dkris pa ni/ / 'jig rten 'din che btsan ldan pa'i rtags// lte ba khung nas nyi ma 'char ba ni// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gtingar nas skems pa'i rtags// spyi bo gtsug nas zla ba 'char ba ni// dug gsum ma rig mun
227b3: bsel ba'i rtags/ / zhabs la dbang gi lcags sgrog 'khyil ba ni// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i rtags// phyag g.yas shad lang nag po bsnams pa ni// sdug bsngal skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// phyag
227b4: g.yon thod rlon dmar chen 'thung ba ni/ / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal khrag ltar 'thung ba'i rtags/ bor bugapa pa byin phyogs zhon pa ni / log par lta ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i rtags// srin po'i ag mas snga ru byas pa ni// srin yul
227b5: lang ka bu ra 'dul ba'i rtags/ / sprul nag chun pos gong sbed byas pa ni// zhe sdang dbang gis bgegs rigs 'joms pa'i rtags// rus sbal nag po'i pheg bu btang ba ni// klu bdud nag po dam la btags pa'i
227b6: rtags/ / snga sha g.yas pa bdud kyi khrim pa ma ni// dam tshig nyams pa khram la 'debs pa'i rtags// byi shar nad kyi rgyal pa btags pa ni// bstan pa 'di la gnod pa'i dgra bol// nadaka 'bebs shing dal kha sbyar ba'i
227b7: rtags/ / don dam bcud kyi rtags su zhag gi zer ris btang // thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su rag ta'i thig les brgyan// 'dul byed phrin las rtags su thal ba'i mtshan mas btab// ma mo 'bum phrag brin du
227b8: 'khol ba ni/ / khams gsum khyab par phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags// ma cig kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems// lag na rdo rje 'phyar bas ri rab tsheg bor 'phen// bdag gis brtson par lha mo khyod la bstod// de nas yang/
228a1: gshin rjen ga pos dpal lha mo la che ba'i yin tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa// lha mo dpa la ldan mapar bgron ga ma khyod lan// na du til mar byas byugs lan phrag cags // nyan nas bsnyungs shing malug/
228a2: mang po 'chang byed ma// rgyun du rkang sgrogs lcags la byas pa gcig gis rkang la mdzes par brgyan pa ste// mtshan mo bong bu zhon nas 'gro ba de ni nag mo khyod nyid yini par shes// ral bas bdag nyid mdzes par brgyan
228a3: khyod kyi spyod pa mtsho chen don dag su yis shes/ / 'khor ba 'dzag pa'i tshe na mi rus dag la khrag dang zhag 'dzag dub 'thul pa na// nag mo mche ba mi bzad khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam du zhugs par 'gyur//
228a4: lha mo lag na mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal 'byor can du dur khrod dgyes// khyod ni g.yog bcas mya ngan med cing 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par dril bu'i sgra yang sgrogs// khyod ni dpa' bo dag gi mgo
228a5: bcad g.yul du mtshon gyis bsad pa'i mgo phreng lag na thogs shing gar thabs skor zhing lag pa brkyang bskum che/ / rkub tshes che la klu dbang ga shibs pa'i ske rags bcings shing lag na mdung dang ba dan
228a6: thogs/ / khrag gi chang gis ra ro myos te mig rtsad dmar por byas nas mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu ba 'byung po thal chen kun gyis mthong // rkang pa'i gos ni kau rlon mtshan pas drangs pas snam gyi byed ni re ldes
228a7: dkris/ / mi ye rgyu ma sar pa'i sbubs kyis zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing khrag dgag gi tshem bus thig le rabargyan// mi yi shal so sor che mche ma tha yin mi ro dag gi cod pan mgo la brgyan pa ste// bdag la skyob pa
228a8: drag mo mi sha thegs pa khyod ni snga nas ma mthong gzod mthong na/ / bdud dang srin mo ma mo rnams kyang mig rtsa rig rig ngas zhing khyod la 'dud// lha mo bzang mo lus mdog gnag cing bzod par dga' ba khyod la brgya/
228b1: byin la sogs pas// bstod pa byed pa'i gshin rje'i rgyal po nyid kyang rtag tu 'dud// ldan mas dang ni 'gro ba ma lus mjug btul bas na na pa ya gcig la// brang gis 'gro ba sbal mgo gdengs ka stong dang ldan
228b2: 'ang gcig gis rgyab nas rgyan du byas/ / ya gcig la ni seng ge mtshungs med thogs shing rgya mtsho skor zhings gzhi gnon pas steng gi/ phyogs nas rtsu ba'i nyim zla ba lha mo khyod kyi ste nas 'char zhing srid gsum
228b3: zil gyis gnon/ / rgya mtsho klong nas me 'bar chu rnams skems par byed par nus pa'i bud med thams cad zhi mdzad ma// lha chen sku dang 'tsham par bzhugs pa'i dka' bzlog nag mo mi nad thugs nang kun la
228b4: 'jigs pa med/ / ma gcig khyod nyid la ni bdag ni gus par phyag 'tshal mchod cing bstod par bgyi// de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la bram ze mchog sred kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa brten par bstod pa// ma cig
228b5: lha mo dpal lha mo/ / rdo rje lha mo nag mo che// mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi btsun par khyod bstod kyis// bkra shis mchog grub sems gter gnas// yid myur gzugs chen kun dugag+sa/
228b6: ma mor grags shing 'jig rten skyong // dpal brtul drag spyod brtson 'grus che// 'thab mo g.yul las rtag tu rgyal// gshin rje'i sring mo yin par bstod// gos su dar gos sngon po gsol// sdug dang mi
228b7: sdug cha lugs 'chang / / sman mig mthong na mi sdug kun du sdang // dad cing tshogs pa'i mi rnams sdud// res 'ga' ri brag zab mor gnas// res 'ga' tshal dang shing la gnas// res 'ga' dur khrod dbus
228b8: ni gnas/ / lha mo'i gnas rten de ru 'cha'// gnas de raM deng tshal dgan du// rtag du lha mo khyod bstod na// desas dgongs pa skong bar byed// bdag gis rtag tu bstod byas na// bdag gi bsam pa grub pa
229a1: mdzod/ / rma bya'i sgo la rgyal mtshan byas// gang zhig rtag bsten srung bar byed// gnag lug phyugs rnams 'phel bar byed// seng ge stag dang spyang gi yis// rtag tu kun nas bskor nas kyang // rdo rje dril chen
229a2: snyan par sgrogs/ / byin te dril chen snyan par sgrogs// lan 'ga' lag na tri shul thogs// lan 'ga' nyi zla'i ru mtshon 'phyar// mar gyi tshes dgu bcu gcig na// de yi dus su mchod byas na// lha mo khyod las lhag pa
229a3: med/ / bdud 'dul lha min sring mor ston// dgra dang 'thab tshe rgyal bar byed// bud med nang na mchog yin te// tshig dbang 'jig rten mgon po 'dra// rgyal po'i khab na pad ma 'dra// zhal bzangs zla ba nya ba 'dra// chu la rgal
229a4: na gru zam 'dra/ / phongs pa rnams kyi gnyen bshes 'dra// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed tshe// lha mo khyod kyi lte ba la/ lha rnams kun gyi rdzong bcas nas// lha dmag dkar po rgyal bar byas// lha ma yin rnams pham par
229a5: byed/ / lag na mdung dmar chems se chems// ru mtshon ba dan me ltar 'bar// dgra 'dul g.yul zlog khyed la bstod// de nas drang srong chen po kauN+Di n+yas dpal lha mo la dpe byad kyi sgo nas bstod pa// 'jig rten gtse la
229a6: rtag tu gus phyag 'tshal/ / mi rnams nang na khyod ni rtag tu mchog yin te// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod// byad bzhin sdug mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs lus rab brgyan//
229a7: mig yangs 'dam skyes sngon po'i mdab ma 'dra// bsod nams ye shes snang ba grags pas brgyan// dper na rin thang med pa'i nor bu 'dra// deng bdag pad mo khyod la bsngags pas kyang // sems la bsam pa thams
229a8: cad 'grub par 'gyur/ / yang dag ye shes gya nom bkra shis pa// pad ma lta bur shin tu rnam par dag/ lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyi lta bar mos// mtshan ma yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan/ dri med ye shes rnam das
229b1: rab mdzes pa/ / dran pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu gyur// ci ltar seng ge gcan zan mchog gyur bzhin// bsngags bstod tshig ni 'di las 'byung ba yis// bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad grub par shog ces bstod do// de nas
229b2: dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal ba/ / khyed kyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa legs so// da yang bstod pa 'di dag gi don bsgoms shig/ yid la rtag tu zlos cig/ lha mo 'di la bstod pa ni ngal bstod pa yin no//
229b3: sangs rgyas thams cad la bstod pa yin no// lha mo des kyang mi 'di srung bar byed do// skyob par byed do// ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster ro// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor de rnams rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
229b4: la rgyan gyi char chen po phab nas so so'i gnas su 'khod do/ / bstod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI de bi kA li aSh+Ta sha ta ka/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i mtshan
229b5: brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i byang chub sems
229b6: dpa' thams cad la bden pa'i mtshan rnams ston par mdzad do/ / de'i tshe dpal lha mo nag ma tshan mo yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs cig
229b7: tu 'dug go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtson 'grus kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' srin mo'i cha lugs kyis 'jig rten pa'i don mdzad pa'i mtshan
229b8: gyi rnam grangs ji lta bu lags zhes gsol ba dang / / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtson 'grus la dgongs nas dpal lha mo nag mo la gzigs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// thos bsam
230a1: sgom la cher gnas pa'o/ / rgyu 'bras rkyen gyi bdag nyid can// 'gro la phan mdzad mkhas pa'i mchog/ dpal ldan lha mo nag mo 'phags// byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa ste// sa ltar brten pa'i gzhir
230a2: gyur pa/ / yon tan sdud byed chu dang 'dra// byang chub smin byed me lta bu// dge ba'i 'du byed rlung ltar g.yo// shes rab rnam dag nam mkha' ste// khyod ni 'byung ba chen po 'dra// 'byung po pal cha rnams kyis bstod// bsod na
230a3: ye shes rab bsags pa'i/ / las dang rnam smin dag la mkhas// nga rgyal gzugs kyi 'dul ba goms// shes rab snying rje'i lam du 'gro// khyod ni bum pa bzang lta bu// dper na yid bzhin nor bu'i chu// kun la phan pa'i
230a4: dpag bsam shing / / nyi ma 'dra bar khyod la gsal// zla ltar gsal ba'i thugs mnga' zhing // ming ni ri bong rwa dang 'dra// rang gi rgyud ni 'khor lo 'dra// u du mthar ltar khyod dkon yang // bdud rtsi lta bur yongs
230a5: tshim mdzad/ / 'gro ba kun gyi bdag mo lags// rang bzhin med pa'i chos kyang ston// chu dang nam mkha'i tshub ma ltar// gdul bya'i srid gsum cis kyang 'dul// dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa skyong // dam pa rnams
230a6: dang yang dag gcig/ dam pa rnams kyi lam du 'gro// lha mo ma mo gnod sbyin mo// srin mo klu mo sha za mo// gdug mo 'byung mo grul bum mo// drag mo rngam tshul glog 'gyu ma// rlung mo nag mo 'jigs byed ma/
230a7: mkha' 'gro gtum mo zhing sgrol ma// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag pos 'dul// dkar ser ljang nag dmar yang ston// rnam pa brgyad kyi dbyibs kyang 'byung // 'gro ba drug po'i tshul yang ston// phung po lnga yang brjod
230a8: par nus/ / dbang po chem byed yul lnga'ang ston// rten cing 'brel ba'i spyod pa mkhas// yul can rnams ni gsod la mkhas// de bzhin dag rnams gsod pa dang // lus can rnams ni gsod la brtson// sems
230b1: ni gsod pa med la mkhas/ / 'khor ba las ni ring du song // de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan te// byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong mdzad dpal ldan ma// dam chos 'dzin pa rnams la
230b2: byams/ / oM AHb+h+rUM shrI da bi kA li sa ma ya dza/ DA kI ni nA ya sa ma ya swA hA// ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang 'dzin pa// yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad kyang thob// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur// yi dgas gnas su mi
230b3: skye zhing / / sgrol song skye bas thogs mi 'gyur// lus 'phags gnas su skyes pa na// thog las sogs pa mi 'bab cing // sgra mi snyan du rung gis min// de bzhin pa glang spyod du yang // chu dang rlabs kyis khyer mi nus//
230b4: 'dzam bu gling du gang skyes pa// sna tshogs gnod pas nyen mi 'gyur// 'dod pa'i lha rnams gnas su yang // skyes nas chos la dga' bar 'gyur// bsam gtan bzhi yi skye gnas su// tshad med bzhi ni 'phel bar 'gyur//
230b5: gzugs med gnas ni bzhi por yang // don med na ni mi skye ste// 'du shes med par nams kyang min// 'phags pa bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su// khams gsum tshul gyis bdag don spyod// rtag tu yul la chags mi
230b6: 'gyur/ / sems la 'dzin par mi byed de// nyon mongs rtsa ba drug po dang // de bzhin nye ba nyi shu dang // mtshams med lnga yang byang bar 'gyur// bskal pa grangs med mang por yang // mi khom brgyad du skye mi 'gyur// mu stegs
230b7: rtsod pazlog pa dang / / mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing // tshe ring nad med dpal dang ldan// sdug bsngal rnam pa mang por yang // rnam kyang 'khor bar mi ltung zhing // mya ngan 'das pa thob bya'i phyir// nyan thos sa rnams
230b8: non pa dang / / rten 'brel bcu gnyis shes par bya// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni// rab dag 'dri med 'od byed 'phro// sbyang dka' mngon gyur ring du song // mi g.yo legs pa chos kyi sprin// sangs rgyas sa chen bla na med//
231a1: bcu gnyis po yang thob 'gyur te// kun du 'ong dang bdud rtsi 'od// nam mkha'i 'od dang rdo rje'i 'od// rin chen 'od dang pad ma'i 'od// las kyi 'od dang dpe med sa// dpal ldan sa dang shes rab 'od// thams cad
231a2: mkhyen dang rang rig ste/ / bcu gnyis sangs rgyas sa rnams kyang // 'di che byung na myur du thob// sa rnams ma thob bar du yang // 'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang // shes rab snying rje ldan gyur cing // chos la dga' ba rnams kyis
231a3: srung/ / dngos grub thob ste de bzhin gshegs// rin chen las byung thob par 'gyur// dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang // dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang 'dzin pa// yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad
231a4: thob ste/ / sku gsung thugs ni grub nas kyang // khams gsum chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// zhes gsungs pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang // dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/
231a5: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod do// dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa yon tan dang bcas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / 6// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
231a6: bgrod gdus gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dang / 'dod chags ni sdang gti mug gsum gyi rgyus// sdig sprin las thub lha dang sgyu ma yin// dmyal tshogs ma ltar 'bar ba 'a gnas 'dir// sha thag
231a7: dmar la rol ba'i lha mo khyod/ / lha yi g.yul ngo rgyal bar zhal 'ches la// lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams drag par mdzad// ces bstod do// rdzogs s+ho// @6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yas pa
231a8: She tra Ta ka tA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod sang du/ 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gci/
231b1: na// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te// phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
231b2: bo dang yang thabs gcig go/ / de'i tshe na mu stegs can kun du rgyu ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gnod par bya ba'i phyir// ro langs chen po bdun btang bar gyur to// de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba las/
231b3: de dag gis glags ma rnyed// dmigs pa ma rnyed do// de dag gis glags ma rnyed/ dmigs pa ma rnyed nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la der song ste phyin
231b4: nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i lus la reg go// reg ma thag tu kun dga' bo de sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa tshab/ shil thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems
231b5: te/ bdag ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa// drag pa/ tsha ba/ shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan na bcom ldan 'das des ma dgongs so// bdag 'di ltar nyam nga bar gyur na de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so snyam mo//
231b6: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par 'gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de lta bu de tshe dang ldan pa shA
231b7: ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos thos so// de nas de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gal ba der song ste byin nas 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag pa/
231b8: tsha ba'i tshor ba myong nas bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so zhes ci de skad ces smra'am/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gi lus
232a1: la tshor ba dang ldan pa ni dper na sog les mgo bo gshegs pa ltar kun dga' bo la reg pa yang de dang 'dra'o/ / kun dga' bo ma 'jigs shig/ bdag cag gis khyod khri'i steng du bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung
232a2: du bkur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de khyod la yongs su skyob par mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dag bo nyal khri'i steng du bzhag nas// bcom ldan
232a3: 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod ci sdug bsngal mi bzad pa// drag pa/ tsha ba'i tshor bas
232a4: thebs sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// kun dga' bo khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// kun dga' bo khyod la reg pa'i ro langs chen po stobs che ba// gdul
232a5: dka' ba/ mthong na gnod pa bdun yod de/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phreng ba 'dzin ces bya ba dang / nor bu 'dzin dang / gtum po dang / gdol pa dang / rma bya'i snying dang / tshe zad dang / la ba can te/ ro langs chen po bdun po de dag ni
232a6: stobs che ba/ gdul dka' ba/ bsten par dga' ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba'o// kun dga' bo ro langs re res kyang 'dod na rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos ri'i rgyal po re rab kyang baphen te// ri'i rgyal po ri rab yungs
232a7: 'bru tsam du rnam par 'jig go/ steng du bltas nas 'gas par byed do// phyogs su bltas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// phyogs mtshams su bltas na mes sreg par byed do// de dag gis khyod la reg go// de lta mod kyi de bzhin
232a8: gshegs pa'i mthu dang / / chos thos pa'i gus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis da dung du khyod kyi lus 'tshe ba yin no/ kun dga' bos gsol ga/ bcom ldan 'das legs par bas 'dugasol// phyir bzlog du gsol/
232b1: bya rgya ci du so// srung bas bci dugasol/ bcom ldan das kyis bka phrul ba/ ku / khod pa kyi begs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ha ra/ ma hA gA re/ g+ha sa ra ba ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ri/ d+ha ra Ni/ tsher tshor/ Ni ka ro ta ti/
232b2: tas ma d+ha ni/ sa ma sa ra Ni/ sa ra na ko ta ma ti/ sa ma b+ha b+he/ b+ha ba ni/ nA ga re/ b+ha da nI/ sA dA na~M ti swA hA/ kun dga' bo gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lan lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te// mdung ba lnga bcu cu gnyis bo na
232b3: brjed byed thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi snying la gnod pa byas par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad kyis byas pa las thar bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das legs so// de ltar mdzod cig/ slar yang mi 'chi bar
232b4: mdzad du gsol/ kun dga' ba de'i phyir nyon la legs par yang zung shig/ tad+ya thA/ pad tsa le ba le/ ma hA bad tsa le ba le// b+hi li b+hi li/ ma dA b+hi ri ni/ ni mi ri ni/ ha na ha na ha ti ri/ ma tsa tha/ ma bi tsar thA/ ti re s+thir mu le/ mtha
232b5: nir ma tha ni/ tsA la ni/ mA ka mi dzam b+ha ni/ bI dA ni/ ba ya sa kri ni/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ta thA ga ta/ bi ta the/ ti be g+ha d+ha re/ ba ra pra de/ ha re tiSh+Tha/ ni la ba sa ni swA hA// kun dga' bo ro langs 'di dag ni 'tsheg pa/ sdang ba/ gdum por
232b6: gyur pa/ gsod par 'gyur ba'o// de la rig sngags 'dis ki mo ru ka'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dor ro// des na 'byung po chen po shin tu 'khrugs par 'gyur ro//
232b7: 'dis thams cad kyang sdang bar 'gyur/ 'dzem par 'gyur/ zhi bar 'gyur zhing / 'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur/ 'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo nyon cig dang
232b8: bstan par bya'o/ / tad+ya thA/ da ra da ra da ra/ ka ra ka ra kar ka ra/ ma hA kag ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsad tsa ra/ ma hA tsad tsa ra/ ha la ha la ha la/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ hi re bi re/ hi ri ki ri/ be re bi tsi/ ni ka ra na ka ri/ sarbaSh+Ta tan+dan/ pra dza ma thA la ni
233a1: nil ba rabs ni/ cang tshu/ tsakra/ tsakra/ a yu d+he swA hA// kun dga' bo 'di dag ni gnod sbyin thams cad dang / srin po thams cad dang / gsang sngags thams cad dang / yi dgas dang / byang dang / sdig pa rab du zhi bar byed
233a2: pa'o/ / rgyal pos bkrabs pa dang / la gcan pa phyir zlog par byed do// de la rig sngags 'di skud pa dmar po la lan sum bcu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ mdun pa sum bcu rtsa bdun bor na thams cad la rengs par
233a3: byas par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig/ chongs shig/ legs par rab tu yid la zung shog/ rjes su sbyor bar gyis shig/ de lta bas na kun dga' bo khyod kyis dran pa dang ldan pas
233a4: gzung bar bya'o/ / tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha d+ha ra/ kha ra kha ra/ ma hA kha ra/ ma hA ba le/ ba nI sha ni go ta Ta Ni/ kud Ta nI/ kud Ta nI/ sa ma hA re/ kUd dang shwe/ ka kha kha re/ ma kud ta d+ha re ni/ mu lug ka/ k+She ne ka kai rI ke/ sa marma sha ni/ ki naM/
233a5: gi ri ni/ b+ho gi se ri/ sa sA be tad/ ku su ra ka/ kri ti sA si/ kin na bi bud d+ha si/ bi bud d+ha/ bi bud d+h+ya/ gri tA na b+h+yAM/ kri ta b+hai ra ba/ bi kri ta b+hai ra ba/ ma hA ba ye/ kA tAn/ hA ra si/ kin na mA ra ya si/ kin na sarba de ba/ nA ga/ yak+Sha/ gan d+ha ra
233a6: ba/ / a su ra/ sarba a su ra/ sarba b+hA ya sha ma na/ mang sa ra sA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags 'di sbyin bsreg gam/ skud bas bcings na 'dod pa'i mthar gtogs pa thams cad 'jig par byed/ lung bar byed/ za bar byed do//
233a7: kun dga' bo ro langs thams cad rengs par byed pa'i rig sngags zung shig/ t+yad thA/ se me le/ ma hA ha ha le/ ha ra ha rau/ g+ho ra d+ha re d+ha rang ti rid ti/ bi rod ti/ ku nad ti/ ku ta ni/ sang go tsa ni/ ga tsa ri/ kha tsa ri/ ma ra ne/ tu hu/ ma re ne/
233a8: ma hA ma la d+ha re/ na yo na ma ti swA hA/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dmod pa drag po dang mtshungs shing 'dra ste/ 'byung po thams cad rnam par bshig pa'i phyir bal gtsang ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa bzhir
233b1: bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi por na/ log 'dren thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// bran dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dgazung shig/ legs par rab tu gzung bar gyis shig/ kun dga' bo gas pa
233b2: sngags 'di gang yang rung bas/ gzung bar mi nus so// kun dga' bo de ltabs na legs par bzung bar gyis shig/ taHthA/ tsad cang/ tsad tsar/ ma hA tsad tsar/ tsir tsi ri/ khu ra tha ra/ ma d+ha rba na/ sa mab+ha le/ mahA saM b+hA le/
233b3: ma hA ba le swA hA// kun dga' bo lnga dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas// tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / skyes dgur bcas pa'i 'jig rten na gang zhig gsang sngags 'di la mi spo ba ni ngas rjes su ma mthong ste/
233b4: srung ba dang / rjes su 'brang ba yin no// gsang sngags 'di ni mi bzad pa ste/ sreg par byed/ 'tshed par byed/ 'ching bar byed/ 'joms par byed/ 'bar bar byed pa yin te/ rig sngags lan drug bcu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/
233b5: mdud pa drug bcu rtsa gcig bor na sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed/ rig sngags gcod par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das legs so// /
233b6: legs par gzung lags so// mdud pa dor du gsol// phyag rgya gzhag par mdzad du gsol// kun dga' bo de'i phyir/ tad+ya thA/ b+ha b+ha re/ b+ha re/ b+ha ra ni he ra pra ha re/ ha ra ni/ ku tha ni ti Ta/ led tshad da te/ tshangs pas byas pa'i rig
233b7: sngags gcad do/ / dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// khyab 'jug gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// brgya byin gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// rgyal po chen po bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags
233b8: gcad do/ / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// zla ba dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// gza' dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// gza' dang rgyu skar gyis byas pa'i rig sngags
234a1: gcad do/ / phyogs nas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phyogs mtshams nas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// steng nas byas pa dang / 'og nas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// lhas byas pa'i rig sngags
234a2: gcad do/ / klus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// gnod sbyin gyis byas pa dang / nam mkha' lding gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// grul bum gyis byas pa dang / tshor ba pas byas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal
234a3: rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gdol pas byab ba dang / kla klo dang / ri khrod pas byas pa dang / seng ge dang / sbrul gyis byas pa dang / 'gro lding ba'i yid kyis byas pa dang / gsungs pos
234a4: byas pa dang / to sa la bas byas pa dang / mA dag ri khrod pas byas pa dang / sems can thams cad rig sngags 'chang bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// tad+ya thA/ ga ga gA ra li phu/ ma hA ga ga gA ra li phu/ be she phu sha ba ra sid d+hi
234a5: tsan dA li pra/ mahA tsan dA li phu/ tso ga phu/ tsi mi re pra/ tsi ni mi re ru/ tsakre pra/ tsakra dA re phu/ tsakra dA re prA/ kri sh+le phu/ kri shwe ru pa phu/ tsan de phu/ so ge phu/ pan tsa Ta lI phu/ pan tsa le phu/ b+hi me phu/ b+hi bA ba le phu/ bing ga le phu/ bir
234a6: gA la/ a k+She pya/ a nan de pra/ sa man te prA/ nA shan+ni pra/ tshed ni phru/ bidi che danaM pram+bA hwA/ kris naM/ bak+ShA ni/ m+bA ra ni/ bi na da ni/ bin d+ya nan/ bak+Sha ne/ nA shA ni/ khAd d+ya ka nan/ gA la b+hinA shA nI/ d+hA tA ma siT+Ta s+sa/ b+ha sma ni/ mas
234a7: ni/ ban d+ha ni swA hA/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni mtshan mo gzi brjid 'phrog par byed pa'o// kun dga' bo nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe/ ro langs chen po gnod byed ces bya ba zhig
234a8: yod de/ de ston gyi dus kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis rjes su zhugs nas/ gang 'od zer de dag gis gang la reg 'od zer gyi dra bas reg nas rims su 'gyur te de yang gtsang ngo // kun dga' bo ro langs kha gcig pa zhes bya ba zhig
234b1: yod de/ de yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o// klu'i rgyal pos 'dzin ces bya ba yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o// klu thams cad dang / grul bum thams cad dang / yi dgas dang / sha za thams cad kyang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/
234b2: nam mkha' lding yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ nor 'dzin yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ rlung lha yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ sgyu ma len gyi bu ba ro ba ti/ she rung dro yang 'di nyid kyi nang du sdus/ phung po 'dzin mdung thung 'dzin
234b3: kyang de bzhin du bsdus/ de bzhin du blon po dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pa yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus so// kun nas dpag tshad brgya dag tu/ nga yis chad pa dag byas pas// ral 'byung po byar ci yod/ nga yis sdang ba
234b4: thams cad bcom/ / gsod par gyur pa stobs po che// ro langs dag gis byar ci yod// de dag kyang ni nga'i zhags pas// kun nas yongs su bskor ba yin// zhags pa kun gyis de dag kyang // rmugs shing shin tu rmongs par
234b5: byas/ / 'di yis bdag gis kun 'grub cing / gsang sngags tshig rnams grub gyur cig/ na ma sid d+ha nAn/ sid d+han tu man tra pA da swa stir mi sarba satwa nan tsa swA hA// sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang // dgra bcom
234b6: rnams kyi stobs gang dang / / dam pa'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis// bde legs su ni rab gyur cig/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi gzi yis rtag tu 'jigs pa thams cad la swA hA/ cho ga ni lan drug bcu rtsa gcig bzlas
234b7: brjod byas te/ / kai me ru dang / bal gtsang ma la sogs pa'i skud pa dmar po la mdud pa dor ro// de bzhin du bya ba yang bya'o// 'byung po thams cad dang / brjed byed dang / sems rnam par g.yeng byed la sogs pa dang / dug byin pa
234b8: dang / dug byas pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi rnams la kun tu 'gro ba grub pa'i mchog yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
235a1: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud
235a2: d+ha sing ha dang / bar de ye shes snying po sdes bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+ya ka ra sing ta dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ su ru ba nA ma d+ha ra NI/
235a3: bod skad du/ su ru ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// na maHsu ru ba ya ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te saM mya ka saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM su ru su rA pra su ru pra su ru/
235a4: ta ra ta ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ sma ra sma ra/ san ta ra pa ya san ta ra ba ya/ sarbapra ta dA nAM swA hA// gzungs 'di chu dang bcas pa'i zan la lan bdun yongs su bzlas te lag pa g.yon pas se gol gyi sbrul na gsum du byas
235a5: nas yi dgas thams cad la dben pa'i sa phyogs su sbyin par bya zhing / 'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste/ skabs tshol ba dang glags lta ba rnams dengs shig/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i yi dgas rnams
235a6: la bza' ba 'di bdag gis sbyin par bgyi'o zhes pa'o/ / zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol nyid du sbyin par bya'o// de ltar na yi dgas thams cad la 'bras bre bo che re re'i bza' ba so sor byin par 'gyur ro// de ltar byas na
235a7: skye ba nas skye bar yang nyam chung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / dbul por mi 'gyur ro// stobs che ba dang / mdzes pa dang / mthong na dga' ba dang / phyug cing longs spyod che bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang / myur du bla na med pa
235a8: yid dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// gzugs legs shes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho//
235b1: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// oM dz+nyA na bi lo ki ti sa man ta s+phar nar shrI b+ha ba sa ma ya ma dA ma Ni du ru ru ru hrid ya dz+wa la ni hUM/ 'bab chu'am/ mtsho'i 'gram du 'dug ste/ lag pa g.yas pa'i khyor bar chu thugs la/
235b2: ye shes kar mda'i snying po 'di lan bdun bzlas te/ chu khyor ba bdun 'bab chu'am/ chur gtor na sangs rgyas kyi spyan ras gzigs pa'i yi dgas ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lha'i kha zas kyi ro dang / btung ba'i ro mchog
235b3: dang ldan pa 'thob cing yi dgas re re la yang kha zas dang / btud ba yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bdun bdun gyis tshim par byas par 'gyur zhing / chu de 'thungs pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad yi dgas kyi skye gnas las mthar cing bde 'gro
235b4: mtho ris kyi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ gzhan yang byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dgas sam/ bya 'am/ chu na gnas pa la sogs pa gang gis chu de 'thungs
235b5: ba de dag thams cad sdig pa dang / sgrub pa thams cad byang zhing / bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ye shes skar mda'i snying po rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ a mri ta b+ha ba nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/
235b6: bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab byang chub kyi shing drung na/
235b7: 'khor rnam bzhi dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyis bskor nas bzhugs so// de nas 'khor rnams kyi nang nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnam pa bzhi dang / rigs drug gi sems can thams cad
235b8: la/ spos dang / sman dang / zhal zas kyi mchod pa chen po bshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba 'di rnams sems can rnams kyi don
236a1: dbye gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhal zas kyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng duraM dkar po la chos thams
236a2: cad rdul dang bral ba'o/ / zhes bya ba'i sgra byung bas zhal zas kyi dri ma dag par gyur to// yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a dkar po bsams te/ zhal zas lha'i bdud rtsi dang / yo byad du gyur to// yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
236a3: gyi steng du/ oM zhes pas 'phags pa dang sems can thams cad mnyes shing tshim par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rdo rje ltar byas te gzungs 'di gsungs so// oM sarba d+harma ta badz+ra sid te hU~M/ oM a
236a4: pri ta tAM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yoHbi shwa mu ge b+h+yaHsarba tad khaM ud ga te s+pha ran ti maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ti saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA/
236a5: d+ha na swA hA// zhes gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu mchod pa'i zhal zas kyis mchod nas/ 'phags pa thams cad mnyes pa dang / sems can thams cad bde bar gyur to// de nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis bcom ldan
236a6: 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthu dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi mthu dang / bdag gi bsam pa
236a7: rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis 'phags pa thams cad kyi pho brang dang / sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang / sems can thams cad kyi mthu la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod dpag tu med cing brjod kyis mi khyab pa// /
236a8: brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa 'byung zhing rgyas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi bden pa
236b1: byin gyi sarlabs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te chos kyi sbyin pa dang / bdag gi zang zing gi sbyin pa 'dis bde ba dang / dga' bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ khyim bdag bzang skyong legs so/
236b2: dka' ba'i spyod pa 'di lta bu byed pa legs so nga'i 'khor lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang 'di ltar mchod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / khyim bdag bzang
236b3: stong rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de dga' bar gyur to// bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // #// yi dgas mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i
236b4: gtor ma'i cho ga/ do// na mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skyan shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi tshogs
236b5: chen po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te chos ston to// de nas kun dga' bo dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag 'jog cing rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas chos mngon sum du byed pa na/ mtshan mo nam gyi cha smad la de'i
236b6: mdun du yi dgas mo kha' bar ma 'dug nas smras pa/ kye kun dga' bo khyod gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur te/ yi dgas kyi gnas 'dir skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bos smras pa/ brten pa'i thabs ci yod/ yi dgas mos
236b7: smras pa/ kun dga' bo gal te nang bar yi dgas gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag la yi dgras re re la yang zas dang skom yul ma ga ta'i bre bo che bdun bdun tsam byin te/ bram ze'i drang srong
236b8: 'bum yang tshim par byas la/ bdag gi ming gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na/ de ltar na khyod kyi tshe yang phyir nur bar 'gyur la/ bdag kyang yi dgas kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te mtho ris kyi 'jig
237a1: rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas kun dga' bos ye dgas mo la 'bar ma rid cing mdog ngan la lus skem pa/ kha nas me lce 'bar ba/ lho dang kha skam pa/ ral ba'i phung po g.yasas spu dang / sen mo rid ba mthong ste/
237a2: tshig mi snyan cing yid du mi 'ong ba de thos nas klag cing sngangs te/ spu zing zhes byed nas/ stan las langs te shin tu rings pa dang / shin du myur ba'i shugs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
237a3: 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ste/ / 'dar bzhin du 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyabs mdzad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bdag ni gnangs srog 'gum par 'gyur lags so//
237a4: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yi dgas mo kha 'bar ma mthong ste/ khyod gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/ bdag gis thabs ci mchis shos smra na/ de'i mchid nas gal te khyod kyis yi dgas gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag
237a5: khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag tshim par byas te/ bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim par byas na/ de ltar na khyod kyi tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bka'
237a6: sbrul du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo gang gis khyod yi dgas rnams dang / bram ze'i drang srong rnam
237a7: tshim par byed par 'gyur ba'i thabs yod kyis ma 'jigs shig/ kun dga' bo thams cad du 'od dang ldan pa rgyal chen shugs ldan 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ des byin pa tsam gyis yi dgas gang gA'i klung
237a8: ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag tshim pa byas par 'gyur te/ yi dgas dang / bram ze'i drang srong re re la zas dang skom yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyur ro// de ni nga sngon bram zer gyur pan
237b1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las ngas bzung ste/ des yi dgas dang bram ze'i drang srong grangs su bgrang ba mang
237b2: ba dang / res mang ba dgangs zas dang skos kyis tshim par byas te/ de dag thams cad yi dgas kyi 'jig rten nas/ shi 'phos nas lha'i 'jig rten nang du skyes so// kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung la rdo lon gyis shig/
237b3: na maHsarba ta thA ga tA a ba lo ki te/ oM sa ma b+hA ra sa ma b+hA ra hUM/ kun dga' bo 'dis yi dgas kyi gtor ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas lag pa brkyang ste sgo drung du sbyin par bya'o// se gol yang brdab rdza
237b4: bya'o/ / de ltar byas nas byin ma thag tu phyogs bzhi'i yi dgas gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig gi bye ma snyed dag tshim par byas par 'gyur te/ yi dgas re re la yang yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyur po
237b5: de dag zos pa tsam gyis yi dgas kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo khyod kyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi
237b6: 'chad par khor zug tu bsnyad par bya'o/ / de ltar byas na bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ tshe yang ring bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par
237b7: 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu mi ma yin pa rgyu ba 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / yi dgas rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang yang ldan par 'gyur
237b8: ro/ gzugs dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// bram ze'i drang srod tshim par byed 'dod pa des ni mchod yon dang / dbul bar bya ba snod bkang ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod
238a1: byas la 'bab chug la yod pa'i gnas der sbyin par bya'o/ / di ltar byas na bram ze'i drang srong gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i bye ma snyed dag lha'i bza' ba dang / btung ba rnams kyis tshim par
238a2: byas par 'gyur ro/ / bram ze'i drang srong de dag kyang dbang ba tshim par 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis oM bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin par byed la/ sems can de dag kyang bsam pa yongs su dag par
238a3: 'gyur te/ / bram ze'i gzi rdzid dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ga tu tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig zag 'bum gyi byem snyed dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro//
238a4: rtag du dgra thams cad shigs par 'gyur ro// me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ spos sam/ zas dang / skom gyi yo byad la lan nyi shun+da gcig bzlas brjod byas la/ sangs kyis dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'o// de ltar
238a5: byas na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge snyen ma des/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
238a6: lalha'i mchod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// bla mar byas/ ri mor byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs shing lung bstan pa dang / lha
238a7: thams cad kyis kun du bsrung bar yang 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo song la ngo lon yang gyis shig/ sems can thams cad la yang yang dag par ston cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyang gyis shig ces nga smra'o//
238a8: dgas mo kha 'a bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs s+ho// / rtag da du / khyed mul Na I pA ya sha mA.A nA mA rbA gi shog du yi dgas nas me chu ma nes pa'i rlu / chos mnan das yul ser skyan dge 'dun gyi gnas na/ dge
238b1: slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' zangs med pas yongs su bskor ba la chas ldan / da' tsha tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bas mtha' shig na chos yid la byed cing dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'dug la de'i drung /
238b2: mo rnam gyi cha skad la yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bya ba gzugs byed mi sdug pa/ shin tu rid cing skems pa kha nas me 'badag mgrin pa mo khab tsam du brag sgra 'dzings pa/ sen ma dang mche ba ring ba rno ba shin du
238b3: 'jigs su rung bzhig dga' bo'i drung du 'ongs nas/ dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod de ste zhag bdun na tshe'i dus byas te/ yi dgas kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// dga' bos de smras pa de thos
238b4: nas shin tu 'jigs skrag ste/ yi dgas de la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te tshe'i dus byas nas yi dgas kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ba 'di thabs ci byas na sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur// de nas mi
238b5: dgas des dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ / gal te khyod kyis sang gi nyi ma la yi dgas gang gA'i klung khyi ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang drang srong brgya stong snyed la yul dbus
238b6: 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad ma re re'i zhal zas mchis pa phul te/ kho bo'i phyir dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na/ tshe ring zhing yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal dang bral te mtho ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe dga' bos
238b7: yi dwags kha nas me 'bar ba/ lus mi sdug pa/ shin du rid cing skem pa dang / kha nas me 'bar ba dang / mgrin pa mo khab tsam la sgra 'dzings pa dang / sen mo dang / mche ba ring zhing rno ba yang mthong la/ yid
238b8: du mi 'ong mi 'dod pa'i tshig kyang thos nas las skye bud zhes byed pa tsam du 'jigs skrag nas 'dug pa las langs te myur bar bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byin
239a1: lus smad lngas la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bas la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lus 'dar bzhin du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol zhes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
239a2: ces gsol to/ / bdag pas mtha' zhig na chos yid la bgyid cing mchis pa las/ yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bgyi ba de bdag la 'di skad mchi'o// khyod de ste zhag bdun na nges par tshe'i dus byas te yi dgas kyi
239a3: khams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/ / bdag gis de la thabs ci bgyis na yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur zhes dris na/ des bdag la khyod kyis yi dgas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig
239a4: brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang drang srong la sogs pa brgya stong snyed la zhal zas mchog dam pa bul na tshe ring bar 'gyur zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji lta bur yi dgas dang drang srong
239a5: la sogs pa de snyed kyi kha zas 'byor par 'gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod 'jigs par ma byed cig/ khyod kyis yi dgas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang / bram
239a6: ze dang drang srong la sogs pa la kha zas dang / gtor ma mang po 'byor pa'i thabs nga la yod kyis yid klong bar ma byed cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga la gzungs sngags gzi brjid
239a7: da med pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'i 'od zer rnam par rgyal ba'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de/ gang zhig gis gzungs 'di brjod na yi dgas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang / bram ze dang / drang srong la sogs/
239a8: te mang po'i kha zas dang / gtor ma mchog dam par 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa gcig kyang kha zas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas gcal ba'i bre bdun bdun snyed thob par 'gyur ro// dga' bo de yang bram zer
239b1: gyur ba na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur yon tan zhes bya ba la gzungs 'di thos pas na/ de'i dbang gis yi dgas tshad med pa snyed dang / drang srong mang po la kha zas dang /
239b2: gtom gyi byin par gyur te/ yi dgas kyi khams su skyes pa de dag sdug bsngal las rnam par grol nas mtho ris kyi lhar skyes par 'gyur ro// dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs 'di zung shig/ bsod nams dang tshe'i tshad kya
239b3: 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ oM sam b+ha ra sam b+ha ra hUM// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka'
239b4: stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig tshe ring bar 'dod dam/ bsod nams che zhing 'phel ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu byin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na ni// rtag tu snga dro'i dus sam/ yang na
239b5: dus thams cad du byas kyang bar chad du 'gyur ba med do/ / snod gtsang ma'i nang du chu gtsang ma blugs la/ chan nam bye 'am/ khur ba la sogs pa chung zad cig btab ste/ lag pa g.yas pa snod kyi steng du bzhag la
239b6: gzungs 'di lan bdun bsngags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan nas brjod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi mtshan nas brjod
239b7: ba'i byin kyis rlabs kyis yi dgas thams cad kyi skye ba mang po'i ser sna byas pa'i mi dge bi 'alas bcom zhing bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
239b8: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis yi dgas mang po byad gzugs mi sdug pa bcom zhing gzugs dang mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
240a1: kA 'byas klas la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pakra 'byam klas kyi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis yi dgas mang po sgom pa grangs shing tshim par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa'i gnas yid bzhin
240a2: du za ba dang chog cing 'drangs par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ yi dgas
240a3: mang po'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te/ yi dgas kyi khams thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan nas
240a4: brjod de/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu se gol lan gsum byas te/ gtor ma'i snod blangs nas lag pa brkyang ste/ sa gtsang mar blugs par bya'o// de ltar gtor ma sbyin par byas na phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i yi
240a5: dgas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed so so nas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi ze tsha dmas gcal ba'i the bdun bdun thob par 'gyur ro/ / kha zas de dag yi dgas kyis yid bzhin du za ba dang / cho ga
240a6: 'drangs par dang / yi dgas kyi khams spongs pa dang / tho ris kyi ltar skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te dge slong ba dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang zhig rtag tu gzungs 'dis kha zas
240a7: la bsngags te/ yi dgas la sbyin pa byin na bsod nams chad med pa snyed yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / de nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsad nams dang khyad par
240a8: med de/ tshe ring ba dang / bsod nams dang / mangs dang / stobs skye zhing 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa thams cad kyis ga
240b1: gi gnod par byed me rnas pa dang / gzhan lagaci brjid ma dmed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gas teg pa zhag zas pa dang drang srongs sbyin pa byed 'dadan 'azas song sa thag/ pasnod gcag gnang dbakang ste/ gams sngag sa'i
240b2: lan bdun bzlas te 'bab chu gtsang mar gtor na/ de ltar byas pas lha rdzas kyi zhal zas mchog dam par 'gyur te/ des na bram ze dang / drang srong de dag kyang sngags kyis btab pa'i zas thob nas/ sngags kyi byin gyis so
240b3: so nas sngon chad ci dang ci la dga' zhi dmos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams yongs su 'gyur bas/ so so nas 'thun par dus gcig tu de la tshe ring ba dang / mdangs dang stobs su ldan te bde zhing skyid par gyur cig ces smon lam
240b4: 'debs so/ / gzhan yang mi de sems bsam pa bzhin du mthong zhing thos pa'i sgo nas yongs su dag cir shes pa mi nor ba dag tshangs pa lha'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan ning yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sangs rgyas
240b5: bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang 'dra ste/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis gnod pa byed mi nus par 'gyur ro// gal te dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma
240b6: 'am/ / dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang zhig sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par 'dod na/ spos dang / me tog dang / zhal zas dam pa la gzugs sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te/ dkon mchog
240b7: gsum la dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas rigs kyi bu po dang / rigs kyi bu mo des phul ba'i zhal zas des lha rdzas kyi zhal zas su gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byas
240b8: par 'gyur ro/ / des na bstod pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags shing dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha mang pos rtag tu
241a1: bsrung zhing skyob pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dga' bo khyod kyis 'di'i rjes su yi rang tshes bzhin yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong zhing thos par bya
241a2: ba'i phyir yongs su rgyas par ston cig dang / bsod nams tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro// yi dgas kha nas med 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// bod skad du/ 'jur 'gegs zhes bya
241a3: ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sar sna las cher lhag pa/ gzhan gyi la 'jur 'gegs byas pa'i nyes pa'i 'bras bu 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang / 'phags pa mod
241a4: gal gyi bu gnyis pas mtha' cig na/ so sor rtog pa'i shes rab yid la byed cing yod pa las/ nyi ma'i gung la gnyis pos khams sad du mchis pa'i sa na yi dgas mo lus sde la skam pa/ khog khog zer ba/ skra 'dzings pa/ mig
241a5: dmar la mi g.yon du yo ba ma mchu ring la g.yas su yo ba/ ske dang / rkang lag shin du phral ring ba/ lag pa khu tshur bsdams pa'i sen mos tha kar thug nas sen mo sngo zad de yod pa// kha nas sgra rnam pa lnga sgrogs pa ni 'di lta ste/
241a6: dgos na zhes bya ba dang / med na zhes bya ba dang / ma sbyin cig zhes bya ba dang / ster na yang che ches par 'ong ngo zhes bya ba dang / de tsam ches kyis phri la byin zhes bya ba dang / lnga brjod pa/ spyi zing byed pa cig dang phrad pa las/ der
241a7: gang zag gnyis po des bsams pa/ dgon pa bas grong yul thag nyel zas mod pas grong khyer du phyin te bslangs pas dkar gsum dang / mngar gsum dang / 'bras dang / nas kyi zan la sogs pa bza' ba dang / btung ba
241a8: mang du rnyed nas yi dgas kyi drung du khyer te/ phyin nas btabs pas mi len par gong gi sgra rnam pa lnga sgrogs shing bros so// der gang zag gnyis po des shin du ma dga' nas yi dgas mo de'i sems su song nas
