263a4: can/ / shel gyi ri bo'i mdog 'dra ba// byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'bru bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal skor ba du ma byas//
263a5: 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// rin chen shel gyi me tog ni// rgya che du ma mthong bar byed// bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo 'tshar ldan pa dang // rmang byung chen po'i tshigs bshad gyis//
263a6: zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i zhe sdang ri bo bcom// bzod pa'i nyi ma lha der mdzad// bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus// phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM hrIHtrai lo kya bi dza ya a mo
263a7: g+ha bA sha a pra ti ha taSh+ThaHhaHhUM phaT swa hU~M/ / snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i gal de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// bus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// shar lho'i phyogs kyi
263a8: zhing khams mchog/ grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi// zhing khams bdud rtsi brtsegs pa na// sangs rgyas sman gyi 'byung gnas bzhugs// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs
263b1: dbang ni/ rje btsun ha la ha la me/ bu sha ra ka'i ri bo 'dra// byang chub sems dpa' bya ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig ma khal gshegs// glog 'bru bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal
263b2: skor ba du ma byas/ / 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yis// pra sha ka ra'i me tog ni// rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed// bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo 'tshar ldan pa dang / spad byung chen po'i tshigs
263b3: bcad kyis/ / zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i phrag dog dug sdongad sbrul// bsam gtan bdud rtsi rgya mtsho rlabs// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM ha la ha la/
263b4: hUM pad ma gar+b+ha hUM phaT swA hA// snying po de skad phul nas kyang / thub pa ga la de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul du ni/ bus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// lho nub phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/
263b5: grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na// zhing khams pad mas brgyan pa na// sangs rgyas pad ma'i snying po bzhugs// drung du byang chub sems pa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// rje btsun pad ma
263b6: rgyan gyi lung / / zangs ma zhun gyi ri bo 'dra// byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal/
263b7: skor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// zangs ma zhun gyi me tog ni// rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed// bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // smad byung chen po'i
263b8: tshigs bshad kyis/ / zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba rmongs pa'i thibs po bcom// sna tshogs thabs kyi rlung chen 'phyo// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do//
264a1: oM pad ma a lang tra hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la dpogs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// bus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// nub byang phyogs kyi
264a2: zhing khams mchog/ grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na// zhing khams stong brgya zhes bya bar// sangs rgyas dam tshig dpal bzhugs so// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni//
264a3: rje btsun rdo rje chos dbang phyug/ nor bu spug gi kha dog 'dra// byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gru bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/
264a4: phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i yi// spug gi snying po'i me tog ni// rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed// bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad byung
264a5: chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ / zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i mnar sems zhen pa bsal// mthu stobs chen po'i rdo rjes btab// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// phrin las 'di nyid
264a6: grogs bgyid do/ / oM badz+ra d+ha maN+Da tsa hU swA hA// snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i gal de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// bus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// steng gi phyogs kyi zhing khams
264a7: mchog/ grags med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/ zhing khams gtsug tor brtsegs pa na// sangs rgyas gtsug tor rgyal po bzhugs// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// ha ri ha ri ha ri
264a8: la/ / zhon zhes rab tu grags pa yi// rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor de// in dra nI la'i ri bo mdog/ byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gru bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/
264b1: bcom ldan mgan pa thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab mastong dang ldan pa 'o// an drA nI la'i mi tog ni// rgya che dum 'thor bar mdzad// bad bar gshegs pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang //
264b2: rmang byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i log lta'i sgrib g.yogs sel// dge ba'i smon lam 'khor lo bskor// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// brin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid
264b3: do/ / a b+h+rUM hrIHha hA swA hA// snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i gal de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// bus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// 'og gi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangs med
264b4: bdun gyi mtha' nyid ni/ / zhing khams za me tog mdzes na// sangs rgyas gnon pa'i dpal bzhugs so// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// rje btsun mgrin pa sngon po rgyal// and rnyil gyi/
264b5: ri bo 'dra// byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gru bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// an
264b6: da rnyil gyi me tog ni/ rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad// bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad gyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i shes
264b7: bya'i sgrib nags sel/ / ye shes ral gris rtsa ba bregs// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// a ma Ni pad me hUM// snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la de logs su// 'khor bcas
264b8: dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ / bus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs 'dus nas// rig sngags mthu chen 'chad pa dang // gzhan don rdzogs par mdzad pa de'i// shin du dga' bar mdzad pa
265a1: la/ / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun// phyag rgya nas ni spyi bor bzhag/ 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis legs so byin// nam mkha' snyan pa yis kyang bkang // de tshe phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yis// khro bo'i
265a2: rgyal po ma lus rnams/ / sa stengs thams cad gar gyis bkang // g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang zla gam dang // zlum po gru bzhi gru gsum 'gros// mchod dang geng mchongs dril po dang // rdebs dang brtsir ba'i tshul gyis su//
265a3: bgegs rnams stabs kyis tshar gcod mdzad// lag pa thal sbyar phye btsum bskyed// sor mo gcig bsnol gcig 'khrud dang // kun bsnol kun 'khrud kun gdengs dang // rgyab bsnol res 'khyud kun 'khyud dang /
265a4: re mos 'khyud sgreng kun sgreng dang // mnyam bzhag dang ni mchog gi rgya// sa gnon skyabs sbyin mchog sbyin sogs// phyag rgya du ma bgegs sel mdzad// gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshegs// ma lus 'khor dang bcas
265a5: pa rnams/ / gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i// snga na med par rig sngags rmad// ngo mtshar 'byung zhes thos ma thag/ lus kyang shin tu 'dar gyur nas// rgyal mchog gtso bo drung lhags te// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas ni//
265a6: spyan sngar 'dug te 'di skad gsol// gang zhig gdong ni bcu gcig pa'i// rig sngags len cing 'dzin pa dang // rgyun du 'don dang yid la byed// 'jig rten mgon po sman ras gzigs// dkyil 'khor chen po'i
265a7: tshogs 'di rnams/ / gang gis yid la byed pa 'am// yang na ji tsam dran yang rung // dge ldan rigs kyi bu de ni/ phyogs bcu rgyal ba rnams kyis sras// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bshes// rig pa'i lha mo rnams
265a8: kyi yab/ / byis pa rnams kyi gnyen yin no// bdag cag rnams ni de yi 'bangs// skyes bu khyu mchog chen po ste// bsod nams rnams kyi gter ldan zhing // de yi tshul khrims ngal pa med// mi de skye ba don yod de/
265b1: gnas dag nas sku gseb tu// ye shes 'od zer bdud rtsi 'dzud// 'jig rten 'di yi nad rigs dang // gdon rigs ci snyed yod pa 'am// rig sngags byang stems ma lus pas// de la tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// cho ga bzhin
265b2: du spyad pa yis/ / tshangs pa'i tshe tshad gnas nas kyang // shi ba sems brgyal med par ni// gnas 'pho tshul gyis mtho ris 'jug/ rgyal ba'i zhing du gshegs nas kyang // rgyal ba rnams la chos nyan cing // rgyal sras rnams
265b3: dang skyabs cig tu/ / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa brnyes te// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan gyur nas// skad cig klog 'gru ci bzhin du// 'gro ba ma lus dag byed cing // zhing rnams ma lus dag par byed// 'phags pa spyan ras
265b4: gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba las lha byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas lag na rdo rje 'dzin// bzhengs te thal sbyar thub pa la// phyag 'tshal phyogs su
265b5: 'khod nA ni/ / gsang ba bstod nas tshig 'di gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal dbang po// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang kun// rang rang gnas nas gshegs nas byon// 'gro ba thugs brtse chen po
265b6: yis/ / snying po byin brlabs ldan la gsol// rmad du byung ba'i snying po la// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dang // rig pa 'dzin rnams 'thun par dgyes// 'on kyang 'gro rnams bzung ba dang // dngos grub thams
265b7: cad myur ba dang / / snying po mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir// mgon po thugs rje che rnams kyi// byin brlabs ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags// 'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol// rig sngags nyi ma zla ba'i 'od// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sprin
265b8: bral byed/ / 'gro la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang // bdag la phan pa'i don slad du// rgyal ba mya ngan kun bral ba// rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// sdig pa kun myur sgrol
266a1: bya ba'i/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi thugs rje las// spyan ras gzigs dbang seng ge'i sgra// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo ra da na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki ta/
266a2: shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad ya thA/ oM a ka Te bi ka Te/ Ni ka Te Ti ka Te/ ka TaM ka Ti/ ka ro Te bir+ya swA hA// yon tan ye shes tshogs rnams kun// rig sngags 'dis ni nges par bi skyed/
266a3: khyad par du ni mdzen da la// rtswa las byung ba'i me bzhin no// rtog ldan rnam shes brgyad kyi gzhi// sbyor phyir maN Da la lham pa brgyad// ba ser skya yi bdud rtsis byug/ yan lag bcu gnyis mgor bcas pa'i// sngags
266a4: grangs byin gyis brlabs blugs nas/ / lhag ma yan lag thig ler bya// cung zad lce la myang bas ni// dus dus sum brgya drug bcu 'tshed// nyi ma grangs kyis dag nas ni// lo gcig dus su rtogs ldan 'gyur// de nas
266a5: bcom ldan thub pa che/ / dpal bskyed 'tshe bzlog pa yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po yid bzhin 'khor lo yi// rtsa bi'i rag sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo rad na tra
266a6: yA ya/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra warti pad ma ts+tshi na d+ha ma Ni dz+wa la ma hA pad me ru ru tiSh+Tha dz+wa la A kar ShA ya hrIHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'jig rten 'jig
266a7: rten 'das pa yi/ / glo bur gnod pa bsel ba'i byar// bdun phrag sngags grangs dang mnyam pa'i// yungs dkar ser po brgya rtsa brgyad// rang gi lus sam yan lag la// mchod dang bcas pas gdags par bya/
266a8: de la yang yang gsol ba gdab// de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa ches// khams gsum dbang du bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po pad ma gar dbang gi
266b1: rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ / // na mo ra dan tra yA ya/ na maHAr+yA A ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya taH thA/ sarba satwa bA sa nA gA d+he ba ti ni/ na dza sa rba satA bi sa na/ A ha ra ni na
266b2: maHsa rbas twa ba yod ta ra NA ya/ na maHs+t+waM u0f7fpra sha ma N+Da ya/ na maHma karba badz+nya tsi ta ta ki nas na ka rA ya/ na maHsarbas twA ban d+hAn ts+tshe da na ka rA ya na maHsarba satwA duHkha bi mok+Sha na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba An ta kA ra b+hir+d+ha nA ma
266b3: na maHsarba bid+ya d+hA ra rA dzA rba sha pra b+ha ye/ ma hA yo ga yo ge shwa rA ya/ ha sa ha s+ya nA ya/ na ma skr-i tA e dam Ad+ya A ba lo ki te shwa ra mu khong giN+Da ri shi bi ba ri d+ha sAkra/ yak+Sha ra k+Shas/ shAkya pra hA lo ka kA la ya/ bib+h+yAs
266b4: he shwa ra/ na rA ya na mAnaH/ ku be ra/ a su re na dra/ ma tri ga Na/ na ma sri tatra/ badz+ra khu Na sa hr-i da ya/ ha ya shrI ba na mo ya ma hri da yaM/ ma wa r+d+ha sh+ye mi/ a ba pra me yod da sa d+ha ka na a ba ha na/ sarba bi na ya kaM a mo g+han/ sarba
266b5: karma mi sha nan+da/ ba nI ya kan/ tad+ya thA/ oM ta ru la/ ta nu ta la/ bi ta ru la/ sarba bi Shi ka ka/ sarba bud d+ha bi da ni/ za dzA ti ba ta/ an la bi sU la ki/ a.ata trA sa ke shwa rA ya/ a to pa pra baM tA ya/ badz+ra khu ra narga ti ta/ tsa la ta pra
266b6: bu da/ ta la/ badz+red shA na ting ta ti/ si ta ma du to ga ta za na ma Na ba kA ra ba ra duSh+TA na bi drA ka ma ga saM b+ha ka na kA ra/ sarba bi d+yau ba tA he sha kA ra/ pa ra ma shAn tI kA ra/ bu da d+ha bo d+hA ya ma ti/ b+ha ga bA na ha ya grI ba sarba bi d+yA hri da ya/
266b7: ma ba ra ta yi sh+ya bi la tra kha dra/ la hA ro dra man tran/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ A ta ma saM sti ta na ma narba na/ sid d+ha sA d+ha/ sarba karma Sha me/ sid d+he sid d+he/ de hi de hi/ A be sha A be sha/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarba tha he Sha a
266b8: pra ti ha ta/ d+hun d+hun/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ sarba sa ro sa kra ma kri tan drA gra/ ka kho ra da dur laM gi ta hi// ba shi ka/ bi shi ka ta/ sA sha daMSh+TA/ bi sha tsur+Na yo ga a b+hi tsa ra/ ba shI ka ra NaHsid d+ha any+dzan
267a1: tsa ku mo han tsirkaDa/ bini shes na kA ra/ nir+ya a bar pre sha ka ra na/ tA sa ya trA sa ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa rin d+ha di sha naM/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsarba sa twA nA~M/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ mA ma nu dra d+harma saM g+ha a nu dz+nyA ta me karma shA
267a2: ku ru ku ru baT/ ha ya gA ba phaT/ badz+rad dz+dza dkad thA ya ba ra sa na phaT/ ye ke/ tsi ta mA ma e hid shi go ba kA ya kra min to man tra yan tra ya ma man ti/ dza ba ya ri dzu ha ti/ kA kho dar kur wan de rmA/ sarba dza mu khen draH
267a3: dad tA ya phaT/ na maHsarba duSh+Ta gra hod sA d+hA na ya ha ya grIb sid d+hi tu me man tra ba dAHni swAH// oM a mri tod b+hA bA ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ na maHsarba satwA sh+tsa sid dz+nyAn tu me man tra pa dAHNi swA hA// gang zhig
267a4: klus non spyi la ni/ / dung gi me tog sngags stong gis// byin gyis brlabs nas gu gul badrug/ lus la thogs na legs par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ thogs med sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i// ting
267a5: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po thugs rje mi bshol ba'i// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo ra dan tra yA ya/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twa
267a6: ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na maHsarba b+ha ma tsa ka ra/ sarba rog tha sha man ka raM/ sarba b+hu da ni b+ha ra ka raM/ aSh+Ta k+Sha Na ba di sa sa twe b+h+yaHtA rA/ samyaka tA rI/ nA ma da sa dI ka bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yaH
267a7: maHsam gas bud d+hA kaTAN+De/ a nyen me sti Ar+yA pA lo ki ti shwa ras shwa dra ta ra ni ma N+DakArANik+Sha ye/ a thani kyati/ mahAkIrba/ kA ya/ ma rba/ mdz+walas ti k+Sha/ ma n+t+rak+Shar+ra NA b+ha bas sa man ta ta naH/
267a8: d+yau0f88u0f90/ a TadzaT/ dzi Ta dza~MH/ du Tu dz+raH/ ra ra nga/ ri ri ri da ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ was gra wa/ ma hA Sha r+pa kA ya/ sarbata thA ga ta/ ma hA sa graH/ ma nu bar naH/ e h+ye he ba rgyag tsata ki~M/ tsita tsa ka/ tsu cu gas b
267b1: tisaH/ prartid+han thahA/ kAr a nu san d+hA ya/ ma hA kA rba kA ya/ sa b+ha ba e bye ga/ ra la ral ru la/ d+ha na bi mo k+Sha sa mA d+hi/ sa ma pa ti b+hi shwa ra i tiSh+Tha/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li cag tsu la tsu la/ bi d+hi ba d+hi/ et+ya e t+ye/ bud dro brad d+ho/ bud/
267b2: d+hasat+ye na/ d+harma sat+yen/ sa g+ha sa t+ye ra/ o Te/ s+phA Te swA/ sarba ma hA me tre bu ta/ ni ba ranaH/ ma hA kA ru NA ma g+hen mA ma sarba rog ni ba ra yan tu/ bun bun/ bi bu na bi bun/ ma tha ma tha/ bra ma tha pra ma tha/ oT s+pho Ta s+tha/ e h+ye e h+ye/
267b3: mA ma sa rba sha pra yan tu/ karba bi sho d+ha ya/ ma hA kA ru NI kA ya/ ma hA bad man dA ya/ bad ma a thA ya srAH/ shed/ adz+nyA A ba bi tA ya srAr+tha/ ku ru ri ni s+thAn/ shra badz+nyA sA nA/ tsakran swA tA/ ya ma ye swA hA/ an da tse'i bud
267b4: b+hA hA/ sa swen b+h+yo brad d+he b+h+yaHswAhA/ a du bduke b+hU b+hU di de sAhA/ bi da ki b+h+yo bya d+he b+h+yaHsA hA/ bi d+had+he b+h+yo byAd b+h+yaHswA hA/ swa na ni par+d+ha ke b+h+yo byad b+h+yaHsAh+ma thA mi an ti ri ka sha tsi rab+h+yob+h+yaHswAd+ha/ d+ya thA/ oMn traT traT/ tri tiH
267b5: d+her+the d+har+tha/ na bA ma sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsarba u ba tra be b+h+yaHrak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru sA hA/ sras grib sa/ ma tham tha/ bram ze bram ga/ ha na han/ btsa ba tsa/ na maHAr+yA pA loka te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mardza sa dz+ra sa la a dz+nyA ba ya ti swAH/
267b6: shang ka ra'i sa bon las// stong du bzlas nas dri chu dang // lhan cig spangs la byugs pas ni// lhog nad drag po 'joms par byed// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// rig sngags zod stong gzhom pa yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
267b7: par zhugs/ / sugasung thugs kyi dza rdzalas// mgon pa dan po gags pa pa// cha ba'i rig sngags 'di ga sangs so// nam sde d+ha ar+tha ga ta pra tISh+Ti Ne b+h+yaHsa barbad d+ha ba d+his twe b+h+yaH na ma pra teg b+ha d+hA an+ta shrA ba kas
267b8: b+hen+yA tI ta a nA ga ta pra t+yud ban ni b+h+yaH/ na maHsa ma myag ka tA nA~M/ na maHsa ma myaH/ pra ti ba rA/ na maHshA ra dA tI bu tA ya ma hA ma ti ye/ na maHAr+ya mai tre ya pra mu khe b+h+yo ma hA bo d+ha satwa b+h+ya na maHsra pra tiSh+Thi te shai len dra rArdza
268a1: pra mu la b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ a ra ha te b+h+yaHsa myags ma bud te b+h+yo na maHsu ban+d+ha bar+tha su pra ti b+ha bi nam ti ti shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga ta ya/ na mi sai ha bi kri Di ta d+hA dzA ya tathA ga tA ya/ na maHAr+ya a mi tAb+ta ya twa thA ga tA ya/
268a2: namaHsra rba tiSh+Thi ta ma Ni kuT rA dz+nyA ya ta thA ga ta na maHsa man tar srung ga ta shrI ban+da rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi pa tsi ne t+tathA ga tA ya/ na maHshi khyen b+hag d+hA / na mo'i shwa d+hu ba tAr+dz+dzakat+ta ya/ na ma kra k+Shu rbe nata ye tA thA u0f7f
268a3: ya/ na maHka na ka mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkA sh+ya pA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshAkya mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ta te sam myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne man+ta mu ne ye swA hA/ oM sa me sa me ma ta sa me rak+Sha rak+Sha maM sarba
268a4: satwaM shu sarba pA pa pra sha ma ne swA hA/ na maHsu pa ri kIri ti ta na ma d+he yA ya ta thA ga d+hA ya/ na maHsa man ta a wa b+ha sa bi dzi ta sa~M mA ma shI ye ta thA ga ta ya/ na maHini drakat+par+tha tra shI yai tA thA ga ta ya/ na mo rad na pra b+ha se shwa ra rA dzA ya
268a5: ta thA ga dA ya/ na mo a pra tiH tid+hiSha dz+ha rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi kAn tag mi ne ta thA ga tA ya// na mo bud d+ha ya/ na mo d+ha mA ya/ na maHsa g+hA ya/ na ma a ti tA a na ga ta pra b+hud pan ne b+h+yoH bud d+he b+h+yoH b+ha ga ba te Sh+Tha Shatad+ya thA/ s+thi ti bar/
268a6: d+ha naM/ ma ti par d+ha ni/ ga ti bar d+ha ni/ d+hI ti bar d+ha ni pradz+nyA par d+ha ni/ pra tiSh+Than na bar d+ha ni/ d+h+ya na bar d+ha ni/ sa mang+ga ya bar d+ha ni/ sarba bo d+hi bak+Sha d+harma bar d+ha ni/ sa ka la bud d+ha d+harma pa ri pU ra Ni ye swA hA// na mo rang natra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a
268a7: wa lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya ma hA satwa ya ma hA kA ru ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma prA ba tA ya bo d+hi satwa ya ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ e b+h+yo na ma s+thi d+hA i da ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tI shwa ra mu kho da gar+t+ti a mo g+ha pA sha rA dza na ma tri da yaM ta thA ga tA/
268a8: ba ma ma baM b+ha shi ta ma ma hA tI bar shaM ma d+hi ata ma dA ni ma ba ra yi s+yA sidat+tAn tu me/ mne tra pa dAHsarba kAr+ya NI/ sarba b+ha ya b+h+yo ma ma sarba satwA nan+ta rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/ tad+yathA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma ra ma ra/ mi ri mi ri/ mu ru
268b1: muru/ maH kA r+ra Ni ka/ sa ra sA ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsaru/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ ma hA bad ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud d+ha satwa/ b+hud d+ha b+hud d+ha/ bo d+ha bod+ha/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bod+ha
268b2: ya bo d+ha ya/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku N+ya ku N+Da/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma bA ba ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ e Ta Ta/ e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ d+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra tar/
268b3: ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ e d+h+ye ti ma hA kA rA Ni ka/ ma ta ba shu ba ti be sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta re ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma ra ma ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha bA hi dI hu drA/ oM kAr pra d+ha
268b4: b+he sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu dra/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ na ra na ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ha ra ta ra/ rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN Di ta sha rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta ba ta ga b+hA sa b+hA sa/ b+h+ra ma b+hU ma/ b+ha ga wAn so ma/ a di t+ya/
268b5: ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra/ prah+man+da pA yu/ a ga ni d+ha na da/ de ba ri Shi ga Na a b+ha ra tsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ su dra/ bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu/ d+ha na da/ ba yu/ a ga ni/ ri shi/ na ya ka/ bi na ya
268b6: ka ba hu bi bi d+ha be sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ti/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ta ra/ pa ra pa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra d+ha ya ka/ sa man ta a wa lo ki ta/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/
268b7: mad+he shU ra Ni b+hu ba ne shwa ra/ sarba ku Na sa ma A la~M kr-i ta/ a ba lo ti te shwa ra/ mu d+ha mu rba/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+dza muH/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwAM sh+tsa/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ sa rbo padra be b+h+yaH/ sarbo pa sarbe b+h+yaHsa rba b+ha tIH
268b8: sarba bi She b+h+yaHsarba dz+wa re b+h+yaH/ e baM ban d+ha b+han d+ha na/ tA Ta na/ tardza na/ rA dza/ ta ska ra/ a ga ni/ u da ka/ bi sha Sha stA pa ri mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku N+ya kuN+Da/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ in dri ya/ ba la
269a1: bag a margyas byas bak+sha shA ka/ bta ga tas ta/ da sad ga/ sa sams/ sa mas / dzas sa/ sa d+hakarba/ kas nAHsa yan taka ra bi u0f7f saH/ rbang+gar ma tAHri b+hU kA a la sa la/ ngi nga?/
269a2: me li/ su lu sa lu/ a rbaH/ u0f7f99/ tsa rdo Ta/ tsurba nu r+tha/ @##/ e ne ya bar+b+ba grIta ba ri kAr/ en+te hi ma hA ShA rba Ni ShA e shar/ sa rba b+hUHga Na sa~M u0f7fu0f7fdza ka/ ka ra kir/ ka~M re/ ri/ ku ru kra prA par pa
269a3: ra/ ha ra tar/ kha ra ba ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ku Tu ku Tu/ ma Ta sarba/ sa bA bi shud d+ha bi sha ya ni ba sin/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta ya dzA u pa bi ta/ rang na mra ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA se ra si kri ta dza
269a4: TAnA ma ku Ta/ ma tA ad b+hu ta/ ka ma la a la ma kri ta ka ra la/ d+ha na sa mA d+hi/ bi mo k+Sha a pra kas bya/ ba hu sa twa sa na ta ti pa ri pA tsa/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA sarba karma a wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba dz+nyA dz+nyA na pa r-i pU ra ka/ sarba
269a5: byA d+hi ba ri mo tsa ka/ sarba satwa a shA ba ri pU ra ka/ sarba satwa sa mA shra a sa na/ ka ra na mo stu te swA hA/ a mo g+hA ya swA hA// a mo g+ha pA shA ya swA hA/ a dzi tA ya swA hA/ a pa ra dzi tA ya swA hAHa mi tA b+hA ya swA hA/
269a6: a mi tA thA su tA ya sA hA/ ma ra se na ya pra marda nA ya srA thA/ a b+ha ya pra dA ya sAn+t+ra/ dzA sa ya srA b+hA/ ba~M dza yA ya swA hA/ dza ya bi dza yA ya swA hA/ par dA ya swA hA/ pa ra mr-i d+hA ya swA hA/ e kA la mr-i tru pra sha ma nA ya swA hA/

269a8: oM a ro lo ka swA hA/ oM ba hu le bcu le swA hA/ oM a ro la kA triHhriHd+hu Ta sAhA/ ni ya ta ni ya ta be dA ni ya a su b+ha s+ya maM b+ha ga b+ha na ka ma no a she Sha taHk+Sha yaM ku ruM swA hA/ oM pad+ma tA b+hA ya swA hA/ oM bud d+ha d+hA
269b1: g+ha ya swA hA/ / / rabs chad thod par ro sregs sa// yungs dkar ser po dri chur bcas// bskyed de myu gus sngags stong brjod// 'bras bu la ni khri brjod bya// lus la thogs na byad stem sogs// nad dang gdon nams myur/

269b4: s+thA ma prA sta/ Ar+ya mAM tri Ar+ya many+dzu shI/ Ar+ya badz+ra pA Ni a d+hi kaM/ bo d+ha satwa ma hA sa twe b+hAHa te na maHkri tau/ b+ha ga ban/ ar+ya ba lo ka te shwa ra ti dzi da ya sarba kam padaHsarba gra ho tsA da ne ka raM/ b+ha ba a ma ra Ni bi na sha ka/
269b5: bi shi taM/ saM ya s+thi d+hi te bo d+hi satwa ma hA bo d+hI sA hA/ pri ya bo d+hi sa tu/ he hA lo Ar+yA ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ ba ra ma mai tri tsid ta ti ta/ tsid ta kA ru Ni ka/ ku ru ku ru/ k+Sha ma g+ha ma bi haM g+ha ma bi ya ti/ bi dza yan ti/ ma hA bi dza yan ti/

269b8: naman pa/ t+ya pra t+yamra/ bu la n+ya mr-i/ Na ma li Na bo nyis / nam kI nA n+ya/ hU~M kroSh+T+rin+da ga chas chu zi pa/ a cu k+Shar/ sa ma pa a r+tha s+pha ra/ dza ti a nu m+ba ra/ i dam me ka tsu ku ra/ ma ri tham par dru ya/
270a1: ma ma pad pa na rnam thapar 'as byas gas gas ca// bam ldan na cad pa'/ bkyis la mazung bab// tshus 'khor bu ba zhims pa // cugasas pas nas d+hanas bdag/

270a4: snyoms kyis/ / 'dod pa kun gru bzhen pas byin// yid la byed pas 'tshang bar 'gyur// se'u po che'i lcug mA la// ro sregs thal ba khri phrag bdun// bsngags nas gtor bas char ches pa// char bsgyur tu chad par byed/

270a7: ma du / NaH/ na maHAr+ya a maM tA~M b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra tad de b+h+yaHsaM myaka saM bud d+ha ya/ na mo ma hA m+b+ha ma pra b+hA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma trA sa dA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo bi lu la bi ma la/ su pra ti pra

270b1: su las ma be sha/ a bi sha sarbas tra ba re mo tsa kA ya/ thur praHswAH// ma hA loka shwa rA ya/ nas pa me ra ba rba bin sha kA/ ra ka d+he/ da mo d+hA d+hA la sha ma kA shas ma sha na kA ra ra/ krA k+ShaHa b+ha ya dun d+ha

271a1: A r+yA a ba la ka te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ mas ma' ma aH/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bI ro tsan pra b+hA rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ a rat+na t+ye b+h+yaHsarba a dz+nyA ya/ yan d+ha kAr mA ma yi tra// tad yaT+TA/ oM sad+ha nIm+b+ha
271a2: d+hane/ sid d+he sidad+ha/ sid d+had+hAr/ b+ha ga ba te/ ba ram pa ra/ kle sha de pi na/ a dz+nyA sha ma ni sha ma yaHsarba pA pa pi shud d+he/ d+harma NaM d+ha maNi/ bA la dzA ga tsi raM a ban go tsi ni sra sha mra d+hI/ su kha ra pra te/ sarba kle shad pa ni/

271a4: ba yak+Sha pa mi ta su b+hu d+ha bi shA ya/ pA sha pa ti ni pa ra mi ta d+ha d+hA dz+nyA na go tsa re/ pA sha sha ba ti sha mA le ni ka ra na go tsa re/ ma hA la ni dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka ma ti su bi nish+tsi ta da da d+hi/ he he b+ha ga ba te ma hA kA ru ni kA ya/ ku ru ku ru/
271a5: shi d+ha ma pa na/ ma ma sarba satwa bau ma hA ku ru Nod sa ke na/ sany+tsa sany+tsa sa sam brta ya/ saM pA la pra ro ha ya me/ ma hA kA ru ni kA ya/ bi dza ya pa ri shud d+ha ya/ a mu ka bi gu ru ge dza yan/ sa ra sa ra/ me g+ha ga te/ mA mA mA/ bo d+hi tsi

271b2: tes myag sa~M bud d+hA ya/ na ma A r+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ha re ha ri/ bi d+han d+ha ma ka bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya// i li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ tu le tu le/ ku ru me ku ru me/ si ri si ri/ bi si ri/ tsa ra ya/ bi sha re/ g+ho
271b3: g+han d+ha re/ tra mi ni/ ma taM ke/ praka ka si/ ka ta ya/ mA la ya tsaN Da li/ hu ru mA li ni tsau li tsi li/ gran som da shan ku ru/ tsan dra mu khi la g+hu ma Na ya ma ti/ Ar+ya da ny+dzin bud d+he/ sarba bid+yA nAM/ mA ma pra sA d+ha ni/ sarba bad+hi nA/ e shA ra
271b4: swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta naM/ sarba a pa ri pa ri pra ra ka na/ tad+ya thA/ au ha ha ta/ ma ma ma/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ shAn te pra shAn te/ sarba ba sA k+Sha ya kA ri/ a ba lo ka ya kA ru ni kA ya/ bo d+hi tsid ta ma na si ku ru pa ya lo kA ya/ ma mAM
271b5: s+phar sma ra/ sa man ya sUrbe/ sa N+ya a d+hiSh+ThA na tri tan te na sa r+d+ha na/ sa tsaM pa tsi naM/ sarba ak+Sha me/ pa ri pU ra ya/ bud d+ho khe tra me pa ri sha d+he ya/ ma me ka sh+tsa/ bi he tha non+ta bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha nen swA hA// tad+ya thA/ au dzaM te dze ta/ ma hA dzaM te laM/

271b8: 'di gur gum tsan dan gyis/ / gro ba la bris sku'i mchod rten// sku gdung bcas par zhugs par bya// yang na sku gdung dang bcas pa'i// spyan ras gzigs dbang sku la gdag/ sa// tshes brgyad nas ni nye'i bar// bum pa

272a2: can 'jigs sam g.yon/ / sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad// gtor zhing dus gsum mchod de bkru// sdig sbyangs rmi lam 'ong du 'bar// bdud rnams zlog par byed pa la// rtse gsum sor brgyad tshad la ni// thod pa skam po sor
272a3: drug ste/ dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa// seng ldeng yu ba khru gang ba// de yi rten yang sor drug ste// de ni zur brgyad ldan pa la// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad ma ral gri lcags kyu mnga'// mdung rnams g.yas nas bskor bar dgod//

272a6: Na kA ra ya/ sarba d+ha pa tra pA Ni na sha na kA ra ya/ sarba bA she shwa tra na ya da s+ya na ma s+thi taM i ma~M A rU ba lo ki ta shwa ra tA ba nI la kan tha nA ma ma ri tI ra ya ma bta yi Sh+ya mi sarba a rba ha sA d+ha nAM/ su ba a tshe yaM/ sarba bud d+ha nAM/

272b1: salan sa/ a/ sa sa / ta ma sa d+hA A n+tu// ga d+hA na / ga / / shA blu brnas pa gags
272b2: bar tsa kr-i bi/ tri Tar ta da na shwa ra/ n+d+ha ra sam+b+ha/ N+Dal chub be shar+d+ha pi da lakA/ adAn+na la/ ha la ta la/ bi shA ne dgas s+ya/ shi ni/ dri ba shan sha na/ marba pra shAnA ne ma/ na/ nu lu r+tha sa/ mal pa la pa
272b3: rim pa da ma mnaH/ sa ra sa ra/ sa~M ris / sa ru sa ru/ baN+Dal banA ba d+hA ya/ ma~M ta~M nI laka/ k+Sha.a te ti b+ham s+t+rai ta sa ha mu la/ Na sa has/ kr-iSh+Ta muny+dza/ matarba naHse/ e h+ye bo d+ha ma d+ha sa / kau thar gtanaH
272b4: pa tsa/ sA d+hA ya sA dzA ya/ bid+yA ya sma ra sma ra/ b+ha ga ba te/ lo ki ba la ki ta/ ta thA ga taM/ dra dra hi me daR+shan+taM/ brasaHya ma Na swA hA/ sid d+hA ya sA hA/ ma hA sid d+ha ya swA hA/ sid+hA yo gi shwa rA ya swA hA/ nI la kan ShA ya sA hA/ ba ha suH
272b5: yamA sid su yas skam dAn si su 'a ba Ar+tha/ sid+d+ha ba d+ya dra la srAs+sa/ d+ya ta p+ta pa srAs+sa ma bAh+ma k+ta pay+YAH/ ng+ra / pam+b+ha/ a tr-Ita sta s+yA/ gri ShA ma ba kri d+hA ya swA hA/ mang+gak+Shal ma kut+tad+ha rA yasak+Sha/ tsan+ta a yu d+ha pra ba ra swA hA/ sha la sha ba ta ni rA ya swA hA/ sa ma skan te s+tha
272b6: rakr-iShA dza nI ya swAhA/ pad ma hasta bA k+Sha tsa ra me Ne ba nA ya swA hA/ laka shwa rA ya sA rA/ sarba sadaM d+he shwa rA ya swA hA/ na ma~MHmA r+yA ba le ka ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sida~M d+hi t+ya me man tra ba
272b7: swAhA/ / sdug bu me len srung len dang // shel dang bai dUr+ya ka ram// gser gyi snongad du khur bcas pa// maN+Dal dbus bzhag sdigs khri brjod// mug khri rdo yai ko bur ni// chur bcas sde dro bsngar byas nas// nyi shu rtsa
272b8: gcig sngags brjod do/ / khong du 'thungs bas dbyig dug dang // sbyar dug lhan cig skyes dug dang // bza' nyes tsam yang sel 'gyur na/ dug rigs gzhan lta smos ce dgos// dogs pas the tsom mi bya'o// dad can shes
273a1: 4 spyad gas gapa / / zhus/ ga / na /
273a2: mthum sna ba cing // dgar po ga bstan mangs sas// byang chub rin chen gte thob par/ sngags kyi sa thas ni mang da // thugs la nyis dang me pa'o// bstanan mas par 'jur/ khrigs bstan
273a3: ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba las rigs kyi khyad par gyi sngags byung ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bsdus pa'i
273a4: dngos/ / 'jig rten mgon pos bcu'i dbang // stobs bcu rgyas pa'i rang bzhin can// pha rol phyin bcu lhun grub pa// sa bcu gcig tu rdzogs nas kyang // phyogs bcu kun du khyab mdzad pa'i// bcu gcig pa yi mtshan
273a5: shi nyid/ / bsod nams skal par ldan pa'i mis// rang gis lus la sngags dgod bya// sngags dang bcas pa'i lus la ni// sred med bus kyang mi tshugs na// 'jig rten gzhan lta smos ci dgos// byad dang sha za ro
273a6: langs dang / / 'byung po mtshon dang grib gnon dang // ltas ngan rnams ni myur du sel// bla ma las byung rim pas ni// myur du bla med byang chub 'gyur// bla ma'i lung dang bral bas ni// nams kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// spyi bor
273a7: yi ge oM dkar po/ / nan tan du ni bsam par bya// sprul par yi ge a ljang ku// de bzhin du ni bsam par bya// lce yi steng du yi ge mchog/ hrIHyig dmar po 'od ldan bsam// snying po phyogs su hUM sngon po// lte bar
273a8: ta yig ser po ste/ / de bzhin gsang bar ho ljang khu// bshang ba'i gnas su ho sngon po// pus mo gnyis la sa ser skya// rkang mthil yi ge ha ljang ser// lag mthil gnyis la hUM dkar po// lag ngar la ni hrIHsngon te// dpung
273b1: pang mi gI rdzi gong u0f7f/ / me ni tshogs kyis sbyin parlabs nas// gang dang gang yang rung ba li// col pa rnams la 'jug par bya// grol ba de dang de dag kyang / sngags rtsa byin brlabs las byung zhing // lus kyang sngags
273b2: kyi ngo banyid/ / sngags kyis bskyed pa'i lus nyid ni// sngags dang bcas pa'i lus su 'gyur/ sngags kyi lus kyi rigs rnams che// zhing khams dum sbyangs nas kyang // 'gro ba rnams kyi lus su ni// 'gro ba grol ze'i
273b3: spyod pa ni/ / kun bzang mchog dang mtshungs pa ste// 'gro dang dbyer med don rig 'gyur// don de sa lus thob pa'i thabs// ngag gis rig par gyur pa yis// rigs 'dzin zhes bya'i dngos po ste// de la gang gnas de yi
273b4: ming / reg pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ste// sangs rgyas mu stegs pas mi shes// lhag dang bcas pa'i rtsom pa ni// shin du ngal ba nyid yin te// ngal pa nyid kyis gol ba'i lam// bgrod par dka' ba de spangs nas// shin du
273b5: bka yangs bde ba'i lam/ / skal dman yang dag sgrub 'di la// nan tan du ni 'jug par bya// ston pas de skad gsungs pa'i tshe// 'khor rnams dga' nas thal sbyar te// mkha' la me tog gtor nas kyang // mgon po spyan
273b6: ras gzigs dbang gtso/ / thams cad kyis ni phyag 'tshal te// bskor ba du ma byas nas kyang // gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i// zhal dang sku yi 'du byed la// 'dzum bzhin du ni bltas nas kyang // gsang ba'i sems dang
273b7: ldan pa dag/ pus bcugs thal po skar byas te// phyogs bcu rang rang bde bar 'khod// de nas 'jig rten mgon pos ni// 'gro ba'i don du rig sngags gsungs// bdag dang gzhan gyi deni rdzogs phyir// las kyi ster ba
273b8: 'ang tha dad do/ / na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bI ro tsan bru ha rA dzA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ra ta te b+h+yaHsa myaka saM bud d+hA b+ha/ na ma A r+yA ba lo ka ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru NikA
274a1: ya/ tar+NaT+Ta/ ed+harad+ha ra/ d+hi ra d+ha re/ d+hur d+ha ra/ oM de bde/ tsal tsal/ macal pra tsal/ kA su ma klas mkhar ya ma tham/ satsadz+wa la yab sa ma na swA tra/ shad na ma swA d+ha a tA kA ra Na kA ya swA hA/
274a2: 'digasangs chanas chen yang // rnas pa drug tugasas par gyur// rba ba'i stong pa stong brjod pas// dngas zlab ci dang ci 'dod 'brug// gzhan thugs pas men gyi dbang / rkyen gyi b+hag sa ben pa parje//
274a3: nam na sa/ nas ya d+ha da du grag bar can naH du gnam 6snru rgyags tu gnas ba / r+b+has thAgs / 9/ 26/
274a4: a laM mi li/ tsil tsi l-i/ kha le ha la swA hA// dkyil 'khor nang du 'jug pa yis// chu dang gos la bdun bdun brjod// khrus byas gos gon nang du 'jug/ snod sogs rdzas gzhan dag kyang bsad // na mo rang na tra yA ya/
274a5: na ma Ar+yA dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ra ha te b+h+yaHsa myaka sau bud d+hA ya// na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya ya thA/ oM d+hu ru d+hur+ra/
274a6: har ha ra swA hA// bdun phrag re re btab pa yis// spos bsregs pa dang mar me sbar// na mo rang na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta a ra he te b+h+yaHsa ka sa bud d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ka/
274a7: teshwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA rA Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si ri si ri/ d+hi ri d+hi re/ si d+hi ri si d+hi ri swA hA// me tog byug spos me tog breng // bdun bdun brjod la sku gzugs la// gtor dang phyugs dang gdags par bya//
274a8: nanonamo rang na traShA ya/ na ma AR+tha dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsan b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ra ha te b+h+yaHse myaka sa~M prad d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba le ka ti shwa rA yA/ be d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kAr Ni kA ya/ tad+yaH/
274b1: sAd+he sAd+he/ so tsi so / so dra so dra/ bshos gtsang me tog 'bras zer bcas// nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod nas ni// zhal zas dag gis rnam par mchod// na mo rad na rbayA / na ma Ar+ya dA na sA ga rabar can b+ha u0f7f rA dzA ya/
274b2: rnams tathAg sa 9pa stsags zang d+hA ga nam swA rU ba soka carA pa/ po h+yas rbA sha/ ma hA sa twA / mahA.AH) k+Sha/ taH/ mas naN+Da / tsa la/ khur ma/ mas/ sams rba/ bar ba swAH/
274b3: me tog dkar po'i shing dram za// sram bcu bzhi mar blang tsar ni// zhag gcig spangs nas nyin gcigag ma// nang re nub par re re la// sngags re btab nas bsregs nas bzod// ci dgos pa rnams bsgrubs na 'gren
274b4: namo rang na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra be ro tsan b+ha ha rA dzA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta/ a ra ha te b+h+yaHsa myaka sa~M bud d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ardzas pa wi/ ga/ tad+ya thAM/ oM a la
274b5: mi li/ bi li ti li/ tsi li ti li swA hA// chu 'am thal ba yungs kar la// lan bdun bsngags nas phyogs bzhir gtor// sa phyogs te ring gang du yang // 'tshams gcod pa yi mchog lags so// na mo rang na tra yA ya/ na ma
274b6: Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsan bruM ha rA dzA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ra ha te b+h+yaHsamya ka sa~M bud d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi ti bi ta/ ta Te ti Te/ khe
274b7: bede/ ka tsa ka / thA ga bAn Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sarba sAd+ha nAM swA hA// sku sogs slar yang spyan drang dang / rang nyid gnas nas ldog don phyir// tshul lan badran btab pa yis// bkrus nas dgongs pa de dag 'grag/
274b8: napa ra na tra ShA ya/ na ma a rA dAd sAgar zer can thA ta dwe tA~M yai/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ra hi te b+h+yaHsa rgyags bud d+hA / Ar+yA ba po ka ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+ha sa twA ga/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hAk+Sharu Ni kA ya/ NaN thA/ ma ba
275a1: hU~M hrIHho/ / 'jig rten 'bo la rab dga' bas// zas gom byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ mgon po zhal
275a2: ni bcu gcig pa'i/ / rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na b+hu ta rA dza ya na maHsarba ta thA gA tA a ra ha te b+h+yaHsamyaka sa~M bud d+hA ya/ na ma ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya
275a3: ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na maHsarba b+hu ta b+hi hi sarba a ha~M bud d+ho pra sa ke saM g+he b+h+yo na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na ya/ na maHsarba ta thA gA tA ya/ a ra ha te b+h+yaHsa myaka sau bud d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ka
275a4: shA rAH/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a b+ha ya d+ha na/ sarba ba ta g+ha ra tA na ka raM/ sarba A rA ya g+ha ba pany+tsa pra sha ma na ka raM/ sarba bi shud d+hAHkA la hi g+hA ba ta/ b+hi gra ha/ pra na ma ka raM/ sarba pA pa~M nA sha ya ga ra~M/
275a5: sab b+hU da be ta la/ bi sha mar+ha na/ dud sra ba na/ dur ni mit+taM/ sarba bi g+h+r-i bi na ya ka na/ bo d+hi satwA ka raM/ pa ra tsakr-i/ dur b+hik+Sha/ sha ke b+ha ya ni sa ra ka raM/ sA d+he pe nA ga yak+Sha/ gan d+harba/ a shu ra/ ga ru Ta/ kin na ra/ ma ho ra ge/
275a6: sarba ts+tshin da ka ra/ sarba bi shA tsi kai Da b+ha/ su DA grAr+Na/ krats+tsha ka lir/ be Ta li/ a maM b+ha la/ bi nA shA kA rA ya/ na mo nA ShA ma hA kA ru Na/ e ke d+hA sa su kha sra/ tra sa b+hu dze swA hA/ sra na DaM/ tad+ya thA/ aM dza ka ri/ yu did ta rA ni/ bi tse tranra
275a7: khi/ akad sa mu kha/ sarba saMg+hA ma hA rA na dzi mud te/ ma hA swa b+hU dza ma hA ne traM/ ma hA shI na nI l-i kA ra// ma Ni ku Na Da ya san d+ha hA sa nad ta/ bi tsid tra mU la d+hA re/ tsan dra sUr+ya/ a ti ra ke/ A k+Sha sha ga/ ga ta tsa re ne/ ma g+ha la sha ri/
275a8: d+hI mu te be bid/ tra bid na ma~M g+ha le b+hu ri mi tra kA ra ne/ tsu ru tsu ru she ta ta bA de/ mu ru mu ru shad ha a band te/ hu ru pu ru/ ba bidi tra mu khi ku ru ku ru/ tsid ta tra mu kha~M/ a dir+ya bA sha ba ra ni ni// dzaM b+ha ni/ ma~M g+ha ta ni/ sarba pA
275b1: ni ni/ sarba bir+ya ram b+he/ ma hA ni/ a mo g+ha pA sha hasta/ sarba b+hA ya bi mo tsa ni ra tsa ri/ a ga ni bi Sha// u ta ka pA ya/ pra sha ma ni/ ka kho ra da ni/ bA na/ o hi r-i hi r-i/ dza ya ka ri/ ba la ka ri/ da na ka ri/ te tsa sa ka ri/
275b2: b+hI ba d+ha/ pra sha ma Ni/ yud d+ha ni ba ra tsakra pra sha ma Ni ni pa ra s+ya bya bi na ni mu dod te ra ni pra b+hu na b+he la/ ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ ma Ni d+ha re/ tri lo ka a li ka ka ri ti su ra na ka ri/ tri pu ra nA/ ra bi da dA na sa ni/ bar b+he na/
275b3: bid tra pA Ni na/ sarba grir+ya karma ni/ su da ni// sarba bya d+hi na/ pra sha ma Ni swA hA/ oM tsi li mi le swA hA/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ mi l-i mi li swA hA/ si li si li swA hA tsi li li tsi li li swA hA/ tsin d+ha li me di ni sAhA/ u da ke sha bid ka la
275b4: ke to d+he na mu khi swA hA/ oM ka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ muny+tsa muny+tsa muny+tsa ya muny+dzA ya/ ma sha mA ya pra sha mA ya/ yu dod d+hA ra NI phaT/ tsid d+he nir mA la ka ri phaT a su ra nA ra ki ti ta phaT/
275b5: dza ya ka ri phaT/ sa ti ri phaT/ sa ha sra b+hu dze phaT/ sa ha sra ne te phaT/ sarba b+ha dra ra na ma sa tri te phaT/ sarba b+ha ya bi mok+Sha ni phaT/ ma ra tsakran pa ra ra ni phaT/ pa ra s+ye na si gru pa ni phaT/ sarba kri t+ya ka ma si du ni phaT/ sarba
275b6: byAd+hi pra shas ni baT/ sarba byAd+hi bi nA sha ya phaT/ sarba gra bod sbyin d+ha ni pa mA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma~M/ sarba bud d+ha bo d+his twA nA~M/ sa pa ra sa pa ra/ nitatsa sha ri sa mai r+tha/ sarba pra ya pra tre b+hUHb+h+yoHsarba yud te/ dus tri ti b+h+yaHsaH
275b7: trid ta kA kho ra da/ sarba bi shiSh+ThaHsarbe kA ya bA gA tsi te si tse b+h+yaHrak+Sha rak+Sha ma~M swA hA/ saHsra b+hu dze/ sata swa ne tra/ a ka da sha mu khi Ar+yA bA lo ki tai shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sa
275b8: dran tu mi man tra pA dAHni swA hA/ / rje btsun zhal ni bcu gcig pa'i// sngags 'di yon tan mtha' yas te// gang la 'di ni gtsug tor du// yid bzhin nor bu thogs dang mtshungs// 'chang dang klog par byed pa des//
276a1: mtha' yas yon tan rnyed par 'gyur// nad dang gdon rnams sel ba dang / khyad par du ni sdig kun 'byang // ba dkar mo yi bdud rtsi lngas// maN Da la 'jam po lnga byugs la// gtsang sbra ldan pa dbus
276a2: su ni/ / shing sku ring bsrel ldan pa bzhag/ gzhan yang ring bsrel ldan pa yi// sku gdung bzhi ni phyogs bzhir te// tshad ldan pa yi bum pa ni// lnga po dbus dang 'tshams su ste// rigs lnga'i mdog dang phyag rgya
276a3: can/ sna tshogs rgyan dang mchod pa dang // srad bu tha dad bre bar bya// ci 'dod phyag rgya bri byas te// tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar// 'dod la dmigs nas sngags brjod de// bzhi khri rdzogs nas bcwa lnga la//
276a4: 'dod pa gsol gdab khrus byas nas// ci 'dod myur du 'grub pa dang // bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang // rnam par 'tshe dang mi mthun pa// khrus kyis nges par sel bar 'gyur// sngags brjod yon tan mtha'
276a5: yas rnams/ / bsdus nas sgrub po blo ldan 'gyur// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ sngags gang brjod pa tsam la yang // gshis ngan shi ba bcwa lnga med// skye bzang bcwa lnga thob par 'gyur// mu ge
276a6: rgyal po'i chad pa dang / / dug dang mtshon dang g.yul 'gyed dang // stag sogs sbrul sogs gcan zan gdug/ dug can zas dang me chus 'chi// srog chag mdun du nyal nyes dang // g.yeng byed dang ni lha
276a7: 'dres gces/ / gsor mi rung dang bdag lce ba rnams// de la nam yang mi 'jigs so// rgyal po'i chos ldan yul skye zhing // 'phags pa bzhugs dang dus bzang dang // bshes gnyen bzang dang dbang po tshad//
276a8: dge la dga' zhing tshul khrims ldan// bran khol bzang zhing nor mang rtag/ gzhan gyis 'bul zhing dgos 'dod sbyor// sems bder 'jig rten skyong bas bsrung // sangs rgyas zhal mthong don zab brtags
276b1: gzhan yang dman la byams sems bskyed/ / snying rje mchi ma 'khrug pa dang // yon tan dran nas spro ba dang // dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang // phul du byung ba'i blo yis 'phel// tshul bzhin ma yin yid bral dang //
276b2: bka' lung sde snod dang ba rnams// yang nas yang du skye bar 'gyur// ji ltar spros pa'i gnas mthong na// sngags 'dis rang bzhin med par byas// oM swa b+hA ba shud d+haHsarba d+harmAHsrA b+hA ba shud to ho// 'dzin pa/
276b3: drag po'i blo byung tshe// sngags 'dis stong pa nyid du bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha~M// gang gis lus ngag yid g.yon// sngags 'dis bstan par byin gyis brlabs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA
276b4: ka tsid ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ / gang la gnod yod sems ldan dang // dang gis sa gzhi bgegs yod pa// gsal phyir seng ldeng dkar po ni// brag la skyes shing gzhon pa las// sor drug tshad ldan phur bu ni//
276b5: brjid ldan rtse mo rno dpal can// mgo bo rked pa rgya mdud tshul// sor tshad phyed phyed ldan pa la// zur ni bcu drug rked pa la// sor gnyis zur brgyad ldan pa'o// sor gsum zur gsum rtse rno ba// dpal mtho cung
276b6: zad par reg pa/ / des dang skabs ni zab pa ste// sngags kyi byin brlabs ldan pa brgyad// khang pa'i zur dang phyogs bzhi por// g.yas su phyogs pa gzugs par bya// na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA dz+nyA na sA ga
276b7: ra bai ro tsan bru ta rA dza ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ra ta te b+h+yaHsamyaka saM bud d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma tA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mash+tsa Na Da badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ hu l+r-i hu lu/
276b8: tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ba na d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha de ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ a mr-i te hUM phaT// ltos ngan thams cad 'joms pa dang // gnas khang byin gyis brlabs pa dang // tshe dang longs spyod rtag pa dang // de la 'byor phran
277a1: sum tshogs pa dang / / dang po thal mo sbyar byas te// phyis ni lag g.yon sdigs 'dzub bcas// oM dang a la la la ho// zhes brjod rngam cing kha pa yi// nang du 'jug pa khro bor bcas// de nas hUM
277a2: sgras se gol gtogs/ / de nas oM AHbadz+ra dang // s+tha na pA Ni b+h+yaHa haM// rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT brjod// shin du 'jam pa'i stan la ni// rdo rje dkyil krung gis gnas nas// bsrang te mig ni sna rtser phab// ngal ba'i rlung
277a3: ldan dkan la ni/ / lce yis cung zad reg par bya// lte ba cung zad 'bum pa yis// sems ni bag yod gnas par bya// rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min// gtsang ma ma yin mI gtsang min// bde ba ma yin sdug bsngal
277a4: min/ / bdag dang ngar min bdag nyid min// blang dang dor ba'i 'jig tshogs min// sems ma yin zhing sems byung min// pung khams skye mched med ma yin// yid min rtag min mi rtag min// mun pa ma yin//
277a5: shes rab min// 'gro mi ni 'od min gnas ma yin// sna tshogs sprin glog du ma ni// 'dod gzugs du ma sgyur byed pa// mkha' byung nam mkha' la ni thim// 'gro 'ong ston pa 'dod bskul ba// med mong na'ang de ltar spyod//
277a6: yul gyis ma skyes dbang pos min// dus kyis ma yin gtan gyis min// rgyu dang de bzhin rten gyis min// gnas skabs gzhan yang de la med// de la sems pa'i sems nyid kyang // gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi gnas// /
277a7: gar yang ma song brtags na stong // brtag par byed pa rtog pa tsam// dngos rnams brtags pa ming tsam ste// kun rdzob tsam du ming yig la// brten nas rang gi sems bzung na// drod kyi bzhi pa dang por bzung // byung ba'i
277a8: gnyis pa de la brten/ / de la dang po gnyis pas bskor// dang po bcwa lngas mnan pas te// bcu drug pa ni grogs su bzhag/ yi ge drug la grub pa ni// sangs rgyas drug gi rang bzhin te// 'od zer rnam pa drug du bcas//
277b1: rlung drug gis ni dbang byas nas// yul ni rnam pa drug la 'jug/ yul drug dag gis dbang byas nas// nyon mongs rnam pa drug dang bcas// nyon mongs rgyas par 'gyur ba yin// phung po rnam pa drug dang ldan// phung po grangs kyi dbye
277b2: bas ni/ yan lag drug drug 'phel bar 'gyur// yan lag rdzogs pa'i grib mar ni// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems sgrib byed// sgrib gnyis go bas 'thug po ni// bsal dka'i ri bo dang bcas pa// rtag chad gnas su zhugs pa'o//
277b3: srog rtsol bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyi rol snang ba nub par 'gyur// rtsol dang bral nas dga' skye ste// yi ge la ni sems gnas 'gyur// yi ge gsal ba'i 'od zer ni// ba spu khung rnams thams cad nas// sems dang
277b4: bcas pa ldang 'jug ste/ / slar yang thig le bsdus nas ni// yi ge nyid kyang mi dmigs so// 'dzin pa de bas thos nas kyang // sgyu ma'i rnam pa rjes dran bya// de la goms nas ting 'dzin ni// nyams pa med pa thob par 'gyur// ting
277b5: 'dzin de brtan gyur nas ni/ / lus 'dis rig pa 'dzin pa thob// rig 'dzin de la gnas nas ni// bla med byang chub de thob 'gyur// skad cig de la dngos rnams ni// nam mkha' lta bur dag nas kyang // mkha' ltar kun la khyab par
277b6: spyod/ / rten ni spyan ras gzigs dbang ste// lus ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo// yan lag phyag na rdo rje ste// mgo dang thod ni ma bam pa// gtsug tor sgrib pa rnam sel nyid// nyi zla kun du bzang po ste// sa chu me rlung nam mkha'
277b7: dang / rnam par shes nyid bcas pa'o// thams cad dbyer med 'gyur ba ste// bsam gtan la ni gnas pa'i phyir// stsal rnams so sor bsdu bar bya// sems glong pas ni nges par 'grub// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi//
277b8: dus ni rtag pa ma yin te// mi rtog sems nyid 'brel gyur nas// dus la tha dad mi rtog go// nyi ma'i 'khor lo chu rgun dang // nam mkha'i phyogs na ji lta gar// sems kyang sems kyis btsal bar bya// gzhan ni go skabs
278a1: mi byed do/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ thun mong gi sngags byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas drang srong gnas nas ni// sna tshogs
278a2: gzugs ldan zhes bya ba/ / bskal pa du mar sbyangs pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rig 'dzin zhig/ rgya cher rang gi 'khor bcas la// dkyil 'khor drung du lhags nas ni// rmad byung chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod// phyag
278a3: 'tshal kor ba du ma byas/ / thal sbyar 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ni// ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol// oM mtha' yas spros pa nyer zhi zhing // zhi mdzad dul zhi rab spyod mdzod// rtog bcom chog mkhyen tog yongs zhugs// ye shes
278a4: kun rgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ / zhi las zhi gyur 'thab 'byung ba// chos rnams kun mchog zhi chos che// spros med las spros dkar bcu bya// mtha' yas chos la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro 'gyur grol mdzad dag pa che// dag par
278a5: spyod pa gtsang ma mgon/ / tshogs rdzogs tshogs ldan tshogs spyod rgyal// tshogs rtag bdag nyid phyag 'tshal lo// rab mdzes thugs rje'i nyi mas brgyan// 'jig rten rab gsal mdzad pa'i// rtag pa don chen rtags
278a6: zhugs la/ / mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// khams gsum bag chags kyis dkrugs pa// thibs po'i ling tog zhugs pa rnams// mngon du snang bar brjod pa dang // sems la gsal skur shin du dag la//
278a7: mngon sum med la brjod bral yang // lkog du gyur pa smos ci dgos// lkog don mngon du byed pa la// phyag rgya dang ni 'dra 'bag mchog/ mngon sum thob ldan ming nas kyang // don la sems kyis gsal ba skye// don gang
278a8: yang yang goms pa las/ / sems kyi 'jug pa rtog pa ste// de bsal mi rtog blo 'bras bu// sgom pa'i pha rol phyin pa'o// blo dman rnams kyi 'jug pa dang // 'bring po 'gro bar bya phyir dang // rnon po rdzogs sangs
278b1: rgyas 'gyur phyir/ / gzugs brnyan byung tshul bshad du gsol// myur du 'jug dang grol ba dang // myur du byang chub cher 'gyur cing // gzugs brnyan dge ba'i tshul 'byung can// 'dres pas de ring bshad du gsol// mkha'
278b2: sprin rtag pa med pa la/ / mtshan mar gzung du med pa ltar// rnam rtog gis dkrugs sems la ni// su zhig mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur// dmigs pa'i mtshan ma gsal byed pa// gzugs brnyan tshad dang ldan pa ste//
278b3: legs par 'gyur ba'i yid 'jug cing // byin brlabs nges par 'jug par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'dren pa gtsos// ljags kyi dbang po rab bkram nas// gzugs brnyan dge ba'i tshul byung ba// nga las nyan par
278b4: brtson pa ni/ / legs pa lha yi drang srong mchog/ rig 'dzin byang chub sems khyod legs// rtse gcig sems kyis nyan nas kyang // legs par gsungs pa yid la zhog/ khyod la yang dag bshad bya ba// byin brlabs
278b5: dgyes pa'i gzugs brnyan ni/ / tshon gyis ris su bris pa 'am// rin chen rigs sam sa rdo 'am// shing la byas na mchog tu bsngags// dang po'i las can sems can la// dmigs pa gsal bar 'gyur ba dang //
278b6: sbyin brlabs mchog ni 'jug par 'gyur// tsa na dan dkar po gsal zhing drang // gzhon zhing chag gas med pa la// bsang zhing dud pas bdugs nas ni// dad ldan ngang tshul bzang ba'i bzhag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug
278b7: mgon gyi sku/ / bcwa brgyad sor tshad ldan pa la// gdan khri dag ni sor dgu ste/ rgyab yol sor tshad drug gis bskyed// bzhengs te ldem pa gnyams dga' ba// rin chen du ma'i gzugs kyis brgyan// g.yas kyi
278b8: dang po bgrang phreng ste/ / gnyis pa mi 'jigs stsol ba'i phyag/ g.yon pa dang po pad ma dmar// gnyis pa ril pa spyi blugs thogs// zhal gyi grangs ni bcu gcig la// mdun gyi zhal gsum mtshan bzang can// byams pa/
279a1: snying rje dga' ba'i mdangs// dkar po dkar ser dmar skya bo// g.yon gyi gsum ni khro bo'i zhal// sgeg pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa ste// dmar dang dmar ser leb rgan no// g.yas su gtum po'i khro zhal gsum// sngo
279a2: da ser dang ljang ku'o/ / rgyab tu khro gtum mdog dmar ba// rta skad rab tu 'tsher ba'i zhal// khro ba'i zhal rnams mche ba gtsigs// mig gsum dbu skra ser po ni// gyen du thor tshugs bcings pa'o// steng du sangs rgyas
279a3: 'dzum pa'i zhal/ / byi ru bcag pa'i mtshan 'dra ba'i// dbu yi cod pan nang rnams su// 'di dag phyogs bcu'i thub pa rnams// re re bzhin du bzhugs par bya// dbu rgyan cod pan ldan pa dang // rna rgyan mgul rgyan dpung rgyan
279a4: dang / / lag rgyan sa mo dor bcas pa// do shal rkang gdub ska rags can// rgyan dang na bza' mdzes pas brgyan// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ri mo dag la dga' gyur nas// yid gzhungs dal spyod khro ba med// sred
279a5: chung shes rab snying rje che/ / thabs ldan ri mo rgyud la mkhas// bsam pa bzang ldan tshul khrims bsrung // 'bri chos gzob la gzhungs pa yis// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas su bri// gzugs bzang yid dal gtsang
279a6: ldan pa'i/ / bu mes bkal ba'i ras la ni// tshon bzang ngur smrig mdog bya'o// 'thas per bcags te 'jam por bya// thig pa phyogs su bshad nas kyang // ser sna tshon gyi gzugs brnyan ni// tshad la mkhas pa
279a7: tshad ldan pa'i/ / nan tan du ni bri bar bya// dkar po wa yi shel yin te// dmar po sems rtsoli khri'o// sngon po rams dang 'bring shing ste// ser po ba bla dag pa yi/ nag po sdug cha nyid yin te// ljang khur mas dang ldong ngos
279a8: sbyar/ / yang na spangs ma nyid kyis bya// mu zi rams dang skags sbyar ste// gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya// sprin dang bral na grags par 'gyur// shing sprin ser dang ka pi ta// lo ma ta dang than dzar// de dag so sor
279b1: sbyar ba yis/ / gsal zhing bkrus med dag par byed// a ta pas ni snum par byed// gan to has ni rtag par 'gyur// rgyas par gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ yang na sgo gcig pa yang rung // dkyil 'khor cha rim gsum pa'ang // yang na
279b2: gnyis sam gsum yang rung / / dbus su gdong bcu gcig pa ni// mdzes pa'i lha mo bzhi ldan bri// shar du spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ dkyil 'khor rnam gnas gtso bo can// de yang spyan sogs lha mo bzhi/
279b3: phyag bzhi pa dang bcas pa'o// lhor ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ dkyil 'khor shAka thub gtso bo can// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa'o// nub tu rig ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/
279b4: sems dpa' bzhi bzhir bcas pa'o// dbus su rdo rje dbang mo yang // mdun du rdo rje rtag pa ste// g.yas su rdo rje dpal 'byung ngo // rgyab du rdo rje dpag med de// g.yon du rdo rje don grub bo// shar du lha mo spyan ma ni//
279b5: mdun du rdo rje sems dpa'o// g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po'o// rgyab du rdo rje chags pa ste// g.yon du rdo rje legs pa'o// lhor ni lha mo mA ma kI// mdun du rdo rje rin chen no// g.yas su rdo rje nyi ma ste// rgyab du rdo rje rgyal mtshan
279b6: ro/ / g.yon du rdo rje gzhad pa yin// rub dun bza' dkar mo yang // mdun du rdo rje chos yin te// g.yas su rdo rje rnon po yin// rgyab du rdo rje rgyu zhes pa// g.yon du rdo rje sla ba'o// byang du lha mo sgrol ma yang // mdun du rdorje/
279b7: las yin no// g.yas su rdo rje bsrung ba'o// rgyab du rdo rje gnod sbyin te// g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur ro// 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi ste// g.yas kyi dang po rang rigs
279b8: rtags/ / gnyis pas thams cad skyabs byin te// g.yon gyi dang po pad ma yang // phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o// gnyis pas phyogs kyi mdog ldan pa'i// sngags nor phreng yang 'chang ba'o// 'khor gyi/
280a1: modado dag kun// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// g.yon pa'i tha ma bum pa 'chang // lhag mgong ltar shes par bya// byang du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yang // khro bo bzhi bzhir bcas pa'o// dbus su rdo rje hUM byed de//
280a2: sngon po ud pa la'i mdog/ mdun du sngo bsangs chen po ste// g.yas su rdo rje drag mo'o// rgyab du rdo rje brjed byed pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje mthu chen mo// shar gyi 'khor lo'i cha rtsibs la// khro bo gshin rje gshed po gnag
280a3: mdun du rdo rje dbang zhal ma/ / g.yas su rdo rje khyab 'jug mo// rgyab du rdo rje gzhon nu ma// g.yon du rdo rje skul byed ma// 'khor lo rtsibs ni mnyam pa la// khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub ser// mdun du rdo rje gnag byed mo// g.yas
280a4: su rdo rje mchen mo/ / rgyab tu rdo rje zla ba mo// g.yon du rdo rje rnon po ma// rtsibs gsum rdo rje gtsug tor ser// rdo rje khro mo khrag 'thung mo// rdo rje rlung 'dzin chen mo dang // rdo rje sdang byed mor bcas pa'o// nub kyi rtsibs la rta mgrin
280a5: dmar/ mdun du rdo rje rmongs byed ma// g.yas su rdo rje zhi ba mo// g.yon du rdo rje tshol byed ma// / lnga pa'i rtsibs la de bzhin du// khro bo bgegs mthar byed pa ldang // mdun du rdo rje gsor byed ma// g.yas su rdo rje gtum mo
280a6: ste/ rgyab du rdo rje ro langs ma// g.yon du rdo rje rings byed ma// rtsibs drug 'khor lor bri ba ni// rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal ldang sngo// mdun du rdo rje chu dbang po// g.yas su dngos grub 'byung ba mo'o// rgyab du rdo rje mtshan modag
280a7: g.yon du rdo rje mkha' dbang phyug/ de ltar rdo rje khra ba khri mo rnams// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o// khro bo phyag gnyis mnga' gzhu bkang // g.yas na btson kha ts+tsha dang // tho ba rdo rje rgya gram dang // 'khor lo gtun
280a8: shing rdo rje rnams/ / rang rtags phyag rgya 'chang ba'o// g.yon na sdig 'ju ba zhags pa'o// kun kyang rtag gi sham thabs can// khro mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// g.yas na gri gug cang te'uhaM// g.yon na thod khrag la tswa/
280b1: zhing lpags dag gi chos gos te// gzig gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can// khro bo'i g.yon na sgeg pa'i tshogs// de rgyab cha yi snam bu la// phyogs rer lha mo bzhi bzhi dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bzhi//
280b2: phyogs rer brgyad brgyad bkod pa ste// sum bcu rtsa gnyis gzhengs pa'i tshul// de bzhin bskor bzhin sems ma mchog/ lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // 'bebs ma rang rtags phyag rgya g.yas// gnyis
280b3: pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste/ / g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad ma dang // gnyis pa dar gyis chos gos so// kun kyang sgeg nyams ldan pa'o// de rgyab dkyil 'khor cha la ni// shar du brgya byin glang chen zhon// g.yas kyi dang
280b4: po rdo rje ste/ / gnyis pa skyabs sbyin phyag rgya can// g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad ma ste// gnyis pa rang mdog phreng ba bri// de yi g.yon du tshangs pa ser// ngang pa'i khri la bzhugs pa la// g.yas kyi dang po nyi ma
280b5: 'chang/ / ma phyogs su ni me lha ste// mdog dmar ra zhon me phung 'dzin// lho yi phyogs su gshin rje sngo// thod dbyug bzung ba ma he zhon// bden bral du ni srin po gnag/ rtse gsum bzung nas srin po zhon// nub
280b6: tu chu lha dkar po ni/ / klu yi khri la sbrul zhags bzung // de yi g.yon dus bdag dkar// bum pa bzung ste rus sbal zhon// lha min phyogs su rlung lha ldang // ba dan bzung ste sha bzhon// byang du gnod sbyin mi la
280b7: zhon/ / ljang nag phyag na gter sgrom mo// byang shar dbang ldan dkar po ni// rtse gsum bzung ste khyu mchog zhon// sgo bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi// phyogs kyi kha dog go cha can// pi wang ral gri zhags pa can/
280b8: rin chen dbyug tho g.yas kyis 'chang // gnyis pa skyabs kyi phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa ma la bgrang phreng ni// phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o// kun kyang sgeg nyams phyogs kyi mdog/ rim bzhin stag gzig
281a1: dom seng ge'i/ / khri la bzhugs pa'i gzigs pa can// rang rang phyogs kyi sgo la ni// bsrung brtson shin du 'grus pa'o// dkyil 'khor cha brgyad khor yug tu// bza' shing me tog spos shing dang // mdzes pa'i shing
281a2: tshogs tshal gseb du/ / mdzes pa'i bya sogs dud 'gro dang // lha yi ba dang bu mo sogs// de bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za gral bum bu mo'o// rol mo byed pa dra ma bri// 'di ltar dang na la las ni// 'jig rten skyong ba'i nang rol
281a3: gza' dang rmA sar sum bcu drug/ rin chen pad ma la gnas bri// srin drag pad ma dkar po 'chang // srar ma mgo ni ud pa la// nab so pad dkar lag tri shUl// rgyal ni bgrang phreng mag sbal nag/ mchu ni pad seraH/
281a4: mnyam bzhag/ mi ba'i pang dkar cong thug pa// nag pa pad mas ri ras// sa ga bo tik+ta 'tshams rnam// sgron ni rdo rje rnams dbyug ste// chu stod ril brgya smad pad// byaM zhan gser gyi 'khor lo ste// sgo ldan tshwa stsogs son gru pa/
281a5: mon gre shel sgong khrims stod kyis// ral gyi khrums slad ku mu ta// nam gru ba dan tha skar gyis// shing lo bra nye dbyug srin no// zla ba ku mung dkar po ste// nyi ma pad ma dmar po'o// mig dmar me'i phreng ba ste// gza' lag ung
281a6: bal sngon po'o/ / pra rabras chos kyi glegs pam mo// pa ba sangs ni bgrang phreng bzung // spen pa lag na ral gri 'chad// sgra gcan bdud rtsi'i gzhong bu'i// nang gi grwa'i char gtogs pa// bkra shis lha mo brgyad yin te// rtag dbang
281a7: ma dang rgyal ma sha ra/ / don grub ma dang mi 'pham lhor// nub tu bde ba bde dga' ma// myur grub ma dang gtan ma byang // rtse lnga rtse gsum rdo rje dang // sngon po ser po rin chen dang // dkar dang dmar dang ud pal dang // ud pal
281a8: sngon dang kra mra ta/ / dang po phyag na rim bzhin 'chang // skyabs sbyin pad ma bgrang phreng ni// lhag ma rnams kyi rim bzhin 'chad// de dag thams cad phyogs mdog go/ rgyas pa'i spros pas skyon yang // lnga bcu brgyad dam sum bcu
281b1: bdan/ / nyi shu dgra'am nyi shu lnga// bcwa lnga dgra'am lnga 'am gcig/ yi ge phyag rgya gzugs brnyan tshogs// sprul pa sku'i cho 'phrul te// rang gis ji ltar 'dod pa yi// sems kyi byin brlabs nyid du 'gyur// bde gshegs sku dang
281b2: po ti dang / / phyag rgya sogs pa rab gnas bya// nyams sam dri mas gos pa ni// bkrus dang bshig nas dag byed la// rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis su// de la bsod nams dpag tu med// gzugs sogs sngon pas dman gyur
281b3: kyang / / de yis bsod nams mtha' yas thob// phrin las dang ni sku gsang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid de// de bzhin nyid de stong pa nyid// byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang // mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob ste// sgyu ma
281b4: rmi lam lta bu'o/ / sum bcu gnyis dang brgyad bcu ni// yi ge brda dang spros pa'i sku// longs sku bsod nams rgyu 'thun 'bras// sprul sgra las kyi rnam smin 'bras// kun rdzob don dam mtshan nyid ldan// dag dang ma dag skal
281b5: ldan la/ / bde gshegs phrin las gzugs sku gnyis// tshogs gnyis la ni sku gsum byung // rnam byang kun nyon mongs pas stong // lus ngag yid kyi spyod yul min// dmigs med nam mkha'i khams rtogs pa// rgyal ba
281b6: rnams kyi chos sku'o/ / rtag chad med pa'i rten 'brel ni// skye 'gag med pa thugs chud pa// yid kyis rnam shes 'jug lam gyis// bsam gtan goms pas shes par bya// dad pa'i lcags kyu shes rab can// lha klu 'bum
281b7: brag dkar po'i sems dge ba/ / kun slong byang chub gter gyi rin chen nor// thob par 'dis mdzod 'khor los sna rab 'byung // sems kyi dbas gces de phyir spyod spyad pas// dbang por bya ba'i rgyud kun khyad par du// pad ma
281b8: dra ba phyag stong gis brgyan par/ / myur du sgrub pa'i thabs mang gsungs pa rnams// bskus brtson dang byas ldan pas gces su bya// bla ma'i lung yod snying rje gang ldan pa// rgyal dang rgyal sras tshogs rnams kun dgyes nas/
282a1: 'dag tan snang tshags dga' bzlas ca dgas// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gartsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po padamadra ba zhes bya ba las gzugs brtan 'byung ba'i ma'u ma tha //
282a2: denas dga' lngar gnas 'khrungs pa// bskal pa du mar tshogs bsags pa// rig pa gsum ldan lha yi bu// mdzes pa'i tog ces mtshan gsol pa// spyan ras gzigs la cher dang nas// zhengs te thal mo myar byas
282a3: shing / / 'khor tshogs chen po dang bcas pas// mthon gcig du ni 'di skad gsol// oM khams gsum kun gyi tha ma gso/ 'dren pa mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// sa gsum ye shes 'od po che// bde bar gshegs
282a4: laphyag 'aralalo/ / yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ rig sngags pade ldan byin brlabs can// gsung drung rtag padam chos gtso// kun togs la skyo ba phyag 'tshal lo// rtag par brtse ldan spyan ras gzigs// byang chub
282a5: sems tshogs 'byung tshogs rgyal/ / bya ba byas nas bskal par gnas// pad 'chang tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi// thugs rjeye shes las byung ba'i// rig sngags phreng ba byin brlabs
282a6: can/ / mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// sems can rnams la ba na don phyir// phyag rgya phrin las ldan par gsungs// las kyi dri ma dang ldan zhing // nyon mongs bdag rgyal gyis bcings nas// le lo ser sna'i
282a7: 'das rdza ba can/ / khur dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams// myur du zol bar bya ba dang // thugs rje nyi ma bkram byas te// srid bang ba sdug po skem pa dang // myur du sangs rgyas 'grub bya'i phyir/ lha dang gsang sngags blang
282a8: dang / / phrin las sbyor ba ldan pa dang // brdud pa rgyun gzhan med pa yi// sbyor ba'i tshul 'byung bshad du gsol// rig sngags rjes gnang med pa ni// bslabs kyang 'bras med ngal ba ste// 'dren pa med pa'i shing ta ni// 'kho
282b1: lo bzang yang gang du byin/ / nyon mongs rtsa ba gcad pa'i phyir// rig sngags ral gri rno dang mtshungs// bdag 'dzin go cha 'bigs pa'i mdung // sdug bsngal mtsho skems nyi ma che// kun rtog rdul phung bsreg pa'i me// shes rab
282b2: me tog 'khrud pa'i rlan/ / na da ngan kun sel sman mchog ste// bag tshogs sel ba'i sred med bu// bag tshegs bkrus pa'i chu rgyun yin// leng spyod 'phel ba'i gter chen nyid// 'khor ba las brgal gru gzings te// nyes pa kun
282b3: sel zung dang mtshungs/ / de nas bcom ldan thub pa che// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas chen gyis// srab 'jam ring ba'i ljags bkram nas// tshangs pa'i gsung snyan dbyangs kyis gsungs// 'gro la thugs rje chen po yis
282b4: sngags 'byung brgud pa'i rim 'byung ba'i/ / cho ga dam pa nyan brtson pa// shin du legs so lha yi bu// nyams dga' dge ba'i sa phyogs su// sa yi cha mnyam dkyil 'khor bltar// pad ma'i gdan 'dra'i dkyil 'khor ni//
282b5: tshen sna ma lus rnams kyis bri// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang sogs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rig pa'i lha mo khro mor bcas// 'jig rten skyong sogs ma lus pa'i// sku 'am phyag rgya bkod pa
282b6: dang / / mchod pa'i tshogs kyang bkram par bya// mar me yon cha ba zug spos dri// zhal zas gtor ma sna tshogs dang // gzhan yang zas skom sna tshogs dang // rgyan dang na bza' lha ba lbu ba dang // sil snyan me tog phreng dum//
282b7: yid 'ong mdzes pa'i tshig gis pacan// slob ma gus pas tha ma la// yon bral brtson byas 'di skad gsol// sems can kun gyi sems kyi gnyen// dmus leng lam log las 'dren pa// rab rib sel ba'i tha ma
282b8: can/ / bdag la 'dren pa'i grol ma sogs// shes rab snying rje'i skye ba can// zos bsam bsgom pa'i gru gzings can// las can sdug bsngal chu sgrol ba'i// thabs brtson nyan pa khyod phyag 'tshal// byang chub las
283a1: mthong dbag yas thugs/ / 'gro rnams thar lam ten gzigs pa// dge brtson dge la bskul ba'o// dge bcu med pa dag la grol// dam tshig sdom gnas ngang tshul bzang // bag yod dbyangs mkhas ltung ba
283a2: med/ / chos don gnyer ba'i don skyabs so// skyabs dang sdom gnas bdag la stsol// dga' brtan zhi rdul spyad pa yi// dga' slad slob dpon 'di skad brjod// oM gti mug rnam dag bder gshegs thugs// rnam par
283a3: snang mdzad skyabs su mchi/ / zhe sdang rnam dag rdo rje thugs// mi bskyod pa la skyabs su mchi// ser sna rnam dag longs spyod gter// rin chen 'byung ldan skyabs su mchi// 'dod chags rnam dag pad ma'i gsung // 'od dpag med/
283a4: la skyabs su ma chi// phrag dog rnam dag phrin las rgyal// don yod rdo rje skyabs su mchi// AHgnas med mkha' dang mnyam spyod pa// chos dbyings chos la skyabs su mchi// skye med skye snang ltar grub chos// 'phags lam
283a5: brgyad la skyabs su mchi/ / don cig tshogs lam bcu gnyis grangs// gsung rab yan lag skyabs su mchi// rgyu 'bras snang ba'i so sor rtog/ nyan thos dge 'dun skyabs su mchi// gcig gam tshogs spyod rdzu 'phrul che//
283a6: rang rgyal dge 'dun skyabs su mchi// snying rje shes rab byang chub 'brel// sems chen tshogs la skyabs su mchi// bsod dang chu rdzun 'khrig spyod dang // tshig rtsub phra ma dag khyal dang // brnab sems gnod sems log
283a7: lta spyod/ / thar pa'i srog gcod bcu po spongs// chang 'thung til mar 'tshar las dang // mgar dang rgya skyegs rtswa shing gcod// srog chags tshegs dang mgo zlum 'tshod// mtho ris lus kyi grags chen spong // rtags dang
283a8: phyag rgya 'dra 'bag dang / / rten dang dge 'dun rtags yi ge/ bgrang phreng 'dzin pa'i yo byad sogs// 'gos dang bshig pa gtan tu spong // mchod pa rnyil dang sgog pa dang // 'bags dang lhag mar gyur pa dang // sha dang
283b1: man pa'i lag gi zas/ / srog chags yod pa'i chu rnams spong // deng nas bzung ste ci srid pa// byang chub snying po thug par du// sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge bas chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims
283b2: sogs/ / nam du mi dor brtan por gzung // lha dang slob dpon yid byed cing // rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya gzung // 'grol zang zing mi 'jigs skyabs// chos kyi sbyin pa ci 'byor stsol// theg gsum tha dad chos tshul rnams// mi
283b3: 'gal sbyor bas rgyun du spyad/ / lus ngag yid dang longs spyod bcas// ser sna med pas mchod 'os mchod// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa'i// rig 'byung sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// des spyod dam tshig dam pa rnams sdom
283b4: tshul brtan po gzung bar bya/ / 'gro rnams kun la snying brtse dang // yi dgas rnams la gtor ma sbyin// 'dzam b+ha la ni chu yis mchod// yi dgas dag kyang chus mnyes bya// de rjes slob ma rab dga' nas// ci 'byor/
283b5: lha dang bla ma mchod// dga' chen las sbyor slob dpon dgongs// snying brtse bdag la gzigs nas kyang // lha dang sngags dang byin brlabs thabs// de bdag brtse phyir stsal du gsol// rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs
283b6: bzhugs pa'i/ / nyams dga' thar pa'i grong khyer che// yid bzhin longs spyod char du 'bab// khang chen der ni bdag 'jug 'tshal// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// spros bral
283b7: dmigs su med pa'i don/ / las chen bdaga' stsal du gsol// de nas slob dpon sngags rig pa// de cid bcu sbyar mkhas pa'o// g.yon pas chos gos rtse bzung ste// lag pa g.yas chos phyag tu can// gsapa/
283b8: bstod 'dzum pa'i mdangs 'od rgyas// dad dang ldan pa 'di skad brjod// oM bu sho ga theg pa chen po yi// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin phyir// gsang sngags spyod tshul chog rnams// khyed la nges par bstan par bya//
284a1: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgoms pas// mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes rnams// shAkya seng ge dpa' bos kyang // gsang sngags
284a2: sbyor ba mnyam med kyis/ / bdud sde shin du mi bzad pa'i// dpung chen dag kyang 'dir bcom mo// 'jig rten rjes 'dul rdzogs bya'i phyir// 'khor lo skor nas mya ngan 'das// de phyir kun thob bya ba'i phyir// bu yis
284a3: blo gros 'di gyis shig/ sngags dang rdzas kyi bsrung ba dang // lha'i rten mig de la mchod// u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar// 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag/ brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang
284a4: ni mi 'byung ngo / / sngags kyi spyod tshul 'byung ba ni// de bas kyang ni ches dkon te// gang gis mtshungs med sems can dono// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// bskal pa du mar bsags pa'i sdig/ gang la sdig
284a5: khur ci yod pa/ / lha'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang // byin brlabs tsam gyis byang chub nas// blo gros dri ma med pa yis// spyod tshul brlabs pa zhugs nas lha// ngan 'gro sdug bsngal rgyun bcad nas// mtshan ldan
284a6: sku ni gzhan don thod/ / bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa mtshungs med de ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pas// bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams ni// gang du mes kyang gzung ba'i phyir// deng nas khyed rnams
284a7: thog chen rigs/ / sha stag tu ni skye des te// theg pa chen por cher 'byung ba// dpal dang ldan pa'i lam mchog 'di// gang du rgyas par khrid nas kyang // bde bar gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// de bas sgrol brtson par gyis//
284a8: slob ma ku sha dge ba yi// stan la nyal na pa rmi lam dri// bsang dang sbyor ba byas nas kyang // chus bkrus 'di rnams klag pa dang // bkra shis du ma klag byas te// gdong pa dar gyis bcings nas kyang // 'bras kyi me tog phreng ba
284b1: nilha yi dkyil 'khor dbus su dong / / slar blangs mgo la bcing bya ste// pad ma ldan rigs mtshan gyis rgyan// mig bye de la lha rnams dang // byang chub phyogs tshes mtshan ma yi// yon tan ye shes stobs mnga' ba//
284b2: mchod rten lha tshogs bcas pa bstan// yid ches dang ba mngon byas la// ci 'byor pa yis mchod par bya// de nas dag pa'i sras de la// mar me la ni mar mo ltar// 'dod pa'i lha ni stsal bar bya// brjod pa dang bcas 'brel pa
284b3: yis/ / rtsa ba'i snying po nye snying tshogs// sngags kyang gsal bar sbyin par bya// zhi ba shel gyi phreng ba ste// rgyas pa la ni a ru ra// dbang la lung thang dmar po shis// drag po rwa'am ru na sha/ bo de tses ni las kun byed// sngag sa
284b4: bcas stsal nas mgo la bcing / / hUM dang bcas pa'i rdo rje yang // lag pa g.yas su gzhag par bya// stod g.yogs kriSh+Na sa ri ste// smad g.yogs kha dog sngon po'o// dbu rgyan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste// zhal zas snod ni bad
284b5: mas brgyan/ / sems can kun don spyod pa'i rdzas// thub pas bkra shis bzhed pa'i rtags// gdugs nya bum pa dpal be'u dang // rgyal mtshan 'khor lo pad ma stsal// nad sel bde byed 'tsho ba'i phyir// 'dod yon pog
284b6: ris grub pa'i rdzas/ / gi'u wang du ra ba li kri zho// pil pa sbrang rtsi a ru ra// ka ra bi ra'i 'bras bu rnams// hri zhes dag pas rtsal bar bya// gur gum ga bur gla rtsi dang // ba'i 'o mas sbyar byas nas// tshig 'dis lce la gzhag
284b7: bar bya/ oM yan gar nges pa'i tshig rig dang // ming gi rnam grangs chos rig dang // dri ba lan ldon spobs pa'i rig/ phyi nang mtshan nyid don rig shog/ badz+ra d+ham pra be sha/ oM bcas brjod cing lcel na// lan gsum
284b8: rdo rjes gzhag par bya/ / dIH yig dmar pos med par bsas// gang la dgos pa de 'byung zhing // gos pa gzhan bye dbang med na/ rtog pa'i 'byung ba chad pa'i phyir// kun rtog phyag rgyal dmigs bshad// dmigs
285a1: rten gyis sngags la yang / / byin brlabs tha dad 'byung bar 'gyur// sa la dbang bsrur thob 'dod pas// phyag na 'khor lo 'chang la dmigs// ting 'dzin brtan la rdo rje ste// dpal thob 'dod pas rin chen
285a2: dmigs/ / gzugs bzang 'dod pa pad ma ste// spobs pa 'dod par la bri'o// gzhan don 'dod pas rgya gram ste// rdo rje dkar pos sems gsal 'gyur// shes rab 'dod pas glegs bam mo// khang bzangs kyis ni
285a3: mi'i rgyal po'o/ / thub gzugs rtag tu sangs rgyas 'jam// thal sbyar ba ni 'gro bas bkur// khang bsil byams dang steng rje ste// lcags kyus 'jig rten myong bas bsrung // rin chen ze'u 'bru lte bder 'gyur// dril bus skad
285a4: snyan byed par 'gyur/ / bgrang 'phreng gis ni lung bstan 'thob// khri rkang gis ni nye dbang 'gyur// lha sogs bdug pa dung yin te// mdung rtse gsum pas g.yul las rgyal// pad ma dmar pos lha ru skye// ril ba spyi blugs
285a5: tshangs ris skye/ / sprin mdog lnga ni drang srong skye// me long gis ni lha zhal mthong // pad ma rAgs ye shes skye// pad ma sngon pos dag pa'i zhing // pad ma dkar pos dge tshogs 'phel// ri bos bu dang bu mo 'phel// dgra stas
285a6: bdud kyi bar chod sal/ / 'khor dang sems 'thun 'bring g+ha ras// dub kyis dgra dang gcan zan 'joms// rnga yab dkar pos sdig pa 'phyag/ me tog snyems nad sel byed// rin chen mdangs ni yid 'ong grogs// gzhus ni nor
285a7: ngang go 'phang snyed/ / chu shel dug dang tshang rims sel// mi 'jigs phyag gis 'jigs skrag 'joms// dgral rdo rje gtun shing ste// rdo rje nag po bdud 'dul 'gyur// rin chen ral gris rig sngags zlog/ lto ba na las lhung
285a8: bzed de/ / rims nad sel byed zhags pa'o// 'bru 'dod pas ni 'bru ste ma// nor dbyig 'dod pas rin chen phrag/ yang na lung bstan 'dod pas na// mgo la sangs rgyas dmigs par bya// mngon par shes pa lnga 'dod na//
285b1: sangs rgyas lnga po dmigs par bya// de nas mgon po spyan ras gzigs// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis pad ma'i zhal// sa yi snying po la gzigs nas// sa yi go rims 'di gsungs so// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ni// gsang
285b2: sngags thams cad sa bdun te/ / gsang sngags sa dang sngags sbyaras// rig 'chang sa dang rig gsal sa// rigs mchog sa dang rigs chenas// phyag rgya chen po'i sa rnams so// gtsug tor chen po'i sangs rgyas sa// gnas/
285b3: skabs drug tu rgyal bas gsungs// kun du 'od dang pad ma'i spyan// yi ge 'khor lo tshegs che nas// rdor 'chang ye shes bla ma'i sa// rdzogs sangs bde ba chen po'i sa// sa'i snying po sa gsol pa// mgon po 'phags pa
285b4: thugs rje'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ byin rlabs lcags klu lta bus 'khor ba'i btsen ra nas// klu phrugs 'bum phrag drangs ltar dge ba kun slong gis// byang chub rin chen ma la 'jog mdzad ngo mtshar che// 'phags/
285b5: baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga rtse ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba las byin brlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du// rab dga'i tshul du 'khrungs pa'i lha// te
285b6: 'dzin yangs pa zhes bya ba/ / rtogs pa rgya che zab pa zhig/ 'khor dang bcas pa bzhengs byas te// me tog rin chen rigs byung ba// ston pa'i phyogs su char bzhin pa pa// mkha' la gdugs kyi bla re bkad// 'khor dang
285b7: bcas pas mgrin gcig tu/ / gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang// rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'o// rdo rje rig 'dzin mchog grub pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung phyir// bdag dang sems can kun tu
285b8: yang / / dngos grub 'byung rim bshad du gsol// la la sems ni g.yengs pa yis// bla ma'i rgyud don bral mod kyang // sngags rgyud sdig pa 'chang byed 'byung // snyan tshig rmongs rnams ngo mtshar skye// gdams ngag med pas
286a1: 'gro bsdus/ / dngos grub med pas bstan pa gzhig/ sred pas lan gcig sogs par 'gyur// gnyis pa dmyal tshogs ngan 'gror 'gro// la la las kyi skye mched no// dbang po rten kha dmar myur la// gdams
286a2: ngag d+hAng tshul yod mang kyi/ / chas tshul bzhin du skyed byed cing // gang la dbang du bzung ba yi// bu 'dra bas kyang brnyes byur nas// snang ba 'phel nas cod par gyur// des kyang gnyis kar dmyal sogs 'gro// la la zas chung
286a3: shes rab dman/ / rmongs pa gzhan rkyen nga rgyal can// bstan pa dang ni 'chad byed la// skyon slod smra bas dmyal sogs 'gro// la la mi dge ba shes gnyen gyis// log lam 'jug pa'i nges 'dzin can// yang dag lam smon
286a4: brtson pa dong / / log sgrub can de dmyal bar 'gro// la la bsam med sngags brjod med// mar me bdug spos gtor ma sogs// 'byung pos brlams te bdag nyid dang // 'khor bcas tshe thung longs spyod 'grib// la la 'dod srad
286a5: gtumardeb che/ / mkhas gzhan dag la phrag dog gis// sgro skur tshul 'chos tshes la smod// rang nyid lta ngan bsgrub la rtsod// ther zug blo yi mun pa can// 'byung po drag po'i rigs su skye// la la ser sna rab 'jug pas// lha dang /
286a6: bla ma tshig gis bstod// zas dang longs spyod rgyan gos dang // me tog bdug spos gtor ma sogs// nyung ngu mug tshul rgyun sprul na// zas skom dag gis gdungs pa yi// yi dgas dman pa'i rigs su ni// yang nas
286a7: yang du skye bar nges/ / de phyir de dag spangs nas ni// yang bas bsam pa bzang ldan pas// tshul bzhin blangs te thos bsam gyis// gtan la pa ba don ma 'khrul bar// brjod cing yid la byed pa dang // the tshom med par
286a8: brtson byed pas/ / 'gro tshogs grol byed thabs thob na// rang don 'ba' zhig spos ci dgos// de nas lag na rdo rje gtso// ye shes mtha' yas mnga' ba'i skus// 'gro la snying brtser rab grags nas// gsang ba'i skad
286b1: kyis 'di skad gsungs/ / nga la nyan par btson byed pa// shin tu legs so lha yi za// lha dang dngos grub 'byung 'brel ba'i// ting 'dzin nga yis bshad par bya// khyod nyid rtse gcig yid kyis ni// legs par nyon la yid
