286b2: la zung / / shin tu zab cing rgya che ba'i// dam chos thob pa shin tu dka'// rgyun chad med pa'i thugs rje can// spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po gtso// rang gi sems la bskyed par bya// shin tu gsalan dngos grub 'gyur//
286b3: dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis pa yi ge'i byang chub sems// gsum pa spro btags ming tshogs sems// bzhi pa gzugs brnyan phyag rgya'i sems// lnga pa byin brlabs rgyas 'debs sems// sgra dang
286b4: brag cha'i rdul 'byung bar/ / gtso bo'i 'khor gyis khyad par gsol// dbus su yi ge o lnga ste// shar du hUM lhor ni swA// nub tu hrIHyi ga byang duH// rigs kyi rigs ni yang yang bskyed// lha ni gang du' pheM 'gyur
286b5: bas/ / dkyil 'khor de yi rigs 'byung yin// rigs kyi phyag rgya de nyid kyi// rig pa rigs kyi rgyas 'debs shing // rigs kyi lha tshogs po mo rnams// nyam dga' dben pa'i tshul gyis su// phan tshun du na bltas
286b6: nas gnas/ / ltes bag na bza' 'phyang 'phrul dang // 'phur lding sil snyan rin chen tshogs// du ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan bya ste// lal ldem bzhengs 'gying dang bcas// la la rdo rje skyil thung bcas// la
286b7: las pad ma'i sbrel grang ste/ / la la sems dpa'i skyil zung can// lal khro thabs brkyang bsdus can// la la zhal phya ga zhabs kyang med// lal zhabs ni gnyis yin te// la la zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis/
286b8: la la pad sdong pad ma spyan// la la pad ma mi 'jigs phyag/ gun d+he bum pa 'bar sil dang // rnga yab legs so skyabs sbyin phyag/ rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu dang // 'khar rnga shing rnga rje rnga dung // zangs lcags rdo dang rus pa'i rnga// ring zlum
287a1: rkang nyag leb phyal che/ / chung phra spo ba yangs dog pa dang // ral gri chu gri gri rings dang // gri leb gri zla ba gri kyog dang // sta zur sta leb phyal ste dang // rnga chung gzhog ste 'bigs sta dang // zlum sta 'phreng ste gzhar sta dang /
287a2: mdud dang bdud rtse gsub 'phen mdung // 'khor lo khat+taM gtun shing sgyogs// snye ma tig bu me tog dang // sdong bu la 'dab yal ga dang // ba dan pad gdugs rgyal mtshan srungs// rgya gram pad pa rin chen sgom// 'khor lo glegs bam
287a3: ud pal go/ / de la stsogs te mchog mtha' yas// phyag rgya stong snyed tshang pa 'am// brgya rtsa brgyad dam bzhi bcu drug/ nyi shu gnyis sam bcu gnyis drug/ bzhi 'am gnyis sogs mos pas 'byung // phyag rgyab cing ldan phyag rgya ste/
287a4: des ni lha la rgyas 'debs byed// gom pa'i stobs kyis phyag rgya che// seng ge'i sgra ni seng ge zhen// rgyal po rol pa'i stabs tshul can// rtse gsum sbrul dang mi 'jigs phyag/ pad ma sdod bcas ral gri 'bar// dpa' bo'i lcags
287a5: k+Sha thod pa ni/ / nang pa mdun gyi cha gnas pa// gtum po drag po 'od ldan ma// g.yon du klu'i dbang phyug so// pad sa dang ni phyogs mdog sems dpa'i dkyil krung can// yid bzhin nor bu rta la bcibs// zhal gsum
287a6: phyag drug 'khor lo dang / / rdo rje pad ma rin chen phyag/ skyabs gsol mchog sbyin phyag rgya can// 'khor ni sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung ste// mdog bzang sgeg pa'i lha mo ni// yid byur rin chen bzang mo dang // pad rgyal mo dang rten mo//
287a7: da chen par pa zla zi la// 'khor lo grogs kyi tshul du'o// pad mo 'byung gnas ma bya zhon// zhal gcig phyag bzhi sdes pag cag// pad sa skyabs kyinalcags kyu dang/ ril pa skyi thugs bgana'achang // sgeg mo phrengs kru ga sa// pad thA
287a8: sems dpa'i dkyil krung ngo / / mi bskyod pa ni mkha' lding bci bas// ral gri pad ma mda' gzhu dang // skyabs sbyin gang ba'i bum pa thogs// bzad 'dzin ma dang rnam sbyangs ma// sa srungs mo dang rab brtan mo// de dag gong gis cha byang b.ru das/
287b1: don yod zhags pa kra stengs bzhugs// rin po che dang zhags pa dang // skyabs sbyin lcags kyu 'chang ba'o// seng ge mo dang glang po ma// rtag gdong khyu mchog gdong ldan pa// pad ma zla ba'i gangadan la'o// ta la ha la dus sbal stengs// rdo rje dril bu
287b2: skyabs sbyin dang / / chos kyi za ma tog 'chang pa'o// nyi 'od ma dang zla 'od pa// chu dbang po dang nor phrang po// dge ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa'o// mgon po pad brgyan lung che// chu srin steng du rol pa'i tshul// Da ma ru dang bgrang phreng dang // mi 'jigs
287b3: phyag dang lcags sgrog go/ / lu gu rgyud ma 'khor lo ma// gsang ba po dang ring bsrel mo// glang sor rdo rje chos dbang phyug/ chos kyi 'khor lo chos 'chad rgya// skyabs sbyin padam po tir bcas// dga' ba dga' skyes snang byed ma// sil snyar
287b4: ma rnams pad zla ra ni/ / phyed krung ldem pag tshul du'o// rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor ni// ha re ha ri ha ri zhor// zhal gsum phyag ni brgyad pa la// 'khor lo rdo rje mda' gzhu dang // pad dkar bgrang phreng skyabs sbyin dang // bdud rtsis gang
287b5: ba'i bum pa 'chang / / mkha' lding gdong ma shA ri'i gdong// nyi zhal zla zhal lta po'o// mgrin sngo dga' bo nyi dga'i steng // zhal gsum phyag drug pad ma dang // po ti skyabs sbyin bzang phreng phyag/ seng ge'i gdong mo klu zhal mo// dga' byer
287b6: mo dang srog byed do/ / pad blar sems dpa'i dkyil klad do// dbus su mgon po gdong bcu gcig/ gsang 'dzin po dang 'dzin pa mo// sngags bsrung ba dang grub spangs pa// gong ltar cha byad phyogs mdog go// phyogs bzhi 'khor
287b7: mnaral no/ / gtso zom pas dpa' bzhi dang bcas// shar du rdo rje dbang phyug ni// thigs med yod dang thub dbang phyug// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gcer sgom can// kun kyang pad mtha ba la 'o// gling na rin chen dbang phyug te// thub can
287b8: dbang phyug dang phag zhal/ / grub pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang // grub 'dzin dbang phyug zhes bya'o// rlab tu pad ma'i dbang phyug ni// skyes bu seng ge'i zhal dang ni// pad ma'i phyag dang sbrul nag phyag// tso thad rgyas 'dzin zhes bya'o//
288a1: byang du dam tshig dbang phyug dang // 'khor lo 'chang dang stag lpags 'char// kun grub dbang phyug sgra dung 'phel// phyogs dang phyogs kyi mdog can no// 'jig rten skyong ba bcu po dang // rgyal po chen po sde bzhi po// kun tu
288a2: grags pa'i lha chen rnams/ / bstan la dga' ba dgod par bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das don du// rigs bzang skye ba bzhes dgongs pa// bskal pa bzang po 'di 'dzin pa'i// sangs rgyas stong yang dgod par bya// de ltar rgyas
288a3: bar spros pa ni/ / lha rnams grangs ni rgya che bar// gcig stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu bdun// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lha// mgon po gdong bcu gcig pa yi// lha grangs dkyil 'khor bkod pa'o// spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil
288a4: 'khor bcu/ / 'jig rten dbang gi dkyil 'khor lnga// rig pa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor lnga// rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bdun// dkyil 'khor de dag re re la// sems kyi dkyil 'khor lha mang ste// rang bzhin gyis ni nyi shu lnga// d+hU 'bras
288a5: tshul du rnam pa dgu/ / ye shes tshal lnga yin te// chos nyid ngo bos gcig tu rgyal// gang gad mos pa de dang de'i// dkyil 'khor rnam par spro ba 'am// gcig tu mos pa'i sbyor ba yis// byang chub rdo rje mchog thob nas// khams
288a6: gsum rgyal por longs spyod che/ / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur// gtsang sbra che zhing dang sems can// rtse gcig sgrub la nan tan rtsol// blo bzangs 'gro la 'jug cing spyod// ngag snyan dang gis khro ba med// g.yo sgra 'dod brkam
288a7: g.yeng ba med/ / lus dgadal zhing thos pa mang// nga rgyal ser sna chags pa med// gtong pod snying rje drag ldan pas// spyan ras gzigs la gang dmigs nas// de yi snying po ca sngags la// par chod med pas rab brjod nas// gzhan
288a8: la pan phyir smon lam brjod/ / spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// gang la 'jigs pa brgyad snar tshe// khro bo chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// de dag skur du sel byed shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// gang la
288b1: nad rims gang byung tshe/ / gso spyang sman dang sman par ni// bdag nyid gyur nas myur sel shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// mu ge'i nang du byung gyur tshe// phyogs gzha nas ni rnam g.yos nas// zas skom rgyun chad
288b2: med par shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// gang du 'khrug pa che byung tshe// rang dbang gis ni sems gyur nas// bde bas phan tshun sdum par shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// byol song gcig la
288b3: gcig za dang / / zas skom dkon dang gzhan 'jigs dang // de dag sel ba'i skyabs gyur cig/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// yi dgas zas skom gdungs pa dang // log par lta ba'i gnas zhugs tshe// nang bral bdud
288b4: rmi kun snang shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i skyabs dang thabs mkhas dang // shes rab grub dang ldan nas kyang // thabs kyis sdug bsngal las grol shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal
288b5: tshul khrims zhabs ldan lam la rtag/ mya ngan 'das pa'i ri bo 'dzeg/ 'dus ma byas kyi khyim 'jug shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// ngan song gnas rnams mthong nas kyang // der phyin de rnams zad pa
288b6: yaM/ / gnyen pos so sor 'byung bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// dmyal rnams tsha grang gcad gtubs tshe// go cha che dang bsil grib dang // drod kyi 'od du gyur par shog/ raMg sngags yang yang brjod pa
288b7: yis/ / yang dag lam nyid rtogs par shog/ kun 'byung sa bon rul nas ni// sdug bsngal phung po skam par shog/ mgon po mya ngan 'das thob nas// 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags 'gyur// de nas yang dag ba
288b8: byag/ bsnyen pas bgegs kyi mthu bcom nas// dngos grub myur du rnyed bya'i phyir// bsgrub pa la ni brtson par bya// zla ba dkar po'i tshes gcig nas// khrus byas gos sar gyon byas nas// sku gzugs bzang po'i mdun
289a1: 'anan/ / bkra pa gnas nas nag gas/ ugasum thags 'ad sa brgyad / ba byung ba dang dag// ma can thoms nas / ba ga la// zhug
289a2: gzigs nas gzhag/ bza' btung mang rabs dpags pas mchod/ oM a kar drang dra rug/ badrug pa rgyun tu sreg par bya// 'ab+ha kar 'o ma'i zas bza' zhing// zhagagasam bzlas pa ci dus bya// de ras zhag gsum pa
289a3: dubadag/ 'o mazho dang 'bras chan 'tshal// lhal mchod pa cher bskyed nas// byang chub shing drung stong rtsa brgyad// du ru ka yi mar du spang// dram bu re re sngags re dang // byang chub sems dpa'i drung du ba sreg/ sa yang g.yo zhing sgra yang g.yo//
289a4: steng zhal nas ni snyan pa'i sgra// legs so legs so rigs kyi bya// khyod ni nan tan brtson 'grus can// 'dod sman don gnyer gang yin pa// mkha' la 'phur ram rkang mgyogs sam// drang srong rig 'dzin rgyal po la// bdag dang skal
289a5: ba mnyam 'dod na/ / de ring nyid du stsal bar bgyi// bcwa lnga'i tshes la sku gzugs de// bde gshegs ring bsrel yod pa yi// mchod rten nang ngam drung du bzhugs// gso sbyong blangs nas bskung pa yis// skya snar me tog brgya rtsa brgyad
289a6: sngags re brjod pas sku la bdeg/ de tshe madran zhal rtsa ba nas// 'brug sgra chen po lta bu 'byung // sa chen rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur// de tshe bdag nyid ma skrag par// sngags bsgrub rjes su dran bya ste// byang chub sems dpa'
289a7: sems dpa' che/ / mgon po sman ras gzigs dbang phyug/ thugs rje tshe dang ldan pa la// bdag nyid gus par phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi/ mgon skyabs reganas gyur nas kyang // 'gro ba kun gyi
289a8: 'dod rnams/ / tshul bzhin du ni skong par shog/ de tshe 'dod pa stsol ba la// lha gru tshogs kyi bar chad med// sngags kyi 'dod don kun grub yin// bsod nams rdzogs byed smon lam mo// phyag 'tshal rten la bskor ba dang //
289b1: mtshad rten cig dang dkyil 'khor ni// rnal 'byor yan lag las ldan pas// bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi byig/ d+hAn chad med par brtson par// dge byed blon lam h+ya sa pa nAM/ de dag myur du 'byung bar 'gyur// de pyir spyod lam/
289b2: mchog dra bshad// gang la dge sbyong g.yel ba y-i// la la can ni bdud bzung nas// tsamahA zhing chas la sbed/ bstan pa 'jig par byed par 'gyur// pyid dmar rigs gdam ba can// log sung chen do nga du se sa
289b3: sAl long rgyal can/ / bag med g.yeng dang bcas pa ni// bdud kyi 'ching la pa log lam pa// zhugs dang slar la btang bar bya// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma'i dra ba zhes bya ba las//
289b4: rangs grub 'byung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas nad dang gnod pa la sogs pa// sngags brjod tsam gyis gsal bar bshad// nad gdon gang dang gang la yang // sngags pas drag tu gsal btab la// rang gis rtse
289b5: gtsig sems kyis bzla/ / dang po snying rjer bcas pa yi// sngags kyis nad dang gdon las grol// de tshe mchod la brtson par bya// skyon da nyin re ldang ba dang // nyin gnyis pa'am nyin gsum pa// nyin bzhi nyin bdun ldang ba'i
289b6: rims/ / 'byung po mkha' 'gro sha za'am// smyo byed brjed byed lus srul po// 'dre gdon drag pos bgyid mod kyang // brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sel bar 'gyur// yang na srad bu kha dog lnga// mdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad//
289b7: mdung ldan shul lam dpung par gdags// khan ma tho bsags pa yi// sgrib kun zhi zhing byang 'gyur na// bgegs sogs nad lta smos ci dgos// bde brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab po// spangs dang 'bras kyi phreng ba dang /
289b8: shu ba po la mig rma mdze dang // me dpal lhog pa g.yan la sogs// ma rungs pa yi nad rnams dang // ral gri mda' mdud la sogs pas// myos sam de yis nyen pa dang // sbrul dang sdig partsangs pa dang // bung ba mchu rnon
290a1: 2/ / la sogs pa// gdug pa rnams la lan bdun dang // brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong du brjod// yang na sa ser 'jim pas byug/ de yis nad las grol bar nges// bgegs sam rlung la sogs pa yi// gzhogs gcig
290a2: phyogs su nad langs sam/ / rab 'on nam snga srabs na// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa 'am// 'brum na dang ru rta dang // lan bdun brjod nas su byug dang // zos shing rna ba sngar blugs nas// sos par 'gyur bar the tshom med//
290a3: ras byang chub sems dpa' che// ci 'od kyis kyang rig sngags 'chag/ sung dang lam 'gro skyab pa'i phyir// bya ni brlabs ldan pa'i tshig 'di gsungs// na mo bud d+hA ya gu ra bai// na mo d+ha mA ya ta ye ni/ na maHsa g+hA ya ma hA ta/
290a4: kro bi ya~M swA hA nA ma/ nyin mtshan dus su 'di brjod pas// sdig kun byang zhing nad rnams zhe// lam du bgegs bdud mi 'phrad cing // rtag tu sems dga' dam pa 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyang // bsrung ba'i don
290a5: du sngags 'di gsungs/ / sha ma ta he ru shu ho// a dz+nyA ba te// su ru te/ sha ki Te/ ba ra ma bya te/ su ru Te/ kya la Ta te/ bi ma te swA hA// tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la// bdun bzlas mdud pa nyi shu gcig/ na sar btags na nang
290a6: sel 'gyur/ / gzhan yang yon tan grangs med 'thob// sbrul gyi rma ni sgo phye la// bdun bzlas rma khar btab na sos// seng ge stag gzig dom dred kyis// blags pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags// brjod nas gra khrim
290a7: can la bskon/ / de ma thag tu rims sel 'gyur// glo bur gdon gyis nyen pa la// lan bdun brjod pa'i gu gul bdug/ ldong ros yungs dkar lan tshwa da kar// sbyar nas nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod// nad pa'i mal
290a8: bzhag nas bdugs na/ / 'byung po 'bros te nad las grol// til mar nang du ru rta btsos// byugs pas bzhogs nad rna nad dang // zha grum myur du sel bar byed// yang na rtsi mar nyid la bya// til mar lte bar bskus pa yis//
290b1: myur du bu thon 'gyur bar nges// lcim rtsas sha ma thon par nges// du ru ka dang spyi mong sbyar// snying nad drag po sel bar 'gyur// ba rog mo'i lci dron gyis// rma khar brlan na mes tshig sos// srin bu ring mo snying la za// rta dkar gcin
290b2: la khyer gang 'thung / / des ni srog chags bud par 'gyur// 'bras la ram kyi lo ma yis// khu ba bskol bas byug par bya// bung bu'i rtug pa gsar ba brtsir// nyal kar mig du thugs na sos// mtshan ma spangs la skur dkar/
290b3: de ku nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// brgya rtsa brgyad brjod shu dag dkar// dpung par btags pas g.yul las rgyal// phug ron ril ma nyi shu brgyad// bzlas bcas bskus pas lcags sgrog dang // shing sgrog la sogs grol bar des//
290b4: thal ba'am bye ma la ni sngags// stong bzlas me tog srin bu grol// gdon dang yams nad zlog pa la// dri bzangs tshul bzlas nas bkru// bud med bu 'dod don du ni// stong bzlas pa mar btung bar bya// byi ba sprul dang ru sbal sha/
290b5: byem gtor na phyugs rnams rengs// ma ga ni dang shu dag dang / sgra dang gos stod spang rtsi sbyar// sngags 'di yis ni shes rab 'phel// na mo ngan tramA la// nam Amyas ba sog te tha sa/ kho d+ha ma twA ya/ ma hA sa b+hA ya/ @ts+tsha
290b6: ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ khA hi khA hi/ ba la ti sA hA/ na mo rang na tra yA ya// na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya ma hA kA ru ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pad me pu/ ma hA pad med pu/ pad ma lo tsan pre/ a moH
290b7: be te/ / na mo a dod ku tra ya// sa ra sa ra/ ga tsa ga tsa/ i ma/ ma kI ro gau nA sha ya swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas kyang // thal bas mig ni phyi rol bsku// mig nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// skud pa dkar po mdung
290b8: pa bdun/ / sngags bdun bzlas pas rna ba yi// nad rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// kur gur ka ra cha mnyams pas// sna'i nad ni sel bar byed// a ru ra'i phye ma dang // sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i mdag pas ni// so'i nang
291a1: dang rtse'i nang/ / thams cad 'joms par shes par bya// oM tru shu truM tsa k+She pra/ nyi shu rtsa gcig tshul baH// 'thungs pas ma zhu'i gnod pa sel// na mo rad na trar+tha ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwaN+Da pa kho d+hi sa twA ya/
291a2: badz+ra sa twA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ taH thA/ oM rad na she/ ma hA tsaN// a su ra mar ta ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tshin d+ha chen u0f7f/ ku ru tra ma/ ki ri ki ri/ Na na ha na/ sarba dz+ra ren d+ha u0f7fka/ ban rkyen/ tA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba gra hI swA hA/ sngags 'di b
291a3: a ral gyis bris nas kyang / / mgul du btags nand rnams sel// gzhan yang rna ba'i sngags gang gis// las rnams de dang de la sbyang // sbrang bu srin bu sbrul lhog pa// g.yan pa shub ke nad la// sbrang rtsi pi pi ling gis drug/
291a4: gang zhig brtson du zhugs pa la// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa la/ tsan dan 'degu snying gar byug/ gang gis mi gnang sel ba la// shing dang chu'am gros chu'am// la la sha'i khwa yis bya// rna ba la ni ti la mar gyis// gzhan gyi yi ga
291a5: gsal ba dang / / 'thab mo shags 'gyed 'gyur ba'i tshe// bum pa chu yis gdong pa bkru// gang yang byis pa bsrung ba ni// seng ldeng phur bu sor bzhi pa// pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang // don yod zhags pa'i sngags rings dag/ stong
291a6: brgyad du bzlas btags na/ / tshe ring nyid du bde bar spyod// ba lang rwa dang po so 'cha'// shing kun dung sbrul lpags pa dang // ras bal sa bon drung po dang // de bzhin du ni ser po gnyis// nas kyi phub ma g.yengs pa'i sku// byi la'i
291a7: tug pa ba pri ha ti/ / shug pa bya rog sgo dang dang // ba lang rmi ga ban le sham// da dud dang lhan cig sbyar// de rnams bsres pa'i dud pa yis// bgegs rnams sel phyir ru tra yis// dud pa bcu drug zhes bya ba'i// bu shel tse dang ba bla dang /
291a8: btsan dug gi ni sbrul shun gyis// bdugs na rims nad thams cad sel// nad gzhan dag kyang sel bar byed// ba lang lci ba khu bar ni// so ma ra tsa'i phye ma gdab// yi ge hri yis byin brlabs nas// mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa ba'i sngags//
291b1: brgya rtsa brgyad brjod 'thungs pas ni// drug dang rims nad sel bar byed// skyer ba bskol ba'i khu bar ni// so mar tsa'i phye mar sbar// ril bu rgya sran tsam gyi tshad// yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags brjod nas// zos pa tsam gyis dug rigs rnams
291b2: zos kyang lus la gnod pa med/ / 'o mar yur ba srad cig bsko'o// so ma ra tsa blugs te brung// so so chang la ha la'i sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad sngags zangs chang ba// brjod de byung na skyugs nas ni// dug gis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro//
291b3: khyim gyi dung ba rgya mtshwa dang // skye dud mar tsa lo mar bcas// phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi bcas// ha ri chen po rtsa ba'i sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btung bar bya// sbrul nad thams cad sel bar byed// shu dag ru Na a ga ru// lung ba bong
291b4: dkar po rnams/ / don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis mnye// byugs pas dug rnams thams cad sel// rgya mtshwa srang gang mar srang gnyis// gcin srang brgyad dang lhan cig bskol// rdo rje chos kyi sngags kyis 'thungs// dug nad
291b5: thams cad sel bar byed/ / rgya mtshwa tsha gsum mar srang bzhi// sbyar te mi shol sngags brjod nas// blugs na reg pa tsam gyis ni// sdig pa sbrul gyis zin pa sel// ku ma ri dang ser po gnyis// phyi mtshwa myang tshwa sbar bcas la// gang
291b6: dbang sngags dang chu yis btung / / dug nad thams cad sel bar byed// ser po gnyis dang ldong ros dang // go thal gur gum leb rgan ci// pad ma rgyan lung bsngags kyis btung // dbyig drug thams cad 'joms par byed// gang la
291b7: gza' dang rgyu skar gyi/ / 'tshe ba byung na de bsal phyir// pad ma 'dab brgyad maN Dal gyi// phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams dbus rnams su// mgon po 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni// mkha' lding gzugs su 'gyur ba la// spyan ras gzigs
291b8: dbang nga cu gcig gis/ / gus pa'i tshul du mchod byed dgod// nyim zla ba lag 'dzin pa'i// khyab 'jug gis ni byi ba'i gzugs// mnan pa'i mkha' lding mig sman mdog/ nor rgyas bu gnyis rtsa yi gzugs// mig gsum ldan pa
292a1: brjod pa lus/ / ngan chen lnga yi sdeng gshog can// rdo rjes chu rdo khro dang bcas// nyim bye ba brgyan pa'i 'od// snying kar nyis 'od 'bar la// g.yig nag po sngags kyis bskul// surnams zings kyis gyur nas tha
292a2: phyogs bcud rdo rje khyab par 'gro/ / gza' dang rgyu skar mog byas te// gdon dang klu rnams sreg par byed// thugs rjes mi bshol ba'i sngags// 'thug sga ga bur gsal bar brjod// gang yang grangs med stong phrag ni// las nam
292a3: thams cad sngags 'dis 'grub/ / mkha' lding dkar po brjid pa'i lus// klu'i gdon las sbyar bar bya// de la mgrin pa sngon po yi// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskul bas ni// sa stengs gtum po klu yi gdon// du ma nges par sel bar
292a4: byed/ / klu dang tshangs pa'i srin po bsregs// 'gro la mdze nad gtong bar byed// mkha' lding dmar po sbrul za ma// me tog thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ g.yon na 'chang ste g.yas pa na// ral gri me 'od 'bar ba 'chang // mgon po seng ge'i sgras
292a5: bskul nas/ / dpa' rlabs bskal pa'i me dang mnyam// sbrul dang rin chen dbyug tho can// mkha' lding sha za'i gdon la ni// mgon po ha ri'i sngags kyis bskul// mkha' 'gro'i gdon la mkha' lding ni// ljang khu ral gri phur ba
292a6: 'chang / / pad ma ral gri sngags kyis bskul// las rnams gang dang gang la yang // sngags dang phyag rgya ldan par bya'o// ci ltar mos te phyag rgyar bcas// lus kyi phyag rgya sems kyi rgya// ngo bo nyid kyis mtshon pa yi// sngags dang /
292a7: phyag rgyas rgyab de ba 'gyur// ni phyag tub shad par bya// grwa yi mdun du langs nas kyang // rkang pa g.yas pa yud tsam bskum// lag gnyis so sor thung du brgyad // gung srin sa sar ma thil du bkug/ 'theb 'jub dag rje/
292a8: so sor brgyad // gru khrag lag mthil mdun du bstan// 'gro 'am 'dug kyang da dbang sas// rgyal byir sngags 'di brjod par bya// na mo rang na tA yA ya// na ma Ar+yA ba lo ko te shwa rA ya// bi d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru
292b1: Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ba te ba ra ba te/ e h+ye hi swA hA// yang na sngon ltar lus bsrad te// snying khar thal sbyar spro ba bsnol// 'dzub mo gnyis sbrengs rtse mo spad// 'the ba gnyis 'dzub tshigs dang por bkug/ lag mthil cung zad ma reg
292b2: pa/ / gzungs sngags gang brjod phyag rgya'o// bgegs kyis 'tshe ba 'byung ba'i tshe// sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis bsal bya// na mo rang na trA yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba le ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya// ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA yA/ tad+ya thA/
292b3: oM sarba d+harma Ni ma Na Ta lA ya/ e h+ye hi bar ma shud d+ha sa twA ya swA hA// yang na sgom la 'jug pas ni// thog mar phyag rgya 'di bcing ngo // bus gtsugs spyi bor thal mo sbyar// 'dzub gnyis bkug la rtse sprad nas// de la 'theb gnyis
292b4: sbyar bar bya/ / 'di ni bdud las rgyal bar nges// yang na lag gnyis rgyab sprad nas// soraro mo rtsa rnams reg par bya// 'theb gnyis brgyang nas 'dzub snang sbyar// smin 'tshams su ni gzhag par bya// na mo rang na trA yA ya/ na ma A
292b5: rA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma tA pa twA ga/ ma hA k+Sha ni kA ya/ ShaH/ oM sarba duSh+TA na mo badz+ra ya me swA hA// khyad par du ni lha mthong 'gyur// yang na 'greng ste mnyam bzhag rgya// snying khar bzhag la sngags 'di brjod// na mo rang na tra
292b6: A ya/ / na ma A rA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba de ba A na pa swA hA/ glo bur rtsod pa rgyal byed yin// yang ni 'greng ste rting pa spyad// lag gnyis 'jigs byed tshul du bya//
292b7: thugs gang rung brjod pas ni// 'dzin yan lag brtan par 'gyur/ yang na padam rgyan sang gas// Na ba'i sngags kyi phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis pal gyur zin lag / mtha pa'i yin ma panan byas s+ho// ma
292b8: mo'i gung mo spad/ / gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya ste// dgug na 'dzub rtse bskul zhing dgug/ yang na g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo dgug/ g.yon pa slar btang bya ba'o// na mo rang na tra yA ya/ na ma A r+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bad+his
293a1: trA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM brah+ma e h+ye hi swAhA// yang na sor rtse rnams bskyed na// 'dzub mo g.yab la lha chen rnams// yang na phyag rgya 'di bcas la// nyi zla gza' bzung dus su ni/
293a2: gzungs sngags ba mar bzlas nas ni// phyag rgya btab nas zos pas ni// shes rab 'phel dang tshe 'phel 'gyur// nad med gzugs bzang thob par nges// bgreng ste rkang pa sha bi thal sbyar nas// mtheb gnyis lag pa'i nang bkug
293a3: pa/ / snying khar bzhag bya spyan ras gzigs// yid bzhin nor bu'i 'khor lo rgya// mchod sogs las kyi sngon 'gro ba'o// de bzhin sdig bshags la yang ngo // 'dzub bkug mthe bo sen mor bcas// lag gnyis rgyab sbrad gar
293a4: dbang rgya/ / thal sbyar mtheb 'dzub so sor brkyang / mgrin pa sngon po'i phyag rgya'o// 'dzub mo gnyis bkug lhag ma brkyang // mi bshol ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis rgyab spad 'theb gnyis brkyang// 'dug pa bzang la sngags/
293a5: 'di bzlas// na mo rang na tra yA ya// na ma A r+yA ba lo ka te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sra tA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ mahA kA rba Ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo rang na sha ri tsan dra a laM kA ra sarga de dza swa pra tsaka baM sha rA dza ya/ tad ya thA/ oM rang ne rang ne
293a6: tasha rang na tata sha rang na/ / br-i nyi ma te rang ne rba thA// ran teg ra swAH/ snga bar brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do// nor yang thob pa'i gtar rnyed 'dzad/ grog zhan bdag la byams 'dod na// so shing la ni nyi shu gcig/
293a7: na 'dod pa su dag/ stong rtsa brgyad bcas stong bar bkru// gang ba shad phyag rgya dang bcas pas// gtsug pa'i sngags 'dis bgags kyang 'thos// maHsa bzung drata mas g+ha la// na mo rang na r+thaSh+Ta gnas a nA me
293a8: lo ka te shwa rA ya/ ba~M d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twa ya/ ma hAkA ra/ kA ya/ 6thA/ na mo badz+ra pa Ni s+ya// Na thA oM pra bi huM gai ka badra bi zag ya ni swAhA// nam grangs bdug pas sangs rgyas bdug/ lha rnams dag kyang mchod pa/
293b1: bya// yan lag g.yas pa mthab na// lag ma thal bzhag nas sa mas dag ga/ da lhag d+har nas 'jub sa na// brkyang bsum bsgral bas spro ba dang / g.yon pa ma 'jigs phyag rgya sa// dus pa yin par 'cha sogs rten/
293b2: 9/ gnyis thal ma sbyang nas kyang // se ma bcwol te bkad pa las// mtha'amathe'u rdzam sa na// s+yAd de skad pa shes ba d+he/ maM saHsa sha d+han sa // de bzhin bsngol te bkan pa la// zung gnyis nang rlab mas
293b3: zang po'i rgya ste sngags 'di'o/ / ma pa ba tsan swAH// de nyid skabs nas grang mo gnyis// rdo spad spangs pa bdug spros so// oM rUb d+ha ta swA hA// ting skad so so tshangs sar dgag/ thug pa'i tshul ni thug pa'i rgya// oM d+hal pa
293b4: u0f7fsA d+ha/ / ti spang song mo gyen dra bgrod// zhal nas 'thor tshul bshos kyi rtsa// oM ni bi N+ye pro k+Sha ta swA hA/ lag gnyis bkug nas rtse brkyang spang / mthe bong gyen du yan pa ni// na bza' dam pa'i phyag rgya'o// oM b+ha sa ran
293b5: swA hA/ / snyim pa kha rtse btegs pa'i tshul// rom stsal ba'i phyag rgya'o// oM AM gr-i hrIH/ sa ka la g+ha na pa ri wa ra naM/ ba ri kai ra a a a ba ta ran te/ a ba pa ran ti/ a ba ta ra na da sa de ga lo ka pA la/ sa ba ri wa ri b+h+yaH
293b6: dpa bi la~M gr-i han du la dan du bi dad dra/ ya thai ba ya rbai shAm/ dzaHnub hoHsan trisarba sa tra ni/ shAn ti ku ru/ prastaM ku ru bag/ ku ru/ a ba ra Na ku ru grub ting / ka/ rod ku dz+nyAn du hU~M nu phaT/ ya rA a ba loka ti shwa ra s+ya/
293b7: arna pa sa satwa/ oM e kA ra pra kha sarba d+hamaNA~M adu chung ban+dan tu oM AHhU~M badz+ra AH/ oM dza~M dza~M d+ha la dza len drA ya swA d+ha// yongs spyod rtag byar gnod gnas la// chug cang rtag tu sbyin par bye// oM a thilo /
293b8: ran+du nu smi ti ka rA ya swA hA// yaM dgas rnams la sra ra zas// ci phyir chu dang bcas pa stsal// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor grogs// lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang // 'byung po yi dgas kun brtson 'gyur// sems
294a1: klags pa ldan byas/ / zan mangs sems par badrang ste// skrag 'a bum blag sems dga' ba'i// kun kyong byung chub rin chen ni// las la bsdur pa'i sngag sa ma babyed/ ma dzad pa rgya me kun chub 'gyur/
294a2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las sngags kyis sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas// byang chub sems dpa'
294a3: sems dpa' che/ / nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba// 'khor gyi tshigs dang bcas pa zhig/ mchod pa'i bkod pa chen po dang // bstod pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa yis// bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas// skor ba du ma byas nas
294a4: kyang / / phyag 'tshal gsang bstod phyogs gcig 'khor// bus btsugs thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// mgon po yon tan kun gyi rgyal// ye shes rmad kyi 'byung gnas gtso// thar pa'i lam chen nyi shar rgyal// 'dren la rgya mtsha
294a5: phyag 'tshal lo/ / mtshan dpe mthar thug med pa'i sku// gzi brjid rgya che mkha' khyab la// blo gros yangs pa'i nam mkha' can// sku yi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs dbyangs dum bsam mi khyab// nam mkha' yangs pa'i
294a6: mtha' bkang nas/ / tshad med yan lag bcu gnyis byung // gsung gi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo// ting 'dzin rnam thar bsam gtan sgo// bsam yas bsam du med bsam pas// bsam mi khyab pa'i shes rab dang // thugs rje'i
294a7: thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'ching gcod pa'i// ma rig g.yul las rgyal byed pa// kun tog dra ba sel ba yi// sgron ma di ring bshad du gsol// byis rnams mun pa'i 'obs su gyur// nyan thos 'dod
294a8: chags chog gis skrag/ rang rgyal gsang ba'i bzod dang ldan// byang chub sems dpa' 'ching bas 'jigs// nyon mongs mnga' bdag gsang sngags la// shes rab snying rje'i sbyor ba yis// bag chags bcas pa gtan spong
294b1: ba/ thabs pacog dram bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ma/ 'od zer phyogs bcur byes byas nas// tshangs pa'i dbyangs can gsung snyan pas// nam mkha'i khams chen rab gang nas// shes rab snying rje 'phral ba
294b2: yaM lho ba'i chog tu sa rnams/ / bzlas pa'i don du byas pa 'di/ nyi ma'i snying po nyan pa ni// legs so byang chub sems dpa' che// dpal dang ldan pa khyod legs so// tshe gcig gus dang bcas pa 'i// sems kyis legs rkyen
294b3: yid lazung / / nyams dga' bde ba'i sa phyogs su// shin du dga' ba'i sa las ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya// klu bzhi po bzhi rtababs bcas/ shang ram g+ho ya sgra gtong bya// dkar ba ser po dmang po dang / ldang ba'i tshon
294b4: gyis bri bar bya/ / dbus su pad ma 'dab brgyad pa// dkar po'i lte bar 'tsham par dmar// mu khyA da gnyis dang ldan pa'o// gser dngul zangs sams nyid la// bum pa lto yangs mgrin pa pra// kha g.yel zhabs ched zhum pa la// shin
294b5: du gtsang mar bkrus nas kyang / / ga bur gur kum cu gang dang // bla rtsi gi'u wad chu yis bkang // byang gri seng gri ha sa der// ka ri ka ra ni de ba ko/ nas 'bras til gro mon sran dang // gser dngul byi ru mu tig dang // mal shal yin te rin
294b6: chen lnga/ bum par stsal nas ras dkar gyis// mgul ba bcings na kha rgyan yang // dri zhim shing le me tog gzhag/ me tog phreng dang bcas pa de// pad ma'i dbus su bzhag nas kyang // rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa nas// pag pa
294b7: shing chen 'bras bur bcas/ / 'jig rten dbang gis gang ba yi// sngags kyang mtha' yas khyab dmigs nas// sngags kyi mthu yis sangs rgyas nas// dgongs pa rgya chen skye gyur te// legs so bkra shis 'bab par 'gyur// rgyal
294b8: sras rnams dang rig pa yi/ / lha mo tshogs dang klu len dang // bkra shis du ma brjod par 'gyur// de tshe mkha' la ye shes kyi// 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya yis// shing chen yongs su smin pa las// bdud rtsi char chen 'bebs par
295a1: 'gyur/ / 'jig rten skyong la gtor ma sbyin rgyal dang rgyal sras mchod par bya// skar ma la sogs 'bab pa 'am// chos gcig nas ni nya yi bar// sngags kyi phreng ba brjod par bya// lha la yang yang bskor bar bya// las
295a2: rnams gang dang gang la yang / / lha yi dbang gyur sbyar bar bya// de dang de ni las rnams la// ci bde bar yang sbyar bar bya// phran tshogs las la spyan ma'i sngags// lhog pa 'brum bu la sogs la// mi bshol ba'i sngags kyis byung /
295a3: gdon rigs bzlog la gar dbang ste// byad skams rig sngags zlog pa la// don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis bkru// shes rab 'phel ba rdo rje chos// klu nang ha la ha las sel// tshe 'bel pad ma rgyan lung ste// mgrin sngon sngags/
295a4: kyis dpal 'phel byed// ha ri chen po bdug spos te// gdong bcu gcig pas glo bur sel// seng ge sgras ni mdzen sel// rnal 'byor yo byad 'dod pas ni// yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags kyis bkru// bkra shis rol mo du ma dang // gtsang/
295a5: sngags gsang ldan pa yis// spyan pa'i gdangs dang ldan pas bkra// myur du sgrib pa 'byung ba dang / 'dod yon can grub sngags phreng ni/ gang dang gang yang sbyar bar 'gyur// phran tshigs gzhan la thos ci dgos// zla ba gzas gang
295a6: gyung ba'i ma/ / yang grang gcig dang ma nga gas// phra gzugs mthun panag zugs brjod nas// zla ba sam nas mang mangs te// ngos sa ma sras la thugs pa yis/ nad rnams ni zhing ba bang 'gyur/ nga ras 'ag
295a7: mnyam pas/ A mi bdun shag sngags kyang ban/ chum thus dathal bar cigs ni// khams gsum ma tha shing 'dod gsupa 'gru// kun kyang nas lus bzlas pa// da dang bgags rnams dag par 'gyur/ ma
295a8: 'bras lan bcu rtse brgyad/ sa nas thogs galas la bye// dbang kyang phyogs su bsanan ni// dgrag tshul shin da byas par 'gyur/ la tha 'bras bu sngags dang babs/ bral labartan bcwang / seM
295b1: bsgrags pas ni/ / mi yams phyugs nad thams cad 'chad// skud pa gtsang ba mdog dmar ba// sngags ra btab pa'i mdud pa bdun// zhal gcig sreng zhal btags nas ni/ nad pa la btags rims nad 'i// sngags
295b2: mdun pa nyi shu gcig/ mdun zhal steng bzhag blangs btags pas// mkha' 'gro 'byung po ro langs gdon// ga pas zin pa 'joms par byed// gal te des kyang ma sos na// mdud ra brgya rtsa brgyad brjod nas// 'al gcig
295b3: mdun zhal dpur btags te/ / blangs te btags na nges par grol// sdug bsngal nad pa yun rings gdungs// khyim du 'dre gdon 'jigs zhugs na// 'bru re sngags re thang 'brom 'bras// sku mdun brgya rtsa brgyad grangs te// gong
295b4: ltar bsgrubs pa'i skud pa yang / / lus la btags na grol bar nges// mi mdza' ba dang 'khrug pa dang // byang stem drag po bzlog pa la// sku la spos dang me tog mchod// bi na ya yi gzugs mdun du// phra bo'i 'bras bu dgra ming bsreg
295b5: sngags raM mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad/ / mdung ldan g.yon gyi khro zhal gdags// zhag bzhi lon nas sku las dgrol// mdud pa re re'i bar du ni// sngags re brjod cing bcad par bya// bdag la sdang byed skyabs su 'ong // dzas dang
295b6: sngags kyi rus pa'o/ / brtson pa'i bar chad bsal ba ni// tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la// mdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad// mdud nas mdud bzhag steng btags pa/ zhag gcig lon dgrol lus btags na// las rnams
295b7: bkra shas rdul du 'grub/ / gang zhig bsgribs pa'i gshegs ldan pas// las gang 'dod bzhin mi 'grub cing // dus dus bkra mi shis byung na// gtsang sbra bum chu bzang po gnyis// brgya rtsa brgyad grangs re re brjod// dngos
295b8: sku gzugs bkru bar bya/ / gnyis pas bi na ya ka bkru// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sngags btab nas// rang nyid de nas bkru bar bya// bar chad byang nas 'dod kun 'grub// ci ltar sbal pa'i gdon bsal phyir// byi la'i mgo nas
296a1: ngal ba dang / sa bzang chu gcang smras pa'ang/ rgyal yi nig dgas byas te// thA yi mdun du gzhaganas kyang // khrezhal g.yon par zad bus gdags// ta ma grin sngags ni stong phrag zag/ gzungs brgya bzlas pa'i
296a2: ral gri yis/ / dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du btub// dum bu re re sngags re dang // deng gi nang du dor bar bya// de dag gnod pa gtan du sel// mig nang sna tshogs ma rungs la// 'bras bu gsum pa zhib tu btags// spang dkar khye'u 'tshe
296a3: dru shor ba nas/ / dranas gzar ba'i bud med dang // khyi ma gdag gis ma mthong byas// zlum po 'dzum pa'i gal la brtags// sngags kyang bzlas nas myur ba des// mig du thugs na chog 'bras su// migan thams cad mal
296a4: bar byed/ / mig don dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur// lhag ma ma yin khron pa'i chu// ga zung gu gul chamanyam bskal// 'khor gang 'dag par 'gyur ba de// rtsa ba'i zhal gdangs sngags stong bzlas// bkrol nas ril bu byas meng
296a5: na/ Na la ha la'i dug 'joms 'gyur// glang po dkar po'i 'gi'u wang ni// mthing bram bzhag nas sku yi mdun// stong rtsa brgyad bzlas yan lag bcul// dpral par thig le byas gyur na// lha klu 'byung po mi rnams dga'// khyo shuH
296a6: mi mthun brtag pa la/ / ngur ba'i 'jug sgo klu'i mdun du// stong bzlas lag tu blangs na 'dum// chu gams pa'am char med na// ling ga'i drung du su bzhugs la// cher mchod nas ni sku'i mdun du// stod brjod chu skyes char chen
296a7: 'bebs/ / gang zhig char ched nge 'dod ni// 'gog par snyoms thugs phyag rgya bcing // sku yi mdun du rtag par ni// a ka ru nag badrug pa sags// mchod pas rgyun du mchod bya zhing // brgyad nas nye bar sngags stong brjod/
296a8: mig gi bdon shes bsgrub pa'i phyir// dri zhim dkyil 'khor gru bzhil// rgyal mtshan po dan kha dag bzhi// bla re yal ba dkar ba yis// dbus su pad ma lnga bris te// ring bsrel ldan pa'i sku gdung bzhugs// tsan dan dka
296b1: bo'i dri chu dang / / bdug pas rgyun du mchod par bya// ba mdog ser skya'i mar gyi ni// sgron ma'i phreng bas mchod par bya// man shi rika kra shwa dang // pad ma dmar dang sngon po dang // rgya mtsho chab kyi dbu ba dang // nya rgun nag po myu gu
296b2: dang / marlabs pa dang gu gul dang // ku ban sa dang 'ga'u wang dang // gyar bum dpar dang ser po dang // tsha ba gsum dang cha mnyam brdung // de rnams phyed chad gci dang // ga bung stsal nas re re'i ched// sngags ni stong phrag
296b3: grangs/ / sku yi mdun du brjod par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag nas// sngags khrir bcas te nya la ni// zangs kyi za ma tog du stsal// sku'i steng zhal btags nas ni// mchod pa byas nas gsol ba gang ba// bar
296b4: ba'i thur mas mig du stsal/ / ling thog gam ni mchi ma mdzag/ sprin dkar sprin dmar gtses pa dang // klad pa na dang mig nad dang // glo bur long dang thibs pa sel// nyin gnyis bskus na lus kyi nang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sel
296b5: bar 'gyur/ / gsum pas gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur// bzhi pas sgrib pa thams cad sel// lngas ni rtsod pa'i g.yul las rgyal// drug pas rmi lam ngan dang byang snyems sa la// bdun pas glo bur 'chi ba med// 'dun phrag gnyis kyis
296b6: dbang phyug 'thob/ / gsum gyis 'byung po dbang du 'gyur// bzhi pas gnod sbyin lnga pas klu// lnga pas lha mi srin po rnams// drug pas mkha' lding ri bdun lha// bdun pas nag po chen po 'grub// brgyad pasam mo dgus
296b7: gter mthong / bcu pas 'gro ba'i sman par 'gyur// bcu gcig lnga pi'i khang par byin// bcu gnyis rig 'dzin drang srong khyim// bcu gsum klu'i khang par byin// bcu bzhi sum bcu gsum pa'i gnas// bcwa lnga mtshan mo kun
296b8: mthong ste/ / bcu drug khams gter mthong ba ngas// bcu bdun rdo rjes gzhi dang // rlung gi dkyil 'khor thags pa med/ bcwa brgyad pas ni nyi ster mgyogs// bcu dgus rgyal sras kun mthong 'gyur/ nyi shus spyan
297a1: ras gzigs nyid kyis/ / lung bstan dam chos bshad par 'gyur// nyi shu gcig gis gzugs khams phyin// mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur// lo gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi// zhing khams du mar phyin
297a2: pa dang / dam chos nyan dang zhing spyod 'gyur// mig sman sbyor ba bla med 'di// sangs rgyas mu stegs can la gsar// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sna tshogs sman gyi sbyor ba yi// bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i// 'dod pa'i
297a3: den kun 'grub byed nyon/ / ga bur gla rtsi 'gi' wang dang // gur gum dzA ti li shi dang // ka tan la dad sug smel dang // tsan dan dkar dang bad ma dang // gser gyi me tog ud pal sde// re re la yang sngags stong bzla// sbrang rtsi dkar/
297a4: po lhan cig bsdu// dkyil 'khor dbus su sku'i zhal// dbu ma la ni gdags bya ste// tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar// nyin re sngags stong brjod par bya// mchod pa rgya cher mchod par bya// bstod dang gsol ba gdab pa/
297a5: bya/ dge slong dge tshul dge bsnyen gang // bcwa lnga'i nyin par lnga stong bzla// de nas gtsang ma'i snod bzhag ste// dgongs pa gang dang gang la yang // lha ni de dang de dag sbyar// gang la bgegs kyis gnod gyur nas// pad ma gar
297a6: gyi sngags kyis bdun/ / 'gro ba'i nad yams bsal ba dang // ha la ha la'i sngags bzlas pas// gos la sogs pa bdug par bya// / gzhan dag dag par 'dod pas ni// yid bzhin nor bu'i phreng sngags kyis// mig
297a7: gi steng du thug par bya/ / rgyal po rgyal mo la sogs pa// pho mo dbang du bya 'dod na// rdo rje chos kyi phreng sngags kyis// dpral bar thig le bya ba'o// mdze la sogs pa'i nad la ni// seng ge sgra'i phreng sngags kyis// lus la
297a8: reg pa bde bar b+ha ga/ lod du lus pa'i nad la ni// ha ri chen po'i sngags dang chus// rang gi khong du btung bar bya// byad stems rig sngags zlog pa la// don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis bdug/ dug nad sel la mgrin/
297b1: sngon te// sgrib pa sbyong ba'i don du ni// gdod bcu gcig pa nyid kyis sbyar// rgyal srid thob par byed pa ni// mgon po pad ma rgyan lung ngo // de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// 'byung po sha za mkha' 'gro dang // lus srul po dang brjed byed kyis/
297b2: nyin cig nas ni nyin bdun par// glo bur pa'i rims rnams dang // rtag pa'i rims dang drag po'i rims// brtun byed la sogs rims rigs dang // glo bu rab dang rtag pa'i gdon// nad drag po ni ji snyed dang // dug rigs rim
297b3: dang lba ba dang / / 'bras dang ldog pa me dpal dang // shu brdo dang 'brum bu'i rigs// phol mig me dpal bal ltogs sogs// mngon du gang dang gang snang la// sngags stong bzlas pa'i 'jim pa ni// sku zhal dbus la btag
297b4: nas ni/ / mchod pas mchod de sngags khri brjod// tshes gcig nas ni tshes brgyad par// gsol ba yang ni gdab byas nas// tshes dgu'i snga dro dgrol bar bya// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod// 'bras bye ba mar
297b5: 'bru bzang rnams/ / shi rtsi shi'am brgya rtsa brgyad// bsgrags pas nad yams gnod pa ni// nad la mar lhag nyung zhig btud// nad gzer gang yang 'joms par 'gyur// yang na 'bru men bye ma 'am// sa
297b6: 'am spra tshil gzugs byas te/ / srad bus khro ba'i zhal btags nas// rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de// ral gris gtubs nas sbyin bsreg bya// brgya phrag lngas ni sdang byed nyams// yang na dug gi gzugs brnyan btum// drag
297b7: khrag ni ma pa'i shing la bsreg/ drug bcu rtsa bzhi grangs kyis ni// tshar bcad pa yi dbang du 'gyur// 'byung po drag bzhen pa la// gu gul yungs dkar de ltar bsreg/ bal po'i se'u lug ma la// bu ram spang ci zho mar skrag/
297b8: sku yi mdun du bsregs pas ni// 'go ba'i nad yams 'chad par 'gyur// gu gul dkar po nyi shu gcig/ bsregs na byang chub sems dpa' 'gugs// zho mar sbrang rtsi lud tang shing // nyi shu rtsa gcig sku mdun bsreg/ sa chen
298a1: rgyal sras kun mnyam pa'i/ / rdzu 'phrul chen po des rnyed 'gyur// gang gi bsod nams rgyas 'dod na// dri bzangs chu dang sa gtsang la// grwa bzhi khru gang dkyil 'khor bya// dri bzang shing la khru gang rtsig/ man 'dzu sha ka yungs
298a2: dkar sna / / 'om zho bar a kar// tsan dan dkar po dmar po dang // dri zhim mtho gang tshad kyi zhing // 'bru bzang tshad dang bcas pa dag/ dang por sngags stong bzlas nas kyang // brgya rtsa brgyad du bsgrags pa yis// tshe ring nad med rgyal chen
298a3: 'thob/ / stong gis 'jig rten padag 'grub// khris ni 'dod pa'i lha yin te// 'bum gyis gzugs khams mngon du gyur// sa yas rgyal sras kun mthong zhing // mngon shes drug dang ldan par 'gyur// bye bas rgyal ba kun mthong zhing //
298a4: shing khams dum stong bar 'gyur// gzhan yang phran tshegs las rnams la// ci srid nyi shu rtsa gcig nas// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du sbyor// sngags dang lha la sems brtan bya// nad yams drag po bsal ba la// gtso bor 'bras bu gsum
298a5: bsreg go/ / gdon chen rnams ni bsal ba la// gu gul sgog pa rnga mo'i sha// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya// rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan// phra mo nad dang gdon rigs la// dUr ba zungs dkar mchog du bshad// 'bru rnams gang dang
298a6: gang 'dod la/ / 'bru rigs de nyid sbyin bsreg bya// char pa dbab par 'dod pas ni// tsam pa ka dang rnam gsum dang // mngar gsum nA ga ge sar dang // dbang po lag gi sbyin bsreg ni// ci 'dod char pa 'bab par 'gyur// gal te bcad
298a7: par 'dod pas ni/ / thal ba de dang yungs dkar gyis// nan tan phyogs bzhir gang dbang gis// sngags kyis yang yang gtor bar bya// grangs dkar zho mar sbrang rtsi dab/ 'bras yos kyis ni byas pa sos// gdon nam rims las
298a8: pa dang / / khyim bsrung bar ni 'dod pa yis// pad ma dmar po'i sbyin bsreg ni// nyi shu rtsa gcin khon bya// sems bzang gzugs ring 'dod pas ni/ tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin pa sreg bya// phran tshogs lams nang sel ba la/ lo ma cang
298b1: byin bsreg bya/ / phrugs nad sel bar 'dod pa'i rtsa// 'o ma me tog dkar bcas bsreg// nad dang gdon bcas sel ba la// mdar gsum 'bru bzang ga bur bcas// dUr ba dkar po'i yam shing rnams// dri bzang byugs pas nad/
298b2: rnams sel// chog de ltar ldan pas ni// mA nad du ta 'bru mar byug/ yang na gre bar sngags bcas bdags// byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la// 'bru mar dam ni srad bu bya// dud 'gre la ni ru nyid dam// yang na sred bu bya ba ste// rdzi mar dag gis/
298b3: mchog tu 'gyur// sbyor rnams gang dang gang la yang // sgra byad mtshan dpe ldan pa ni// me long nang gi gzugs ltar dmigs/ gsol ba btab pas 'grub par 'gyur// dang po skye mched drug ldan sams// thun mong rigs can sa pa'i/
298b4: khams// gnyis pa mos dang ldan pa ni// thun mong kun du zhugs pa'i rigs// gsum pa rig pa'i rtags ldan pa// rig 'dzin gsang sngags 'chang ba'i rigs// bzhi pa lhag sems mthun ldan zhing // gsang sngags sngon du gyur pa yi//
298b5: lnga pa blang dor med pa'i sems// drug pa bdag gzhan dbyer med sems// bdun pa chos rnams rgyal ba'i sems// brgyad pa 'phags pa'i bden pa'i sems// dgu parten 'brel zab snang sems// bcu pa mtshan bral grub pa'i sems//
298b6: bcu gcig mtshan bral snang ba'i sems// bcu gnyis chos kyi sgo yi sems// bcu gsum lhag par 'byung ba'i sems// bcu bzhi shes bya mthar thug sems// rgyas dang gsal dang khyab pa dang // rtag dang 'gyur med gya nom pa'i//
298b7: gnas skabs bcu bzhir rab tu rtogs// sems rtogs gyur nas sangs rgyas chos// rgyud kun du ni rgyal bas bshad// 'od zer lcags kyu khyud mo'i bar tu ni// spros pas lha 'bum phrag dge kun slong sems// dkar po skyes nas kya
298b8: chub rin chen gling / / thob mdzad blos bsgyur 'di ni ngo mtshar che// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba las sku la rten pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//
299a1: de nas 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs// rgya chen rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// shar lce'i 'tshams na bzhugs pa yi// nyan ka zhes la sogs pa// drang srong tshogs rnams mgrin gcig tu// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol//
299a2: oM kun mkhyen ye shes nyi ltar wa// mtshan dpe dums brgyan mdzad pa// bdud las rgyal ba rkang gnyis mchog/ 'dren pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi ba chags bral 'od gsal ba// rgyun chad med pas 'khor lo'i tshul// kye rgan 'chi las
299a3: sgrol zhing/ rnam dag bsgrub gsum chos phyag 'tshal// sa chen sa chen gzhan rnams kyang // sa la 'dren mdzad tshogs chen rdzogs// rgyun mi 'chad du su 'byung ba// thal sbyar pus btsugs phyogs gcig 'khod// de nas chal ba
299a4: kun gyi yab/ / dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi lha// spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje can// 'gro la thugs brtse'i slad du ni// rig sngags bla na med pa gsungs// sngags de myur du 'grub pa dang // stongs dang dag la sel
299a5: ba'i phyir/ / me'i las la bsten pa'i phyir// sbyor ba rim pa bshad du gsol// de skad gsol nas drang srong tshogs// phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas kyang // mchod pa'i char chen phab pa ste// thal sbyar pus btsugs phyogs
299a6: gcig 'khod/ / de nas rgyal sras kun gyi yab// 'gro ba'i gnyen cig 'dren pa'i gtso// sbyin bsreg las kyi cho ga 'di// nan tan du ni bka' stsal to// sa bzang dri bzang chur bcas pas// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham paH
299a7: bud shing 'o ma can rnams ni/ / me tog bzang po shing la bsreg/ gdon nang zhi bar 'dod pas ni// 'bras bu gsum sogs shing rnams bsreg/ gdon phran la ni mngar gsum dang // dur ba dkar po bsregs pas ni//
299a8: rmi las ngan dang lhas ngan gang // 'bras phye mar sngags sel bar byed// gos dang snod bcad rdzas dang lus// gzhan grib ngan pas gos pa las// 'bras phye mar dang spos dkar dang // me tog dkar po bsreg par bya// ting ma
299b1: byid kyi me tog bsreg/ mig nad thams cad sel bar byed// ma su li ma rtsa bar bcas// bsregs na rna ba'i nad sel 'gyur// tsan dan gla rtsib mar bsregs// sna'i nad rnams thams cad sel// su thi gu gul ri lu bsregs//
299b2: sa dang kwa'i nang sel 'gyur// sa na dza dang ka kur/ bsregs pas send 'joms par byed// sAng ci tsan dan sha ka ra/ besregs pas khyon dasel bar byed// 'bras bu gsum dang sho sha wa/ bsregs pas snying nad sel bar
299b3: byed/ 'u su spang dang bye dang // bsregs pas mtshan pa'i nad sel 'gyur/ me nyon kha dog lnga bsregs na// bo ba la sogs dang grol na / sa lus thams cad zhi bar byed// lus sadzes pa yang thob par 'gyur/ nar 'dad pa pa
299b4: seng ldeng mer/ / ba sor zho dang mar bsreg bya// gos mdog gang dang gang 'dod la// de dang mtshungs pa'i me tog dang // srad bu sor ni bcu gnyis pa// shing mdog de dang 'thun pa yi// dri zhim dag la bsreg par bya// rnyed 'gyur the tshom
299b5: mi bya'o/ / pri yang ku dang ka ling ka/ pad ma'i ze ba yal sdod la// bsreg cing gsol ba gdab pa ni// gnyer gyi longs spyod rgyas par 'gyur// 'bras dang smyu gu'i 'bras bu sogs// bsregs na longs spyod brtan par 'gyur// 'dod
299b6: 'dod bral dang 'bras bu gsum/ / brgya bsregs bu dang bu mo 'phel// 'bras yos 'phel bar 'dod pas kyang // sri ka 'dzA ti me tog dkar// ba dkar 'os zho mar bcas// bsregs pas 'khor dang dmag dpung 'phel//
299b7: 'bum grangs kyis rgyal srid 'thob// mngar gsum bil ba'i 'bras bu la// 'bum gyis rang nyid rgyal por 'gyur// sngags mthu rgyas pa'i don du ni// nim pa'i shing la mar dang ni// yungs dkar dkar po srang bcas la// badz+ra rtsa
299b8: brgyad du bsreg par bya/ / gang gis rgyal po 'khor dang bcas// dbang du bya bar 'dod pa yis// yungs dkar kyal ba'i yungs dkar bcas// rgya sran drug du bsreg par bya// gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang 'dod na// mya ngan med/
300a1: ba'i yam shing la// 'bras bu gsum dang gur gum ni// stong phrag gcig tu bsreg par bya// gnod sbyin tshogs dbang byed pa la// 'bras bu gsum pa'i shing la ni// 'bras bu gsum pa'i gu gul la// stong phrag
300a2: gnyis su bsreg par bya/ / lha rnams dbang du bya 'dod pas// a ru ra'i shing sar la// 'o ma zho mar sbrang rtsi la// sum stong bsregs pas lha dbang 'gyur// bud med dbang du 'dod pas ni// til dang 'bras sogs phrab ma la// 'bras dang
300a3: rang byung brgya rtsa brgyad/ / bsregs pas bzang mo dbang du 'gyur// byis pa dbang du 'dod pas ni// bri yang ku yi sbyin bsreg bya// las rnams gang dang gang la yang // de dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sbyor// zhi ba zhi pa'i yid kyis te//
300a4: bskal bzangs blo ni rgyas pa la// chags dang 'dun sems ldan pas ni// dbang du 'gyur la the tshom med// khro dang bcas pa'i yid kyis ni// drag po'i las su 'gyur ba yod// brtan po dal 'byor ldan pa'i blo// rgyun rtag gsal
300a5: ba yod gyur pas/ / ci ltar bsams pa de 'grub kyi// gzhan du yang ni de ltar min// mig la skyon zhugs lus kyi ni// dngos gang gsal bar blta ba ltar// bla ma dang ni bral gyur na// sngags kyi byin rlabs snang ba med//
300a6: lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas kyang // rnam pa kun du bla ma la// smod pa 'bad de spang bar bya// smad pas dmyal sogs ngan 'gror 'gro// bla ma'i ngag las byung ba dang // ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya mchod// oM ru ru s+pha ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid d+ha
300a7: lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ / bsang gtor dang ku sha dgram pa'i sngags so// oM dz+wa la dz+wa lAn pArka swA hA/ sbar ba'i sngags so// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha NAM/ oM ag ne ye ag dI bya A tri sham tA shri ye ta u0f7fka b+ha ba ha nA ya swA hA// mchod
300a8: mar gyi sngags so/ / oM sarba pA baM da ha na badz+ra yaM swA hA/ til gyi sngags so// oM sarba sa bA dwe swA hA/ zho dang zan dam pa yi'o// oM badz+ra ba smi ku ru ku ru swA hA/ u pa la'i'o// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta swA hA/ 'bras kyi'o// oM badz+ra a mra
300b1: titata badz+ra swAhA/ ku sha'o// oM badz+ra bI dzA ya swA hA/ lagu ban gyi'o// oM badz+ra mA le pu ShA ye swA hA// mngar gsum dang dkar gyi'o// oM badz+ra ma tA be ga ya swA hA// nas kyi lo// oM mA hA ba la ya swA hA/ sran ma ma sha yi'o// oM badz+ra g+ha s+pha ri
300b2: swA hA/ gro'o// oM badz+ra ad nya swA hA/ A du ma bA ra'o// oM ti ti bri ma swA hA/ byang chub shing ngo do// oM badz+rA d+ha yA swA hA/ n+yA ya gro ta'o// oM badz+ra na ma ka yA swA hA/ a mri'i'o// oM AHhrIHhUM// thams cad du bsang ba'o// chus ni dag
300b3: par byed pa'o/ / rdul sogs mun bzhi bar byed// zhi ba chu'i dkyil 'khor bar// dkar po zlum po kho na'o// sa ni rma shing 'bru me tog/ bskyed dang dngos po rgyas par byed// rgyas pa sa yi dkyil 'khor ltar// ser po gru bzhi pa
300b4: na'o/ / rlung gis sdud dang 'byed pa dang // dbang du byas nas g.yo bar byed// dbang la rlung gi dkyil 'khor ltar// zla gam dmar po'i kha dog go// mes ni smin cing bsreg pa dang // dral shul gyis ni yal bar byed// drag po gru gsum
300b5: me'i dkyil 'khor/ / nang dmar rgyab ni nag por bya// mkha' la nyi ma shar ba ni// mun pa'i sgrib pa zhi bar byed// ni lha shar du bltas pa ste// dpal ldan gos kyang dkar po'o// nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe// dngos po rgyas par 'gyur ba'i
300b6: phyir/ / rgyas pa byang du bltas bya ba// gos ni ser ram ljang khu shis// nyi ma thal nas mtshan mo ni// dbang du dngos po 'gyur ba'i phyir// dbang la nub phyogs bltas pa dang // gos kyang dmar ser rab tu shis// nyi ma lhor 'gro'i
300b7: dus su ni/ / shin du grang ba'i chu yis ni// rtsa sogs dngos rnams bsad nas kyang // des dang 'thor dang dengs pa dang // skabs dang g.yar dang dub pa dang // rab tu g.yos dang bcas par 'gyur// mngon spyod lho'i phyogs bltas
300b8: nas/ / gos kyang sngo dang nag po bya// tsam pa ka dang bu ti ka/ lag skyes pad ma dkar po dang // ku mud dkar po zla seng rnams// chu gtsang dang bar bcas pa dag/ zhi ba'i las la mchod par bya// man 'dzu nA ga ba
301a1: gari/ sa su le dang a s+thas dang // gser mdog chen po chu drang dang / tse'u li sar dang pad ma se ra// chu bo chen po chur bcas pa// rgyas pa'i las la bsngags pa'o// ma tsin dang man du dmapa/ lo yi tshe dang nya sha nams// sin dur/
301a2: dang dbang ma dmar// ku mu ta rigs dmar po rnams// lu ma'i chu dang bcas pa ste// dbang gi las la mchod par bya// ud pal k+She ba la ka dang // ud khye ba dang ma mi she/ dzu mong sbyin la mgo bo dang // pag na 'dan don pa la rnams// khron pa'i chu dang /
301a3: lhan cig tu// mngon spyod las la mchod par bya// sA lu dkar po zan dang 'o// bri ka spos ni zhi ba la// sA lu dmar po'i za na 'o ma// tsan dan dmar po dbang la'o// gro dang ma sha ser ba'i zan// hu lu ka ni rgyas pa la'o// nas dang bra po'i zan gu gul//
301a4: bcos pa'i sha dang lhan cig ste// drag po'i las de zhal zas dang // bdug spos bye brag shes par bya// ni mar dang ni a ba se'i// sdong bur ldan pa'i mar me'i ni// zhi ba'i las la shin du shis// yang na pad dkar sdong bu'o// til lam shin du
301a5: dngas ma dang / / sa ri ta'i sdong bu ni// rgyas pa'i las la shin du shes// yang na pa yi lag gi cha// na ke la'i mar dang ni// pad ma dmar po'i mar dang ni// dbang gi las la shin du shis// yang na pa ya ma ri'o// lung dang ci li mar dang ni// tsi tri'i sdong pa/
301a6: mar me ni// yang nag so ma'i shun pa yin// mdog/ dmar dal zhing gsal ba ni// gang ri'i rtse ltar rab 'bar ba// bar ze spa gul spos dkar dri// zhi ba'i las ni 'grub par 'gyur// mdog dmar g.yo zhing mog pa la// nyi ma thal ka'i ri rtse
301a7: shib sgra ma li ka la 'o'i/ bang gi las 'grub the tshom med// mdog ser mig g.yo dngas pa la/ nyi ma shar ba'idi ltar 'bar// sgrub bla tsam pa ka li rbi// rgyas pa'i las 'thab the tshom med// leb rgan mdog ldan 'khyil zhing sdug/ dung
301a8: sgra rul dri thob dang / nags kyi bo ltar 'bar ba// mngon spyod las la 'grub par 'gyur/ 'jig rten ting 'dzin ldan 'grub pa'i// drang srong rigs la dpag med kyang // me yi wa ni bzhi bcu pa'i// sbyin sreg las la thang bar bya// 'dzi/
301b1: na 'das pa' zhi 'dzin can// cu gnyis grangs ni gzung bar bya// mtha' na ga dngas ba ka/ t+ya k+Shas bras kyi dro dang // sgrub yid skyes khro bo dang / dmar po srang tsham 'i// b+his pa ke bcu gnyis po// phan 'dogs la sogs las la snang /
301b2: ba sbyin pasag thal bas ni// thung po phraman par byed/ dbang gi thal bas 'byung ba 'ching// rgas pas 'dod pa'i las sbyin byed// dab co la gdong bar bya/ drag pas 'byung posel bar byed// lam gyi gzung drug dang bar bya//
301b3: dbang gizhing phyogs dang // rab bskyed mos tshal du gtor// dag par byed pas chu bo ltar// rgyas pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang // gang bar byed pa rgya mtsho ltar// sbyin bsreg gis ni lha mnyes shing // sngags bsgrub sngags kyi las rnams 'akru/
301b4: drang srong tshogs rnams thams cad dang // dri za'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang 'byung ba'i tshigs rnams thams cad dang // sbyin bsreg gis ni rab dga' nas// rnal 'byor thogs byed bsrung ba dang / blob phyir tshe da dpal 'phel zhing //
301b5: nad med longs spyod rgyas pa dang // bsam pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba las me la brten pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
301b6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo zhes bya ba// mkha' la yi ge sprul nas ni// 'gro don sna tshogs mdzad pa zhig/ 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor der lhags nas// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// mchod pa'i sprin ci
301b7: rgyas par mchod/ / phyogs cig 'khor nas ston pa la// mgrin gcig gsung ni sten pa yis// 'di skad tshig ni gsol ba 'debs// oM mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa'i sku// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// chos kyi longs spyod ci snyed pa
301b8: rdzogs par longs spyod mdzad phyag 'tshal/ / gang la mkho ba de'i gtso bo// 'dren pa gzugs brnyan du ma 'chang // sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i sku// bde ba che la phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'gyur rnam dag byang chub lam// phyogs chos byang chub
302a1: ma / / sa da ma 'as na ga/ rnams ldan thab k+Sha26// mad/ / na rgyun dz+nyAn/ nga khams rgyam byung / N+Da
302a2: da #ca / / pa / bapa A // ga
302a3: bas / dang rgan yas bkas pal// ba rnams 'byung bas kyad par lags/ rgyal po rigs dang dman pas ga/ zugs ma thaganas pa ldan ni// tha~M sa rgyas satha// di 'byung sa da
302a4: 'phags/ / mgon po bcom ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas// dpal chen ye shes kun gyi mdzod// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gzi can// 'gro ba 'dren gcod ded dpon gyi// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas
302a5: pa yi/ / 'gro ba sna tshogs phan don du// ci ltar 'gyur mdzad bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan thub pa che// pad ma'i spyan gdangs 'dzum mdzad nas// tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis// 'gro la phan phyir 'di skad gsungs//
302a6: dge byed phyag rgya sngags dang bcas// 'gro la phan phyir zhus pa ni// legs so rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo che// shes rab 'chang ba khyod legs so// sems dpa' chen po de phyir ngas// khyod la ngo mtshar legs par bshad// khyod kyang rtse gcig
302a7: yid kyis nyon/ / legs par zungal rgya cher spros// ras sam grog shing shun gang // 'jam zhing nag ris med pa la// gur gum 'gi'u wang sen rtsi dang // tsan dan gyis ni phyag rgya bri// pad ma 'dab brgyad mu khyud bcas// 'od dang ldan pa
302a8: bri bar bya/ / d+ha ra d+ha ra dang po ste// gnyis par d+hi ri d+hi ri s+pho// gsum pa d+hu ru d+hu ru ste/ i ti bi Ti bzhi lnga pa/ tsa le tsa le gnyis bri'o// pra tsa le gnyis drug par ro// ku su me dang ku su ma// bdun pa bris te brgyad pa la// b+ha le i li maM
302b1: ma mtshati nga la dag nyas bas padams pa'o/ ga la la banas sngags pa' bang / mjogs dgrus kyis ka dmigs nas// gtsang pa ma mas pa na// sngags byung ba namams sa gdan /
302b2: 'ang ni srung ba'i mchog du 'gyur// nad dang yams nad gdon nams dang // 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob par nges// reg sngags zlog na khyad par dri// rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga la// 'od kyi rab zlum po yi// ri mo gnyis dang bcas pa waM//
302b3: rwa rnams la ni hUM gnyis par// rig sngags zlog dang bcas pa bri// lte bar oM niHswA hA 'bar// bdag nyid bsrungs shes bri bar bya// mu khyud dang por bri bar bya// gzigs dbang yid bzhin nor sngags so// gnyis par gdong
302b4: bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ / gsum par pad ma gar dbang gi/ sngags rnams g.yas su bskor bar bya// gal te nad yams zlog pa la// 'dab brgyad pad ma mu khyud gsum// sngon ltar yi ge bkod pa la// mu khyud gnyis par spyan
302b5: gyi sngags/ / gsum par rten 'brel sngags bris nas// lus sam 'gul du thogs pas ni// nad rims dang ni lkog 'brum tshogs/ rlung gis rdul bzhin sel bar 'gyur// de nas tshig de thos ma thag/ lha min bu mo nad bdag mo//
302b6: sa tu de bi zhes bya ba// bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas ste// bu mo khris ni mgrin gcig tu// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// rje btsun 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig po// mgon po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// bdag gi sngam
302b7: 'di gang 'dzin pa/ / gal te 'brum nad byung na ni// bdag ni sems can dmyal bar 'grod ma pa a 'di ni dran par bya// rje bal bya'i ka ka ba ni ta// su ma ya bi las ka/ ra ni/ ki shun pan Na t+pa li rten mi// ke na kAr+Na tsarbanaM/
302b8: la min nad ma na u0f7f// ma yi bar nad bur d+ha// dra tsa bid tra tsid tra na dang na// sa sU de wi me wa// lha mos de skad gsol ma thag/ mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to// oM oM b+ha ba ti/ bidi ti mi ti/ ga tsan rba ka ra ni a muH
303a1: mo gtag rdab / / ma rba Sh+TahA// rgyan panabs ldan pa sngags da// kun du bzlas las 'grub par 'jud// sad+hanas dras d+har swAta// sadabum nyams / ba la// rba gam/ bdud ba u0f7f//
303a2: rtsa bzhi bzlas nas kyang // lus sam mgul dra gdags par bya/ kha ga tig tig rngaH zag shig/ ta tha yo pra tsa la ti dr-i dz+nyA phaT/ sran ma rdog po re re la// brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad bzlas pa ye// 'bru bdun thum por byas pa zhig/ dri bzangs
303a3: bcas la mgul du thogs/ / yams nad kun dang 'brum na gnang // shin du gdug pa kun sel 'khrug de nas rig sngags 'chang ba so// dpal bred mas ni 'di skad gsol// bdag gi rig sngags 'di zlos pa// rims nad kun dang bral
303a4: bar 'gyur/ / na mo rang na tra yA ya/ na ma A rU ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma tA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo badz+ra mu ra be dza ya ta thA ga ta a ra ha te b+h+yaHsa myag saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+re badz+re/ ma hA badz+re/ sarba b+hi r-i thA/
303a5: han ha na badz+ra/ sarba b+hA pra shra ma na ye swA hA// mi sgra mi rus sle tres dang // gu gul yungs dkar sgog skya dang // shing kun bla rtsi 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad phyogs bzhir hriHyig bri// 'tshams bzhir bris te dbus su mid// sngags
303a6: 'di mu khrud dang po la/ / gnyis gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags// zis nas lus sam mgul du thogs// nad rims thams cad sel ba dang // rnal 'byor kun dang ldan par 'gyur// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// 'gro
303a7: ba'i don du 'di skad gsol/ / rang 'byung can gyi ras la ni// sen rtsis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// mu khyud gsum dang ldan pa bri// rtsibs bzhi hrIHla g.yon bskor ru// hrIHd+hi wa shi ku ru Sh+T+r-iHsu khrud dang por mgon po na// pad
303a8: ma gar dbang sngags ze'o/ / gnyis pa ud pa la dmar po phreng// gsum pa lcags kyu nyi shu gcig/ dbus su be yig trir bcas bri// lha da ma nyid kyang dam byed na// 'gro ba gzhan lta spos ci dgos// gsol dang bkra shis
303b1: brjong pa dang / gas can 'ad pag/ 6gas da rgyams // dbyas pa nga stan ras gzugs dbang bag/ padagra gnag tung sngags za/ rnapas kun la d+hA pag // bgags pang yang can mas ga//
303b2: sra khrud dang ba spyan ram gcigs/ nyal la'i sngags thal/ gnas pa wa ba taskad sngags// gsum par bgegs dpa'i sngags bris la// dargyab pa yi thang pa bri// gang shig 'khor lo 'di brus pas// srang bar bkar macwo
303b3: chag thug pa can yang 'thor byed na/ / pran tshogs 'byer ba smos ci dgos// gang la ser snga rnam tshags shing // longs spyod 'phel bar mi 'gyur na// phun sum tshogs ldan dpal 'phel phyir// slob pa'i phyag rgya bshad par bya//
303b4: rgyal po'am ni dge 'dun la// gtsang ldan ras bzang blangs nas kyang // dag par bkrus te dri bzang byug/ legs par brgyan nas thig btab ste// gur gum dang ni bla rtsi yis// pad ma 'dab ma bcu drug bri// phyogs bzhir 'am
303b5: mar dpal be'u ste/ / 'tshams bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri// 'tsham brgyad la ni yi ge ga~M/ oM dang badz+rad ke hU~M// yi ge drug gis bskor bar bya// mu khrud dang por mi bshol sngags// gnyis pa gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags//
303b6: gsub pa ud pal phreng ba ste// ya tog rtse 'am mdzod bzhag nas// gsol btab mchod na longs spyod 'phel// bud med gang zhig bu 'dod pas// de bzhin pad ma 'dab brgyad pa// phyogs bzhir hrIHni 'tshams su drang /
303b7: dbus su khye'u yi gzugs shig bri// phyogs bzhir yid bzhin nor bu thaM// sngags bu stsol bcas bri bar bya// 'tshams bzhir oM dang a ma ra// dzI wan tI ye swA hAs bskor// mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs// pad ma rgyan
303b8: lung can gyi sngags/ / gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags// gsum pa ud pal dmar po'i phreng // 'od 'phro rtag par mchod pa dang // phul du byung ba'i bstod pas bstod// gsol ba 'debs shing sngags bzlas na/
304a1: bu stsol 'gyur la the tshom med// bsrung dang nor 'phel dbang byed dang // bu slong pa'i phyag rgya ni// smin drug snar ma rgyal la bri// lhag ma rnams ni ci bder bri// gang zhig sems stor yid mi dga'// glo bur yi mug
304a2: skye 'gyur na/ / pad ma 'dab ma bzhi pa yi// dbus su rang gzugs mtshan ma bri// 'dab mar rdo rje mdog bzhi pa// gdod bcu gcig pa'i sngags kyis bskor// mu khyud la ni spyan ras gzigs// don yod zhags pa'i sngags
304a3: bri'o/ / gnyis par rdo rje phreng ba bri// de'i rgyab 'od kyi phreng ba bI// rtag par mchod cing gsol ba gad ba// nad sel tshe ring bsod nams 'phel// gang zhing shes rab 'dod pas ni// dpal be'u rgyal po'i du mar ni// tri yig rgyab du sngam
304a4: 'dis bskor/ / oM dang ska la de ska la// ma ni swA hA zhes pa bri// de rgyab mu khyud 'khor ba la// mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa sngags bri// de rgyab 'od kyi rab bri// gang gis 'di 'chad mchod pa la// nad dang gnod pa kun bral te// drug dang
304a5: rims nad 'joms pa dang / / shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur// yul du lo thog nyams pa dang // thog 'brug se ba rgod pa dang // klu dngas bdag gnod pa ste// de bas la sbyor ba bshad par bya// shid kun dkar po mnyams/
304a6: da ltung / cug // rnams pa sa// ma sal pa'i / kyi /

304a8: thaldan nams// 'khor dang bcas te lus sems 'gyur/ gang gi khyim dug dong ba dang / ma nyi ta mags sams nang can/ bsal pa thabs kyis phyag byed// brtan par drang chung tshigs rnams can// bang
304b1: ri'i shing la ni/ / khA gang khru gnyis dbyibs gru bzhi// gos grugs chag tshogs med pa la// shin tu srab 'jam sor gnyis rngams// shing de la ni rta bzas gzugs// 'khor lo gdugs dang bcas pa yi// brtsegs pa'i
304b2: g.yas zur dang po ni/ / rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga ste// gnyis pa ud pal dmar po'o// gsum pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyud ser// bzhi par pad ma dkar po'o// g.yon zung dang por pad ma dmar// gnyis pa ud pal sngon po'o//
304b3: gsum par nor bu bzhi rgya gram// nang khong du ni pad ma bya// 'dab ma brgyad pa 'od ldan pa'o// lte ba dang ni 'dab brgyad la// oM dang bi shA tsi pan// sha ba ri sarba bya d+hI/ pra sha ma ni swA hA zhes// baM yig la ni bskor bar bri// mu khyu dang po spyan
304b4: ras gzigs/ / gdong bcu gcig gi sngags bri'o// gnyis par chos kyi gtsug tor gyi// rtsa ba'i phreng sngags bri bar bya// rgya skegs dang ni mtshal yin te// de la shing sbyin byug par bya// mchod dang gsol gdab sngags dag ni// bdun/
304b5: stong re re brjod byas nas// sgo gong la gdags byung 'jug tshe// 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// rta phyugs yams nad ma lus la// rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten mgon gyi rig sngags mthus// myur du sel
304b6: bar mnan pa dang / / zlog dang bcing bar mdzod ces brjod// phyugs bdag chen pos skyong bltar// glang po rta bong ma te tshogs// brtan zhing nad dang gnod pa med// shin du 'phel zhing rgyal bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya
304b7: pa/ / dmag dpung chen po 'jigs pa la// khyad par ru ni skyob pa yi// phyag rgya sbyor ba mnyan par gyis// yud pas ras sam shing la ni// pad dkar steng du kha T+wAM dang // ral gri 'od ma bri bar bya// de la gdug gu gsum gyis bskor//
304b8: dang po gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags// gnyis pa seng ge sgra yi sngags// gsum par ha ya chen po'i sngags// de rgyab de yi ra ba bri// 'di la gsol ba btab nas ni// g.yul dor khyer te zhugs pa gang // dgra dpung chen po 'bros 'gyur
305a1: te/ / nga nyid g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur// longs spyod phyir ni byang bltas bri// dbang byed pa ni nub tu ste// g.yul zlog pa ni lhor bltas bri// lhag ma rnams la shar bltas pri// dkar ser dmar dang sngo ba yi// dbye bas
305a2: zas dang gos shes bya/ / 'dzum dang rngam dang rgod dang khro// bzhin gyi rnam par bshad pa yi// sngags dang sngags kyi 'od phreng dang // lha yi kha dog dbye ba dang // snod la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang // rgyan yang de ltar shes par bya// kun kyang rin chen pad/
305a3: ma'i gdan// kha dog sna tshogs ldan par ni// sngags kyi yig 'bru'i lha rnams bzhugs// sngags rdzogs nas ni sngags su dmigs// gang gis phyag rgya 'chang byed la// byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs rnams dang // rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs
305a4: rnams dang / / 'jig rten 'dren pa'i tshogs bcas dang // spyan ras gzigs dbang tshegs chen dang // khro bo tshigs bcas ma lus dang // 'jig rten skyong pa grags ldan rnams// ci 'dod las rnams ma lus pa'i// grogs dang dpung du bya/
305a5: nas ni/ tshul bzhin du ni bsgrub pa la// brtson 'grus gang dang gang gis kyang // the tshom du ni mi bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba las phyag rgya la brten pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// /
305a6: de nas mkha' la gshegs pa yi// rig pa 'dzin pa'i drang srong mchog/ mtshan dpe du ma rgyas pa che// nyi ma'i gong bu zhes byas// drang srong rje dpon tshogs kyi mchog/ 'gro don rdzogs mdzad thugs rje can// spyan ras gzigs dbang
305a7: mgon po la/ / sangs rgyas tshig gis 'di skad gsol// oM 'od zer du mther zug gi/ srid 'dab stug po sel byed rgyal// yon tan ye shes kyis brgyan sku// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// gsung snyan yan lag brjod
305a8: bral chos/ / bag chags ri bo snyil mdzad rgyal// skye 'gag bral ston sde snod gsum// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// kye 'gag gnod thal mnyam bzhag pa// ting 'dzin shes rab 'phel mdzad rgyal// ye shes gzigs pa
305b1: mtha' las grags/ / mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs sman dang sngags byar nas// yi gong bu'i ri wa ni// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub ma lus rdzogs pa yi// thugs rje'i nyi ma lham mdzad pa'i/
305b2: mgon po pad mas bshad du gsol// 'gro rnams ma rig 'dam las zhe na// sred pa'i theg pa rgya tham bcings// 'dod chags zhe sdang rkun pas g.yogs// nga rgyal phrag dog chu bos g.yengs// ngan rtog log lam g.yang sar lung /
305b3: bag med ser sna'i drag gis myos// sdig pa'i grib mas rnam par rgyal// bag chags 'thug po'i ri bos mnan// mgon po khyod ni thugs rjes ngal ba med// nyes pa'i rgya mtsho bsal ba'i phyir// shes rab thabs 'byung bshad
305b4: du gsol/ / de nas 'jig rten mgon po'i rje// thugs rje thugs dpal mnga' ba yi// thugs dam rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu bcas// khyad par gsung 'di bka' stsal to// mtha' dag gzugs sgra thos pa dang // rdzu 'phrul bsgyur dang gzhan
305b5: sems shes/ / 'das dang ma 'ongs don shes dang // mtha' yas shes drug las spyod pa// dngos dang rtag dang cha 'thun gyis// rnam pa bcwa brgyad dag tu 'gyur// phra dang yang dang mchod par bya ba dang // bdag por gyur dang dbang du 'gyur
305b6: bdang / / gar yang phyin yang 'dod dgur ldan pa dang // dga' 'gur gnas te dbang phyug yon tan no// rnam pa brgyad kyi dper bya yis// longs spyod dbang dang lus la dbang // tshel dbang dang rkang mgyogs dang // tshul mi 'byid mkha'
305b7: la 'gro/ sa 'og 'gro dang mi snang ba// ni rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs// dngos po gang dang gang bsgrub rnams// ri lu las ni 'byung 'gyur gyi// gzhan gyis myur du 'grub mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i ril bu ni// 'tshams med
305b8: lasogs byed pas kyang / / rnyed ma thag tu dngos grub 'gyur// nye dang dbang ldan lha yi sras// ma mos dbang du byas gyur na// 'byung po sha za lha min mi// ma mo mkha' 'gro 'byung po klu// dud 'gro la sogs rdzogs gzugs can// sems can
306a1: gzhanas sgom ci dgos/ ngos ba bzang po 'dod pa yis// byung bar rin 'di ba sgrub bya// 'gi zad dang ni mig pa mig/ grang ngas pabar por gyur ba pa// ril rtsa man tshad byas nas// sgod gtsang nang drug nas
306a2: par bya/ / u0f88u0f90 li mngan du sngags brjod na// ldan can ma mthong snang ba'am// thos sa ma ni bde gshegs gzugs/ yid 'od mngon du byung ba sogs// mar ngo gsum gyis 'byung bar 'gyur// nas zla pa gnas bzung //

306a8: gos/ / ris bu rgya sran tshad byas nas/ re re la yang stong stong brjod// rlung dang nyims ma rig par// bskams nas snod gtsang gzhag par bya// ri su tsam cig sung na yang // rgyal po blon po 'khor bcas kyis// mthong na bu bzhin
306b1: gzigs pas/ / tha mal skye bo smos ci dgos// nor rnams gzhan gyis ster ba dang // bsgob la ni dag btsan 'gyur// ga bur gur gram 'gi wang dang / tsan dan ga na dbarda dang // kArtsi dag ste cha mnyam du// re re thugs sor bzlas nas/

306b3: bu mo dang / / blon po la sogs dbang du 'gyur// ba rab cug tsam gyis grol bar 'ong// gdams pa thams cad don yod 'gyur// spyi bor btags na byad snyoms dang // g.yul las shin tu rgyal bar 'gyur// gal te phye mas bdugs pas
306b4: kyang / sdig pa thams cad byang 'gyur te// kun gyis mthong dang dga' ba dang // gzi byin 'phags pa kun gyis mchod// ga pur gla rtsi gur gum dang // tsan dan gla tsi ka ko la// spos kyi rgyal po pad ma dang // u dpal sngo dang tsan dan dmar/

306b6: lub gi wang dang / / yung dang sbyar ba gur gum dang // ga pur dang ni gla rtsi gsum// re re la yang sngags stod bzla// de nas sku yin dgul btags te// stong bzlas dril nas ril bu bya// mig nad sa lan chu dang sbyar// so nad la ni ka ka ru/ na ba'i
306b7: nad la ru ta ste/ / u dpal mu tig mig nad la// gre ba'i nad la ba sha ka/ glo nad la ni ba le ka/ sha ka ri'i thang dang sbyar// rlung nad la ni mar dang sbyar// bris nad la ni tig ta dang // bad kan la ni lpa dang sbyar// mdze nad la ni dug mo rungs//

307a1: bgegs tshogs sel bar byed/ / ke su rtsa dang lde'u gsher dang // ba la ta ka tsha ba gsum// ser po mu zi phye ma rnams// sbrar rtsi dang bcas ril bu bya// pad ma gar dbang sngags stor bzlas// zlos pa tsam gyis lus rgyas te//

307a6: 'gyur smos ci dgos/ / gi wang sA dA tsi na dang // sre ta spang gi ri lu bya// sngags stong bzlas nas khar bcug na// 'das pa'i don rnams shes par 'gyur// gi wang sug pa phye ma dang // ba ra swA ta ta su r-i// a ra tu ri sbrang rtsir
307a7: bcas/ / ril bu byas nas sngags stong bzla/ mid pas ma 'ongs don rnams shes// gzhan yang nad 'don byed pa yi// ri lu chen po bshad par bya// rgyal dang rnam rgyal na gul// kan d+ha na gu li dang ni// ru Ni a ba
307a8: ya ba ni/ / i ba yan ta ga ra// gan d+ha ga dang bri yang gu// 'khor lo tshe dang 'khor lo dang // biSh+Ta ka Ti de bzhin du// so mar tsa unan ti// re re la yang sngags bred dang // brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya// de nas brdungs te
307b1: kA dang bcas/ / byas pa la ni dpyad par // / zla 'dod ma la mgul bar gdags// 'di brtags pa yi des pag/ 'jigs pa brgyad dang na dulas thol// bsang bu dag bskor bcas// sngags kyi sno drab rdzam

307b3: rnam/ maHk+ShA la thAd+han swAH/ sred dang tho sa sa spyo dang // du thug song po la bags// zhus pa dga' nga ba ze bstan// da las ban
307b4: med/ / rtag tu grags brjod pa rtse sems can// sman rapa gzigs nyid la cher dang // gdung bgacan la mchis can// srang thob tha mang rab dga' ba'i// skyes mchod de la rab dge zhing // 'jig rten skyong gi lha rnams dang /
307b5: bzung ba la sogs smos ci dgos// rtag par rang gi yid la ni// snying po gas grags pa ba par bya// nye ba'i snying po lus dag pa'i// lha yang dngal nye bar byed// rtsa ba'i sngags rnams brjod ma ga// khri dang 'bum
307b6: dngas ya dang / / sa ya gsum dang drug brjod de// kha cig la yang bzhi dang ni// lnga tsam gyis ni de grub yin// las la sbyar ba bdun dang ni// bcu bzhi nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // brgya dang de bzhin stong gis rdzogs//
