307b8: rtsom na de dag rnams/ / de skad gsungs pa'i de ma thag/ rdo rje snying po nyi 'od de// pad dkar rin chen snying po dang // pad spyan gzigs kyi snying po dang // ye shes dbang phyug pa da dbang phyug/ byang chub sems
308a1: dpa' chen po rnams/ / rang rang sde dpung sder bcas pa// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams// 'jig rten dbang la cher dmigs nas// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams bkram bya ste// rin chen rigs las
308a2: 'khrungs pa yi/ / mchod panam mkha'i gtos par bkang // rol mo dum ltab lhub dang // sil stan lha yi tshogs rnams kyis// sprin mdzes tshogs rnams rab 'khrigs ltar// bkod pa mtha' yas bsham bya ste
308a3: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/ / mgon gyur ye shes mnga' ba rnams// spyan ras gzigs dpang gsung stan la// yid rang skyes nas mtshan chen brjod// spyan ras gzigs dbang mchog brtan che// 'jig rten
308a4: dbang po dbang phyug che/ / pad ma sems dpa' pad 'byung che// rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa chen po chos rgyal gtso// blo gros chen po sems dpa' che// pang ma 'chang dang pad ma dpa'// pad ma'i mgon khyod
308a5: phyag 'tshal lo/ / pad ma las byung dam pa'i yid// pad ma gsal mdzad dga' mdzad po// pad ma'i rdo rje pad ma'i sku// khyod mchog spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// snang ba kun chen thabs po che// che mnyam dga' ba dgongs pa
308a6: che/ dpa' bo chen po brtan chen rgyal// bde ba chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// bsam chen mkhyen chen theg chen po// rnal 'byor chen po mes po che// bde stsol bde mdzad dga' mdzad che// pad ma rgyal zhal phyag 'tshal lo//
308a7: chos mnga' don mnga' pad ma rgyal// dag pa chos mnga' chos mchog 'dzin// rmad 'byung chen ldan chos rab 'chang // chos kyi tshogs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog sems dpa'// rin chen
308a8: sems dpa' chos sems dpa'/ / dam tshig sems dpa' las sems dpa'// kun mkhyen sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// 'jig rten dpa' bo dpa' bo mchog/ rnam par gzigs gtso skyob mdzad che//
308b1: 'jig rten gsal mdzad 'jig rten don// 'jig rten mgon po phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten yi ge kha dog che// yi ge che mtshungs yig drug mchog/ yi ge'i rang bzhin yi ge gzigs// yi ge 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal//
308b2: padar 'i phyag tu pa da ma'i lag/ legs mo sbyin mdzad dbugs sbyin pa'o// sangs rgyas chags de sangs rgyas cas// sangs rgyas che gyi phyag 'tshal lo// chad med tshaH sangs rgyas s+ho// gzugs bzang 'chang ldan
308b3: rdorje gzugs/ / gzi brjid che mchog chos snang ba// snang bar mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gtso mgon rgyal po pad ma'i dpal// chos kyi dpal mgon 'dre mdzad pa// tshangs pa'i mgon chen khyab 'jug mgo//
308b4: tshangs pa'i sras khyod phyag 'tshal lo// cher gsal gtso bo snang la mchog/ 'od chen mdzad pa rang gsal mdzad// snang ba chen po kun gsal mgon// snang ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spyan can spyan po
308b5: che/ / chos kyi spyan te gzigs pa che// ting 'dzin chen po ye shes mtsho// rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo// 'dren pa'i gtso bo dbang sgyur gtso// mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas sras// rgyal thabs mnyas pa khyu mchog che// sangs rgyas
308b6: dpag med phyag 'tshal lo/ / drag po chen po rtul chen po// tal chen po seng ge sgra// mgrin sngon gar gyi dbang phyug gtso// ye shes gtsug gtor phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang // 'chang la nad med
308b7: bgegs med de/ / dpal 'byor 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong // yang yang ltar skye mya ngan 'da'// de skad gsungs nas blo ldan rnams// rang rang stan la mngon par 'khod// de tshe phyogs bcu rnam par g.yos// bdud rig
308b8: thams cad mog por gyur/ / de nas gzungs kyi dbang phyug gis// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la// rtog pa'i ye shes ngo bo nyid// nga yi mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so// kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul can//
309a1: dkar lam bcu pa rnam spro ba// sems can gang du 'dod sbyor ba'i// rigs ni rigs chen thams cad pa'o// lus ngag yid bcu spyod bcu ni// rgyun mi 'chad du sbyor mod kyang // rigs pa yi ni gzigs brnyan mthus//
309a2: sngags sbyor gsang sngags 'dzin pa yi// lhal goms pa lha mthong ngam// mngon shes dang po sems gsal bas// mkha' mnyam sems kyi rdzu 'phrul che// sems sdang rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa// mtshan ma phrab la sogs
309a3: pa'i/ / mngon shes 'jig rten gsal mthong sa// 'jig rten 'das pa'i snying po ste// brtan pa'i ye shes las byung ba'o// dam tshig sdom pa mkha' mnyam spyod// sems dang sems dpa' dbyer med dang // zhi lam sgo
309a4: skar chad pa dang / / sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog dang lam// bzhi bzhi lhun gyis grub pa dang // rten 'brel zab don mngon gyur pa// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs kun mchog/ mtshan med ting 'dzin la gnas nas// /
309a5: rtsol bcas gzhan don sgrub pa dang // rtsol med shugs kyis pad 'byung dang // nges tshig chos don spros pa'i mtha'// rdzu 'phrul dum spyod yul la// rigs chen yongs su grub pa'i sa// mkha' spyod phun sum tshogs ldan cing //
309a6: sems kyi snang ba du mar bsgyur// dngos rnams spos spang bsdu spyod pa// rig 'dzin phyag rgya chen po yis// chos su kun snang kun tu 'od// bde sbyar snang ba pad ma'i spyan// yi ge 'khor lo sprul tshogs che// mtshon bya mtshan
309a7: rdo rje 'dzin/ / zag med mi shes tha ma 'is// 'ad+ha 'bral med pa'i bad chen sa// de sar d+ha/ ni sangs rgyas kyi// satshan ma med mthar gnas so// dbo zlas med chos sems pa// gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i rgyu gcig go/
309a8: sems can sems snyoms byang sems 'dzin// nges par sgrub pa'i rgyu gnyis so// sems can mi gtang tshul khrims bsrung // sngags don mi spong nyid dang gsum// rang gi sngags grub gzhan gyi sngags// bar mi
309b1: gcod dang 'gro ba la/ / byams pa bsrub dang snying rje sgrug// grub par byed pa'i chu bzhi'o// dben pa brten dang 'dra 'dzi stod// thos byabs pa ning bad dan spyod// phyi la sngags song ga sdang byung // de dag sngags sgrub rgyu //
309b2: da pa 'dun pa gsol pa dang // phyi nang sngags la mi spyod dang // spros med ston pa'i gzhung 'jug dang // theg chen mdo gzhung 'dzin pa dang // sngags gzhung tshol ba mi skyo dang // dge sbyong ba rtson dang drug pa'o// bzlas dang
309b3: sbyin bsreg mchod gtor brtson/ / phyi rol dka' thub gdung med dang // snod bcud 'og min gnas lha dang // bu mo pha rol phyin yul lha// 'gro ba mi bsku chos mi 'byed// theg dman mi len pa dang bdun// nyan thos rang
309b4: rgyal blo ldan dang / / rig 'dzin rdzu 'phrul the tshom med// lha dang bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dang // dbang bskur lung nod spro ba dang // ser sna med dang gtong la dga'// gsang ba dga' zhing mi g.yengs dang // gzi brjid dbang che'i
309b5: lus thob dang / / grags kun blo ldan brgyad por blta// skur ba med cing bden par sla// bag yod tshul 'chos spangs pa ste// brgyad pa de yang bsgrub pa'i rgyu// rgyu med 'bras bu ga la srid// gang zhig lcags kyus bzung bas
309b6: gnyis re nas/ / klu phrug 'bum phrag 'dren ltar dge ba'i sems// kun slong byang chub rin chen thob mdzad rgyu// rtag par 'chang na gnas sgyur byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// blo ldan rnams la bka' stsal pa//
309b7: legs so legs so sems dpa' che// gang dag de dag de bzhin du// bde ba 'dod par g.yeng ba dang // des ni sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das// gdung ba chags sdang 'khrug pa dang // des ni log pa'i chos 'dor yang // dge sbyong log
309b8: tshangs pa'i gdon/ / sngags log spyod byed rig 'dzin gdon// gdul dka' dag la rgyun rings so// skye ngan 'jigs phyir blo zab spyod// gang gi khyim du rgyud 'di yod// bri dang klag dang mchod pa dang // rim gro cher dugasal byed dang //
310a1: rgya// bkra shis tshe ring dpal 'byor skyed// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs de dag dang / rig pa'i
310a2: lha mo dang / khro bo du ma dang nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
310a3: bstod do/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
310a4: girtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba rdzog s+ho/ / rig pa'i 'byung gnas rig pa'i 'od zer gyis shes rab pad ma rgyas pa'i kha che'i yul bdud rtsi'i 'byung ba'i gtsug lag khang chen por rab
310a5: te chen po so ma shrI T+Ta bya zhes bya ba dang / / bod kyi lo tsAb kyar dge slong tshul khrims 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// ye d+harmA u0f7f tu pra b+ha lA he tun+te/ Sh+Than+ta thA ga to h+ya ba ta/ teSh+Thany+dzalo
310a6: noroHe wam+b+ha dI ma hA shwa ma NaH/ sar+b+ba bA bas+t+ra ka ra Na ku sha la phyo bas m+ba de// swanid+hi pa ri da ma nu me tad+had+hA nA bA sa ne// maM ga la b+ha wan+tu// kra b+ha ma sgras rbA dza ga tAM/
